2284  Zcoord_Index1.erase (Zcoord_Index1.begin() + iEdge);
2285  Variable_Index1.erase (Variable_Index1.begin() + iEdge);
2286  IGlobalID_Index1.erase (IGlobalID_Index1.begin() + iEdge);
2287  JGlobalID_Index1.erase (JGlobalID_Index1.begin() + iEdge);
2288 
2289  Remove = true; break;
2290  }
2291  if (Remove) break;
2292  }
2293  } while (Remove == true);
2294 
2295  /*--- Remove repeated edges computing distance, this could happend because the MPI ---*/
2296 
2297  do { Remove = false;
2298  for (iEdge = 0; iEdge < Xcoord_Index0.size()-1; iEdge++) {
2299  for (jEdge = iEdge+1; jEdge < Xcoord_Index0.size(); jEdge++) {
2300 
2301  /*--- Edges with the same orientation ---*/
2302 
2303  if ((((IGlobalID_Index0[iEdge] == IGlobalID_Index0[jEdge]) && (JGlobalID_Index0[iEdge] == JGlobalID_Index0[jEdge])) ||
2304  ((IGlobalID_Index0[iEdge] == JGlobalID_Index0[jEdge]) && (JGlobalID_Index0[iEdge] == IGlobalID_Index0[jEdge]))) &&
2305  (((IGlobalID_Index1[iEdge] == IGlobalID_Index1[jEdge]) && (JGlobalID_Index1[iEdge] == JGlobalID_Index1[jEdge])) ||
2306  ((IGlobalID_Index1[iEdge] == JGlobalID_Index1[jEdge]) && (JGlobalID_Index1[iEdge] == IGlobalID_Index1[jEdge])))) {
2307 
2308  Xcoord_Index0.erase (Xcoord_Index0.begin() + jEdge);
2309  Ycoord_Index0.erase (Ycoord_Index0.begin() + jEdge);
2310  Zcoord_Index0.erase (Zcoord_Index0.begin() + jEdge);
2311  Variable_Index0.erase (Variable_Index0.begin() + jEdge);
2312  IGlobalID_Index0.erase (IGlobalID_Index0.begin() + jEdge);
2313  JGlobalID_Index0.erase (JGlobalID_Index0.begin() + jEdge);
2314 
2315  Xcoord_Index1.erase (Xcoord_Index1.begin() + jEdge);
2316  Ycoord_Index1.erase (Ycoord_Index1.begin() + jEdge);
2317  Zcoord_Index1.erase (Zcoord_Index1.begin() + jEdge);
2318  Variable_Index1.erase (Variable_Index1.begin() + jEdge);
2319  IGlobalID_Index1.erase (IGlobalID_Index1.begin() + jEdge);
2320  JGlobalID_Index1.erase (JGlobalID_Index1.begin() + jEdge);
2321 
2322  Remove = true; break;
2323 
2324  }
2325 
2326  /*--- Edges with oposite orientation ---*/
2327 
2328  if ((((IGlobalID_Index0[iEdge] == IGlobalID_Index1[jEdge]) && (JGlobalID_Index0[iEdge] == JGlobalID_Index1[jEdge])) ||
2329  ((IGlobalID_Index0[iEdge] == JGlobalID_Index1[jEdge]) && (JGlobalID_Index0[iEdge] == IGlobalID_Index1[jEdge]))) &&
2330  (((IGlobalID_Index1[iEdge] == IGlobalID_Index0[jEdge]) && (JGlobalID_Index1[iEdge] == JGlobalID_Index0[jEdge])) ||
2331  ((IGlobalID_Index1[iEdge] == JGlobalID_Index0[jEdge]) && (JGlobalID_Index1[iEdge] == IGlobalID_Index0[jEdge])))) {
2332 
2333  Xcoord_Index0.erase (Xcoord_Index0.begin() + jEdge);
2334  Ycoord_Index0.erase (Ycoord_Index0.begin() + jEdge);
2335  Zcoord_Index0.erase (Zcoord_Index0.begin() + jEdge);
2336  Variable_Index0.erase (Variable_Index0.begin() + jEdge);
2337  IGlobalID_Index0.erase (IGlobalID_Index0.begin() + jEdge);
2338  JGlobalID_Index0.erase (JGlobalID_Index0.begin() + jEdge);
2339 
2340  Xcoord_Index1.erase (Xcoord_Index1.begin() + jEdge);
2341  Ycoord_Index1.erase (Ycoord_Index1.begin() + jEdge);
2342  Zcoord_Index1.erase (Zcoord_Index1.begin() + jEdge);
2343  Variable_Index1.erase (Variable_Index1.begin() + jEdge);
2344  IGlobalID_Index1.erase (IGlobalID_Index1.begin() + jEdge);
2345  JGlobalID_Index1.erase (JGlobalID_Index1.begin() + jEdge);
2346 
2347  Remove = true; break;
2348  }
2349  if (Remove) break;
2350  }
2351  if (Remove) break;
2352  }
2353 
2354  } while (Remove == true);
2355 
2356  if (Xcoord_Index0.size() != 1) {
2357 
2358  /*--- Rotate from the Y-Z plane to the X-Z plane to reuse the rest of subroutines ---*/
2359 
2360  if (config->GetGeo_Description() == FUSELAGE) {
2361  su2double Angle = -0.5*PI_NUMBER;
2362  for (iEdge = 0; iEdge < Xcoord_Index0.size(); iEdge++) {
2363  su2double XCoord = Xcoord_Index0[iEdge]*cos(Angle) - Ycoord_Index0[iEdge]*sin(Angle);
2364  su2double YCoord = Ycoord_Index0[iEdge]*cos(Angle) + Xcoord_Index0[iEdge]*sin(Angle);
2365  su2double ZCoord = Zcoord_Index0[iEdge];
2366  Xcoord_Index0[iEdge] = XCoord; Ycoord_Index0[iEdge] = YCoord; Zcoord_Index0[iEdge] = ZCoord;
2367  XCoord = Xcoord_Index1[iEdge]*cos(Angle) - Ycoord_Index1[iEdge]*sin(Angle);
2368  YCoord = Ycoord_Index1[iEdge]*cos(Angle) + Xcoord_Index1[iEdge]*sin(Angle);
2369  ZCoord = Zcoord_Index1[iEdge];
2370  Xcoord_Index1[iEdge] = XCoord; Ycoord_Index1[iEdge] = YCoord; Zcoord_Index1[iEdge] = ZCoord;
2371  }
2372  }
2373 
2374  /*--- Rotate nacelle secction to a X-Z plane to reuse the rest of subroutines ---*/
2375 
2376 
2377  if (config->GetGeo_Description() == NACELLE) {
2378 
2379  su2double Tilt_Angle = config->GetNacelleLocation(3)*PI_NUMBER/180;
2380  su2double Toe_Angle = config->GetNacelleLocation(4)*PI_NUMBER/180;
2381  su2double Theta_deg = atan2(Plane_Normal[1],-Plane_Normal[2])/PI_NUMBER*180 + 180;
2382  su2double Roll_Angle = 0.5*PI_NUMBER - Theta_deg*PI_NUMBER/180;
2383 
2384  su2double XCoord_Trans, YCoord_Trans, ZCoord_Trans, XCoord_Trans_Tilt, YCoord_Trans_Tilt, ZCoord_Trans_Tilt,
2385  XCoord_Trans_Tilt_Toe, YCoord_Trans_Tilt_Toe, ZCoord_Trans_Tilt_Toe, XCoord, YCoord, ZCoord;
2386 
2387  for (iEdge = 0; iEdge < Xcoord_Index0.size(); iEdge++) {
2388 
2389  /*--- First point of the edge ---*/
2390 
2391  /*--- Translate to the origin ---*/
2392 
2393  XCoord_Trans = Xcoord_Index0[iEdge] - config->GetNacelleLocation(0);
2394  YCoord_Trans = Ycoord_Index0[iEdge] - config->GetNacelleLocation(1);
2395  ZCoord_Trans = Zcoord_Index0[iEdge] - config->GetNacelleLocation(2);
2396 
2397  /*--- Apply tilt angle ---*/
2398 
2399  XCoord_Trans_Tilt = XCoord_Trans*cos(Tilt_Angle) + ZCoord_Trans*sin(Tilt_Angle);
2400  YCoord_Trans_Tilt = YCoord_Trans;
2401  ZCoord_Trans_Tilt = ZCoord_Trans*cos(Tilt_Angle) - XCoord_Trans*sin(Tilt_Angle);
2402 
2403  /*--- Apply toe angle ---*/
2404 
2405  XCoord_Trans_Tilt_Toe = XCoord_Trans_Tilt*cos(Toe_Angle) - YCoord_Trans_Tilt*sin(Toe_Angle);
2406  YCoord_Trans_Tilt_Toe = XCoord_Trans_Tilt*sin(Toe_Angle) + YCoord_Trans_Tilt*cos(Toe_Angle);
2407  ZCoord_Trans_Tilt_Toe = ZCoord_Trans_Tilt;
2408 
2409  /*--- Rotate to X-Z plane (roll) ---*/
2410 
2411  XCoord = XCoord_Trans_Tilt_Toe;
2412  YCoord = YCoord_Trans_Tilt_Toe*cos(Roll_Angle) - ZCoord_Trans_Tilt_Toe*sin(Roll_Angle);
2413  ZCoord = YCoord_Trans_Tilt_Toe*sin(Roll_Angle) + ZCoord_Trans_Tilt_Toe*cos(Roll_Angle);
2414 
2415  /*--- Update coordinates ---*/
2416 
2417  Xcoord_Index0[iEdge] = XCoord; Ycoord_Index0[iEdge] = YCoord; Zcoord_Index0[iEdge] = ZCoord;
2418 
2419  /*--- Second point of the edge ---*/
2420 
2421  /*--- Translate to the origin ---*/
2422 
2423  XCoord_Trans = Xcoord_Index1[iEdge] - config->GetNacelleLocation(0);
2424  YCoord_Trans = Ycoord_Index1[iEdge] - config->GetNacelleLocation(1);
2425  ZCoord_Trans = Zcoord_Index1[iEdge] - config->GetNacelleLocation(2);
2426 
2427  /*--- Apply tilt angle ---*/
2428 
2429  XCoord_Trans_Tilt = XCoord_Trans*cos(Tilt_Angle) + ZCoord_Trans*sin(Tilt_Angle);
2430  YCoord_Trans_Tilt = YCoord_Trans;
2431  ZCoord_Trans_Tilt = ZCoord_Trans*cos(Tilt_Angle) - XCoord_Trans*sin(Tilt_Angle);
2432 
2433  /*--- Apply toe angle ---*/
2434 
2435  XCoord_Trans_Tilt_Toe = XCoord_Trans_Tilt*cos(Toe_Angle) - YCoord_Trans_Tilt*sin(Toe_Angle);
2436  YCoord_Trans_Tilt_Toe = XCoord_Trans_Tilt*sin(Toe_Angle) + YCoord_Trans_Tilt*cos(Toe_Angle);
2437  ZCoord_Trans_Tilt_Toe = ZCoord_Trans_Tilt;
2438 
2439  /*--- Rotate to X-Z plane (roll) ---*/
2440 
2441  XCoord = XCoord_Trans_Tilt_Toe;
2442  YCoord = YCoord_Trans_Tilt_Toe*cos(Roll_Angle) - ZCoord_Trans_Tilt_Toe*sin(Roll_Angle);
2443  ZCoord = YCoord_Trans_Tilt_Toe*sin(Roll_Angle) + ZCoord_Trans_Tilt_Toe*cos(Roll_Angle);
2444 
2445  /*--- Update coordinates ---*/
2446 
2447  Xcoord_Index1[iEdge] = XCoord; Ycoord_Index1[iEdge] = YCoord; Zcoord_Index1[iEdge] = ZCoord;
2448 
2449  }
2450  }
2451 
2452 
2453  /*--- Identify the extreme of the curve and close it ---*/
2454 
2455  Conection_Index0.reserve(Xcoord_Index0.size()+1);
2456  Conection_Index1.reserve(Xcoord_Index0.size()+1);
2457 
2458  for (iEdge = 0; iEdge < Xcoord_Index0.size(); iEdge++) {
2459  Conection_Index0[iEdge] = 0;
2460  Conection_Index1[iEdge] = 0;
2461  }
2462 
2463  for (iEdge = 0; iEdge < Xcoord_Index0.size()-1; iEdge++) {
2464  for (jEdge = iEdge+1; jEdge < Xcoord_Index0.size(); jEdge++) {
2465 
2466  if (((IGlobalID_Index0[iEdge] == IGlobalID_Index0[jEdge]) && (JGlobalID_Index0[iEdge] == JGlobalID_Index0[jEdge])) ||
2467  ((IGlobalID_Index0[iEdge] == JGlobalID_Index0[jEdge]) && (JGlobalID_Index0[iEdge] == IGlobalID_Index0[jEdge])))
2468  { Conection_Index0[iEdge]++; Conection_Index0[jEdge]++; }
2469 
2470  if (((IGlobalID_Index0[iEdge] == IGlobalID_Index1[jEdge]) && (JGlobalID_Index0[iEdge] == JGlobalID_Index1[jEdge])) ||
2471  ((IGlobalID_Index0[iEdge] == JGlobalID_Index1[jEdge]) && (JGlobalID_Index0[iEdge] == IGlobalID_Index1[jEdge])))
2472  { Conection_Index0[iEdge]++; Conection_Index1[jEdge]++; }
2473 
2474  if (((IGlobalID_Index1[iEdge] == IGlobalID_Index0[jEdge]) && (JGlobalID_Index1[iEdge] == JGlobalID_Index0[jEdge])) ||
2475  ((IGlobalID_Index1[iEdge] == JGlobalID_Index0[jEdge]) && (JGlobalID_Index1[iEdge] == IGlobalID_Index0[jEdge])))
2476  { Conection_Index1[iEdge]++; Conection_Index0[jEdge]++; }
2477 
2478  if (((IGlobalID_Index1[iEdge] == IGlobalID_Index1[jEdge]) && (JGlobalID_Index1[iEdge] == JGlobalID_Index1[jEdge])) ||
2479  ((IGlobalID_Index1[iEdge] == JGlobalID_Index1[jEdge]) && (JGlobalID_Index1[iEdge] == IGlobalID_Index1[jEdge])))
2480  { Conection_Index1[iEdge]++; Conection_Index1[jEdge]++; }
2481 
2482  }
2483  }
2484 
2485  /*--- Connect extremes of the curves ---*/
2486 
2487  /*--- First: Identify the extremes of the curve in the extra vector ---*/
2488 
2489  for (iEdge = 0; iEdge < Xcoord_Index0.size(); iEdge++) {
2490  if (Conection_Index0[iEdge] == 0) {
2491  XcoordExtra.push_back(Xcoord_Index0[iEdge]);
2492  YcoordExtra.push_back(Ycoord_Index0[iEdge]);
2493  ZcoordExtra.push_back(Zcoord_Index0[iEdge]);
2494  VariableExtra.push_back(Variable_Index0[iEdge]);
2495  IGlobalIDExtra.push_back(IGlobalID_Index0[iEdge]);
2496  JGlobalIDExtra.push_back(JGlobalID_Index0[iEdge]);
2497  AddExtra.push_back(true);
2498  }
2499  if (Conection_Index1[iEdge] == 0) {
2500  XcoordExtra.push_back(Xcoord_Index1[iEdge]);
2501  YcoordExtra.push_back(Ycoord_Index1[iEdge]);
2502  ZcoordExtra.push_back(Zcoord_Index1[iEdge]);
2503  VariableExtra.push_back(Variable_Index1[iEdge]);
2504  IGlobalIDExtra.push_back(IGlobalID_Index1[iEdge]);
2505  JGlobalIDExtra.push_back(JGlobalID_Index1[iEdge]);
2506  AddExtra.push_back(true);
2507  }
2508  }
2509 
2510  /*--- Second, if it is an open curve then find the closest point to an extreme to close it ---*/
2511 
2512  if (XcoordExtra.size() > 1) {
2513 
2514  for (iEdge = 0; iEdge < XcoordExtra.size()-1; iEdge++) {
2515 
2516  su2double MinDist = 1E6; FoundEdge = false; EdgeDonor = 0;
2517  for (jEdge = iEdge+1; jEdge < XcoordExtra.size(); jEdge++) {
2518  Dist_Value = sqrt(pow(SU2_TYPE::GetValue(XcoordExtra[iEdge])-SU2_TYPE::GetValue(XcoordExtra[jEdge]), 2.0));
2519  if ((Dist_Value < MinDist) && (AddExtra[iEdge]) && (AddExtra[jEdge])) {
2520  EdgeDonor = jEdge; FoundEdge = true;
2521  }
2522  }
2523 
2524  if (FoundEdge) {
2525 
2526  /*--- Add first point of the new edge ---*/
2527 
2528  Xcoord_Index0.push_back (XcoordExtra[iEdge]);
2529  Ycoord_Index0.push_back (YcoordExtra[iEdge]);
2530  Zcoord_Index0.push_back (ZcoordExtra[iEdge]);
2531  Variable_Index0.push_back (VariableExtra[iEdge]);
2532  IGlobalID_Index0.push_back (IGlobalIDExtra[iEdge]);
2533  JGlobalID_Index0.push_back (JGlobalIDExtra[iEdge]);
2534  AddExtra[iEdge] = false;
2535 
2536  /*--- Add second (closest) point of the new edge ---*/
2537 
2538  Xcoord_Index1.push_back (XcoordExtra[EdgeDonor]);
2539  Ycoord_Index1.push_back (YcoordExtra[EdgeDonor]);
2540  Zcoord_Index1.push_back (ZcoordExtra[EdgeDonor]);
2541  Variable_Index1.push_back (VariableExtra[EdgeDonor]);
2542  IGlobalID_Index1.push_back (IGlobalIDExtra[EdgeDonor]);
2543  JGlobalID_Index1.push_back (JGlobalIDExtra[EdgeDonor]);
2544  AddExtra[EdgeDonor] = false;
2545 
2546  }
2547 
2548  }
2549 
2550  }
2551 
2552  else if (XcoordExtra.size() == 1) {
2553  cout <<"There cutting system has failed, there is an incomplete curve (not used)." << endl;
2554  }
2555 
2556  /*--- Find and add the trailing edge to to the list
2557  and the contect the first point to the trailing edge ---*/
2558 
2559  Trailing_Point = 0; Trailing_Coord = Xcoord_Index0[0];
2560  for (iEdge = 1; iEdge < Xcoord_Index0.size(); iEdge++) {
2561  if (Xcoord_Index0[iEdge] > Trailing_Coord) {
2562  Trailing_Point = iEdge; Trailing_Coord = Xcoord_Index0[iEdge];
2563  }
2564  }
2565 
2566  Xcoord_Airfoil.push_back(Xcoord_Index0[Trailing_Point]);
2567  Ycoord_Airfoil.push_back(Ycoord_Index0[Trailing_Point]);
2568  Zcoord_Airfoil.push_back(Zcoord_Index0[Trailing_Point]);
2569  Variable_Airfoil.push_back(Variable_Index0[Trailing_Point]);
2570  IGlobalID_Airfoil.push_back(IGlobalID_Index0[Trailing_Point]);
2571  JGlobalID_Airfoil.push_back(JGlobalID_Index0[Trailing_Point]);
2572 
2573  Xcoord_Airfoil.push_back(Xcoord_Index1[Trailing_Point]);
2574  Ycoord_Airfoil.push_back(Ycoord_Index1[Trailing_Point]);
2575  Zcoord_Airfoil.push_back(Zcoord_Index1[Trailing_Point]);
2576  Variable_Airfoil.push_back(Variable_Index1[Trailing_Point]);
2577  IGlobalID_Airfoil.push_back(IGlobalID_Index1[Trailing_Point]);
2578  JGlobalID_Airfoil.push_back(JGlobalID_Index1[Trailing_Point]);
2579 
2580  Xcoord_Index0.erase (Xcoord_Index0.begin() + Trailing_Point);
2581  Ycoord_Index0.erase (Ycoord_Index0.begin() + Trailing_Point);
2582  Zcoord_Index0.erase (Zcoord_Index0.begin() + Trailing_Point);
2583  Variable_Index0.erase (Variable_Index0.begin() + Trailing_Point);
2584  IGlobalID_Index0.erase (IGlobalID_Index0.begin() + Trailing_Point);
2585  JGlobalID_Index0.erase (JGlobalID_Index0.begin() + Trailing_Point);
2586 
2587  Xcoord_Index1.erase (Xcoord_Index1.begin() + Trailing_Point);
2588  Ycoord_Index1.erase (Ycoord_Index1.begin() + Trailing_Point);
2589  Zcoord_Index1.erase (Zcoord_Index1.begin() + Trailing_Point);
2590  Variable_Index1.erase (Variable_Index1.begin() + Trailing_Point);
2591  IGlobalID_Index1.erase (IGlobalID_Index1.begin() + Trailing_Point);
2592  JGlobalID_Index1.erase (JGlobalID_Index1.begin() + Trailing_Point);
2593 
2594 
2595  /*--- Algorithm for adding the rest of the points ---*/
2596 
2597  do {
2598 
2599  /*--- Last added point in the list ---*/
2600 
2601  Airfoil_Point = Xcoord_Airfoil.size() - 1;
2602 
2603  /*--- Find the closest point ---*/
2604 
2605  Found_Edge = false;
2606 
2607  for (iEdge = 0; iEdge < Xcoord_Index0.size(); iEdge++) {
2608 
2609  if (((IGlobalID_Index0[iEdge] == IGlobalID_Airfoil[Airfoil_Point]) && (JGlobalID_Index0[iEdge] == JGlobalID_Airfoil[Airfoil_Point])) ||
2610  ((IGlobalID_Index0[iEdge] == JGlobalID_Airfoil[Airfoil_Point]) && (JGlobalID_Index0[iEdge] == IGlobalID_Airfoil[Airfoil_Point]))) {
2611  Next_Edge = iEdge; Found_Edge = true; Index = 0; break;
2612  }
2613 
2614  if (((IGlobalID_Index1[iEdge] == IGlobalID_Airfoil[Airfoil_Point]) && (JGlobalID_Index1[iEdge] == JGlobalID_Airfoil[Airfoil_Point])) ||
2615  ((IGlobalID_Index1[iEdge] == JGlobalID_Airfoil[Airfoil_Point]) && (JGlobalID_Index1[iEdge] == IGlobalID_Airfoil[Airfoil_Point]))) {
2616  Next_Edge = iEdge; Found_Edge = true; Index = 1; break;
2617  }
2618 
2619  }
2620 
2621  /*--- Add and remove the next point to the list and the next point in the edge ---*/
2622 
2623  if (Found_Edge) {
2624 
2625  if (Index == 0) {
2626  Xcoord_Airfoil.push_back(Xcoord_Index1[Next_Edge]);
2627  Ycoord_Airfoil.push_back(Ycoord_Index1[Next_Edge]);
2628  Zcoord_Airfoil.push_back(Zcoord_Index1[Next_Edge]);
2629  Variable_Airfoil.push_back(Variable_Index1[Next_Edge]);
2630  IGlobalID_Airfoil.push_back(IGlobalID_Index1[Next_Edge]);
2631  JGlobalID_Airfoil.push_back(JGlobalID_Index1[Next_Edge]);
2632  }
2633 
2634  if (Index == 1) {
2635  Xcoord_Airfoil.push_back(Xcoord_Index0[Next_Edge]);
2636  Ycoord_Airfoil.push_back(Ycoord_Index0[Next_Edge]);
2637  Zcoord_Airfoil.push_back(Zcoord_Index0[Next_Edge]);
2638  Variable_Airfoil.push_back(Variable_Index0[Next_Edge]);
2639  IGlobalID_Airfoil.push_back(IGlobalID_Index0[Next_Edge]);
2640  JGlobalID_Airfoil.push_back(JGlobalID_Index0[Next_Edge]);
2641  }
2642 
2643  Xcoord_Index0.erase(Xcoord_Index0.begin() + Next_Edge);
2644  Ycoord_Index0.erase(Ycoord_Index0.begin() + Next_Edge);
2645  Zcoord_Index0.erase(Zcoord_Index0.begin() + Next_Edge);
2646  Variable_Index0.erase(Variable_Index0.begin() + Next_Edge);
2647  IGlobalID_Index0.erase(IGlobalID_Index0.begin() + Next_Edge);
2648  JGlobalID_Index0.erase(JGlobalID_Index0.begin() + Next_Edge);
2649 
2650  Xcoord_Index1.erase(Xcoord_Index1.begin() + Next_Edge);
2651  Ycoord_Index1.erase(Ycoord_Index1.begin() + Next_Edge);
2652  Zcoord_Index1.erase(Zcoord_Index1.begin() + Next_Edge);
2653  Variable_Index1.erase(Variable_Index1.begin() + Next_Edge);
2654  IGlobalID_Index1.erase(IGlobalID_Index1.begin() + Next_Edge);
2655  JGlobalID_Index1.erase(JGlobalID_Index1.begin() + Next_Edge);
2656 
2657  }
2658  else { break; }
2659 
2660  } while (Xcoord_Index0.size() != 0);
2661 
2662  /*--- Clean the vector before using them again for storing the upper or the lower side ---*/
2663 
2664  Xcoord_Index0.clear(); Ycoord_Index0.clear(); Zcoord_Index0.clear(); Variable_Index0.clear(); IGlobalID_Index0.clear(); JGlobalID_Index0.clear();
2665  Xcoord_Index1.clear(); Ycoord_Index1.clear(); Zcoord_Index1.clear(); Variable_Index1.clear(); IGlobalID_Index1.clear(); JGlobalID_Index1.clear();
2666 
2667  }
2668 
2669  }
2670 
2671  AD_END_PASSIVE
2672 
2673 }
2674 
2675 void CGeometry::RegisterCoordinates(CConfig *config) {
2676  unsigned short iDim;
2677  unsigned long iPoint;
2678  bool input = true;
2679  bool push_index = config->GetMultizone_Problem()? false : true;
2680 
2681  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
2682  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
2683  AD::RegisterInput(node[iPoint]->GetCoord()[iDim], push_index);
2684  }
2685  if(!push_index) {
2686  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
2687  node[iPoint]->SetIndex(input);
2688  }
2689  }
2690  }
2691 }
2692 
2693 void CGeometry::RegisterOutput_Coordinates(CConfig *config){
2694  unsigned short iDim;
2695  unsigned long iPoint;
2696 
2697  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++){
2698  if(config->GetMultizone_Problem()) {
2699  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
2700 // In case we are dealing with mesh adjoints the following two lines might be needed
2701 // AD::RegisterOutput(node[iPoint]->GetCoord()[iDim]);
2702 // node[iPoint]->SetAdjIndices(false);
2703  AD::RegisterOutput(node[iPoint]->GetCoord()[iDim]);
2704  }
2705  }
2706  else {
2707  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
2708  AD::RegisterOutput(node[iPoint]->GetCoord()[iDim]);
2709  }
2710  }
2711  }
2712 }
2713 
2714 void CGeometry::UpdateGeometry(CGeometry **geometry_container, CConfig *config) {
2715 
2716  unsigned short iMesh;
2717 
2718  geometry_container[MESH_0]->InitiateComms(geometry_container[MESH_0], config, COORDINATES);
2719  geometry_container[MESH_0]->CompleteComms(geometry_container[MESH_0], config, COORDINATES);
2720  if (config->GetGrid_Movement()){
2721  geometry_container[MESH_0]->InitiateComms(geometry_container[MESH_0], config, GRID_VELOCITY);
2722  geometry_container[MESH_0]->CompleteComms(geometry_container[MESH_0], config, GRID_VELOCITY);
2723  }
2724 
2725  geometry_container[MESH_0]->SetCoord_CG();
2726  geometry_container[MESH_0]->SetControlVolume(config, UPDATE);
2727  geometry_container[MESH_0]->SetBoundControlVolume(config, UPDATE);
2728  geometry_container[MESH_0]->SetMaxLength(config);
2729 
2730  for (iMesh = 1; iMesh <= config->GetnMGLevels(); iMesh++) {
2731  /*--- Update the control volume structures ---*/
2732 
2733  geometry_container[iMesh]->SetControlVolume(config,geometry_container[iMesh-1], UPDATE);
2734  geometry_container[iMesh]->SetBoundControlVolume(config,geometry_container[iMesh-1], UPDATE);
2735  geometry_container[iMesh]->SetCoord(geometry_container[iMesh-1]);
2736 
2737  }
2738 
2739  if (config->GetKind_Solver() == DISC_ADJ_RANS || config->GetKind_Solver() == DISC_ADJ_INC_RANS)
2740  geometry_container[MESH_0]->ComputeWall_Distance(config);
2741 
2742 }
2743 
2744 void CGeometry::SetCustomBoundary(CConfig *config) {
2745 
2746  unsigned short iMarker;
2747  unsigned long iVertex;
2748  string Marker_Tag;
2749 
2750  /* --- Initialize quantities for customized boundary conditions.
2751  * Custom values are initialized with the default values specified in the config (avoiding non physical values) --- */
2752  CustomBoundaryTemperature = new su2double*[nMarker];
2753  CustomBoundaryHeatFlux = new su2double*[nMarker];
2754 
2755  for(iMarker=0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++){
2756  Marker_Tag = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(iMarker);
2757  CustomBoundaryHeatFlux[iMarker] = NULL;
2758  CustomBoundaryTemperature[iMarker] = NULL;
2759  if(config->GetMarker_All_PyCustom(iMarker)){
2760  switch(config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker)){
2761  case HEAT_FLUX:
2762  CustomBoundaryHeatFlux[iMarker] = new su2double[nVertex[iMarker]];
2763  for(iVertex=0; iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++){
2764  CustomBoundaryHeatFlux[iMarker][iVertex] = config->GetWall_HeatFlux(Marker_Tag);
2765  }
2766  break;
2767  case ISOTHERMAL:
2768  CustomBoundaryTemperature[iMarker] = new su2double[nVertex[iMarker]];
2769  for(iVertex=0; iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++){
2770  CustomBoundaryTemperature[iMarker][iVertex] = config->GetIsothermal_Temperature(Marker_Tag);
2771  }
2772  break;
2773  case INLET_FLOW:
2774  // This case is handled in the solver class.
2775  break;
2776  default:
2777  cout << "WARNING: Marker " << Marker_Tag << " is not customizable. Using default behavior." << endl;
2778  break;
2779  }
2780  }
2781  }
2782 
2783 }
2784 
2785 void CGeometry::UpdateCustomBoundaryConditions(CGeometry **geometry_container, CConfig *config){
2786 
2787  unsigned short iMGfine, iMGlevel, nMGlevel, iMarker;
2788 
2789  nMGlevel = config->GetnMGLevels();
2790  for (iMGlevel=1; iMGlevel <= nMGlevel; iMGlevel++){
2791  iMGfine = iMGlevel-1;
2792  for(iMarker = 0; iMarker< config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++){
2793  if(config->GetMarker_All_PyCustom(iMarker)){
2794  switch(config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker)){
2795  case HEAT_FLUX:
2796  geometry_container[iMGlevel]->SetMultiGridWallHeatFlux(geometry_container[iMGfine], iMarker);
2797  break;
2798  case ISOTHERMAL:
2799  geometry_container[iMGlevel]->SetMultiGridWallTemperature(geometry_container[iMGfine], iMarker);
2800  break;
2801  // Inlet flow handled in solver class.
2802  default: break;
2803  }
2804  }
2805  }
2806  }
2807 }
2808 
2809 
2810 void CGeometry::ComputeSurf_Straightness(CConfig *config,
2811  bool print_on_screen) {
2812 
2813  bool RefUnitNormal_defined;
2814  unsigned short iDim,
2815  iMarker,
2816  iMarker_Global,
2817  nMarker_Global = config->GetnMarker_CfgFile();
2818  unsigned long iVertex;
2819  constexpr passivedouble epsilon = 1.0e-6;
2820  su2double Area;
2821  string Local_TagBound,
2822  Global_TagBound;
2823 
2824  vector<su2double> Normal(nDim),
2825  UnitNormal(nDim),
2826  RefUnitNormal(nDim);
2827 
2828  /*--- Assume now that this boundary marker is straight. As soon as one
2829  AreaElement is found that is not aligend with a Reference then it is
2830  certain that the boundary marker is not straight and one can stop
2831  searching. Another possibility is that this process doesn't own
2832  any nodes of that boundary, in that case we also have to assume the
2833  boundary is straight.
2834  Any boundary type other than SYMMETRY_PLANE or EULER_WALL gets
2835  the value false (or see cases specified in the conditional below)
2836  which could be wrong. ---*/
2837  bound_is_straight.resize(nMarker);
2838  fill(bound_is_straight.begin(), bound_is_straight.end(), true);
2839 
2840  /*--- Loop over all local markers ---*/
2841  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
2842 
2843  Local_TagBound = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(iMarker);
2844 
2845  /*--- Marker has to be Symmetry or Euler. Additionally marker can't be a
2846  moving surface and Grid Movement Elasticity is forbidden as well. All
2847  other GridMovements are rigid. ---*/
2848  if ((config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == SYMMETRY_PLANE ||
2849  config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == EULER_WALL) &&
2850  config->GetMarker_Moving_Bool(Local_TagBound) == false &&
2851  config->GetKind_GridMovement() != ELASTICITY) {
2852 
2853  /*--- Loop over all global markers, and find the local-global pair via
2854  matching unique string tags. ---*/
2855  for (iMarker_Global = 0; iMarker_Global < nMarker_Global; iMarker_Global++) {
2856 
2857  Global_TagBound = config->GetMarker_CfgFile_TagBound(iMarker_Global);
2858  if (Local_TagBound == Global_TagBound) {
2859 
2860  RefUnitNormal_defined = false;
2861  iVertex = 0;
2862 
2863  while(bound_is_straight[iMarker] == true &&
2864  iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]) {
2865 
2866  vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal(Normal.data());
2867  UnitNormal = Normal;
2868 
2869  /*--- Compute unit normal. ---*/
2870  Area = 0.0;
2871  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
2872  Area += Normal[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
2873  Area = sqrt(Area);
2874 
2875  /*--- Negate for outward convention. ---*/
2876  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
2877  UnitNormal[iDim] /= -Area;
2878 
2879  /*--- Check if unit normal is within tolerance of the Reference unit normal.
2880  Reference unit normal = first unit normal found. ---*/
2881  if(RefUnitNormal_defined) {
2882  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
2883  if( abs(RefUnitNormal[iDim] - UnitNormal[iDim]) > epsilon ) {
2884  bound_is_straight[iMarker] = false;
2885  break;
2886  }
2887  }
2888  } else {
2889  RefUnitNormal = UnitNormal; //deep copy of values
2890  RefUnitNormal_defined = true;
2891  }
2892 
2893  iVertex++;
2894  }//while iVertex
2895  }//if Local == Global
2896  }//for iMarker_Global
2897  } else {
2898  /*--- Enforce default value: false ---*/
2899  bound_is_straight[iMarker] = false;
2900  }//if sym or euler ...
2901  }//for iMarker
2902 
2903  /*--- Communicate results and print on screen. ---*/
2904  if(print_on_screen) {
2905 
2906  /*--- Additional vector which can later be MPI::Allreduce(d) to pring the results
2907  on screen as nMarker (local) can vary across ranks. Default 'true' as it can
2908  happen that a local rank does not contain an element of each surface marker. ---*/
2909  vector<bool> bound_is_straight_Global(nMarker_Global, true);
2910  /*--- Match local with global tag bound and fill a Global Marker vector. ---*/
2911  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
2912  Local_TagBound = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(iMarker);
2913  for (iMarker_Global = 0; iMarker_Global < nMarker_Global; iMarker_Global++) {
2914  Global_TagBound = config->GetMarker_CfgFile_TagBound(iMarker_Global);
2915 
2916  if(Local_TagBound == Global_TagBound)
2917  bound_is_straight_Global[iMarker_Global] = bound_is_straight[iMarker];
2918 
2919  }//for iMarker_Global
2920  }//for iMarker
2921 
2922  vector<int> Buff_Send_isStraight(nMarker_Global),
2923  Buff_Recv_isStraight(nMarker_Global);
2924 
2925  /*--- Cast to int as std::vector<boolean> can be a special construct. MPI handling using <int>
2926  is more straight-forward. ---*/
2927  for (iMarker_Global = 0; iMarker_Global < nMarker_Global; iMarker_Global++)
2928  Buff_Send_isStraight[iMarker_Global] = static_cast<int> (bound_is_straight_Global[iMarker_Global]);
2929 
2930  /*--- Product of type <int>(bool) is equivalnt to a 'logical and' ---*/
2931  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(Buff_Send_isStraight.data(), Buff_Recv_isStraight.data(),
2932  nMarker_Global, MPI_INT, MPI_PROD, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
2933 
2934  /*--- Print results on screen. ---*/
2935  if(rank == MASTER_NODE) {
2936  for (iMarker_Global = 0; iMarker_Global < nMarker_Global; iMarker_Global++) {
2937  if (config->GetMarker_CfgFile_KindBC(config->GetMarker_CfgFile_TagBound(iMarker_Global)) == SYMMETRY_PLANE ||
2938  config->GetMarker_CfgFile_KindBC(config->GetMarker_CfgFile_TagBound(iMarker_Global)) == EULER_WALL) {
2939 
2940  cout << "Boundary marker " << config->GetMarker_CfgFile_TagBound(iMarker_Global) << " is";
2941  if(Buff_Recv_isStraight[iMarker_Global] == false) cout << " NOT";
2942  if(nDim == 2) cout << " a single straight." << endl;
2943  if(nDim == 3) cout << " a single plane." << endl;
2944  }//if sym or euler
2945  }//for iMarker_Global
2946  }//if rank==MASTER
2947  }//if print_on_scren
2948 
2949 }
2950 
2951 
2952 void CGeometry::ComputeSurf_Curvature(CConfig *config) {
2953  unsigned short iMarker, iNeigh_Point, iDim, iNode, iNeighbor_Nodes, Neighbor_Node;
2954  unsigned long Neighbor_Point, iVertex, iPoint, jPoint, iElem_Bound, iEdge, nLocalVertex, MaxLocalVertex , *Buffer_Send_nVertex, *Buffer_Receive_nVertex, TotalnPointDomain;
2955  int iProcessor, nProcessor;
2956  vector<unsigned long> Point_NeighborList, Elem_NeighborList, Point_Triangle, Point_Edge, Point_Critical;
2957  vector<unsigned long>::iterator it;
2958  su2double U[3] = {0.0,0.0,0.0}, V[3] = {0.0,0.0,0.0}, W[3] = {0.0,0.0,0.0}, Length_U, Length_V, Length_W, CosValue, Angle_Value, *K, *Angle_Defect, *Area_Vertex, *Angle_Alpha, *Angle_Beta, **NormalMeanK, MeanK, GaussK, MaxPrinK, cot_alpha, cot_beta, delta, X1, X2, X3, Y1, Y2, Y3, radius, *Buffer_Send_Coord, *Buffer_Receive_Coord, *Coord, Dist, MinDist, MaxK, MinK, SigmaK;
2959  bool *Check_Edge;
2960 
2961  bool fea = ((config->GetKind_Solver()==FEM_ELASTICITY) || (config->GetKind_Solver()==DISC_ADJ_FEM));
2962 
2963  /*--- Allocate surface curvature ---*/
2964  K = new su2double [nPoint];
2965  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) K[iPoint] = 0.0;
2966 
2967  if (nDim == 2) {
2968 
2969  /*--- Loop over all the markers ---*/
2970  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
2971 
2972  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != SEND_RECEIVE) {
2973 
2974  /*--- Loop through all marker vertices again, this time also
2975  finding the neighbors of each node.---*/
2976  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
2977  iPoint = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
2978 
2979  if (node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
2980  /*--- Loop through neighbors. In 2-D, there should be 2 nodes on either
2981  side of this vertex that lie on the same surface. ---*/
2982  Point_Edge.clear();
2983 
2984  for (iNeigh_Point = 0; iNeigh_Point < node[iPoint]->GetnPoint(); iNeigh_Point++) {
2985  Neighbor_Point = node[iPoint]->GetPoint(iNeigh_Point);
2986 
2987  /*--- Check if this neighbor lies on the surface. If so,
2988  add to the list of neighbors. ---*/
2989  if (node[Neighbor_Point]->GetPhysicalBoundary()) {
2990  Point_Edge.push_back(Neighbor_Point);
2991  }
2992 
2993  }
2994 
2995  if (Point_Edge.size() == 2) {
2996 
2997  /*--- Compute the curvature using three points ---*/
2998  X1 = node[iPoint]->GetCoord(0);
2999  X2 = node[Point_Edge[0]]->GetCoord(0);
3000  X3 = node[Point_Edge[1]]->GetCoord(0);
3001  Y1 = node[iPoint]->GetCoord(1);
3002  Y2 = node[Point_Edge[0]]->GetCoord(1);
3003  Y3 = node[Point_Edge[1]]->GetCoord(1);
3004 
3005  radius = sqrt(((X2-X1)*(X2-X1) + (Y2-Y1)*(Y2-Y1))*
3006  ((X2-X3)*(X2-X3) + (Y2-Y3)*(Y2-Y3))*
3007  ((X3-X1)*(X3-X1) + (Y3-Y1)*(Y3-Y1)))/
3008  (2.0*fabs(X1*Y2+X2*Y3+X3*Y1-X1*Y3-X2*Y1-X3*Y2)+EPS);
3009 
3010  K[iPoint] = 1.0/radius;
3011  node[iPoint]->SetCurvature(K[iPoint]);
3012  }
3013 
3014  }
3015 
3016  }
3017 
3018  }
3019 
3020  }
3021 
3022  }
3023 
3024  else {
3025 
3026  Angle_Defect = new su2double [nPoint];
3027  Area_Vertex = new su2double [nPoint];
3028  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
3029  Angle_Defect[iPoint] = 2*PI_NUMBER;
3030  Area_Vertex[iPoint] = 0.0;
3031  }
3032 
3033  Angle_Alpha = new su2double [nEdge];
3034  Angle_Beta = new su2double [nEdge];
3035  Check_Edge = new bool [nEdge];
3036  for (iEdge = 0; iEdge < nEdge; iEdge++) {
3037  Angle_Alpha[iEdge] = 0.0;
3038  Angle_Beta[iEdge] = 0.0;
3039  Check_Edge[iEdge] = true;
3040  }
3041 
3042  NormalMeanK = new su2double *[nPoint];
3043  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
3044  NormalMeanK[iPoint] = new su2double [nDim];
3045  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
3046  NormalMeanK[iPoint][iDim] = 0.0;
3047  }
3048  }
3049 
3050  /*--- Loop over all the markers ---*/
3051  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
3052 
3053  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != SEND_RECEIVE) {
3054 
3055  /*--- Loop over all the boundary elements ---*/
3056  for (iElem_Bound = 0; iElem_Bound < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem_Bound++) {
3057 
3058  /*--- Only triangles ---*/
3059  if (bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetVTK_Type() == TRIANGLE) {
3060 
3061  /*--- Loop over all the nodes of the boundary element ---*/
3062  for (iNode = 0; iNode < bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetnNodes(); iNode++) {
3063 
3064  iPoint = bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(iNode);
3065 
3066  Point_Triangle.clear();
3067 
3068  for (iNeighbor_Nodes = 0; iNeighbor_Nodes < bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetnNeighbor_Nodes(iNode); iNeighbor_Nodes++) {
3069  Neighbor_Node = bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNeighbor_Nodes(iNode, iNeighbor_Nodes);
3070  Neighbor_Point = bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(Neighbor_Node);
3071  Point_Triangle.push_back(Neighbor_Point);
3072  }
3073 
3074  iEdge = FindEdge(Point_Triangle[0], Point_Triangle[1]);
3075 
3076  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
3077  U[iDim] = node[Point_Triangle[0]]->GetCoord(iDim) - node[iPoint]->GetCoord(iDim);
3078  V[iDim] = node[Point_Triangle[1]]->GetCoord(iDim) - node[iPoint]->GetCoord(iDim);
3079  }
3080 
3081  W[0] = 0.5*(U[1]*V[2]-U[2]*V[1]); W[1] = -0.5*(U[0]*V[2]-U[2]*V[0]); W[2] = 0.5*(U[0]*V[1]-U[1]*V[0]);
3082 
3083  Length_U = 0.0; Length_V = 0.0; Length_W = 0.0; CosValue = 0.0;
3084  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) { Length_U += U[iDim]*U[iDim]; Length_V += V[iDim]*V[iDim]; Length_W += W[iDim]*W[iDim]; }
3085  Length_U = sqrt(Length_U); Length_V = sqrt(Length_V); Length_W = sqrt(Length_W);
3086  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) { U[iDim] /= Length_U; V[iDim] /= Length_V; CosValue += U[iDim]*V[iDim]; }
3087  if (CosValue >= 1.0) CosValue = 1.0;
3088  if (CosValue <= -1.0) CosValue = -1.0;
3089 
3090  Angle_Value = acos(CosValue);
3091  Area_Vertex[iPoint] += Length_W;
3092  Angle_Defect[iPoint] -= Angle_Value;
3093  if (Angle_Alpha[iEdge] == 0.0) Angle_Alpha[iEdge] = Angle_Value;
3094  else Angle_Beta[iEdge] = Angle_Value;
3095 
3096  }
3097  }
3098  }
3099  }
3100  }
3101 
3102  /*--- Compute mean curvature ---*/
3103  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
3104  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != SEND_RECEIVE) {
3105  for (iElem_Bound = 0; iElem_Bound < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem_Bound++) {
3106  if (bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetVTK_Type() == TRIANGLE) {
3107  for (iNode = 0; iNode < bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetnNodes(); iNode++) {
3108  iPoint = bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(iNode);
3109 
3110  for (iNeighbor_Nodes = 0; iNeighbor_Nodes < bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetnNeighbor_Nodes(iNode); iNeighbor_Nodes++) {
3111  Neighbor_Node = bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNeighbor_Nodes(iNode, iNeighbor_Nodes);
3112  jPoint = bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(Neighbor_Node);
3113 
3114  iEdge = FindEdge(iPoint, jPoint);
3115 
3116  if (Check_Edge[iEdge]) {
3117 
3118  Check_Edge[iEdge] = false;
3119 
3120  if (tan(Angle_Alpha[iEdge]) != 0.0) cot_alpha = 1.0/tan(Angle_Alpha[iEdge]); else cot_alpha = 0.0;
3121  if (tan(Angle_Beta[iEdge]) != 0.0) cot_beta = 1.0/tan(Angle_Beta[iEdge]); else cot_beta = 0.0;
3122 
3123  /*--- iPoint, and jPoint ---*/
3124  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
3125  if (Area_Vertex[iPoint] != 0.0) NormalMeanK[iPoint][iDim] += 3.0 * (cot_alpha + cot_beta) * (node[iPoint]->GetCoord(iDim) - node[jPoint]->GetCoord(iDim)) / Area_Vertex[iPoint];
3126  if (Area_Vertex[jPoint] != 0.0) NormalMeanK[jPoint][iDim] += 3.0 * (cot_alpha + cot_beta) * (node[jPoint]->GetCoord(iDim) - node[iPoint]->GetCoord(iDim)) / Area_Vertex[jPoint];
3127  }
3128  }
3129 
3130  }
3131  }
3132  }
3133  }
3134  }
3135  }
3136 
3137  /*--- Compute Gauss, mean, max and min principal curvature,
3138  and set the list of critical points ---*/
3139 
3140  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
3141  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != SEND_RECEIVE) {
3142  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
3143  iPoint = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
3144 
3145  if (node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
3146 
3147  if (Area_Vertex[iPoint] != 0.0) GaussK = 3.0*Angle_Defect[iPoint]/Area_Vertex[iPoint];
3148  else GaussK = 0.0;
3149 
3150  MeanK = 0.0;
3151  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3152  MeanK += NormalMeanK[iPoint][iDim]*NormalMeanK[iPoint][iDim];
3153  MeanK = sqrt(MeanK);
3154 
3155  delta = max((MeanK*MeanK - GaussK), 0.0);
3156 
3157  MaxPrinK = MeanK + sqrt(delta);
3158 
3159  /*--- Store the curvature value ---*/
3160  K[iPoint] = MaxPrinK;
3161  node[iPoint]->SetCurvature(K[iPoint]);
3162  }
3163 
3164  }
3165  }
3166  }
3167 
3168  delete [] Angle_Defect;
3169  delete [] Area_Vertex;
3170  delete [] Angle_Alpha;
3171  delete [] Angle_Beta;
3172  delete [] Check_Edge;
3173 
3174  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++)
3175  delete [] NormalMeanK[iPoint];
3176  delete [] NormalMeanK;
3177 
3178  }
3179 
3180  /*--- Sharp edge detection is based in the statistical
3181  distribution of the curvature ---*/
3182 
3183  MaxK = K[0]; MinK = K[0]; MeanK = 0.0; TotalnPointDomain = 0;
3184  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
3185  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != SEND_RECEIVE) {
3186  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
3187  iPoint = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
3188  if (node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
3189  MaxK = max(MaxK, fabs(K[iPoint]));
3190  MinK = min(MinK, fabs(K[iPoint]));
3191  MeanK += fabs(K[iPoint]);
3192  TotalnPointDomain++;
3193  }
3194  }
3195  }
3196  }
3197 
3198 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
3199  su2double MyMeanK = MeanK; MeanK = 0.0;
3200  su2double MyMaxK = MaxK; MaxK = 0.0;
3201  unsigned long MynPointDomain = TotalnPointDomain; TotalnPointDomain = 0;
3202  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyMeanK, &MeanK, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
3203  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyMaxK, &MaxK, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MAX, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
3204  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MynPointDomain, &TotalnPointDomain, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
3205 #endif
3206 
3207  /*--- Compute the mean ---*/
3208  MeanK /= su2double(TotalnPointDomain);
3209 
3210  /*--- Compute the standard deviation ---*/
3211  SigmaK = 0.0;
3212  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
3213  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != SEND_RECEIVE) {
3214  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
3215  iPoint = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
3216  if (node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
3217  SigmaK += (fabs(K[iPoint]) - MeanK) * (fabs(K[iPoint]) - MeanK);
3218  }
3219  }
3220  }
3221  }
3222 
3223 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
3224  su2double MySigmaK = SigmaK; SigmaK = 0.0;
3225  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MySigmaK, &SigmaK, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
3226 #endif
3227 
3228  SigmaK = sqrt(SigmaK/su2double(TotalnPointDomain));
3229 
3230  if ((rank == MASTER_NODE) && (!fea))
3231  cout << "Max K: " << MaxK << ". Mean K: " << MeanK << ". Standard deviation K: " << SigmaK << "." << endl;
3232 
3233  Point_Critical.clear();
3234 
3235  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
3236  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != SEND_RECEIVE) {
3237  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
3238  iPoint = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
3239  if (node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
3240  if (fabs(K[iPoint]) > MeanK + config->GetRefSharpEdges()*SigmaK) {
3241  Point_Critical.push_back(iPoint);
3242  }
3243  }
3244  }
3245  }
3246  }
3247 
3248  /*--- Variables and buffers needed for MPI ---*/
3249 
3250 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
3251  SU2_MPI::Comm_size(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &nProcessor);
3252 #else
3253  nProcessor = 1;
3254 #endif
3255 
3256  Buffer_Send_nVertex = new unsigned long [1];
3257  Buffer_Receive_nVertex = new unsigned long [nProcessor];
3258 
3259  /*--- Count the total number of critical edge nodes. ---*/
3260 
3261  nLocalVertex = Point_Critical.size();
3262  Buffer_Send_nVertex[0] = nLocalVertex;
3263 
3264  /*--- Communicate to all processors the total number of critical edge nodes. ---*/
3265 
3266 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
3267  MaxLocalVertex = 0;
3268  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&nLocalVertex, &MaxLocalVertex, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_MAX, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
3269  SU2_MPI::Allgather(Buffer_Send_nVertex, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, Buffer_Receive_nVertex, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
3270 #else
3271  MaxLocalVertex = nLocalVertex;
3272  Buffer_Receive_nVertex[0] = nLocalVertex;
3273 #endif
3274 
3275 
3276  /*--- Create and initialize to zero some buffers to hold the coordinates
3277  of the boundary nodes that are communicated from each partition (all-to-all). ---*/
3278 
3279  Buffer_Send_Coord = new su2double [MaxLocalVertex*nDim];
3280  Buffer_Receive_Coord = new su2double [nProcessor*MaxLocalVertex*nDim];
3281 
3282 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
3283  unsigned long nBuffer = MaxLocalVertex*nDim;
3284 #endif
3285 
3286  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < MaxLocalVertex; iVertex++) {
3287  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
3288  Buffer_Send_Coord[iVertex*nDim+iDim] = 0.0;
3289  }
3290  }
3291 
3292  /*--- Retrieve and store the coordinates of the sharp edges boundary nodes on
3293  the local partition and broadcast them to all partitions. ---*/
3294 
3295  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < Point_Critical.size(); iVertex++) {
3296  iPoint = Point_Critical[iVertex];
3297  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3298  Buffer_Send_Coord[iVertex*nDim+iDim] = node[iPoint]->GetCoord(iDim);
3299  }
3300 
3301 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
3302  SU2_MPI::Allgather(Buffer_Send_Coord, nBuffer, MPI_DOUBLE, Buffer_Receive_Coord, nBuffer, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
3303 #else
3304  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < Point_Critical.size(); iVertex++) {
3305  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
3306  Buffer_Receive_Coord[iVertex*nDim+iDim] = Buffer_Send_Coord[iVertex*nDim+iDim];
3307  }
3308  }
3309 #endif
3310 
3311  /*--- Loop over all interior mesh nodes on the local partition and compute
3312  the distances to each of the no-slip boundary nodes in the entire mesh.
3313  Store the minimum distance to the wall for each interior mesh node. ---*/
3314 
3315  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < GetnPoint(); iPoint++) {
3316  Coord = node[iPoint]->GetCoord();
3317 
3318  MinDist = 1E20;
3319  for (iProcessor = 0; iProcessor < nProcessor; iProcessor++) {
3320  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < Buffer_Receive_nVertex[iProcessor]; iVertex++) {
3321  Dist = 0.0;
3322  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
3323  Dist += (Coord[iDim]-Buffer_Receive_Coord[(iProcessor*MaxLocalVertex+iVertex)*nDim+iDim])*
3324  (Coord[iDim]-Buffer_Receive_Coord[(iProcessor*MaxLocalVertex+iVertex)*nDim+iDim]);
3325  }
3326  if (Dist!=0.0) Dist = sqrt(Dist);
3327  else Dist = 0.0;
3328  if (Dist < MinDist) MinDist = Dist;
3329  }
3330  }
3331  node[iPoint]->SetSharpEdge_Distance(MinDist);
3332  }
3333 
3334  /*--- Deallocate Max curvature ---*/
3335  delete[] K;
3336 
3337  /*--- Deallocate the buffers needed for the MPI communication. ---*/
3338  delete[] Buffer_Send_Coord;
3339  delete[] Buffer_Receive_Coord;
3340  delete[] Buffer_Send_nVertex;
3341  delete[] Buffer_Receive_nVertex;
3342 
3343 }
3344 
3345 void CGeometry::FilterValuesAtElementCG(const vector<su2double> &filter_radius,
3346  const vector<pair<unsigned short,su2double> > &kernels,
3347  const unsigned short search_limit,
3348  const su2double *input_values,
3349  su2double *output_values) const
3350 {
3351  /*--- Apply a filter to "input_values". The filter is an averaging process over the neighbourhood
3352  of each element, which is a circle in 2D and a sphere in 3D of radius "filter_radius".
3353  The filter is characterized by its kernel, i.e. how the weights are computed. Multiple kernels
3354  can be specified in which case they are applied sequentially (each one being applied to the
3355  output values of the previous filter. ---*/
3356 
3357  unsigned long iElem, iElem_global, limited_searches = 0;
3358 
3359  /*--- Initialize output values and check if we need to do any more work than that ---*/
3360  for (iElem=0; iElem<nElem; ++iElem)
3361  output_values[iElem] = input_values[iElem];
3362 
3363  if ( kernels.empty() ) return;
3364 
3365  /*--- FIRST: Gather the adjacency matrix, element centroids, volumes, and values on every
3366  processor, this is required because the filter reaches far into adjacent partitions. ---*/
3367 
3368  /*--- Adjacency matrix ---*/
3369  vector<unsigned long> neighbour_start;
3370  long *neighbour_idx = NULL;
3371  GetGlobalElementAdjacencyMatrix(neighbour_start,neighbour_idx);
3372 
3373  /*--- Element centroids and volumes ---*/
3374  su2double *cg_elem = new su2double [Global_nElemDomain*nDim],
3375  *vol_elem = new su2double [Global_nElemDomain];
3376 
3377  /*--- Initialize ---*/
3378  for(iElem=0; iElem<Global_nElemDomain; ++iElem) {
3379  for(unsigned short iDim=0; iDim<nDim; ++iDim)
3380  cg_elem[nDim*iElem+iDim] = 0.0;
3381  vol_elem[iElem] = 0.0;
3382  }
3383  /*--- Populate ---*/
3384  for(iElem=0; iElem<nElem; ++iElem) {
3385  iElem_global = elem[iElem]->GetGlobalIndex();
3386  for(unsigned short iDim=0; iDim<nDim; ++iDim)
3387  cg_elem[nDim*iElem_global+iDim] = elem[iElem]->GetCG(iDim);
3388  vol_elem[iElem_global] = elem[iElem]->GetVolume();
3389  }
3390 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
3391  /*--- Share with all processors ---*/
3392  {
3393  su2double *buffer = NULL, *tmp = NULL;
3394 
3395  buffer = new su2double [Global_nElemDomain*nDim];
3396  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(cg_elem,buffer,Global_nElemDomain*nDim,MPI_DOUBLE,MPI_SUM,MPI_COMM_WORLD);
3397  tmp = cg_elem; cg_elem = buffer; delete [] tmp;
3398 
3399  buffer = new su2double [Global_nElemDomain];
3400  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(vol_elem,buffer,Global_nElemDomain,MPI_DOUBLE,MPI_SUM,MPI_COMM_WORLD);
3401  tmp = vol_elem; vol_elem = buffer; delete [] tmp;
3402  }
3403 
3404  /*--- Account for the duplication introduced by the halo elements and the
3405  reduction using MPI_SUM, which is required to maintain differentiabillity. ---*/
3406  vector<char> halo_detect(Global_nElemDomain);
3407  {
3408  vector<char> buffer(Global_nElemDomain,0);
3409  for(iElem=0; iElem<nElem; ++iElem) buffer[elem[iElem]->GetGlobalIndex()] = 1;
3410  MPI_Allreduce(buffer.data(),halo_detect.data(),Global_nElemDomain,MPI_CHAR,MPI_SUM,MPI_COMM_WORLD);
3411  }
3412  for(iElem=0; iElem<Global_nElemDomain; ++iElem) {
3413  su2double numRepeat = halo_detect[iElem];
3414  for(unsigned short iDim=0; iDim<nDim; ++iDim)
3415  cg_elem[nDim*iElem+iDim] /= numRepeat;
3416  vol_elem[iElem] /= numRepeat;
3417  }
3418 #endif
3419 
3420 
3421  /*--- SECOND: Each processor performs the average for its elements. For each
3422  element we look for neighbours of neighbours of... until the distance to the
3423  closest newly found one is greater than the filter radius. ---*/
3424 
3425  /*--- Inputs of a filter stage, like with CG and volumes, each processor needs to see everything ---*/
3426  su2double *work_values = new su2double [Global_nElemDomain];
3427  vector<bool> is_neighbor(Global_nElemDomain,false);
3428 
3429  for (unsigned long iKernel=0; iKernel<kernels.size(); ++iKernel)
3430  {
3431  unsigned short kernel_type = kernels[iKernel].first;
3432  su2double kernel_param = kernels[iKernel].second;
3433  su2double kernel_radius = filter_radius[iKernel];
3434 
3435  /*--- Synchronize work values ---*/
3436  /*--- Initialize ---*/
3437  for(iElem=0; iElem<Global_nElemDomain; ++iElem) work_values[iElem] = 0.0;
3438  /*--- Populate ---*/
3439  for(iElem=0; iElem<nElem; ++iElem)
3440  work_values[elem[iElem]->GetGlobalIndex()] = output_values[iElem];
3441 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
3442  /*--- Share with all processors ---*/
3443  {
3444  su2double *buffer = new su2double [Global_nElemDomain], *tmp = NULL;
3445  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(work_values,buffer,Global_nElemDomain,MPI_DOUBLE,MPI_SUM,MPI_COMM_WORLD);
3446  tmp = work_values; work_values = buffer; delete [] tmp;
3447  }
3448  /*--- Account for duplication ---*/
3449  for(iElem=0; iElem<Global_nElemDomain; ++iElem) {
3450  su2double numRepeat = halo_detect[iElem];
3451  work_values[iElem] /= numRepeat;
3452  }
3453 #endif
3454 
3455  /*--- Filter ---*/
3456  for (iElem=0; iElem<nElem; ++iElem)
3457  {
3458  /*--- Center of the search ---*/
3459  iElem_global = elem[iElem]->GetGlobalIndex();
3460 
3461  /*--- Find the neighbours of iElem ---*/
3462  vector<long> neighbours;
3463  limited_searches += !GetRadialNeighbourhood(iElem_global, SU2_TYPE::GetValue(kernel_radius),
3464  search_limit, neighbour_start, neighbour_idx, cg_elem, neighbours, is_neighbor);
3465 
3466  /*--- Apply the kernel ---*/
3467  su2double weight = 0.0, numerator = 0.0, denominator = 0.0;
3468 
3469  switch ( kernel_type ) {
3470  /*--- distance-based kernels (weighted averages) ---*/
3471  case CONSTANT_WEIGHT_FILTER: case CONICAL_WEIGHT_FILTER: case GAUSSIAN_WEIGHT_FILTER:
3472 
3473  for (auto idx : neighbours)
3474  {
3475  su2double distance = 0.0;
3476  for (unsigned short iDim=0; iDim<nDim; ++iDim)
3477  distance += pow(cg_elem[nDim*iElem_global+iDim]-cg_elem[nDim*idx+iDim],2);
3478  distance = sqrt(distance);
3479 
3480  switch ( kernel_type ) {
3481  case CONSTANT_WEIGHT_FILTER: weight = 1.0; break;
3482  case CONICAL_WEIGHT_FILTER: weight = kernel_radius-distance; break;
3483  case GAUSSIAN_WEIGHT_FILTER: weight = exp(-0.5*pow(distance/kernel_param,2)); break;
3484  default: break;
3485  }
3486  weight *= vol_elem[idx];
3487  numerator += weight*work_values[idx];
3488  denominator += weight;
3489  }
3490  output_values[iElem] = numerator/denominator;
3491  break;
3492 
3493  /*--- morphology kernels (image processing) ---*/
3494  case DILATE_MORPH_FILTER: case ERODE_MORPH_FILTER:
3495 
3496  for (auto idx : neighbours)
3497  {
3498  switch ( kernel_type ) {
3499  case DILATE_MORPH_FILTER: numerator += exp(kernel_param*work_values[idx]); break;
3500  case ERODE_MORPH_FILTER: numerator += exp(kernel_param*(1.0-work_values[idx])); break;
3501  default: break;
3502  }
3503  denominator += 1.0;
3504  }
3505  output_values[iElem] = log(numerator/denominator)/kernel_param;
3506  if ( kernel_type==ERODE_MORPH_FILTER ) output_values[iElem] = 1.0-output_values[iElem];
3507  break;
3508 
3509  default:
3510  SU2_MPI::Error("Unknown type of filter kernel",CURRENT_FUNCTION);
3511  }
3512  }
3513  }
3514  limited_searches /= kernels.size();
3515 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
3516  unsigned long tmp = limited_searches;
3517  MPI_Reduce(&tmp,&limited_searches,1,MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG,MPI_SUM,MASTER_NODE,MPI_COMM_WORLD);
3518 #endif
3519  if (rank==MASTER_NODE && limited_searches>0)
3520  cout << "Warning: The filter radius was limited for " << limited_searches
3521  << " elements (" << limited_searches/(0.01*Global_nElemDomain) << "%).\n";
3522 
3523  delete [] neighbour_idx;
3524  delete [] cg_elem;
3525  delete [] vol_elem;
3526  delete [] work_values;
3527 }
3528 
3529 void CGeometry::GetGlobalElementAdjacencyMatrix(vector<unsigned long> &neighbour_start,
3530  long *&neighbour_idx) const
3531 {
3532  if ( neighbour_idx != NULL )
3533  SU2_MPI::Error("neighbour_idx is expected to be NULL, stopping to avoid a potential memory leak",CURRENT_FUNCTION);
3534 
3535  unsigned long iElem, iElem_global;
3536 
3537  /*--- Determine how much space we need for the adjacency matrix by counting the
3538  neighbours of each element, i.e. its number of faces---*/
3539  unsigned short *nFaces_elem = new unsigned short [Global_nElemDomain];
3540 
3541  for(iElem=0; iElem<Global_nElemDomain; ++iElem) nFaces_elem[iElem] = 0;
3542 
3543  for(iElem=0; iElem<nElem; ++iElem) {
3544  iElem_global = elem[iElem]->GetGlobalIndex();
3545  nFaces_elem[iElem_global] = elem[iElem]->GetnFaces();
3546  }
3547 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
3548  /*--- Share with all processors ---*/
3549  {
3550  unsigned short *buffer = new unsigned short [Global_nElemDomain], *tmp = NULL;
3551  MPI_Allreduce(nFaces_elem,buffer,Global_nElemDomain,MPI_UNSIGNED_SHORT,MPI_MAX,MPI_COMM_WORLD);
3552  /*--- swap pointers and delete old data to keep the same variable name after reduction ---*/
3553  tmp = nFaces_elem; nFaces_elem = buffer; delete [] tmp;
3554  }
3555 #endif
3556 
3557  /*--- Vector with the addresses of the start of the neighbours of a given element.
3558  This is generated by a cumulative sum of the neighbour count. ---*/
3559  neighbour_start.resize(Global_nElemDomain+1);
3560 
3561  neighbour_start[0] = 0;
3562  for(iElem=0; iElem<Global_nElemDomain; ++iElem) {
3563  neighbour_start[iElem+1] = neighbour_start[iElem]+nFaces_elem[iElem];
3564  }
3565  delete [] nFaces_elem;
3566 
3567  /*--- Allocate ---*/
3568  unsigned long matrix_size = neighbour_start[Global_nElemDomain];
3569  neighbour_idx = new long [matrix_size];
3570  /*--- Initialize ---*/
3571  for(iElem=0; iElem<matrix_size; ++iElem) neighbour_idx[iElem] = -1;
3572  /*--- Populate ---*/
3573  for(iElem=0; iElem<nElem; ++iElem)
3574  {
3575  iElem_global = elem[iElem]->GetGlobalIndex();
3576  unsigned long start_pos = neighbour_start[iElem_global];
3577 
3578  for(unsigned short iFace=0; iFace<elem[iElem]->GetnFaces(); ++iFace)
3579  {
3580  long neighbour = elem[iElem]->GetNeighbor_Elements(iFace);
3581 
3582  if ( neighbour>=0 ) {
3583  neighbour_idx[start_pos+iFace] = elem[neighbour]->GetGlobalIndex();
3584  }
3585  }
3586  }
3587 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
3588  /*--- Share with all processors ---*/
3589  {
3590  long *buffer = new long [matrix_size], *tmp = NULL;
3591  MPI_Allreduce(neighbour_idx,buffer,matrix_size,MPI_LONG,MPI_MAX,MPI_COMM_WORLD);
3592  tmp = neighbour_idx; neighbour_idx = buffer; delete [] tmp;
3593  }
3594 #endif
3595 }
3596 
3597 bool CGeometry::GetRadialNeighbourhood(const unsigned long iElem_global,
3598  const passivedouble radius,
3599  size_t search_limit,
3600  const vector<unsigned long> &neighbour_start,
3601  const long *neighbour_idx,
3602  const su2double *cg_elem,
3603  vector<long> &neighbours,
3604  vector<bool> &is_neighbor) const
3605 {
3606  /*--- Validate inputs if we are debugging. ---*/
3607  assert(neighbour_start.size() == Global_nElemDomain+1 &&
3608  neighbour_idx != nullptr && cg_elem != nullptr &&
3609  is_neighbor.size() == Global_nElemDomain && "invalid inputs");
3610 
3611  /*--- 0 search_limit means "unlimited" (it will probably
3612  stop once it gathers the entire domain, probably). ---*/
3613  if (!search_limit) search_limit = numeric_limits<size_t>::max();
3614 
3615  /*--- Center of the search ---*/
3616  neighbours.clear();
3617  neighbours.push_back(iElem_global);
3618  is_neighbor[iElem_global] = true;
3619 
3620  passivedouble X0[3] = {0.0, 0.0, 0.0};
3621  for (unsigned short iDim=0; iDim<nDim; ++iDim)
3622  X0[iDim] = SU2_TYPE::GetValue(cg_elem[nDim*iElem_global+iDim]);
3623 
3624  /*--- Loop stops when "neighbours" stops changing size, or degree reaches limit. ---*/
3625  bool finished = false;
3626  for (size_t degree=0, start=0; degree < search_limit && !finished; ++degree)
3627  {
3628  /*--- For each element of the last degree added consider its immediate
3629  neighbours, that are not already neighbours, as candidates. ---*/
3630  vector<long> candidates;
3631 
3632  for (auto it = neighbours.begin()+start; it!=neighbours.end(); ++it) {
3633  /*--- scan row of the adjacency matrix of element *it ---*/
3634  for (auto i = neighbour_start[*it]; i < neighbour_start[(*it)+1]; ++i) {
3635  auto idx = neighbour_idx[i];
3636  if (idx>=0) if (!is_neighbor[idx]) {
3637  candidates.push_back(idx);
3638  /*--- mark as neighbour for now to avoid duplicate candidates. ---*/
3639  is_neighbor[idx] = true;
3640  }
3641  }
3642  }
3643  /*--- update start position to fetch next degree candidates. ---*/
3644  start = neighbours.size();
3645 
3646  /*--- Add candidates within "radius" of X0, if none qualifies we are "finished". ---*/
3647  finished = true;
3648  for (auto idx : candidates)
3649  {
3650  /*--- passivedouble as we only need to compare "distance". ---*/
3651  passivedouble distance = 0.0;
3652  for (unsigned short iDim=0; iDim<nDim; ++iDim)
3653  distance += pow(X0[iDim]-SU2_TYPE::GetValue(cg_elem[nDim*idx+iDim]),2);
3654 
3655  if(distance < pow(radius,2)) {
3656  neighbours.push_back(idx);
3657  finished = false;
3658  }
3659  /*--- not a neighbour in the end. ---*/
3660  else is_neighbor[idx] = false;
3661  }
3662  }
3663  /*--- Restore the state of the working vector for next call. ---*/
3664  for(auto idx : neighbours) is_neighbor[idx] = false;
3665 
3666  return finished;
3667 }
3668 
3669 void CGeometry::SetElemVolume(CConfig *config)
3670 {
3671  CElement *elements[4] = {NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL}, *element = NULL;
3672 
3673  /*--- Create a bank of elements to avoid instantiating inside loop ---*/
3674  if (nDim==2) {
3675  elements[0] = new CTRIA1();
3676  elements[1] = new CQUAD4();
3677  } else {
3678  elements[0] = new CTETRA1();
3679  elements[1] = new CPYRAM5();
3680  elements[2] = new CPRISM6();
3681  elements[3] = new CHEXA8();
3682  }
3683 
3684  /*--- Compute and store the volume of each "elem" ---*/
3685  for (unsigned long iElem=0; iElem<nElem; ++iElem)
3686  {
3687  /*--- Get the appropriate type of element ---*/
3688  switch (elem[iElem]->GetVTK_Type()) {
3689  case TRIANGLE: element = elements[0]; break;
3690  case QUADRILATERAL: element = elements[1]; break;
3691  case TETRAHEDRON: element = elements[0]; break;
3692  case PYRAMID: element = elements[1]; break;
3693  case PRISM: element = elements[2]; break;
3694  case HEXAHEDRON: element = elements[3]; break;
3695  default:
3696  SU2_MPI::Error("Cannot compute the area/volume of a 1D element.",CURRENT_FUNCTION);
3697  }
3698  /*--- Set the nodal coordinates of the element ---*/
3699  for (unsigned short iNode=0; iNode<elem[iElem]->GetnNodes(); ++iNode) {
3700  unsigned long node_idx = elem[iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
3701  for (unsigned short iDim=0; iDim<nDim; ++iDim) {
3702  su2double coord = node[node_idx]->GetCoord(iDim);
3703  element->SetRef_Coord(iNode, iDim, coord);
3704  }
3705  }
3706  /*--- Compute ---*/
3707  if(nDim==2) elem[iElem]->SetVolume(element->ComputeArea());
3708  else elem[iElem]->SetVolume(element->ComputeVolume());
3709  }
3710 
3711  delete elements[0];
3712  delete elements[1];
3713  if (nDim==3) {
3714  delete elements[2];
3715  delete elements[3];
3716  }
3717 }
3718 
3719 void CGeometry::UpdateBoundaries(CConfig *config){
3720 
3721  unsigned short iMarker;
3722  unsigned long iElem_Surface, iNode_Surface, Point_Surface;
3723 
3724  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker <config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++){
3725  for (iElem_Surface = 0; iElem_Surface < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem_Surface++) {
3726  for (iNode_Surface = 0; iNode_Surface < bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetnNodes(); iNode_Surface++) {
3727 
3728  Point_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(iNode_Surface);
3729 
3730  node[Point_Surface]->SetPhysicalBoundary(false);
3731  node[Point_Surface]->SetSolidBoundary(false);
3732 
3733  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != SEND_RECEIVE &&
3734  config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != INTERFACE_BOUNDARY &&
3735  config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != NEARFIELD_BOUNDARY &&
3736  config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != PERIODIC_BOUNDARY)
3737  node[Point_Surface]->SetPhysicalBoundary(true);
3738 
3739  if (config->GetSolid_Wall(iMarker))
3740  node[Point_Surface]->SetSolidBoundary(true);
3741  }
3742  }
3743  }
3744 
3745  /*--- Update the normal neighbors ---*/
3746 
3747  FindNormal_Neighbor(config);
3748 
3749  /*--- Compute wall distance ---- */
3750 
3751  ComputeWall_Distance(config);
3752 
3753 }
3754 
3755 CPhysicalGeometry::CPhysicalGeometry() : CGeometry() {
3756 
3757  size = SU2_MPI::GetSize();
3758  rank = SU2_MPI::GetRank();
3759 
3760  Local_to_Global_Point = NULL;
3761  Local_to_Global_Marker = NULL;
3762  Global_to_Local_Marker = NULL;
3763 
3764  beg_node = NULL;
3765  end_node = NULL;
3766 
3767  nPointLinear = NULL;
3768  nPointCumulative = NULL;
3769 
3770 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
3771 #ifdef HAVE_PARMETIS
3772  adjacency = NULL;
3773  xadj = NULL;
3774 #endif
3775 #endif
3776 
3777  /*--- Arrays for defining the turbomachinery structure ---*/
3778 
3779  nSpanWiseSections = NULL;
3780  nSpanSectionsByMarker = NULL;
3781  SpanWiseValue = NULL;
3782  nVertexSpan = NULL;
3783  nTotVertexSpan = NULL;
3784  turbovertex = NULL;
3785  AverageTurboNormal = NULL;
3786  AverageNormal = NULL;
3787  AverageGridVel = NULL;
3788  AverageTangGridVel = NULL;
3789  SpanArea = NULL;
3790  TurboRadius = NULL;
3791  MaxAngularCoord = NULL;
3792  MinAngularCoord = NULL;
3793  MinRelAngularCoord = NULL;
3794 
3795  TangGridVelIn = NULL;
3796  SpanAreaIn = NULL;
3797  TurboRadiusIn = NULL;
3798  TangGridVelOut = NULL;
3799  SpanAreaOut = NULL;
3800  TurboRadiusOut = NULL;
3801  SpanWiseValue = NULL;
3802 
3803 }
3804 
3805 CPhysicalGeometry::CPhysicalGeometry(CConfig *config, unsigned short val_iZone, unsigned short val_nZone) : CGeometry() {
3806 
3807  size = SU2_MPI::GetSize();
3808  rank = SU2_MPI::GetRank();
3809 
3810  Local_to_Global_Point = NULL;
3811  Local_to_Global_Marker = NULL;
3812  Global_to_Local_Marker = NULL;
3813 
3814  beg_node = NULL;
3815  end_node = NULL;
3816 
3817  nPointLinear = NULL;
3818  nPointCumulative = NULL;
3819 
3820 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
3821 #ifdef HAVE_PARMETIS
3822  adjacency = NULL;
3823  xadj = NULL;
3824 #endif
3825 #endif
3826 
3827  /*--- Arrays for defining the turbomachinery structure ---*/
3828 
3829  nSpanWiseSections = NULL;
3830  nSpanSectionsByMarker = NULL;
3831  SpanWiseValue = NULL;
3832  nVertexSpan = NULL;
3833  nTotVertexSpan = NULL;
3834  turbovertex = NULL;
3835  AverageTurboNormal = NULL;
3836  AverageNormal = NULL;
3837  AverageGridVel = NULL;
3838  AverageTangGridVel = NULL;
3839  SpanArea = NULL;
3840  TurboRadius = NULL;
3841  MaxAngularCoord = NULL;
3842  MinAngularCoord = NULL;
3843  MinRelAngularCoord = NULL;
3844 
3845  TangGridVelIn = NULL;
3846  SpanAreaIn = NULL;
3847  TurboRadiusIn = NULL;
3848  TangGridVelOut = NULL;
3849  SpanAreaOut = NULL;
3850  TurboRadiusOut = NULL;
3851  SpanWiseValue = NULL;
3852 
3853  string text_line, Marker_Tag;
3854  ifstream mesh_file;
3855  unsigned short iDim, iMarker, iNodes;
3856  unsigned long iPoint, iElem_Bound;
3857  su2double *NewCoord;
3858  nZone = val_nZone;
3859  ofstream boundary_file;
3860  string Grid_Marker;
3861 
3862  string val_mesh_filename = config->GetMesh_FileName();
3863  unsigned short val_format = config->GetMesh_FileFormat();
3864 
3865  /*--- Determine whether or not a FEM discretization is used ---*/
3866 
3867  const bool fem_solver = ((config->GetKind_Solver() == FEM_EULER) ||
3868  (config->GetKind_Solver() == FEM_NAVIER_STOKES) ||
3869  (config->GetKind_Solver() == FEM_RANS) ||
3870  (config->GetKind_Solver() == FEM_LES) ||
3871  (config->GetKind_Solver() == DISC_ADJ_FEM_EULER) ||
3872  (config->GetKind_Solver() == DISC_ADJ_FEM_NS) ||
3873  (config->GetKind_Solver() == DISC_ADJ_FEM_RANS));
3874 
3875  /*--- Initialize counters for local/global points & elements ---*/
3876 
3877  if( fem_solver ) {
3878  switch (val_format) {
3879  case SU2:
3880  Read_SU2_Format_Parallel_FEM(config, val_mesh_filename, val_iZone, val_nZone);
3881  break;
3882 
3883  case CGNS_GRID:
3884  Read_CGNS_Format_Parallel_FEM(config, val_mesh_filename, val_iZone, val_nZone);
3885  break;
3886 
3887  default:
3888  SU2_MPI::Error("Unrecognized mesh format specified for the FEM solver!", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
3889  break;
3890  }
3891  }
3892  else {
3893 
3894  switch (val_format) {
3895  case SU2: case CGNS_GRID: case RECTANGLE: case BOX:
3896  Read_Mesh_FVM(config, val_mesh_filename, val_iZone, val_nZone);
3897  break;
3898  default:
3899  SU2_MPI::Error("Unrecognized mesh format specified!", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
3900  break;
3901  }
3902  }
3903 
3904  /*--- After reading the mesh, assert that the dimension is equal to 2 or 3. ---*/
3905 
3906  assert((nDim == 2) || (nDim == 3));
3907 
3908  /*--- Loop over the points element to re-scale the mesh, and plot it (only SU2_CFD) ---*/
3909 
3910  if (config->GetKind_SU2() == SU2_CFD) {
3911 
3912  NewCoord = new su2double [nDim];
3913 
3914  /*--- The US system uses feet, but SU2 assumes that the grid is in inches ---*/
3915 
3916  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US) {
3917  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
3918  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
3919  NewCoord[iDim] = node[iPoint]->GetCoord(iDim)/12.0;
3920  }
3921  node[iPoint]->SetCoord(NewCoord);
3922  }
3923  }
3924 
3925  delete [] NewCoord;
3926 
3927  }
3928 
3929  /*--- If SU2_DEF then write a file with the boundary information ---*/
3930 
3931  if ((config->GetKind_SU2() == SU2_DEF) && (rank == MASTER_NODE)) {
3932 
3933  string str = "boundary.dat";
3934 
3935  str = config->GetMultizone_FileName(str, val_iZone, ".dat");
3936 
3937  /*--- Open .su2 grid file ---*/
3938 
3939  boundary_file.open(str.c_str(), ios::out);
3940 
3941  /*--- Loop through and write the boundary info ---*/
3942 
3943  boundary_file << "NMARK= " << nMarker << endl;
3944 
3945  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
3946 
3947  Grid_Marker = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(iMarker);
3948  boundary_file << "MARKER_TAG= " << Grid_Marker << endl;
3949  boundary_file << "MARKER_ELEMS= " << nElem_Bound[iMarker]<< endl;
3950  boundary_file << "SEND_TO= " << config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(iMarker) << endl;
3951  if (nDim == 2) {
3952  for (iElem_Bound = 0; iElem_Bound < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem_Bound++) {
3953  boundary_file << bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetVTK_Type() << "\t" ;
3954  for (iNodes = 0; iNodes < bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetnNodes(); iNodes++)
3955  boundary_file << bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(iNodes) << "\t" ;
3956 
3957  if (bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetVTK_Type() == VERTEX) {
3958  boundary_file << bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetRotation_Type() << "\t";
3959  }
3960  boundary_file << iElem_Bound << endl;
3961  }
3962  }
3963 
3964  if (nDim == 3) {
3965  for (iElem_Bound = 0; iElem_Bound < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem_Bound++) {
3966  boundary_file << bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetVTK_Type() << "\t" ;
3967  for (iNodes = 0; iNodes < bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetnNodes(); iNodes++)
3968  boundary_file << bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(iNodes) << "\t" ;
3969 
3970  if (bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetVTK_Type() == VERTEX) {
3971  boundary_file << bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetRotation_Type() << "\t";
3972  }
3973  boundary_file << iElem_Bound << endl;
3974  }
3975  }
3976 
3977  }
3978 
3979  boundary_file.close();
3980 
3981  }
3982 
3983 }
3984 
3985 CPhysicalGeometry::CPhysicalGeometry(CGeometry *geometry,
3986  CConfig *config) {
3987 
3988  /*--- Get rank and size. ---*/
3989 
3990  size = SU2_MPI::GetSize();
3991  rank = SU2_MPI::GetRank();
3992 
3993  /*--- Initialize several class data members for later. ---*/
3994 
3995  Local_to_Global_Point = NULL;
3996  Local_to_Global_Marker = NULL;
3997  Global_to_Local_Marker = NULL;
3998 
3999  /*--- Arrays for defining the linear partitioning. ---*/
4000 
4001  beg_node = NULL;
4002  end_node = NULL;
4003 
4004  nPointLinear = NULL;
4005  nPointCumulative = NULL;
4006 
4007 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
4008 #ifdef HAVE_PARMETIS
4009  adjacency = NULL;
4010  xadj = NULL;
4011 #endif
4012 #endif
4013 
4014  /*--- Arrays for defining the turbomachinery structure ---*/
4015 
4016  nSpanWiseSections = NULL;
4017  nSpanSectionsByMarker = NULL;
4018  SpanWiseValue = NULL;
4019  nVertexSpan = NULL;
4020  nTotVertexSpan = NULL;
4021  turbovertex = NULL;
4022  AverageTurboNormal = NULL;
4023  AverageNormal = NULL;
4024  AverageGridVel = NULL;
4025  AverageTangGridVel = NULL;
4026  SpanArea = NULL;
4027  TurboRadius = NULL;
4028  MaxAngularCoord = NULL;
4029  MinAngularCoord = NULL;
4030  MinRelAngularCoord = NULL;
4031 
4032  TangGridVelIn = NULL;
4033  SpanAreaIn = NULL;
4034  TurboRadiusIn = NULL;
4035  TangGridVelOut = NULL;
4036  SpanAreaOut = NULL;
4037  TurboRadiusOut = NULL;
4038 
4039  /*--- Initialize counters for the points/elements local to a rank. ---*/
4040 
4041  nLocal_Point = 0;
4042  nLocal_PointDomain = 0;
4043  nLocal_PointGhost = 0;
4044  nLocal_PointPeriodic = 0;
4045  nLocal_Line = 0;
4046  nLocal_BoundTria = 0;
4047  nLocal_BoundQuad = 0;
4048  nLocal_Tria = 0;
4049  nLocal_Quad = 0;
4050  nLocal_Tetr = 0;
4051  nLocal_Hexa = 0;
4052  nLocal_Pris = 0;
4053  nLocal_Pyra = 0;
4054 
4055  Local_Coords = NULL;
4056  Local_Points = NULL;
4057  Local_Colors = NULL;
4058 
4059  /*--- Arrays for holding the element connectivity. ---*/
4060 
4061  Conn_Line = NULL;
4062  Conn_BoundTria = NULL;
4063  Conn_BoundQuad = NULL;
4064 
4065  Conn_Line_Linear = NULL;
4066  Conn_BoundTria_Linear = NULL;
4067  Conn_BoundQuad_Linear = NULL;
4068 
4069  Conn_Tria = NULL;
4070  Conn_Quad = NULL;
4071  Conn_Tetr = NULL;
4072  Conn_Hexa = NULL;
4073  Conn_Pris = NULL;
4074  Conn_Pyra = NULL;
4075 
4076  /*--- Arrays for holding the element IDs. ---*/
4077 
4078  ID_Line = NULL;
4079  ID_BoundTria = NULL;
4080  ID_BoundQuad = NULL;
4081  ID_Line_Linear = NULL;
4082  ID_BoundTria_Linear = NULL;
4083  ID_BoundQuad_Linear = NULL;
4084 
4085  ID_Tria = NULL;
4086  ID_Quad = NULL;
4087  ID_Tetr = NULL;
4088  ID_Hexa = NULL;
4089  ID_Pris = NULL;
4090  ID_Pyra = NULL;
4091 
4092  Elem_ID_Line = NULL;
4093  Elem_ID_BoundTria = NULL;
4094  Elem_ID_BoundQuad = NULL;
4095  Elem_ID_Line_Linear = NULL;
4096  Elem_ID_BoundTria_Linear = NULL;
4097  Elem_ID_BoundQuad_Linear = NULL;
4098 
4099  /*--- The new geometry class has the same problem dimension/zone. ---*/
4100 
4101  nDim = geometry->GetnDim();
4102  nZone = geometry->GetnZone();
4103 
4104  /*--- Recompute the linear partitioning offsets. ---*/
4105 
4106  PrepareOffsets(geometry->GetGlobal_nPoint());
4107 
4108  /*--- Communicate the coloring data so that each rank has a complete set
4109  of colors for all points that reside on it, including repeats. ---*/
4110 
4111  if ((rank == MASTER_NODE) && (size != SINGLE_NODE))
4112  cout <<"Distributing ParMETIS coloring." << endl;
4113 
4114  DistributeColoring(config, geometry);
4115 
4116  /*--- Redistribute the points to all ranks based on the coloring. ---*/
4117 
4118  if ((rank == MASTER_NODE) && (size != SINGLE_NODE))
4119  cout <<"Rebalancing vertices." << endl;
4120 
4121  DistributePoints(config, geometry);
4122 
4123  /*--- Distribute the element information to all ranks based on coloring. ---*/
4124 
4125  if ((rank == MASTER_NODE) && (size != SINGLE_NODE))
4126  cout <<"Rebalancing volume element connectivity." << endl;
4127 
4128  DistributeVolumeConnectivity(config, geometry, TRIANGLE );
4129  DistributeVolumeConnectivity(config, geometry, QUADRILATERAL);
4130  DistributeVolumeConnectivity(config, geometry, TETRAHEDRON );
4131  DistributeVolumeConnectivity(config, geometry, HEXAHEDRON );
4132  DistributeVolumeConnectivity(config, geometry, PRISM );
4133  DistributeVolumeConnectivity(config, geometry, PYRAMID );
4134 
4135  /*--- Distribute the marker information to all ranks based on coloring. ---*/
4136 
4137  if ((rank == MASTER_NODE) && (size != SINGLE_NODE))
4138  cout <<"Rebalancing markers and surface elements." << endl;
4139 
4140  /*--- First, perform a linear partitioning of the marker information, as
4141  the grid readers currently store all boundary information on the master
4142  rank. In the future, this process can be moved directly into the grid
4143  reader to avoid reading the markers to the master rank alone at first. ---*/
4144 
4145  DistributeMarkerTags(config, geometry);
4146  PartitionSurfaceConnectivity(config, geometry, LINE );
4147  PartitionSurfaceConnectivity(config, geometry, TRIANGLE );
4148  PartitionSurfaceConnectivity(config, geometry, QUADRILATERAL);
4149 
4150  /*--- Once the markers are distributed according to the linear partitioning
4151  of the grid points, we can use similar techniques as above for distributing
4152  the surface element connectivity. ---*/
4153 
4154  DistributeSurfaceConnectivity(config, geometry, LINE );
4155  DistributeSurfaceConnectivity(config, geometry, TRIANGLE );
4156  DistributeSurfaceConnectivity(config, geometry, QUADRILATERAL);
4157 
4158  /*--- Reduce the total number of elements that we have on each rank. ---*/
4159 
4160  nLocal_Elem = (nLocal_Tria +
4161  nLocal_Quad +
4162  nLocal_Tetr +
4163  nLocal_Hexa +
4164  nLocal_Pris +
4165  nLocal_Pyra);
4166  nLocal_Bound_Elem = nLocal_Line + nLocal_BoundTria + nLocal_BoundQuad;
4167 #ifndef HAVE_MPI
4168  nGlobal_Elem = nLocal_Elem;
4169  nGlobal_Bound_Elem = nLocal_Bound_Elem;
4170 #else
4171  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&nLocal_Elem, &nGlobal_Elem, 1,
4172  MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
4173  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&nLocal_Bound_Elem, &nGlobal_Bound_Elem, 1,
4174  MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
4175 #endif
4176 
4177  /*--- With the distribution of all points, elements, and markers based
4178  on the ParMETIS coloring complete, as a final step, load this data into
4179  our geometry class data structures. ---*/
4180 
4181  LoadPoints(config, geometry);
4182  LoadVolumeElements(config, geometry);
4183  LoadSurfaceElements(config, geometry);
4184 
4185  /*--- Free memory associated with the partitioning of points and elems. ---*/
4186 
4187  Neighbors.clear();
4188  Color_List.clear();
4189 
4190  if (Local_Points != NULL) delete [] Local_Points;
4191  if (Local_Colors != NULL) delete [] Local_Colors;
4192  if (Local_Coords != NULL) delete [] Local_Coords;
4193 
4194  if (nLinear_Line > 0 && Conn_Line_Linear != NULL)
4195  delete [] Conn_Line_Linear;
4196  if (nLinear_BoundTria > 0 && Conn_BoundTria_Linear != NULL)
4197  delete [] Conn_BoundTria_Linear;
4198  if (nLinear_BoundQuad > 0 && Conn_BoundQuad_Linear != NULL)
4199  delete [] Conn_BoundQuad_Linear;
4200 
4201  if (nLocal_Line > 0 && Conn_Line != NULL) delete [] Conn_Line;
4202  if (nLocal_BoundTria > 0 && Conn_BoundTria != NULL) delete [] Conn_BoundTria;
4203  if (nLocal_BoundQuad > 0 && Conn_BoundQuad != NULL) delete [] Conn_BoundQuad;
4204  if (nLocal_Tria > 0 && Conn_Tria != NULL) delete [] Conn_Tria;
4205  if (nLocal_Quad > 0 && Conn_Quad != NULL) delete [] Conn_Quad;
4206  if (nLocal_Tetr > 0 && Conn_Tetr != NULL) delete [] Conn_Tetr;
4207  if (nLocal_Hexa > 0 && Conn_Hexa != NULL) delete [] Conn_Hexa;
4208  if (nLocal_Pris > 0 && Conn_Pris != NULL) delete [] Conn_Pris;
4209  if (nLocal_Pyra > 0 && Conn_Pyra != NULL) delete [] Conn_Pyra;
4210 
4211  if (ID_Line != NULL) delete [] ID_Line;
4212  if (ID_BoundTria != NULL) delete [] ID_BoundTria;
4213  if (ID_BoundQuad != NULL) delete [] ID_BoundQuad;
4214  if (ID_Line_Linear != NULL) delete [] ID_Line_Linear;
4215  if (ID_BoundTria_Linear != NULL) delete [] ID_BoundTria_Linear;
4216  if (ID_BoundQuad_Linear != NULL) delete [] ID_BoundQuad_Linear;
4217 
4218  if (ID_Tria != NULL) delete [] ID_Tria;
4219  if (ID_Quad != NULL) delete [] ID_Quad;
4220  if (ID_Tetr != NULL) delete [] ID_Tetr;
4221  if (ID_Hexa != NULL) delete [] ID_Hexa;
4222  if (ID_Pris != NULL) delete [] ID_Pris;
4223  if (ID_Pyra != NULL) delete [] ID_Pyra;
4224 
4225  if (Elem_ID_Line != NULL) delete [] Elem_ID_Line;
4226  if (Elem_ID_BoundTria != NULL) delete [] Elem_ID_BoundTria;
4227  if (Elem_ID_BoundQuad != NULL) delete [] Elem_ID_BoundQuad;
4228  if (Elem_ID_Line_Linear != NULL) delete [] Elem_ID_Line_Linear;
4229  if (Elem_ID_BoundTria_Linear != NULL) delete [] Elem_ID_BoundTria_Linear;
4230  if (Elem_ID_BoundQuad_Linear != NULL) delete [] Elem_ID_BoundQuad_Linear;
4231 
4232 }
4233 
4234 CPhysicalGeometry::~CPhysicalGeometry(void) {
4235 
4236  if (Local_to_Global_Point != NULL) delete [] Local_to_Global_Point;
4237  if (Global_to_Local_Marker != NULL) delete [] Global_to_Local_Marker;
4238  if (Local_to_Global_Marker != NULL) delete [] Local_to_Global_Marker;
4239 
4240  /*--- Free up memory from turbomachinery performance computation ---*/
4241 
4242  unsigned short iMarker;
4243  if (TangGridVelIn != NULL) {
4244  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nTurboPerf; iMarker++)
4245  if (TangGridVelIn[iMarker] != NULL) delete [] TangGridVelIn[iMarker];
4246  delete [] TangGridVelIn;
4247  }
4248  if (SpanAreaIn != NULL) {
4249  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nTurboPerf; iMarker++)
4250  if (SpanAreaIn[iMarker] != NULL) delete [] SpanAreaIn[iMarker];
4251  delete [] SpanAreaIn;
4252  }
4253  if (TurboRadiusIn != NULL) {
4254  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nTurboPerf; iMarker++)
4255  if (TurboRadiusIn[iMarker] != NULL) delete [] TurboRadiusIn[iMarker];
4256  delete [] TurboRadiusIn;
4257  }
4258  if (TangGridVelOut != NULL) {
4259  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nTurboPerf; iMarker++)
4260  if (TangGridVelOut[iMarker] != NULL) delete [] TangGridVelOut[iMarker];
4261  delete [] TangGridVelOut;
4262  }
4263  if (SpanAreaOut != NULL) {
4264  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nTurboPerf; iMarker++)
4265  if (SpanAreaOut[iMarker] != NULL) delete [] SpanAreaOut[iMarker];
4266  delete [] SpanAreaOut;
4267  }
4268  if (TurboRadiusOut != NULL) {
4269  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nTurboPerf; iMarker++)
4270  if (TurboRadiusOut[iMarker] != NULL) delete [] TurboRadiusOut[iMarker];
4271  delete [] TurboRadiusOut;
4272  }
4273 
4274  /*--- Free up memory from turbomachinery computations
4275  * If there are send/receive boundaries, nMarker isn't the same number
4276  * as in the constructor. There must be an explicit check to ensure
4277  * that iMarker doesn't point us to memory that was never allocated. ---*/
4278 
4279  unsigned short iSpan, iVertex;
4280  if (turbovertex != NULL) {
4281  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
4282  if (Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker] == 0 && turbovertex[iMarker] != NULL) {
4283  for (iSpan= 0; iSpan < nSpanSectionsByMarker[iMarker]; iSpan++) {
4284  if (turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan] != NULL) {
4285  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan]; iVertex++)
4286  if (turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iVertex] != NULL)
4287  delete turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iVertex];
4288  delete [] turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan];
4289  }
4290  }
4291  delete [] turbovertex[iMarker];
4292  }
4293  }
4294  delete [] turbovertex;
4295  }
4296  if (AverageTurboNormal != NULL) {
4297  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
4298  if (Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker] == 0 && AverageTurboNormal[iMarker] != NULL) {
4299  for (iSpan= 0; iSpan < nSpanSectionsByMarker[iMarker]+1; iSpan++)
4300  delete [] AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan];
4301  delete [] AverageTurboNormal[iMarker];
4302  }
4303  }
4304  delete [] AverageTurboNormal;
4305  }
4306  if (AverageNormal != NULL) {
4307  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
4308  if (Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker] == 0 && AverageNormal[iMarker] != NULL) {
4309  for (iSpan= 0; iSpan < nSpanSectionsByMarker[iMarker]+1; iSpan++)
4310  delete [] AverageNormal[iMarker][iSpan];
4311  delete [] AverageNormal[iMarker];
4312  }
4313  }
4314  delete [] AverageNormal;
4315  }
4316  if (AverageGridVel != NULL) {
4317  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
4318  if (Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker] == 0 && AverageGridVel[iMarker] != NULL) {
4319  for (iSpan= 0; iSpan < nSpanSectionsByMarker[iMarker]+1; iSpan++)
4320  delete [] AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan];
4321  delete [] AverageGridVel[iMarker];
4322  }
4323  }
4324  delete [] AverageGridVel;
4325  }
4326 
4327  if (AverageTangGridVel != NULL) {
4328  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++)
