4329  if (Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker] == 0 && AverageTangGridVel[iMarker] != NULL)
4330  delete [] AverageTangGridVel[iMarker];
4331  delete [] AverageTangGridVel;
4332  }
4333  if (SpanArea != NULL) {
4334  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++)
4335  if (Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker] == 0 && SpanArea[iMarker] != NULL)
4336  delete [] SpanArea[iMarker];
4337  delete [] SpanArea;
4338  }
4339  if (TurboRadius != NULL) {
4340  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++)
4341  if (Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker] == 0 && TurboRadius[iMarker] != NULL)
4342  delete [] TurboRadius[iMarker];
4343  delete [] TurboRadius;
4344  }
4345  if (MaxAngularCoord != NULL) {
4346  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++)
4347  if (Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker] == 0 && MaxAngularCoord[iMarker] != NULL)
4348  delete [] MaxAngularCoord[iMarker];
4349  delete [] MaxAngularCoord;
4350  }
4351  if (MinAngularCoord != NULL) {
4352  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++)
4353  if (Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker] == 0 && MinAngularCoord[iMarker] != NULL)
4354  delete [] MinAngularCoord[iMarker];
4355  delete [] MinAngularCoord;
4356  }
4357  if (MinRelAngularCoord != NULL) {
4358  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++)
4359  if (Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker] == 0 && MinRelAngularCoord[iMarker] != NULL)
4360  delete [] MinRelAngularCoord[iMarker];
4361  delete [] MinRelAngularCoord;
4362  }
4363 
4364  if (nSpanWiseSections != NULL) delete [] nSpanWiseSections;
4365  if (nSpanSectionsByMarker != NULL) delete [] nSpanSectionsByMarker;
4366  if (SpanWiseValue != NULL) {
4367  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < 2; iMarker++)
4368  if (Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker] == 0 && SpanWiseValue[iMarker] != NULL)
4369  delete [] SpanWiseValue[iMarker];
4370  delete [] SpanWiseValue;
4371  }
4372  if (nVertexSpan != NULL) {
4373  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++)
4374  if (Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker] == 0 && nVertexSpan[iMarker] != NULL)
4375  delete [] nVertexSpan[iMarker];
4376  delete [] nVertexSpan;
4377  }
4378  if (nTotVertexSpan != NULL) {
4379  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++)
4380  if (Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker] == 0 && nTotVertexSpan[iMarker] != NULL)
4381  delete [] nTotVertexSpan[iMarker];
4382  delete [] nTotVertexSpan;
4383  }
4384 
4385 }
4386 
4387 void CPhysicalGeometry::DistributeColoring(CConfig *config,
4388  CGeometry *geometry) {
4389 
4390  /*--- To start, each linear partition carries the color only for the
4391  owned nodes (nPoint), but we have repeated elems on each linear partition.
4392  We need to complete the coloring information such that the repeated
4393  points on each rank also have their color values. ---*/
4394 
4395  unsigned short iNode, jNode;
4396  unsigned long iPoint, iNeighbor, jPoint, iElem, iProcessor;
4397 
4398  map<unsigned long, unsigned long> Point_Map;
4399  map<unsigned long, unsigned long>::iterator MI;
4400 
4401  vector<unsigned long>::iterator it;
4402 
4403  SU2_MPI::Request *colorSendReq = NULL, *idSendReq = NULL;
4404  SU2_MPI::Request *colorRecvReq = NULL, *idRecvReq = NULL;
4405  int iProc, iSend, iRecv, myStart, myFinal;
4406 
4407  /*--- Get a linear partitioner to track the partition counts. ---*/
4408 
4409  CLinearPartitioner pointPartitioner(geometry->GetGlobal_nPoint(),0);
4410 
4411  /*--- First, create a complete map of the points on this rank (excluding
4412  repeats) and their neighbors so that we can efficiently loop through the
4413  points and decide how to distribute the colors. ---*/
4414 
4415  for (iElem = 0; iElem < geometry->GetnElem(); iElem++) {
4416  for (iNode = 0; iNode < geometry->elem[iElem]->GetnNodes(); iNode++) {
4417  iPoint = geometry->elem[iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
4418  Point_Map[iPoint] = iPoint;
4419  }
4420  }
4421 
4422  /*--- Error check to ensure that the number of points found for this
4423  rank matches the number in the mesh file (in serial). ---*/
4424 
4425  if ((size == SINGLE_NODE) && (Point_Map.size() < geometry->GetnPoint())) {
4426  SU2_MPI::Error( string("Mismatch between NPOIN and number of points")
4427  +string(" listed in mesh file.\n")
4428  +string("Please check the mesh file for correctness.\n"),
4429  CURRENT_FUNCTION);
4430  }
4431 
4432  /*--- Create a global to local mapping that includes the unowned points. ---*/
4433 
4434  map<unsigned long, unsigned long> Global2Local;
4435  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < geometry->GetnPoint(); iPoint++) {
4436  Global2Local[geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGlobalIndex()] = iPoint;
4437  }
4438 
4439  /*--- Find extra points that carry an index higher than nPoint. ---*/
4440 
4441  jPoint = geometry->GetnPoint();
4442  for (MI = Point_Map.begin(); MI != Point_Map.end(); MI++) {
4443  iPoint = MI->first;
4444  if ((Point_Map[iPoint] < pointPartitioner.GetFirstIndexOnRank(rank)) ||
4445  (Point_Map[iPoint] >= pointPartitioner.GetLastIndexOnRank(rank))){
4446  Global2Local[Point_Map[iPoint]] = jPoint;
4447  jPoint++;
4448  }
4449  }
4450 
4451  /*--- Now create the neighbor list for each owned node (self-inclusive). ---*/
4452 
4453  Neighbors.clear();
4454  Neighbors.resize(Point_Map.size());
4455  for (iElem = 0; iElem < geometry->GetnElem(); iElem++) {
4456  for (iNode = 0; iNode < geometry->elem[iElem]->GetnNodes(); iNode++) {
4457  iPoint = Global2Local[geometry->elem[iElem]->GetNode(iNode)];
4458  for (jNode = 0; jNode < geometry->elem[iElem]->GetnNodes(); jNode++) {
4459  jPoint = geometry->elem[iElem]->GetNode(jNode);
4460  Neighbors[iPoint].push_back(jPoint);
4461  }
4462  }
4463  }
4464 
4465  /*--- Post-process the neighbor lists. ---*/
4466 
4467  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < Point_Map.size(); iPoint++) {
4468  sort(Neighbors[iPoint].begin(), Neighbors[iPoint].end());
4469  it = unique(Neighbors[iPoint].begin(), Neighbors[iPoint].end());
4470  Neighbors[iPoint].resize(it - Neighbors[iPoint].begin());
4471  }
4472 
4473  /*--- Prepare structures for communication. ---*/
4474 
4475  int *nPoint_Send = new int[size+1]; nPoint_Send[0] = 0;
4476  int *nPoint_Recv = new int[size+1]; nPoint_Recv[0] = 0;
4477  int *nPoint_Flag = new int[size];
4478 
4479  for (iProc = 0; iProc < size; iProc++) {
4480  nPoint_Send[iProc] = 0; nPoint_Recv[iProc] = 0; nPoint_Flag[iProc]= -1;
4481  }
4482  nPoint_Send[size] = 0; nPoint_Recv[size] = 0;
4483 
4484  /*--- Loop over the owned points and check all the neighbors for unowned
4485  points. The colors of all owned points will be communicated to any ranks
4486  that will require them, which is due to the repeated points/elements
4487  that were needed to perform the coloring. ---*/
4488 
4489  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < geometry->GetnPoint(); iPoint++) {
4490  for (iNeighbor = 0; iNeighbor < Neighbors[iPoint].size(); iNeighbor++) {
4491 
4492  /*--- Global ID of the neighbor ---*/
4493 
4494  jPoint = Neighbors[iPoint][iNeighbor];
4495 
4496  /*--- Search for the processor that owns this neighbor. ---*/
4497 
4498  iProcessor = pointPartitioner.GetRankContainingIndex(jPoint);
4499 
4500  /*--- If we have not visited this node yet, increment our
4501  number of points that must be sent to a particular proc. ---*/
4502 
4503  if (nPoint_Flag[iProcessor] != (int)iPoint) {
4504  nPoint_Flag[iProcessor] = (int)iPoint;
4505  nPoint_Send[iProcessor+1]++;
4506  }
4507 
4508  }
4509  }
4510 
4511  /*--- Communicate the number of nodes to be sent/recv'd amongst
4512  all processors. After this communication, each proc knows how
4513  many points it will receive from each other processor. ---*/
4514 
4515  SU2_MPI::Alltoall(&(nPoint_Send[1]), 1, MPI_INT,
4516  &(nPoint_Recv[1]), 1, MPI_INT, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
4517 
4518  /*--- Prepare to send colors. First check how many
4519  messages we will be sending and receiving. Here we also put
4520  the counters into cumulative storage format to make the
4521  communications simpler. ---*/
4522 
4523  int nSends = 0, nRecvs = 0;
4524  for (iProc = 0; iProc < size; iProc++) nPoint_Flag[iProc] = -1;
4525 
4526  for (iProc = 0; iProc < size; iProc++) {
4527  if ((iProc != rank) && (nPoint_Send[iProc+1] > 0)) nSends++;
4528  if ((iProc != rank) && (nPoint_Recv[iProc+1] > 0)) nRecvs++;
4529 
4530  nPoint_Send[iProc+1] += nPoint_Send[iProc];
4531  nPoint_Recv[iProc+1] += nPoint_Recv[iProc];
4532  }
4533 
4534  /*--- Allocate arrays for sending the global ID. ---*/
4535 
4536  unsigned long *idSend = new unsigned long[nPoint_Send[size]];
4537  for (iSend = 0; iSend < nPoint_Send[size]; iSend++) idSend[iSend] = 0;
4538 
4539  /*--- Allocate memory to hold the colors that we are sending. ---*/
4540 
4541  unsigned long *colorSend = new unsigned long[nPoint_Send[size]];
4542  for (iSend = 0; iSend < nPoint_Send[size]; iSend++) colorSend[iSend] = 0;
4543 
4544  /*--- Create an index variable to keep track of our index
4545  positions as we load up the send buffer. ---*/
4546 
4547  unsigned long *index = new unsigned long[size];
4548  for (iProc = 0; iProc < size; iProc++) index[iProc] = nPoint_Send[iProc];
4549 
4550  /*--- Now load up our buffers with the Global IDs and colors. ---*/
4551 
4552  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < geometry->GetnPoint(); iPoint++) {
4553  for (iNeighbor = 0; iNeighbor < Neighbors[iPoint].size(); iNeighbor++) {
4554 
4555  /*--- Global ID of the neighbor ---*/
4556 
4557  jPoint = Neighbors[iPoint][iNeighbor];
4558 
4559  /*--- Search for the processor that owns this neighbor ---*/
4560 
4561  iProcessor = pointPartitioner.GetRankContainingIndex(jPoint);
4562 
4563  /*--- If we have not visited this node yet, increment our
4564  counters and load up the global ID and color. ---*/
4565 
4566  if (nPoint_Flag[iProcessor] != (int)iPoint) {
4567 
4568  nPoint_Flag[iProcessor] = (int)iPoint;
4569  unsigned long nn = index[iProcessor];
4570 
4571  /*--- Load the data values. ---*/
4572 
4573  idSend[nn] = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGlobalIndex();
4574  colorSend[nn] = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetColor();
4575 
4576  /*--- Increment the index by the message length ---*/
4577 
4578  index[iProcessor]++;
4579 
4580  }
4581  }
4582  }
4583 
4584  /*--- Free memory after loading up the send buffer. ---*/
4585 
4586  delete [] index;
4587 
4588  /*--- Allocate the memory that we need for receiving the conn
4589  values and then cue up the non-blocking receives. Note that
4590  we do not include our own rank in the communications. We will
4591  directly copy our own data later. ---*/
4592 
4593  unsigned long *colorRecv = new unsigned long[nPoint_Recv[size]];
4594  for (iRecv = 0; iRecv < nPoint_Recv[size]; iRecv++)
4595  colorRecv[iRecv] = 0;
4596 
4597  unsigned long *idRecv = new unsigned long[nPoint_Recv[size]];
4598  for (iRecv = 0; iRecv < nPoint_Recv[size]; iRecv++)
4599  idRecv[iRecv] = 0;
4600 
4601  /*--- Allocate memory for the MPI requests if we need to communicate. ---*/
4602 
4603  if (nSends > 0) {
4604  colorSendReq = new SU2_MPI::Request[nSends];
4605  idSendReq = new SU2_MPI::Request[nSends];
4606  }
4607  if (nRecvs > 0) {
4608  colorRecvReq = new SU2_MPI::Request[nRecvs];
4609  idRecvReq = new SU2_MPI::Request[nRecvs];
4610  }
4611 
4612  /*--- Launch the non-blocking sends and receives. ---*/
4613 
4614  InitiateCommsAll(colorSend, nPoint_Send, colorSendReq,
4615  colorRecv, nPoint_Recv, colorRecvReq,
4616  1, COMM_TYPE_UNSIGNED_LONG);
4617 
4618  InitiateCommsAll(idSend, nPoint_Send, idSendReq,
4619  idRecv, nPoint_Recv, idRecvReq,
4620  1, COMM_TYPE_UNSIGNED_LONG);
4621 
4622  /*--- Copy my own rank's data into the recv buffer directly. ---*/
4623 
4624  iRecv = nPoint_Recv[rank];
4625  myStart = nPoint_Send[rank];
4626  myFinal = nPoint_Send[rank+1];
4627  for (iSend = myStart; iSend < myFinal; iSend++) {
4628  colorRecv[iRecv] = colorSend[iSend];
4629  idRecv[iRecv] = idSend[iSend];
4630  iRecv++;
4631  }
4632 
4633  /*--- Complete the non-blocking communications. ---*/
4634 
4635  CompleteCommsAll(nSends, colorSendReq, nRecvs, colorRecvReq);
4636  CompleteCommsAll(nSends, idSendReq, nRecvs, idRecvReq);
4637 
4638  /*--- Store the complete color map for this rank in class data. Now,
4639  each rank has a color value for all owned nodes as well as any repeated
4640  grid points on the rank. Note that there may be repeats that are
4641  communicated in the routine above, but since we are storing in a map,
4642  it will simply overwrite the same entries. ---*/
4643 
4644  for (iRecv = 0; iRecv < nPoint_Recv[size]; iRecv++) {
4645  Color_List[idRecv[iRecv]] = colorRecv[iRecv];
4646  }
4647 
4648  /*--- Free temporary memory from communications ---*/
4649 
4650  if (colorSendReq != NULL) delete [] colorSendReq;
4651  if (idSendReq != NULL) delete [] idSendReq;
4652 
4653  if (colorRecvReq != NULL) delete [] colorRecvReq;
4654  if (idRecvReq != NULL) delete [] idRecvReq;
4655 
4656  delete [] colorSend;
4657  delete [] colorRecv;
4658  delete [] idSend;
4659  delete [] idRecv;
4660  delete [] nPoint_Recv;
4661  delete [] nPoint_Send;
4662  delete [] nPoint_Flag;
4663 
4664 }
4665 
4666 void CPhysicalGeometry::DistributeVolumeConnectivity(CConfig *config,
4667  CGeometry *geometry,
4668  unsigned short Elem_Type) {
4669 
4670  unsigned short NODES_PER_ELEMENT = 0;
4671 
4672  unsigned long iProcessor;
4673  unsigned long iElem, iNode, jNode, nElem_Total = 0, Global_Index;
4674  unsigned long *Conn_Elem = NULL;
4675  unsigned long *ID_Elems = NULL;
4676 
4677  SU2_MPI::Request *connSendReq = NULL, *idSendReq = NULL;
4678  SU2_MPI::Request *connRecvReq = NULL, *idRecvReq = NULL;
4679  int iProc, iSend, iRecv, myStart, myFinal;
4680 
4681  /*--- Store the number of nodes per this element type. ---*/
4682 
4683  switch (Elem_Type) {
4684  case TRIANGLE:
4685  NODES_PER_ELEMENT = N_POINTS_TRIANGLE;
4686  break;
4687  case QUADRILATERAL:
4688  NODES_PER_ELEMENT = N_POINTS_QUADRILATERAL;
4689  break;
4690  case TETRAHEDRON:
4691  NODES_PER_ELEMENT = N_POINTS_TETRAHEDRON;
4692  break;
4693  case HEXAHEDRON:
4694  NODES_PER_ELEMENT = N_POINTS_HEXAHEDRON;
4695  break;
4696  case PRISM:
4697  NODES_PER_ELEMENT = N_POINTS_PRISM;
4698  break;
4699  case PYRAMID:
4700  NODES_PER_ELEMENT = N_POINTS_PYRAMID;
4701  break;
4702  default:
4703  NODES_PER_ELEMENT = 0;
4704  SU2_MPI::Error("Unrecognized element type.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
4705  break;
4706  }
4707 
4708  /*--- Prepare a mapping for local to global element index. ---*/
4709 
4710  map<unsigned long, unsigned long> Local2GlobalElem;
4711  map<unsigned long, unsigned long>::iterator MI;
4712 
4713  for (MI = geometry->Global_to_Local_Elem.begin();
4714  MI != geometry->Global_to_Local_Elem.end(); MI++) {
4715  Local2GlobalElem[MI->second] = MI->first;
4716  }
4717 
4718  /*--- We start with the connectivity distributed across all procs in a
4719  linear partitioning. We need to loop through our local partition
4720  and decide how many elements we must send to each other rank in order to
4721  have all elements distributed according to the ParMETIS coloring. ---*/
4722 
4723  int *nElem_Send = new int[size+1]; nElem_Send[0] = 0;
4724  int *nElem_Recv = new int[size+1]; nElem_Recv[0] = 0;
4725  int *nElem_Flag = new int[size];
4726 
4727  for (iProc = 0; iProc < size; iProc++) {
4728  nElem_Send[iProc] = 0; nElem_Recv[iProc] = 0; nElem_Flag[iProc]= -1;
4729  }
4730  nElem_Send[size] = 0; nElem_Recv[size] = 0;
4731 
4732  for (iElem = 0; iElem < geometry->GetnElem(); iElem++ ) {
4733  if (geometry->elem[iElem]->GetVTK_Type() == Elem_Type) {
4734  for (iNode = 0; iNode < NODES_PER_ELEMENT; iNode++ ) {
4735 
4736  /*--- Get the index of the current point. ---*/
4737 
4738  Global_Index = geometry->elem[iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
4739 
4740  /*--- We have the color stored in a map for all local points. ---*/
4741 
4742  iProcessor = Color_List[Global_Index];
4743 
4744  /*--- If we have not visited this element yet, increment our
4745  number of elements that must be sent to a particular proc. ---*/
4746 
4747  if ((nElem_Flag[iProcessor] != (int)iElem)) {
4748  nElem_Flag[iProcessor] = (int)iElem;
4749  nElem_Send[iProcessor+1]++;
4750  }
4751 
4752  }
4753  }
4754  }
4755 
4756  /*--- Communicate the number of cells to be sent/recv'd amongst
4757  all processors. After this communication, each proc knows how
4758  many cells it will receive from each other processor. ---*/
4759 
4760  SU2_MPI::Alltoall(&(nElem_Send[1]), 1, MPI_INT,
4761  &(nElem_Recv[1]), 1, MPI_INT, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
4762 
4763  /*--- Prepare to send connectivities. First check how many
4764  messages we will be sending and receiving. Here we also put
4765  the counters into cumulative storage format to make the
4766  communications simpler. ---*/
4767 
4768  int nSends = 0, nRecvs = 0;
4769  for (iProc = 0; iProc < size; iProc++) nElem_Flag[iProc] = -1;
4770 
4771  for (iProc = 0; iProc < size; iProc++) {
4772  if ((iProc != rank) && (nElem_Send[iProc+1] > 0)) nSends++;
4773  if ((iProc != rank) && (nElem_Recv[iProc+1] > 0)) nRecvs++;
4774 
4775  nElem_Send[iProc+1] += nElem_Send[iProc];
4776  nElem_Recv[iProc+1] += nElem_Recv[iProc];
4777  }
4778 
4779  /*--- Allocate memory to hold the connectivity and element IDs
4780  that we are sending. ---*/
4781 
4782  unsigned long *connSend = NULL;
4783  connSend = new unsigned long[NODES_PER_ELEMENT*nElem_Send[size]];
4784  for (iSend = 0; iSend < NODES_PER_ELEMENT*nElem_Send[size]; iSend++)
4785  connSend[iSend] = 0;
4786 
4787  /*--- Allocate arrays for storing element global index. ---*/
4788 
4789  unsigned long *idSend = new unsigned long[nElem_Send[size]];
4790  for (iSend = 0; iSend < nElem_Send[size]; iSend++) idSend[iSend] = 0;
4791 
4792  /*--- Create an index variable to keep track of our index
4793  position as we load up the send buffer. ---*/
4794 
4795  unsigned long *index = new unsigned long[size];
4796  for (iProc = 0; iProc < size; iProc++)
4797  index[iProc] = NODES_PER_ELEMENT*nElem_Send[iProc];
4798 
4799  unsigned long *idIndex = new unsigned long[size];
4800  for (iProc = 0; iProc < size; iProc++)
4801  idIndex[iProc] = nElem_Send[iProc];
4802 
4803  /*--- Loop through our elements and load the elems and their
4804  additional data that we will send to the other procs. ---*/
4805 
4806  for (iElem = 0; iElem < geometry->GetnElem(); iElem++) {
4807  if (geometry->elem[iElem]->GetVTK_Type() == Elem_Type) {
4808  for (iNode = 0; iNode < NODES_PER_ELEMENT; iNode++ ) {
4809 
4810  /*--- Get the index of the current point. ---*/
4811 
4812  Global_Index = geometry->elem[iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
4813 
4814  /*--- We have the color stored in a map for all local points. ---*/
4815 
4816  iProcessor = Color_List[Global_Index];
4817 
4818  /*--- Load connectivity and IDs into the buffer for sending ---*/
4819 
4820  if (nElem_Flag[iProcessor] != (int)iElem) {
4821 
4822  nElem_Flag[iProcessor] = (int)iElem;
4823  unsigned long nn = index[iProcessor];
4824  unsigned long mm = idIndex[iProcessor];
4825 
4826  /*--- Load the connectivity values. Note that elements are already
4827  stored directly based on their global index for the nodes.---*/
4828 
4829  for (jNode = 0; jNode < NODES_PER_ELEMENT; jNode++) {
4830  connSend[nn] = geometry->elem[iElem]->GetNode(jNode); nn++;
4831  }
4832 
4833  /*--- Global ID for this element. ---*/
4834 
4835  idSend[mm] = Local2GlobalElem[iElem];
4836 
4837  /*--- Increment the index by the message length ---*/
4838 
4839  index[iProcessor] += NODES_PER_ELEMENT;
4840  idIndex[iProcessor]++;
4841 
4842  }
4843  }
4844  }
4845  }
4846 
4847  /*--- Free memory after loading up the send buffer. ---*/
4848 
4849  delete [] index;
4850  delete [] idIndex;
4851 
4852  /*--- Allocate the memory that we need for receiving the
4853  values and then cue up the non-blocking receives. Note that
4854  we do not include our own rank in the communications. We will
4855  directly copy our own data later. ---*/
4856 
4857  unsigned long *connRecv = NULL;
4858  connRecv = new unsigned long[NODES_PER_ELEMENT*nElem_Recv[size]];
4859  for (iRecv = 0; iRecv < NODES_PER_ELEMENT*nElem_Recv[size]; iRecv++)
4860  connRecv[iRecv] = 0;
4861 
4862  unsigned long *idRecv = new unsigned long[nElem_Recv[size]];
4863  for (iRecv = 0; iRecv < nElem_Recv[size]; iRecv++) idRecv[iRecv] = 0;
4864 
4865  /*--- Allocate memory for the MPI requests if we need to communicate. ---*/
4866 
4867  if (nSends > 0) {
4868  connSendReq = new SU2_MPI::Request[nSends];
4869  idSendReq = new SU2_MPI::Request[nSends];
4870  }
4871  if (nRecvs > 0) {
4872  connRecvReq = new SU2_MPI::Request[nRecvs];
4873  idRecvReq = new SU2_MPI::Request[nRecvs];
4874  }
4875 
4876  /*--- Launch the non-blocking sends and receives. ---*/
4877 
4878  InitiateCommsAll(connSend, nElem_Send, connSendReq,
4879  connRecv, nElem_Recv, connRecvReq,
4880  NODES_PER_ELEMENT, COMM_TYPE_UNSIGNED_LONG);
4881 
4882  InitiateCommsAll(idSend, nElem_Send, idSendReq,
4883  idRecv, nElem_Recv, idRecvReq,
4884  1, COMM_TYPE_UNSIGNED_LONG);
4885 
4886  /*--- Copy my own rank's data into the recv buffer directly. ---*/
4887 
4888  iRecv = NODES_PER_ELEMENT*nElem_Recv[rank];
4889  myStart = NODES_PER_ELEMENT*nElem_Send[rank];
4890  myFinal = NODES_PER_ELEMENT*nElem_Send[rank+1];
4891  for (iSend = myStart; iSend < myFinal; iSend++) {
4892  connRecv[iRecv] = connSend[iSend];
4893  iRecv++;
4894  }
4895 
4896  iRecv = nElem_Recv[rank];
4897  myStart = nElem_Send[rank];
4898  myFinal = nElem_Send[rank+1];
4899  for (iSend = myStart; iSend < myFinal; iSend++) {
4900  idRecv[iRecv] = idSend[iSend];
4901  iRecv++;
4902  }
4903 
4904  /*--- Complete the non-blocking communications. ---*/
4905 
4906  CompleteCommsAll(nSends, connSendReq, nRecvs, connRecvReq);
4907  CompleteCommsAll(nSends, idSendReq, nRecvs, idRecvReq);
4908 
4909  /*--- Store the connectivity for this rank in the proper structure
4910  It will be loaded into the geometry objects in a later step. ---*/
4911 
4912  if (nElem_Recv[size] > 0) {
4913  Conn_Elem = new unsigned long[NODES_PER_ELEMENT*nElem_Recv[size]];
4914  int count = 0; nElem_Total = 0;
4915  for (iRecv = 0; iRecv < nElem_Recv[size]; iRecv++) {
4916  nElem_Total++;
4917  for (iNode = 0; iNode < NODES_PER_ELEMENT; iNode++) {
4918  Conn_Elem[count] = connRecv[iRecv*NODES_PER_ELEMENT+iNode];
4919  count++;
4920  }
4921  }
4922  }
4923 
4924  /*--- Store the global element IDs too. ---*/
4925 
4926  if (nElem_Recv[size] > 0) {
4927  ID_Elems = new unsigned long[nElem_Recv[size]];
4928  for (iRecv = 0; iRecv < nElem_Recv[size]; iRecv++) {
4929  ID_Elems[iRecv] = idRecv[iRecv];
4930  }
4931  }
4932 
4933  /*--- Store the particular element count, IDs, & conn. in the class data,
4934  and set the class data pointer to the connectivity array. ---*/
4935 
4936  switch (Elem_Type) {
4937  case TRIANGLE:
4938  nLocal_Tria = nElem_Total;
4939  if (nLocal_Tria > 0) {
4940  Conn_Tria = Conn_Elem;
4941  ID_Tria = ID_Elems;
4942  }
4943  break;
4944  case QUADRILATERAL:
4945  nLocal_Quad = nElem_Total;
4946  if (nLocal_Quad > 0) {
4947  Conn_Quad = Conn_Elem;
4948  ID_Quad = ID_Elems;
4949  }
4950  break;
4951  case TETRAHEDRON:
4952  nLocal_Tetr = nElem_Total;
4953  if (nLocal_Tetr > 0) {
4954  Conn_Tetr = Conn_Elem;
4955  ID_Tetr = ID_Elems;
4956  }
4957  break;
4958  case HEXAHEDRON:
4959  nLocal_Hexa = nElem_Total;
4960  if (nLocal_Hexa > 0) {
4961  Conn_Hexa = Conn_Elem;
4962  ID_Hexa = ID_Elems;
4963  }
4964  break;
4965  case PRISM:
4966  nLocal_Pris = nElem_Total;
4967  if (nLocal_Pris > 0) {
4968  Conn_Pris = Conn_Elem;
4969  ID_Pris = ID_Elems;
4970  }
4971  break;
4972  case PYRAMID:
4973  nLocal_Pyra = nElem_Total;
4974  if (nLocal_Pyra > 0) {
4975  Conn_Pyra = Conn_Elem;
4976  ID_Pyra = ID_Elems;
4977  }
4978  break;
4979  default:
4980  SU2_MPI::Error("Unrecognized element type.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
4981  break;
4982  }
4983 
4984  /*--- Free temporary memory from communications ---*/
4985 
4986  Local2GlobalElem.clear();
4987 
4988  if (connSendReq != NULL) delete [] connSendReq;
4989  if (idSendReq != NULL) delete [] idSendReq;
4990 
4991  if (connRecvReq != NULL) delete [] connRecvReq;
4992  if (idRecvReq != NULL) delete [] idRecvReq;
4993 
4994  delete [] connSend;
4995  delete [] connRecv;
4996  delete [] idSend;
4997  delete [] idRecv;
4998  delete [] nElem_Recv;
4999  delete [] nElem_Send;
5000  delete [] nElem_Flag;
5001 
5002 }
5003 
5004 void CPhysicalGeometry::DistributePoints(CConfig *config, CGeometry *geometry) {
5005 
5006  /*--- We now know all of the coloring for our local points and neighbors.
5007  From this, we can communicate the owned nodes in our linear partitioning
5008  to all other ranks, including coordinates and coloring info, so that the
5009  receivers will be able to sort the data. ---*/
5010 
5011  unsigned short iDim;
5012  unsigned long iPoint, iNeighbor, jPoint, iProcessor;
5013  vector<unsigned long>::iterator it;
5014 
5015  SU2_MPI::Request *colorSendReq = NULL, *idSendReq = NULL, *coordSendReq = NULL;
5016  SU2_MPI::Request *colorRecvReq = NULL, *idRecvReq = NULL, *coordRecvReq = NULL;
5017  int iProc, iSend, iRecv, myStart, myFinal;
5018 
5019  /*--- Prepare structures for communication. ---*/
5020 
5021  int *nPoint_Send = new int[size+1]; nPoint_Send[0] = 0;
5022  int *nPoint_Recv = new int[size+1]; nPoint_Recv[0] = 0;
5023  int *nPoint_Flag = new int[size];
5024 
5025  for (iProc = 0; iProc < size; iProc++) {
5026  nPoint_Send[iProc] = 0; nPoint_Recv[iProc] = 0; nPoint_Flag[iProc]= -1;
5027  }
5028  nPoint_Send[size] = 0; nPoint_Recv[size] = 0;
5029 
5030  /*--- Loop over the owned points and check all the neighbors for unowned
5031  points. The colors of all owned points will be communicated to any ranks
5032  that will require them, which is due to the repeated points/elements
5033  that were needed to perform the coloring. ---*/
5034 
5035  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < geometry->GetnPoint(); iPoint++) {
5036  for (iNeighbor = 0; iNeighbor < Neighbors[iPoint].size(); iNeighbor++) {
5037 
5038  /*--- Global ID of the neighbor ---*/
5039 
5040  jPoint = Neighbors[iPoint][iNeighbor];
5041 
5042  /*--- We have the color stored in a map for all local points. ---*/
5043 
5044  iProcessor = Color_List[jPoint];
5045 
5046  /*--- If we have not visited this node yet, increment our
5047  number of points that must be sent to a particular proc. ---*/
5048 
5049  if (nPoint_Flag[iProcessor] != (int)iPoint) {
5050  nPoint_Flag[iProcessor] = (int)iPoint;
5051  nPoint_Send[iProcessor+1]++;
5052  }
5053  }
5054  }
5055 
5056  /*--- Communicate the number of nodes to be sent/recv'd amongst
5057  all processors. After this communication, each proc knows how
5058  many points it will receive from each other processor. ---*/
5059 
5060  SU2_MPI::Alltoall(&(nPoint_Send[1]), 1, MPI_INT,
5061  &(nPoint_Recv[1]), 1, MPI_INT, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
5062 
5063  /*--- Prepare to send colors, ids, and coords. First check how many
5064  messages we will be sending and receiving. Here we also put
5065  the counters into cumulative storage format to make the
5066  communications simpler. ---*/
5067 
5068  int nSends = 0, nRecvs = 0;
5069  for (iProc = 0; iProc < size; iProc++) nPoint_Flag[iProc] = -1;
5070 
5071  for (iProc = 0; iProc < size; iProc++) {
5072  if ((iProc != rank) && (nPoint_Send[iProc+1] > 0)) nSends++;
5073  if ((iProc != rank) && (nPoint_Recv[iProc+1] > 0)) nRecvs++;
5074 
5075  nPoint_Send[iProc+1] += nPoint_Send[iProc];
5076  nPoint_Recv[iProc+1] += nPoint_Recv[iProc];
5077  }
5078 
5079  /*--- Allocate arrays for sending the global ID. ---*/
5080 
5081  unsigned long *idSend = new unsigned long[nPoint_Send[size]];
5082  for (iSend = 0; iSend < nPoint_Send[size]; iSend++) idSend[iSend] = 0;
5083 
5084  /*--- Allocate memory to hold the colors that we are sending. ---*/
5085 
5086  unsigned long *colorSend = new unsigned long[nPoint_Send[size]];
5087  for (iSend = 0; iSend < nPoint_Send[size]; iSend++) colorSend[iSend] = 0;
5088 
5089  /*--- Allocate memory to hold the coordinates that we are sending. ---*/
5090 
5091  su2double *coordSend = NULL;
5092  coordSend = new su2double[nDim*nPoint_Send[size]];
5093  for (iSend = 0; iSend < nDim*nPoint_Send[size]; iSend++)
5094  coordSend[iSend] = 0;
5095 
5096  /*--- Create index variables to keep track of our index
5097  positions as we load up the send buffer. ---*/
5098 
5099  unsigned long *index = new unsigned long[size];
5100  for (iProc = 0; iProc < size; iProc++)
5101  index[iProc] = nPoint_Send[iProc];
5102 
5103  unsigned long *coordIndex = new unsigned long[size];
5104  for (iProc = 0; iProc < size; iProc++)
5105  coordIndex[iProc] = nDim*nPoint_Send[iProc];
5106 
5107  /*--- Now load up our buffers with the colors, ids, and coords. ---*/
5108 
5109  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < geometry->GetnPoint(); iPoint++) {
5110  for (iNeighbor = 0; iNeighbor < Neighbors[iPoint].size(); iNeighbor++) {
5111 
5112  /*--- Global ID of the neighbor ---*/
5113 
5114  jPoint = Neighbors[iPoint][iNeighbor];
5115 
5116  /*--- We have the color stored in a map for all local points. ---*/
5117 
5118  iProcessor = Color_List[jPoint];
5119 
5120  /*--- If we have not visited this node yet, increment our
5121  counters and load up the colors, ids, and coords. ---*/
5122 
5123  if (nPoint_Flag[iProcessor] != (int)iPoint) {
5124 
5125  nPoint_Flag[iProcessor] = (int)iPoint;
5126  unsigned long nn = index[iProcessor];
5127 
5128  /*--- Load the global ID, color, and coordinate values. ---*/
5129 
5130  idSend[nn] = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGlobalIndex();
5131  colorSend[nn] = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetColor();
5132 
5133  nn = coordIndex[iProcessor];
5134  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
5135  coordSend[nn] = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(iDim); nn++;
5136  }
5137 
5138  /*--- Increment the index by the message length ---*/
5139 
5140  coordIndex[iProcessor] += nDim;
5141  index[iProcessor]++;
5142 
5143  }
5144  }
5145  }
5146 
5147  /*--- Free memory after loading up the send buffer. ---*/
5148 
5149  delete [] index;
5150  delete [] coordIndex;
5151 
5152  /*--- Allocate the memory that we need for receiving the
5153  values and then cue up the non-blocking receives. Note that
5154  we do not include our own rank in the communications. We will
5155  directly copy our own data later. ---*/
5156 
5157  unsigned long *colorRecv = new unsigned long[nPoint_Recv[size]];
5158  for (iRecv = 0; iRecv < nPoint_Recv[size]; iRecv++)
5159  colorRecv[iRecv] = 0;
5160 
5161  unsigned long *idRecv = new unsigned long[nPoint_Recv[size]];
5162  for (iRecv = 0; iRecv < nPoint_Recv[size]; iRecv++)
5163  idRecv[iRecv] = 0;
5164 
5165  su2double *coordRecv = NULL;
5166  coordRecv = new su2double[nDim*nPoint_Recv[size]];
5167  for (iRecv = 0; iRecv < nDim*nPoint_Recv[size]; iRecv++)
5168  coordRecv[iRecv] = 0;
5169 
5170  /*--- Allocate memory for the MPI requests if we need to communicate. ---*/
5171 
5172  if (nSends > 0) {
5173  colorSendReq = new SU2_MPI::Request[nSends];
5174  idSendReq = new SU2_MPI::Request[nSends];
5175  coordSendReq = new SU2_MPI::Request[nSends];
5176 
5177  }
5178  if (nRecvs > 0) {
5179  colorRecvReq = new SU2_MPI::Request[nRecvs];
5180  idRecvReq = new SU2_MPI::Request[nRecvs];
5181  coordRecvReq = new SU2_MPI::Request[nRecvs];
5182  }
5183 
5184  /*--- Launch the non-blocking sends and receives. ---*/
5185 
5186  InitiateCommsAll(colorSend, nPoint_Send, colorSendReq,
5187  colorRecv, nPoint_Recv, colorRecvReq,
5188  1, COMM_TYPE_UNSIGNED_LONG);
5189 
5190  InitiateCommsAll(idSend, nPoint_Send, idSendReq,
5191  idRecv, nPoint_Recv, idRecvReq,
5192  1, COMM_TYPE_UNSIGNED_LONG);
5193 
5194  InitiateCommsAll(coordSend, nPoint_Send, coordSendReq,
5195  coordRecv, nPoint_Recv, coordRecvReq,
5196  nDim, COMM_TYPE_DOUBLE);
5197 
5198  /*--- Copy my own rank's data into the recv buffer directly. ---*/
5199 
5200  iRecv = nPoint_Recv[rank];
5201  myStart = nPoint_Send[rank];
5202  myFinal = nPoint_Send[rank+1];
5203  for (iSend = myStart; iSend < myFinal; iSend++) {
5204  colorRecv[iRecv] = colorSend[iSend];
5205  idRecv[iRecv] = idSend[iSend];
5206  iRecv++;
5207  }
5208 
5209  iRecv = nDim*nPoint_Recv[rank];
5210  myStart = nDim*nPoint_Send[rank];
5211  myFinal = nDim*nPoint_Send[rank+1];
5212  for (iSend = myStart; iSend < myFinal; iSend++) {
5213  coordRecv[iRecv] = coordSend[iSend];
5214  iRecv++;
5215  }
5216 
5217  /*--- Complete the non-blocking communications. ---*/
5218 
5219  CompleteCommsAll(nSends, colorSendReq, nRecvs, colorRecvReq);
5220  CompleteCommsAll(nSends, idSendReq, nRecvs, idRecvReq);
5221  CompleteCommsAll(nSends, coordSendReq, nRecvs, coordRecvReq);
5222 
5223  /*--- Store the total number of local points my rank has for
5224  the current section after completing the communications. ---*/
5225 
5226  nLocal_Point = nPoint_Recv[size];
5227 
5228  /*--- Store the proper local IDs, colors, and coordinates. We will load
5229  all of this information into our geometry classes in a later step. ---*/
5230 
5231  Local_Points = new unsigned long[nPoint_Recv[size]];
5232  Local_Colors = new unsigned long[nPoint_Recv[size]];
5233  Local_Coords = new su2double[nDim*nPoint_Recv[size]];
5234 
5235  nLocal_PointDomain = 0; nLocal_PointGhost = 0;
5236  for (iRecv = 0; iRecv < nPoint_Recv[size]; iRecv++) {
5237  Local_Points[iRecv] = idRecv[iRecv];
5238  Local_Colors[iRecv] = colorRecv[iRecv];
5239  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
5240  Local_Coords[iRecv*nDim+iDim] = coordRecv[iRecv*nDim+iDim];
5241  if (Local_Colors[iRecv] == (unsigned long)rank) nLocal_PointDomain++;
5242  else nLocal_PointGhost++;
5243  }
5244 
5245  /*--- Free temporary memory from communications ---*/
5246 
5247  if (colorSendReq != NULL) delete [] colorSendReq;
5248  if (idSendReq != NULL) delete [] idSendReq;
5249  if (coordSendReq != NULL) delete [] coordSendReq;
5250 
5251  if (colorRecvReq != NULL) delete [] colorRecvReq;
5252  if (idRecvReq != NULL) delete [] idRecvReq;
5253  if (coordRecvReq != NULL) delete [] coordRecvReq;
5254 
5255  delete [] colorSend;
5256  delete [] colorRecv;
5257  delete [] idSend;
5258  delete [] idRecv;
5259  delete [] coordSend;
5260  delete [] coordRecv;
5261  delete [] nPoint_Recv;
5262  delete [] nPoint_Send;
5263  delete [] nPoint_Flag;
5264 
5265 }
5266 
5267 void CPhysicalGeometry::PartitionSurfaceConnectivity(CConfig *config,
5268  CGeometry *geometry,
5269  unsigned short Elem_Type) {
5270 
5271  /*--- We begin with all marker information residing on the master rank,
5272  as the master currently stores all marker info when reading the grid.
5273  We first check and communicate basic information that each rank will
5274  need to hold its portion of the linearly partitioned markers. In a
5275  later step, we will distribute the markers according to the ParMETIS
5276  coloring. This intermediate step is necessary since we already have the
5277  correct coloring distributed by the linear partitions, which we would
5278  like to reuse when partitioning the markers. Plus, the markers should
5279  truly be linearly partitioned upon reading the mesh, which we will
5280  change eventually. ---*/
5281 
5282  unsigned short NODES_PER_ELEMENT = 0;
5283 
5284  unsigned long iMarker, iProcessor, iElem, iNode, jNode;
5285  unsigned long nElem_Total = 0, Global_Index, Global_Elem_Index;
5286 
5287  unsigned long *Conn_Elem = NULL;
5288  unsigned long *Linear_Markers = NULL;
5289  unsigned long *ID_SurfElem = NULL;
5290 
5291  SU2_MPI::Request *connSendReq = NULL, *markerSendReq = NULL, *idSendReq = NULL;
5292  SU2_MPI::Request *connRecvReq = NULL, *markerRecvReq = NULL, *idRecvReq = NULL;
5293  int iProc, iSend, iRecv, myStart, myFinal;
5294 
5295  /*--- Store the local number of this element type and the number of nodes
5296  per this element type. In serial, this will be the total number of this
5297  element type in the entire mesh. In parallel, it is the number on only
5298  the current partition. ---*/
5299 
5300  switch (Elem_Type) {
5301  case LINE:
5302  NODES_PER_ELEMENT = N_POINTS_LINE;
5303  break;
5304  case TRIANGLE:
5305  NODES_PER_ELEMENT = N_POINTS_TRIANGLE;
5306  break;
5307  case QUADRILATERAL:
5308  NODES_PER_ELEMENT = N_POINTS_QUADRILATERAL;
5309  break;
5310  default:
5311  SU2_MPI::Error("Unrecognized element type.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
5312  break;
5313  }
5314 
5315  int *nElem_Send = new int[size+1]; nElem_Send[0] = 0;
5316  int *nElem_Recv = new int[size+1]; nElem_Recv[0] = 0;
5317  int *nElem_Flag = new int[size];
5318 
5319  for (iProc = 0; iProc < size; iProc++) {
5320  nElem_Send[iProc] = 0; nElem_Recv[iProc] = 0; nElem_Flag[iProc]= -1;
5321  }
5322  nElem_Send[size] = 0; nElem_Recv[size] = 0;
5323 
5324  /*--- We know that the master owns all of the info and will be the only
5325  rank sending anything, although all ranks might receive something. ---*/
5326 
5327  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
5328  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < geometry->GetnMarker(); iMarker++) {
5329 
5330  /*--- Reset the flag in between markers, just to ensure that we
5331  don't miss some elements on different markers with the same local
5332  index. ---*/
5333 
5334  for (iProc = 0; iProc < size; iProc++) nElem_Flag[iProc]= -1;
5335 
5336  for (iElem = 0; iElem < geometry->GetnElem_Bound(iMarker); iElem++) {
5337 
5338  if (geometry->bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetVTK_Type() == Elem_Type) {
5339 
5340  for (iNode = 0; iNode < NODES_PER_ELEMENT; iNode++ ) {
5341 
5342  /*--- Get the index of the current point (stored as global). ---*/
5343 
5344  Global_Index = geometry->bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
5345 
5346  /*--- Search for the processor that owns this point ---*/
5347 
5348  iProcessor = GetLinearPartition(Global_Index);
5349 
5350  /*--- If we have not visited this element yet, increment our
5351  number of elements that must be sent to a particular proc. ---*/
5352 
5353  if ((nElem_Flag[iProcessor] != (int)iElem)) {
5354  nElem_Flag[iProcessor] = (int)iElem;
5355  nElem_Send[iProcessor+1]++;
5356  }
5357  }
5358  }
5359  }
5360  }
5361  }
5362 
5363  /*--- Communicate the number of cells to be sent/recv'd amongst
5364  all processors. After this communication, each proc knows how
5365  many cells it will receive from each other processor. ---*/
5366 
5367  SU2_MPI::Scatter(&(nElem_Send[1]), 1, MPI_INT,
5368  &(nElem_Recv[1]), 1, MPI_INT, MASTER_NODE, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
5369 
5370  /*--- Prepare to send connectivities. First check how many
5371  messages we will be sending and receiving. Here we also put
5372  the counters into cumulative storage format to make the
5373  communications simpler. ---*/
5374 
5375  int nSends = 0, nRecvs = 0;
5376  for (iProc = 0; iProc < size; iProc++) nElem_Flag[iProc] = -1;
5377 
5378  for (iProc = 0; iProc < size; iProc++) {
5379  if ((iProc != rank) && (nElem_Send[iProc+1] > 0)) nSends++;
5380  if ((iProc != rank) && (nElem_Recv[iProc+1] > 0)) nRecvs++;
5381 
5382  nElem_Send[iProc+1] += nElem_Send[iProc];
5383  nElem_Recv[iProc+1] += nElem_Recv[iProc];
5384  }
5385 
5386  /*--- Allocate memory to hold the connectivity that we are sending. ---*/
5387 
5388  unsigned long *connSend = NULL;
5389  unsigned long *markerSend = NULL;
5390  unsigned long *idSend = NULL;
5391 
5392  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
5393 
5394  connSend = new unsigned long[NODES_PER_ELEMENT*nElem_Send[size]];
5395  for (iSend = 0; iSend < NODES_PER_ELEMENT*nElem_Send[size]; iSend++)
5396  connSend[iSend] = 0;
5397 
5398  markerSend = new unsigned long[nElem_Send[size]];
5399  for (iSend = 0; iSend < nElem_Send[size]; iSend++)
5400  markerSend[iSend] = 0;
5401 
5402  idSend = new unsigned long[nElem_Send[size]];
5403  for (iSend = 0; iSend < nElem_Send[size]; iSend++)
5404  idSend[iSend] = 0;
5405 
5406  /*--- Create an index variable to keep track of our index
5407  position as we load up the send buffer. ---*/
5408 
5409  unsigned long *index = new unsigned long[size];
5410  for (iProc = 0; iProc < size; iProc++)
5411  index[iProc] = NODES_PER_ELEMENT*nElem_Send[iProc];
5412 
5413  unsigned long *markerIndex = new unsigned long[size];
5414  for (iProc = 0; iProc < size; iProc++)
5415  markerIndex[iProc] = nElem_Send[iProc];
5416 
5417  /*--- Loop through our elements and load the elems and their
5418  additional data that we will send to the other procs. ---*/
5419 
5420  Global_Elem_Index = 0;
5421  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < geometry->GetnMarker(); iMarker++) {
5422 
5423  /*--- Reset the flag in between markers, just to ensure that we
5424  don't miss some elements on different markers with the same local
5425  index. ---*/
5426 
5427  for (iProc = 0; iProc < size; iProc++) nElem_Flag[iProc]= -1;
5428 
5429  for (iElem = 0; iElem < geometry->GetnElem_Bound(iMarker); iElem++) {
5430  if (geometry->bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetVTK_Type() == Elem_Type) {
5431  for (iNode = 0; iNode < NODES_PER_ELEMENT; iNode++ ) {
5432 
5433  /*--- Get the index of the current point. ---*/
5434 
5435  Global_Index = geometry->bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
5436 
5437  /*--- Search for the processor that owns this point ---*/
5438 
5439  iProcessor = GetLinearPartition(Global_Index);
5440 
5441  /*--- Load connectivity into the buffer for sending ---*/
5442 
5443  if ((nElem_Flag[iProcessor] != (int)iElem)) {
5444 
5445  nElem_Flag[iProcessor] = (int)iElem;
5446  unsigned long nn = index[iProcessor];
5447  unsigned long mm = markerIndex[iProcessor];
5448 
5449  /*--- Load the connectivity values. ---*/
5450 
5451  for (jNode = 0; jNode < NODES_PER_ELEMENT; jNode++) {
5452  connSend[nn] = geometry->bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetNode(jNode);
5453  nn++;
5454  }
5455 
5456  /*--- Store the marker index and surface elem global ID ---*/
5457 
5458  markerSend[mm] = iMarker;
5459  idSend[mm] = Global_Elem_Index;
5460 
5461  /*--- Increment the index by the message length ---*/
5462 
5463  index[iProcessor] += NODES_PER_ELEMENT;
5464  markerIndex[iProcessor]++;
5465  }
5466 
5467  }
5468  }
5469 
5470  Global_Elem_Index++;
5471 
5472  }
5473  }
5474 
5475  /*--- Free memory after loading up the send buffer. ---*/
5476 
5477  delete [] index;
5478  delete [] markerIndex;
5479 
5480  }
5481 
5482  /*--- Allocate the memory that we need for receiving the conn
5483  values and then cue up the non-blocking receives. Note that
5484  we do not include our own rank in the communications. We will
5485  directly copy our own data later. ---*/
5486 
5487  unsigned long *connRecv = NULL;
5488  connRecv = new unsigned long[NODES_PER_ELEMENT*nElem_Recv[size]];
5489  for (iRecv = 0; iRecv < NODES_PER_ELEMENT*nElem_Recv[size]; iRecv++)
5490  connRecv[iRecv] = 0;
5491 
5492  unsigned long *markerRecv = new unsigned long[nElem_Recv[size]];
5493  for (iRecv = 0; iRecv < nElem_Recv[size]; iRecv++)
5494  markerRecv[iRecv] = 0;
5495 
5496  unsigned long *idRecv = new unsigned long[nElem_Recv[size]];
5497  for (iRecv = 0; iRecv < nElem_Recv[size]; iRecv++)
5498  idRecv[iRecv] = 0;
5499 
5500  /*--- Allocate memory for the MPI requests if we need to communicate. ---*/
5501 
5502  if (nSends > 0) {
5503  connSendReq = new SU2_MPI::Request[nSends];
5504  markerSendReq = new SU2_MPI::Request[nSends];
5505  idSendReq = new SU2_MPI::Request[nSends];
5506  }
5507  if (nRecvs > 0) {
5508  connRecvReq = new SU2_MPI::Request[nRecvs];
5509  markerRecvReq = new SU2_MPI::Request[nRecvs];
5510  idRecvReq = new SU2_MPI::Request[nRecvs];
5511  }
5512 
5513  /*--- Launch the non-blocking sends and receives. ---*/
5514 
5515  InitiateCommsAll(connSend, nElem_Send, connSendReq,
5516  connRecv, nElem_Recv, connRecvReq,
5517  NODES_PER_ELEMENT, COMM_TYPE_UNSIGNED_LONG);
5518 
5519  InitiateCommsAll(markerSend, nElem_Send, markerSendReq,
5520  markerRecv, nElem_Recv, markerRecvReq,
5521  1, COMM_TYPE_UNSIGNED_LONG);
5522 
5523  InitiateCommsAll(idSend, nElem_Send, idSendReq,
5524  idRecv, nElem_Recv, idRecvReq,
5525  1, COMM_TYPE_UNSIGNED_LONG);
5526 
5527  /*--- Copy my own rank's data into the recv buffer directly. ---*/
5528 
5529  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
5530 
5531  iRecv = NODES_PER_ELEMENT*nElem_Recv[rank];
5532  myStart = NODES_PER_ELEMENT*nElem_Send[rank];
5533  myFinal = NODES_PER_ELEMENT*nElem_Send[rank+1];
5534  for (iSend = myStart; iSend < myFinal; iSend++) {
5535  connRecv[iRecv] = connSend[iSend];
5536  iRecv++;
5537  }
5538 
5539  iRecv = nElem_Recv[rank];
5540  myStart = nElem_Send[rank];
5541  myFinal = nElem_Send[rank+1];
5542  for (iSend = myStart; iSend < myFinal; iSend++) {
5543  markerRecv[iRecv] = markerSend[iSend];
5544  idRecv[iRecv] = idSend[iSend];
5545  iRecv++;
5546  }
5547 
5548  }
5549 
5550  /*--- Complete the non-blocking communications. ---*/
5551 
5552  CompleteCommsAll(nSends, connSendReq, nRecvs, connRecvReq);
5553  CompleteCommsAll(nSends, markerSendReq, nRecvs, markerRecvReq);
5554  CompleteCommsAll(nSends, idSendReq, nRecvs, idRecvReq);
5555 
5556  /*--- Store the connectivity for this rank in the proper data
5557  structure before post-processing below. First, allocate
5558  appropriate amount of memory for this section. ---*/
5559 
5560  if (nElem_Recv[size] > 0) {
5561  Conn_Elem = new unsigned long[NODES_PER_ELEMENT*nElem_Recv[size]];
5562  int count = 0; nElem_Total = 0;
5563  for (iRecv = 0; iRecv < nElem_Recv[size]; iRecv++) {
5564  nElem_Total++;
5565  for (iNode = 0; iNode < NODES_PER_ELEMENT; iNode++) {
5566  Conn_Elem[count] = connRecv[iRecv*NODES_PER_ELEMENT+iNode];
5567  count++;
5568  }
5569  }
5570  }
5571 
5572  /*--- Store the global marker ID for each element. ---*/
5573 
5574  if (nElem_Recv[size] > 0) {
5575  Linear_Markers = new unsigned long[nElem_Recv[size]];
5576  for (iRecv = 0; iRecv < nElem_Recv[size]; iRecv++) {
5577  Linear_Markers[iRecv] = markerRecv[iRecv];
5578  }
5579  }
5580 
5581  /*--- Store the global surface elem ID for each element. ---*/
5582 
5583  if (nElem_Recv[size] > 0) {
5584  ID_SurfElem = new unsigned long[nElem_Recv[size]];
5585  for (iRecv = 0; iRecv < nElem_Recv[size]; iRecv++) {
5586  ID_SurfElem[iRecv] = idRecv[iRecv];
5587  }
5588  }
5589 
5590  /*--- Store the particular global element count in the class data,
5591  and set the class data pointer to the connectivity array. ---*/
5592 
5593  switch (Elem_Type) {
5594  case LINE:
5595  nLinear_Line = nElem_Total;
5596  if (nLinear_Line > 0) {
5597  Conn_Line_Linear = Conn_Elem;
5598  ID_Line_Linear = Linear_Markers;
5599  Elem_ID_Line_Linear = ID_SurfElem;
5600  }
5601  break;
5602  case TRIANGLE:
5603  nLinear_BoundTria = nElem_Total;
5604  if (nLinear_BoundTria > 0) {
5605  Conn_BoundTria_Linear = Conn_Elem;
5606  ID_BoundTria_Linear = Linear_Markers;
5607  Elem_ID_BoundTria_Linear = ID_SurfElem;
5608  }
5609  break;
5610  case QUADRILATERAL:
5611  nLinear_BoundQuad = nElem_Total;
5612  if (nLinear_BoundQuad > 0) {
5613  Conn_BoundQuad_Linear = Conn_Elem;
5614  ID_BoundQuad_Linear = Linear_Markers;
5615  Elem_ID_BoundQuad_Linear = ID_SurfElem;
5616  }
5617  break;
5618  default:
5619  SU2_MPI::Error("Unrecognized element type.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
5620  break;
5621  }
5622 
5623  /*--- Free temporary memory from communications ---*/
5624 
5625  if (connSendReq != NULL) delete [] connSendReq;
5626  if (markerSendReq != NULL) delete [] markerSendReq;
5627  if (idSendReq != NULL) delete [] idSendReq;
5628 
5629  if (connRecvReq != NULL) delete [] connRecvReq;
5630  if (markerRecvReq != NULL) delete [] markerRecvReq;
5631  if (idRecvReq != NULL) delete [] idRecvReq;
5632 
5633  if (connSend != NULL) delete [] connSend;
5634  if (markerSend != NULL) delete [] markerSend;
5635  if (idSend != NULL) delete [] idSend;
5636 
5637  delete [] connRecv;
5638  delete [] markerRecv;
5639  delete [] idRecv;
5640 
5641  delete [] nElem_Recv;
5642  delete [] nElem_Send;
5643  delete [] nElem_Flag;
5644 
5645 }
5646 
5647 void CPhysicalGeometry::DistributeSurfaceConnectivity(CConfig *config,
5648  CGeometry *geometry,
5649  unsigned short Elem_Type) {
5650 
5651  unsigned short NODES_PER_ELEMENT = 0;
5652 
5653  unsigned long iProcessor, NELEM = 0;
5654  unsigned long iElem, iNode, jNode, nElem_Total = 0, Global_Index;
5655 
5656  unsigned long *Conn_Linear = NULL;
5657  unsigned long *Conn_Elem = NULL;
5658  unsigned long *Linear_Markers = NULL;
5659  unsigned long *ID_SurfElem_Linear = NULL;
5660  unsigned long *Local_Markers = NULL;
5661  unsigned long *ID_SurfElem = NULL;
5662 
5663  SU2_MPI::Request *connSendReq = NULL,*markerSendReq = NULL,*idSendReq = NULL;
5664  SU2_MPI::Request *connRecvReq = NULL,*markerRecvReq = NULL,*idRecvReq = NULL;
5665  int iProc, iSend, iRecv, myStart, myFinal;
5666 
5667  /*--- Store the local number of this element type and the number of nodes
5668  per this element type. In serial, this will be the total number of this
5669  element type in the entire mesh. In parallel, it is the number on only
5670  the current partition. ---*/
5671 
5672  switch (Elem_Type) {
5673  case LINE:
5674  NELEM = nLinear_Line;
5675  NODES_PER_ELEMENT = N_POINTS_LINE;
5676  Conn_Linear = Conn_Line_Linear;
5677  Linear_Markers = ID_Line_Linear;
5678  ID_SurfElem_Linear = Elem_ID_Line_Linear;
5679  break;
5680  case TRIANGLE:
5681  NELEM = nLinear_BoundTria;
5682  NODES_PER_ELEMENT = N_POINTS_TRIANGLE;
5683  Conn_Linear = Conn_BoundTria_Linear;
5684  Linear_Markers = ID_BoundTria_Linear;
5685  ID_SurfElem_Linear = Elem_ID_BoundTria_Linear;
5686  break;
5687  case QUADRILATERAL:
5688  NELEM = nLinear_BoundQuad;
5689  NODES_PER_ELEMENT = N_POINTS_QUADRILATERAL;
5690  Conn_Linear = Conn_BoundQuad_Linear;
5691  Linear_Markers = ID_BoundQuad_Linear;
5692  ID_SurfElem_Linear = Elem_ID_BoundQuad_Linear;
5693  break;
5694  default:
5695  SU2_MPI::Error("Unrecognized element type.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
5696  break;
5697  }
5698 
5699  /*--- We start with the connectivity distributed across all procs in a
5700  linear partitioning. We need to loop through our local partition
5701  and decide how many elements we must send to each other rank in order to
5702  have all elements distributed according to the ParMETIS coloring. ---*/
5703 
5704  int *nElem_Send = new int[size+1]; nElem_Send[0] = 0;
5705  int *nElem_Recv = new int[size+1]; nElem_Recv[0] = 0;
5706  int *nElem_Flag = new int[size];
5707 
5708  for (iProc = 0; iProc < size; iProc++) {
5709  nElem_Send[iProc] = 0; nElem_Recv[iProc] = 0; nElem_Flag[iProc]= -1;
5710  }
5711  nElem_Send[size] = 0; nElem_Recv[size] = 0;
5712 
5713  for (iElem = 0; iElem < NELEM; iElem++) {
5714  for (iNode = 0; iNode < NODES_PER_ELEMENT; iNode++) {
5715 
5716  /*--- Get the index of the current point. ---*/
5717 
5718  Global_Index = Conn_Linear[iElem*NODES_PER_ELEMENT+iNode];
5719 
5720  /*--- We have the color stored in a map for all local points. ---*/
5721 
5722  iProcessor = Color_List[Global_Index];
5723 
5724  /*--- If we have not visited this element yet, increment our
5725  number of elements that must be sent to a particular proc. ---*/
5726 
5727  if ((nElem_Flag[iProcessor] != (int)iElem)) {
5728  nElem_Flag[iProcessor] = (int)iElem;
5729  nElem_Send[iProcessor+1]++;
5730  }
5731 
5732  }
5733  }
5734 
5735  /*--- Communicate the number of cells to be sent/recv'd amongst
5736  all processors. After this communication, each proc knows how
5737  many cells it will receive from each other processor. ---*/
5738 
5739  SU2_MPI::Alltoall(&(nElem_Send[1]), 1, MPI_INT,
5740  &(nElem_Recv[1]), 1, MPI_INT, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
5741 
5742  /*--- Prepare to send connectivities. First check how many
5743  messages we will be sending and receiving. Here we also put
5744  the counters into cumulative storage format to make the
5745  communications simpler. ---*/
5746 
5747  int nSends = 0, nRecvs = 0;
5748  for (iProc = 0; iProc < size; iProc++) nElem_Flag[iProc] = -1;
5749 
5750  for (iProc = 0; iProc < size; iProc++) {
5751  if ((iProc != rank) && (nElem_Send[iProc+1] > 0)) nSends++;
5752  if ((iProc != rank) && (nElem_Recv[iProc+1] > 0)) nRecvs++;
5753 
5754  nElem_Send[iProc+1] += nElem_Send[iProc];
5755  nElem_Recv[iProc+1] += nElem_Recv[iProc];
5756  }
5757 
5758  /*--- Allocate memory to hold the connectivity that we are
5759  sending. ---*/
5760 
5761  unsigned long *connSend = NULL;
5762  connSend = new unsigned long[NODES_PER_ELEMENT*nElem_Send[size]];
5763  for (iSend = 0; iSend < NODES_PER_ELEMENT*nElem_Send[size]; iSend++)
5764  connSend[iSend] = 0;
5765 
5766  /*--- Allocate arrays for storing the marker global index. ---*/
5767 
5768  unsigned long *markerSend = new unsigned long[nElem_Send[size]];
5769  for (iSend = 0; iSend < nElem_Send[size]; iSend++) markerSend[iSend] = 0;
5770 
5771  unsigned long *idSend = new unsigned long[nElem_Send[size]];
5772  for (iSend = 0; iSend < nElem_Send[size]; iSend++) idSend[iSend] = 0;
5773 
5774  /*--- Create an index variable to keep track of our index
5775  position as we load up the send buffer. ---*/
5776 
5777  unsigned long *index = new unsigned long[size];
5778  for (iProc = 0; iProc < size; iProc++)
5779  index[iProc] = NODES_PER_ELEMENT*nElem_Send[iProc];
5780 
5781  unsigned long *markerIndex = new unsigned long[size];
5782  for (iProc = 0; iProc < size; iProc++)
5783  markerIndex[iProc] = nElem_Send[iProc];
5784 
5785  /*--- Loop through our elements and load the elems and their
5786  additional data that we will send to the other procs. ---*/
5787 
5788  for (iElem = 0; iElem < NELEM; iElem++) {
5789  for (iNode = 0; iNode < NODES_PER_ELEMENT; iNode++) {
5790 
5791  /*--- Get the index of the current point. ---*/
5792 
5793  Global_Index = Conn_Linear[iElem*NODES_PER_ELEMENT+iNode];
5794 
5795  /*--- We have the color stored in a map for all local points. ---*/
5796 
5797  iProcessor = Color_List[Global_Index];
5798 
5799  /*--- If we have not visited this element yet, load up the data
5800  for sending. ---*/
5801 
5802  if (nElem_Flag[iProcessor] != (int)iElem) {
5803 
5804  nElem_Flag[iProcessor] = (int)iElem;
5805  unsigned long nn = index[iProcessor];
5806  unsigned long mm = markerIndex[iProcessor];
5807 
5808  /*--- Load the connectivity values. ---*/
5809 
5810  for (jNode = 0; jNode < NODES_PER_ELEMENT; jNode++) {
5811 
5812  /*--- Note that elements are already stored directly based on
5813  their global index for the nodes. ---*/
5814 
5815  connSend[nn] = Conn_Linear[iElem*NODES_PER_ELEMENT+jNode]; nn++;
5816 
5817  }
5818 
5819  /*--- Global marker ID for this element. ---*/
5820 
5821  markerSend[mm] = Linear_Markers[iElem];
5822  idSend[mm] = ID_SurfElem_Linear[iElem];
5823 
5824  /*--- Increment the index by the message length ---*/
5825 
5826  index[iProcessor] += NODES_PER_ELEMENT;
5827  markerIndex[iProcessor]++;
5828 
5829  }
5830  }
5831  }
5832 
5833  /*--- Free memory after loading up the send buffer. ---*/
5834 
5835  delete [] index;
5836  delete [] markerIndex;
5837 
5838  /*--- Allocate the memory that we need for receiving the conn
5839  values and then cue up the non-blocking receives. Note that
5840  we do not include our own rank in the communications. We will
5841  directly copy our own data later. ---*/
5842 
5843  unsigned long *connRecv = NULL;
5844  connRecv = new unsigned long[NODES_PER_ELEMENT*nElem_Recv[size]];
5845  for (iRecv = 0; iRecv < NODES_PER_ELEMENT*nElem_Recv[size]; iRecv++)
5846  connRecv[iRecv] = 0;
5847 
5848  unsigned long *markerRecv = new unsigned long[nElem_Recv[size]];
5849  for (iRecv = 0; iRecv < nElem_Recv[size]; iRecv++) markerRecv[iRecv] = 0;
5850 
5851  unsigned long *idRecv = new unsigned long[nElem_Recv[size]];
5852  for (iRecv = 0; iRecv < nElem_Recv[size]; iRecv++) idRecv[iRecv] = 0;
5853 
5854  /*--- Allocate memory for the MPI requests if we need to communicate. ---*/
5855 
5856  if (nSends > 0) {
5857  connSendReq = new SU2_MPI::Request[nSends];
5858  markerSendReq = new SU2_MPI::Request[nSends];
5859  idSendReq = new SU2_MPI::Request[nSends];
5860  }
5861  if (nRecvs > 0) {
5862  connRecvReq = new SU2_MPI::Request[nRecvs];
5863  markerRecvReq = new SU2_MPI::Request[nRecvs];
5864  idRecvReq = new SU2_MPI::Request[nRecvs];
5865  }
5866 
5867  /*--- Launch the non-blocking sends and receives. ---*/
5868 
5869  InitiateCommsAll(connSend, nElem_Send, connSendReq,
5870  connRecv, nElem_Recv, connRecvReq,
5871  NODES_PER_ELEMENT, COMM_TYPE_UNSIGNED_LONG);
5872 
5873  InitiateCommsAll(markerSend, nElem_Send, markerSendReq,
5874  markerRecv, nElem_Recv, markerRecvReq,
5875  1, COMM_TYPE_UNSIGNED_LONG);
5876 
5877  InitiateCommsAll(idSend, nElem_Send, idSendReq,
5878  idRecv, nElem_Recv, idRecvReq,
5879  1, COMM_TYPE_UNSIGNED_LONG);
5880 
5881  /*--- Copy my own rank's data into the recv buffer directly. ---*/
5882 
5883  iRecv = NODES_PER_ELEMENT*nElem_Recv[rank];
5884  myStart = NODES_PER_ELEMENT*nElem_Send[rank];
5885  myFinal = NODES_PER_ELEMENT*nElem_Send[rank+1];
5886  for (iSend = myStart; iSend < myFinal; iSend++) {
5887  connRecv[iRecv] = connSend[iSend];
5888  iRecv++;
5889  }
5890 
5891  iRecv = nElem_Recv[rank];
5892  myStart = nElem_Send[rank];
5893  myFinal = nElem_Send[rank+1];
5894  for (iSend = myStart; iSend < myFinal; iSend++) {
5895  markerRecv[iRecv] = markerSend[iSend];
5896  idRecv[iRecv] = idSend[iSend];
5897  iRecv++;
5898  }
5899 
5900  /*--- Complete the non-blocking communications. ---*/
5901 
5902  CompleteCommsAll(nSends, connSendReq, nRecvs, connRecvReq);
5903  CompleteCommsAll(nSends, markerSendReq, nRecvs, markerRecvReq);
5904  CompleteCommsAll(nSends, idSendReq, nRecvs, idRecvReq);
5905 
5906  /*--- Store the connectivity for this rank in the proper data
5907  structure. It will be loaded into the geometry objects in a later step. ---*/
5908 
5909  if (nElem_Recv[size] > 0) {
5910  Conn_Elem = new unsigned long[NODES_PER_ELEMENT*nElem_Recv[size]];
5911  int count = 0; nElem_Total = 0;
5912  for (iRecv = 0; iRecv < nElem_Recv[size]; iRecv++) {
5913  nElem_Total++;
5914  for (iNode = 0; iNode < NODES_PER_ELEMENT; iNode++) {
5915  Conn_Elem[count] = connRecv[iRecv*NODES_PER_ELEMENT+iNode];
5916  count++;
5917  }
5918  }
5919  }
5920 
5921  /*--- Store the global marker IDs too. ---*/
5922 
5923  if (nElem_Recv[size] > 0) {
5924  Local_Markers = new unsigned long[nElem_Recv[size]];
5925  for (iRecv = 0; iRecv < nElem_Recv[size]; iRecv++) {
5926  Local_Markers[iRecv] = markerRecv[iRecv];
5927  }
5928  }
5929 
5930  /*--- Store the global surface elem IDs too. ---*/
5931 
5932  if (nElem_Recv[size] > 0) {
5933  ID_SurfElem = new unsigned long[nElem_Recv[size]];
5934  for (iRecv = 0; iRecv < nElem_Recv[size]; iRecv++) {
5935  ID_SurfElem[iRecv] = idRecv[iRecv];
5936  }
5937  }
5938 
5939  /*--- Store the particular global element count in the class data,
5940  and set the class data pointer to the connectivity array. ---*/
5941 
5942  switch (Elem_Type) {
5943  case LINE:
5944  nLocal_Line = nElem_Total;
5945  if (nLocal_Line > 0) {
5946  Conn_Line = Conn_Elem;
5947  ID_Line = Local_Markers;
5948  Elem_ID_Line = ID_SurfElem;
5949  }
5950  break;
5951  case TRIANGLE:
5952  nLocal_BoundTria = nElem_Total;
5953  if (nLocal_BoundTria > 0) {
5954  Conn_BoundTria = Conn_Elem;
5955  ID_BoundTria = Local_Markers;
5956  Elem_ID_BoundTria = ID_SurfElem;
5957  }
5958  break;
5959  case QUADRILATERAL:
5960  nLocal_BoundQuad = nElem_Total;
5961  if (nLocal_BoundQuad > 0) {
5962  Conn_BoundQuad = Conn_Elem;
5963  ID_BoundQuad = Local_Markers;
5964  Elem_ID_BoundQuad = ID_SurfElem;
5965  }
5966  break;
5967  default:
5968  SU2_MPI::Error("Unrecognized element type.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
5969  break;
5970  }
5971 
5972  /*--- Free temporary memory from communications ---*/
5973 
5974  if (connSendReq != NULL) delete [] connSendReq;
5975  if (markerSendReq != NULL) delete [] markerSendReq;
5976  if (idSendReq != NULL) delete [] idSendReq;
5977 
5978  if (connRecvReq != NULL) delete [] connRecvReq;
5979  if (markerRecvReq != NULL) delete [] markerRecvReq;
5980  if (idRecvReq != NULL) delete [] idRecvReq;
5981 
5982  delete [] connSend;
5983  delete [] connRecv;
5984  delete [] markerSend;
5985  delete [] markerRecv;
5986  delete [] idSend;
5987  delete [] idRecv;
5988  delete [] nElem_Recv;
5989  delete [] nElem_Send;
5990  delete [] nElem_Flag;
5991 
5992 }
5993 
5994 void CPhysicalGeometry::DistributeMarkerTags(CConfig *config, CGeometry *geometry) {
5995 
5996  unsigned long iMarker, index, iChar;
5997 
5998  char str_buf[MAX_STRING_SIZE];
5999 
6000  /*--- The master node will communicate the entire list of marker tags
6001  (in global ordering) so that it will be simple for each rank to grab
6002  the string name for each marker. ---*/
6003 
6004  nMarker_Global = 0;
6005  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) nMarker_Global = config->GetnMarker_All();
6006 
6007  /*--- Broadcast the global number of markers in the mesh. ---*/
6008 
6009  SU2_MPI::Bcast(&nMarker_Global, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG,
6010  MASTER_NODE, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
6011 
6012  char *mpi_str_buf = new char[nMarker_Global*MAX_STRING_SIZE]();
6013  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
6014  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker_Global; iMarker++) {
6015  SPRINTF(&mpi_str_buf[iMarker*MAX_STRING_SIZE], "%s",
6016  config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(iMarker).c_str());
6017  }
6018  }
6019 
6020  /*--- Broadcast the string names of the variables. ---*/
6021 
6022  SU2_MPI::Bcast(mpi_str_buf, (int)nMarker_Global*MAX_STRING_SIZE, MPI_CHAR,
6023  MASTER_NODE, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
6024 
6025  /*--- Now parse the string names and load into our marker tag vector.
6026  We also need to set the values of all markers into the config. ---*/
6027 
6028  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker_Global; iMarker++) {
6029  index = iMarker*MAX_STRING_SIZE;
6030  for (iChar = 0; iChar < MAX_STRING_SIZE; iChar++) {
6031  str_buf[iChar] = mpi_str_buf[index + iChar];
6032  }
6033  Marker_Tags.push_back(str_buf);
6034  config->SetMarker_All_TagBound(iMarker,str_buf);
6035  config->SetMarker_All_SendRecv(iMarker,NO);
6036  }
6037 
6038  /*--- Free string buffer memory. ---*/
6039 
6040  delete [] mpi_str_buf;
6041 
6042 }
6043 
6044 void CPhysicalGeometry::LoadPoints(CConfig *config, CGeometry *geometry) {
6045 
6046  unsigned long iPoint, jPoint, iOwned, iPeriodic, iGhost;
6047 
6048  /*--- Create the basic point structures before storing the points. ---*/
6049 
6050  nPoint = nLocal_Point;
6051  nPointDomain = nLocal_PointDomain;
6052  nPointNode = nPoint;
6053 
6054  node = new CPoint*[nPoint];
6055 
6056  Local_to_Global_Point = new long[nPoint];
6057 
6058  /*--- Array initialization ---*/
6059 
6060  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
6061  Local_to_Global_Point[iPoint] = -1;
6062  }
6063 
6064  /*--- Set our counters correctly based on the number of owned and ghost
6065  nodes that we counted during the partitioning. ---*/
6066 
6067  jPoint = 0;
6068  iOwned = 0;
6069  iPeriodic = nLocal_PointDomain;
6070  iGhost = nLocal_PointDomain + nLocal_PointPeriodic;
6071 
6072  /*--- Loop over all of the points that we have recv'd and store the
6073  coordinates, global index, and colors ---*/
6074 
6075  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
6076 
6077  /*--- Set the starting point to the correct counter for this point. ---*/
6078 
6079  if (Local_Colors[iPoint] == (unsigned long)rank) {
6080  if (Local_Points[iPoint] < geometry->GetGlobal_nPointDomain())
6081  jPoint = iOwned;
6082  else jPoint = iPeriodic;
6083  } else {
6084  jPoint = iGhost;
6085  }
6086 
6087  /*--- Get the global index ---*/
6088 
6089  Local_to_Global_Point[jPoint] = Local_Points[iPoint];
6090 
6091  /*--- Allocating the Point object ---*/
6092 
6093  if ( nDim == 2 )
6094  node[jPoint] = new CPoint(Local_Coords[iPoint*nDim+0],
6095  Local_Coords[iPoint*nDim+1],
6096  Local_to_Global_Point[jPoint], config);
6097  if ( nDim == 3 )
6098  node[jPoint] = new CPoint(Local_Coords[iPoint*nDim+0],
6099  Local_Coords[iPoint*nDim+1],
6100  Local_Coords[iPoint*nDim+2],
6101  Local_to_Global_Point[jPoint], config);
6102 
6103  /*--- Set the color ---*/
6104 
6105  node[jPoint]->SetColor(Local_Colors[iPoint]);
6106 
6107  /*--- Increment the correct counter before moving to the next point. ---*/
6108 
6109  if (Local_Colors[iPoint] == (unsigned long)rank) {
6110  if (Local_Points[iPoint] < geometry->GetGlobal_nPointDomain())
6111  iOwned++;
6112  else iPeriodic++;
6113  } else {
6114  iGhost++;
6115  }
6116  }
6117 
6118  /*--- Create the global to local mapping, which will be useful for loading
6119  the elements and boundaries in subsequent steps. ---*/
6120 
6121  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++)
6122  Global_to_Local_Point[Local_to_Global_Point[iPoint]] = iPoint;
6123 
6124  /*--- Set the value of Global_nPoint and Global_nPointDomain ---*/
6125 
6126  unsigned long Local_nPoint = nPoint;
6127  unsigned long Local_nPointDomain = nPointDomain;
6128 
6129 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
6130  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Local_nPoint, &Global_nPoint, 1,
6131  MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
6132  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Local_nPointDomain, &Global_nPointDomain, 1,
6133  MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
6134 #else
6135  Global_nPoint = Local_nPoint;
6136  Global_nPointDomain = Local_nPointDomain;
6137 #endif
6138 
6139  if ((rank == MASTER_NODE) && (size > SINGLE_NODE))
6140  cout << Global_nPoint << " vertices including ghost points. " << endl;
6141 
6142 }
6143 
6144 void CPhysicalGeometry::LoadVolumeElements(CConfig *config, CGeometry *geometry) {
6145 
6146  unsigned short NODES_PER_ELEMENT;
6147 
6148  unsigned long iElem, jElem, kElem, iNode, Local_Elem, iGlobal_Index;
6149  unsigned long Local_Nodes[N_POINTS_HEXAHEDRON];
6150 
6151  unsigned long iElemTria = 0;
6152  unsigned long iElemQuad = 0;
6153  unsigned long iElemTetr = 0;
6154  unsigned long iElemHexa = 0;
6155  unsigned long iElemPris = 0;
6156  unsigned long iElemPyra = 0;
6157 
6158  unsigned long nTria, nQuad, nTetr, nHexa, nPris, nPyra;
6159 
6160  map<unsigned long, unsigned long> Tria_List;
6161  map<unsigned long, unsigned long> Quad_List;
6162  map<unsigned long, unsigned long> Tetr_List;
6163  map<unsigned long, unsigned long> Hexa_List;
6164  map<unsigned long, unsigned long> Pris_List;
6165  map<unsigned long, unsigned long> Pyra_List;
6166  map<unsigned long, unsigned long>::iterator it;
6167 
6168  /*--- It is possible that we have repeated elements during the previous
6169  communications, as we mostly focus on the grid points and their colors.
6170  First, loop through our local elements and build a mapping by simply
6171  overwriting the duplicate entries. ---*/
6172 
6173  jElem = 0;
6174  for (iElem=0; iElem < nLocal_Tria; iElem++) {
6175  Tria_List[ID_Tria[iElem]] = iElem;
6176  }
6177  nTria = Tria_List.size();
6178 
6179  jElem = 0;
6180  for (iElem=0; iElem < nLocal_Quad; iElem++) {
6181  Quad_List[ID_Quad[iElem]] = iElem;
6182  }
6183  nQuad = Quad_List.size();
6184 
6185  jElem = 0;
6186  for (iElem=0; iElem < nLocal_Tetr; iElem++) {
6187  Tetr_List[ID_Tetr[iElem]] = iElem;
6188  }
6189  nTetr = Tetr_List.size();
6190 
6191  jElem = 0;
6192  for (iElem=0; iElem < nLocal_Hexa; iElem++) {
6193  Hexa_List[ID_Hexa[iElem]] = iElem;
6194  }
6195  nHexa = Hexa_List.size();
6196 
6197  jElem = 0;
6198  for (iElem=0; iElem < nLocal_Pris; iElem++) {
6199  Pris_List[ID_Pris[iElem]] = iElem;
6200  }
6201  nPris = Pris_List.size();
6202 
6203  jElem = 0;
6204  for (iElem=0; iElem < nLocal_Pyra; iElem++) {
6205  Pyra_List[ID_Pyra[iElem]] = iElem;
6206  }
6207  nPyra = Pyra_List.size();
6208 
6209  /*--- Reduce the final count of non-repeated elements on this rank. ---*/
6210 
6211  Local_Elem = nTria + nQuad + nTetr + nHexa + nPris + nPyra;
6212 
6213  /*--- Create the basic structures for holding the grid elements. ---*/
6214 
6215  jElem = 0;
6216  nElem = Local_Elem;
6217  elem = new CPrimalGrid*[nElem];
6218 
6219  /*--- Store the elements of each type in the proper containers. ---*/
6220 
6221  for (it = Tria_List.begin(); it != Tria_List.end(); it++) {
6222 
6223  kElem = it->first;
6224  iElem = it->second;
6225 
6226  /*--- Transform the stored connectivity for this element from global
6227  to local values on this rank. ---*/
6228 
6229  NODES_PER_ELEMENT = N_POINTS_TRIANGLE;
6230  for (iNode = 0; iNode < NODES_PER_ELEMENT; iNode++) {
6231  iGlobal_Index = Conn_Tria[iElem*NODES_PER_ELEMENT+iNode];
6232  Local_Nodes[iNode] = Global_to_Local_Point[iGlobal_Index];
6233  }
6234 
6235  /*--- Create the element object. ---*/
6236 
6237  elem[jElem] = new CTriangle(Local_Nodes[0],
6238  Local_Nodes[1],
6239  Local_Nodes[2], 2);
6240 
6241  elem[jElem]->SetGlobalIndex(kElem);
6242 
6243  /*--- Increment our local counters. ---*/
6244 
6245  jElem++; iElemTria++;
6246 
6247  }
6248 
6249  /*--- Free memory as we go. ---*/
6250 
6251  Tria_List.clear();
6252 
6253  for (it = Quad_List.begin(); it != Quad_List.end(); it++) {
6254 
6255  kElem = it->first;
6256  iElem = it->second;
6257 
6258  /*--- Transform the stored connectivity for this element from global
6259  to local values on this rank. ---*/
6260 
6261  NODES_PER_ELEMENT = N_POINTS_QUADRILATERAL;
6262  for (iNode = 0; iNode < NODES_PER_ELEMENT; iNode++) {
6263  iGlobal_Index = Conn_Quad[iElem*NODES_PER_ELEMENT+iNode];
6264  Local_Nodes[iNode] = Global_to_Local_Point[iGlobal_Index];
6265  }
6266 
6267  /*--- Create the element object. ---*/
6268 
6269  elem[jElem] = new CQuadrilateral(Local_Nodes[0],
6270  Local_Nodes[1],
6271  Local_Nodes[2],
6272  Local_Nodes[3], 2);
6273 
6274  elem[jElem]->SetGlobalIndex(kElem);
6275 
6276  /*--- Increment our local counters. ---*/
6277 
6278  jElem++; iElemQuad++;
6279 
6280  }
6281 
6282  /*--- Free memory as we go. ---*/
6283 
6284  Quad_List.clear();
6285 
6286  for (it = Tetr_List.begin(); it != Tetr_List.end(); it++) {
6287 
6288  kElem = it->first;
6289  iElem = it->second;
6290 
6291  /*--- Transform the stored connectivity for this element from global
6292  to local values on this rank. ---*/
6293 
6294  NODES_PER_ELEMENT = N_POINTS_TETRAHEDRON;
6295  for (iNode = 0; iNode < NODES_PER_ELEMENT; iNode++) {
6296  iGlobal_Index = Conn_Tetr[iElem*NODES_PER_ELEMENT+iNode];
6297  Local_Nodes[iNode] = Global_to_Local_Point[iGlobal_Index];
6298  }
6299 
6300  /*--- Create the element object. ---*/
6301 
6302  elem[jElem] = new CTetrahedron(Local_Nodes[0],
6303  Local_Nodes[1],
6304  Local_Nodes[2],
6305  Local_Nodes[3]);
6306 
6307  elem[jElem]->SetGlobalIndex(kElem);
6308 
6309  /*--- Increment our local counters. ---*/
6310 
6311  jElem++; iElemTetr++;
6312 
6313  }
6314 
6315  /*--- Free memory as we go. ---*/
6316 
6317  Tetr_List.clear();
6318 
6319  for (it = Hexa_List.begin(); it != Hexa_List.end(); it++) {
6320 
6321  kElem = it->first;
6322  iElem = it->second;
6323 
6324  /*--- Transform the stored connectivity for this element from global
6325  to local values on this rank. ---*/
6326 
6327  NODES_PER_ELEMENT = N_POINTS_HEXAHEDRON;
6328  for (iNode = 0; iNode < NODES_PER_ELEMENT; iNode++) {
6329  iGlobal_Index = Conn_Hexa[iElem*NODES_PER_ELEMENT+iNode];
6330  Local_Nodes[iNode] = Global_to_Local_Point[iGlobal_Index];
6331  }
6332 
6333  /*--- Create the element object. ---*/
6334 
6335  elem[jElem] = new CHexahedron(Local_Nodes[0],
6336  Local_Nodes[1],
6337  Local_Nodes[2],
6338  Local_Nodes[3],
6339  Local_Nodes[4],
6340  Local_Nodes[5],
6341  Local_Nodes[6],
6342  Local_Nodes[7]);
6343 
6344  elem[jElem]->SetGlobalIndex(kElem);
6345 
6346  /*--- Increment our local counters. ---*/
6347 
6348  jElem++; iElemHexa++;
6349 
6350  }
6351 
6352  /*--- Free memory as we go. ---*/
6353 
6354  Hexa_List.clear();
6355 
6356  for (it = Pris_List.begin(); it != Pris_List.end(); it++) {
6357 
6358  kElem = it->first;
6359  iElem = it->second;
6360 
6361  /*--- Transform the stored connectivity for this element from global
6362  to local values on this rank. ---*/
6363 
6364  NODES_PER_ELEMENT = N_POINTS_PRISM;
6365  for (iNode = 0; iNode < NODES_PER_ELEMENT; iNode++) {
6366  iGlobal_Index = Conn_Pris[iElem*NODES_PER_ELEMENT+iNode];
6367  Local_Nodes[iNode] = Global_to_Local_Point[iGlobal_Index];
6368  }
6369 
6370  /*--- Create the element object. ---*/
6371 
6372  elem[jElem] = new CPrism(Local_Nodes[0],
6373  Local_Nodes[1],
6374  Local_Nodes[2],
6375  Local_Nodes[3],
6376  Local_Nodes[4],
6377  Local_Nodes[5]);
6378 
6379  elem[jElem]->SetGlobalIndex(kElem);
6380 
6381  /*--- Increment our local counters. ---*/
6382 
6383  jElem++; iElemPris++;
6384 
6385  }
6386 
6387  /*--- Free memory as we go. ---*/
6388 
6389  Pris_List.clear();
6390 
6391  for (it = Pyra_List.begin(); it != Pyra_List.end(); it++) {
6392 
6393  kElem = it->first;
6394  iElem = it->second;
6395 
6396  /*--- Transform the stored connectivity for this element from global
6397  to local values on this rank. ---*/
6398 
6399  NODES_PER_ELEMENT = N_POINTS_PYRAMID;
6400  for (iNode = 0; iNode < NODES_PER_ELEMENT; iNode++) {
6401  iGlobal_Index = Conn_Pyra[iElem*NODES_PER_ELEMENT+iNode];
6402  Local_Nodes[iNode] = Global_to_Local_Point[iGlobal_Index];
6403  }
6404 
6405  /*--- Create the element object. ---*/
6406 
6407  elem[jElem] = new CPyramid(Local_Nodes[0],
6408  Local_Nodes[1],
6409  Local_Nodes[2],
6410  Local_Nodes[3],
6411  Local_Nodes[4]);
6412 
6413  elem[jElem]->SetGlobalIndex(kElem);
6414 
6415  /*--- Increment our local counters. ---*/
6416 
6417  jElem++; iElemPyra++;
6418 
6419  }
6420 
6421  /*--- Free memory as we go. ---*/
6422 
6423  Pyra_List.clear();
6424 
6425  /*--- Communicate the number of each element type to all processors. These
6426  values are important for merging and writing output later. ---*/
6427 
6428 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
6429  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Local_Elem, &Global_nElem, 1,
6430  MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
6431 #else
6432  Global_nElem = nElem;
6433 #endif
6434 
6435  if ((rank == MASTER_NODE) && (size > SINGLE_NODE))
6436  cout << Global_nElem << " interior elements including halo cells. " << endl;
6437 
6438  /*--- Set the value of Global_nElemDomain (stored in the geometry
6439  container that is passed in). ---*/
6440 
6441  Global_nElemDomain = geometry->GetGlobal_nElemDomain();
6442 
6443  /*--- Store total number of each element type after incrementing the
6444  counters in the recv loop above (to make sure there aren't repeats). ---*/
6445 
6446  nelem_triangle = iElemTria;
6447  nelem_quad = iElemQuad;
6448  nelem_tetra = iElemTetr;
6449  nelem_hexa = iElemHexa;
6450  nelem_prism = iElemPris;
6451  nelem_pyramid = iElemPyra;
6452 
6453 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
6454  unsigned long Local_nElemTri = nelem_triangle;
6455  unsigned long Local_nElemQuad = nelem_quad;
6456  unsigned long Local_nElemTet = nelem_tetra;
6457  unsigned long Local_nElemHex = nelem_hexa;
6458  unsigned long Local_nElemPrism = nelem_prism;
6459  unsigned long Local_nElemPyramid = nelem_pyramid;
6460 
6461  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Local_nElemTri, &Global_nelem_triangle, 1,
6462  MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
6463  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Local_nElemQuad, &Global_nelem_quad, 1,
6464  MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
6465  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Local_nElemTet, &Global_nelem_tetra, 1,
6466  MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
6467  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Local_nElemHex, &Global_nelem_hexa, 1,
6468  MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
6469  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Local_nElemPrism, &Global_nelem_prism, 1,
6470  MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
6471  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Local_nElemPyramid, &Global_nelem_pyramid, 1,
6472  MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
6473 #else
6474  Global_nelem_triangle = nelem_triangle;
6475  Global_nelem_quad = nelem_quad;
6476  Global_nelem_tetra = nelem_tetra;
6477  Global_nelem_hexa = nelem_hexa;
6478  Global_nelem_prism = nelem_prism;
6479  Global_nelem_pyramid = nelem_pyramid;
6480 #endif
6481 
6482  /*--- Print information about the elements to the console ---*/
6483 
6484  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
6485  if (Global_nelem_triangle > 0)
6486  cout << Global_nelem_triangle << " triangles." << endl;
6487  if (Global_nelem_quad > 0)
6488  cout << Global_nelem_quad << " quadrilaterals." << endl;
6489  if (Global_nelem_tetra > 0)
6490  cout << Global_nelem_tetra << " tetrahedra." << endl;
6491  if (Global_nelem_hexa > 0)
6492  cout << Global_nelem_hexa << " hexahedra." << endl;
6493  if (Global_nelem_prism > 0)
6494  cout << Global_nelem_prism << " prisms." << endl;
6495  if (Global_nelem_pyramid > 0)
6496  cout << Global_nelem_pyramid << " pyramids." << endl;
6497  }
6498 
6499 }
6500 
6501 void CPhysicalGeometry::LoadSurfaceElements(CConfig *config, CGeometry *geometry) {
6502 
6503  unsigned short NODES_PER_ELEMENT;
6504  unsigned short iNode, nMarker_Max = config->GetnMarker_Max();
6505 
6506  unsigned long iElem, iMarker, Global_Marker, iGlobal_Index;
6507 
6508  unsigned long iElem_Line = 0;
6509  unsigned long iElem_Tria = 0;
6510  unsigned long iElem_Quad = 0;
6511 
6512  unsigned long Local_Nodes[N_POINTS_HEXAHEDRON];
6513 
6514  vector<vector<unsigned long> > Line_List;
6515  vector<vector<unsigned long> > BoundTria_List;
6516  vector<vector<unsigned long> > BoundQuad_List;
6517 
6518  vector<unsigned long> Marker_Local;
6519  vector<unsigned long>::iterator it;
6520 
6521  /*--- Compute how many markers we have local to this rank by looping
6522  through the global marker numbers of each local surface element and
6523  counting the unique set. ---*/
6524 
6525  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nLocal_Line; iElem++) {
6526  if (find(Marker_Local.begin(), Marker_Local.end(),
6527  ID_Line[iElem]) == Marker_Local.end()) {
6528  Marker_Local.push_back(ID_Line[iElem]);
6529  }
6530  }
6531 
6532  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nLocal_BoundTria; iElem++) {
6533  if (find(Marker_Local.begin(), Marker_Local.end(),
6534  ID_BoundTria[iElem]) == Marker_Local.end()) {
6535  Marker_Local.push_back(ID_BoundTria[iElem]);
6536  }
6537  }
6538 
6539  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nLocal_BoundQuad; iElem++) {
6540  if (find(Marker_Local.begin(), Marker_Local.end(),
6541  ID_BoundQuad[iElem]) == Marker_Local.end()) {
6542  Marker_Local.push_back(ID_BoundQuad[iElem]);
6543  }
6544  }
6545 
6546  /*--- Create a mapping from global to local marker ID (and vice-versa). ---*/
6547 
6548  map<unsigned long, unsigned long> Marker_Global_to_Local;
6549  map<unsigned long, unsigned long> Marker_Local_to_Global;
6550 
6551  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < Marker_Local.size(); iMarker++) {
6552  Marker_Global_to_Local[Marker_Local[iMarker]] = iMarker;
6553  Marker_Local_to_Global[iMarker] = Marker_Local[iMarker];
6554  }
6555 
6556  /*--- Set up our element counters on each marker so that we can avoid
6557  duplicating any elements from the previous communications. ---*/
6558 
6559  Line_List.resize(Marker_Local.size());
6560  BoundTria_List.resize(Marker_Local.size());
6561  BoundQuad_List.resize(Marker_Local.size());
6562 
6563  /*--- Count the number of elements on each marker and store in a
6564  vector by marker. ---*/
6565 
6566  vector<unsigned long> nElemBound_Local;
6567  nElemBound_Local.resize(Marker_Local.size());
6568  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < Marker_Local.size(); iMarker++)
6569  nElemBound_Local[iMarker] = 0;
6570 
6571  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nLocal_Line; iElem++) {
6572  iMarker = Marker_Global_to_Local[ID_Line[iElem]];
6573  if (find(Line_List[iMarker].begin(), Line_List[iMarker].end(),
6574  Elem_ID_Line[iElem]) == Line_List[iMarker].end()) {
6575  nElemBound_Local[iMarker]++;
6576  Line_List[iMarker].push_back(Elem_ID_Line[iElem]);
6577  }
6578  }
6579 
6580  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nLocal_BoundTria; iElem++) {
6581  iMarker = Marker_Global_to_Local[ID_BoundTria[iElem]];
6582  if (find(BoundTria_List[iMarker].begin(), BoundTria_List[iMarker].end(),
6583  Elem_ID_BoundTria[iElem]) == BoundTria_List[iMarker].end()) {
6584  nElemBound_Local[iMarker]++;
6585  BoundTria_List[iMarker].push_back(Elem_ID_BoundTria[iElem]);
6586  }
6587  }
6588 
6589  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nLocal_BoundQuad; iElem++) {
6590  iMarker = Marker_Global_to_Local[ID_BoundQuad[iElem]];
6591  if (find(BoundQuad_List[iMarker].begin(), BoundQuad_List[iMarker].end(),
6592  Elem_ID_BoundQuad[iElem]) == BoundQuad_List[iMarker].end()) {
6593  nElemBound_Local[iMarker]++;
