6594  BoundQuad_List[iMarker].push_back(Elem_ID_BoundQuad[iElem]);
6595  }
6596  }
6597 
6598  /*--- Create the domain structures for the boundaries. Initially, stick
6599  with nMarkerMax here, but come back and compute size we need. Same for
6600  OVERHEAD - this can precomputed. ---*/
6601 
6602  nMarker = Marker_Local.size();
6603  nElem_Bound = new unsigned long[nMarker_Max];
6604  Tag_to_Marker = new string[nMarker_Max];
6605  Marker_All_SendRecv = new short[nMarker_Max];
6606 
6607  /*--- Allocate space for the elements on each marker ---*/
6608 
6609  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++)
6610  nElem_Bound[iMarker] = nElemBound_Local[iMarker];
6611 
6612  bound = new CPrimalGrid**[nMarker+(OVERHEAD*size)];
6613  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker+(OVERHEAD*size); iMarker++)
6614  bound[iMarker] = NULL;
6615 
6616  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++)
6617  bound[iMarker] = new CPrimalGrid*[nElem_Bound[iMarker]];
6618 
6619  /*--- Initialize boundary element counters ---*/
6620 
6621  iElem_Line = 0;
6622  iElem_Tria = 0;
6623  iElem_Quad = 0;
6624 
6625  Line_List.clear(); Line_List.resize(Marker_Local.size());
6626  BoundTria_List.clear(); BoundTria_List.resize(Marker_Local.size());
6627  BoundQuad_List.clear(); BoundQuad_List.resize(Marker_Local.size());
6628 
6629  /*--- Reset our element counter on a marker-basis. ---*/
6630 
6631  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++)
6632  nElemBound_Local[iMarker] = 0;
6633 
6634  /*--- Store the boundary element connectivity. Note here that we have
6635  communicated the global index values for the elements, so we need to
6636  convert this to the local index when instantiating the element. ---*/
6637 
6638  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nLocal_Line; iElem++) {
6639 
6640  iMarker = Marker_Global_to_Local[ID_Line[iElem]];
6641 
6642  /*--- Avoid duplicates on this marker. ---*/
6643 
6644  if (find(Line_List[iMarker].begin(), Line_List[iMarker].end(),
6645  Elem_ID_Line[iElem]) == Line_List[iMarker].end()) {
6646 
6647  /*--- Transform the stored connectivity for this element from global
6648  to local values on this rank. ---*/
6649 
6650  NODES_PER_ELEMENT = N_POINTS_LINE;
6651  for (iNode = 0; iNode < NODES_PER_ELEMENT; iNode++) {
6652  iGlobal_Index = Conn_Line[iElem*NODES_PER_ELEMENT+iNode];
6653  Local_Nodes[iNode] = Global_to_Local_Point[iGlobal_Index];
6654  }
6655 
6656  /*--- Create the geometry object for this element. ---*/
6657 
6658  bound[iMarker][nElemBound_Local[iMarker]] = new CLine(Local_Nodes[0],
6659  Local_Nodes[1], 2);
6660 
6661  /*--- Increment our counters for this marker and element type. ---*/
6662 
6663  nElemBound_Local[iMarker]++; iElem_Line++;
6664 
6665  Line_List[iMarker].push_back(Elem_ID_Line[iElem]);
6666 
6667  }
6668  }
6669 
6670  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nLocal_BoundTria; iElem++) {
6671 
6672  iMarker = Marker_Global_to_Local[ID_BoundTria[iElem]];
6673 
6674  /*--- Avoid duplicates on this marker. ---*/
6675 
6676  if (find(BoundTria_List[iMarker].begin(), BoundTria_List[iMarker].end(),
6677  Elem_ID_BoundTria[iElem]) == BoundTria_List[iMarker].end()) {
6678 
6679  /*--- Transform the stored connectivity for this element from global
6680  to local values on this rank. ---*/
6681 
6682  NODES_PER_ELEMENT = N_POINTS_TRIANGLE;
6683  for (iNode = 0; iNode < NODES_PER_ELEMENT; iNode++) {
6684  iGlobal_Index = Conn_BoundTria[iElem*NODES_PER_ELEMENT+iNode];
6685  Local_Nodes[iNode] = Global_to_Local_Point[iGlobal_Index];
6686  }
6687 
6688  /*--- Create the geometry object for this element. ---*/
6689 
6690  bound[iMarker][nElemBound_Local[iMarker]] = new CTriangle(Local_Nodes[0],
6691  Local_Nodes[1],
6692  Local_Nodes[2], 3);
6693 
6694  /*--- Increment our counters for this marker and element type. ---*/
6695 
6696  nElemBound_Local[iMarker]++; iElem_Tria++;
6697 
6698  BoundTria_List[iMarker].push_back(Elem_ID_BoundTria[iElem]);
6699 
6700  }
6701  }
6702 
6703  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nLocal_BoundQuad; iElem++) {
6704 
6705  iMarker = Marker_Global_to_Local[ID_BoundQuad[iElem]];
6706 
6707  /*--- Avoid duplicates on this marker. ---*/
6708 
6709  if (find(BoundQuad_List[iMarker].begin(), BoundQuad_List[iMarker].end(),
6710  Elem_ID_BoundQuad[iElem]) == BoundQuad_List[iMarker].end()) {
6711 
6712  /*--- Transform the stored connectivity for this element from global
6713  to local values on this rank. ---*/
6714 
6715  NODES_PER_ELEMENT = N_POINTS_QUADRILATERAL;
6716  for (iNode = 0; iNode < NODES_PER_ELEMENT; iNode++) {
6717  iGlobal_Index = Conn_BoundQuad[iElem*NODES_PER_ELEMENT+iNode];
6718  Local_Nodes[iNode] = Global_to_Local_Point[iGlobal_Index];
6719  }
6720 
6721  /*--- Create the geometry object for this element. ---*/
6722 
6723  bound[iMarker][nElemBound_Local[iMarker]] = new CQuadrilateral(Local_Nodes[0],
6724  Local_Nodes[1],
6725  Local_Nodes[2],
6726  Local_Nodes[3], 3);
6727 
6728  /*--- Increment our counters for this marker and element type. ---*/
6729 
6730  nElemBound_Local[iMarker]++; iElem_Quad++;
6731 
6732  BoundQuad_List[iMarker].push_back(Elem_ID_BoundQuad[iElem]);
6733 
6734  }
6735  }
6736 
6737  /*--- Store total number of each boundary element type ---*/
6738 
6739  nelem_edge_bound = iElem_Line;
6740  nelem_triangle_bound = iElem_Tria;
6741  nelem_quad_bound = iElem_Quad;
6742 
6743  /*--- Set some auxiliary information on a per-marker basis. ---*/
6744 
6745  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
6746 
6747  Global_Marker = Marker_Local_to_Global[iMarker];
6748 
6749  /*--- Now each domain has the right information ---*/
6750 
6751  string Grid_Marker = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(Marker_Local_to_Global[iMarker]);
6752  short SendRecv = config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(Marker_Local_to_Global[iMarker]);
6753 
6754  Tag_to_Marker[iMarker] = Marker_Tags[Global_Marker];
6755  Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker] = SendRecv;
6756 
6757  /*--- Set the marker tags correctly to match the values in config. ---*/
6758 
6759  config->SetMarker_All_TagBound(iMarker, Tag_to_Marker[iMarker]);
6760  config->SetMarker_All_SendRecv(iMarker, Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker]);
6761 
6762  }
6763 
6764  /*--- Initialize pointers for turbomachinery computations ---*/
6765 
6766  nSpanWiseSections = new unsigned short[2];
6767  nSpanSectionsByMarker = new unsigned short[nMarker];
6768  SpanWiseValue = new su2double*[2];
6769  for (unsigned short iMarker = 0; iMarker < 2; iMarker++){
6770  nSpanWiseSections[iMarker] = 0;
6771  SpanWiseValue[iMarker] = NULL;
6772  }
6773 
6774  nVertexSpan = new long* [nMarker];
6775  nTotVertexSpan = new unsigned long* [nMarker];
6776  turbovertex = new CTurboVertex***[nMarker];
6777  AverageTurboNormal = new su2double**[nMarker];
6778  AverageNormal = new su2double**[nMarker];
6779  AverageGridVel = new su2double**[nMarker];
6780  AverageTangGridVel = new su2double*[nMarker];
6781  SpanArea = new su2double*[nMarker];
6782  TurboRadius = new su2double*[nMarker];
6783  MaxAngularCoord = new su2double*[nMarker];
6784  MinAngularCoord = new su2double*[nMarker];
6785  MinRelAngularCoord = new su2double*[nMarker];
6786 
6787  for (unsigned short iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++){
6788  nSpanSectionsByMarker[iMarker] = 0;
6789  nVertexSpan[iMarker] = NULL;
6790  nTotVertexSpan[iMarker] = NULL;
6791  turbovertex[iMarker] = NULL;
6792  AverageTurboNormal[iMarker] = NULL;
6793  AverageNormal[iMarker] = NULL;
6794  AverageGridVel[iMarker] = NULL;
6795  AverageTangGridVel[iMarker] = NULL;
6796  SpanArea[iMarker] = NULL;
6797  TurboRadius[iMarker] = NULL;
6798  MaxAngularCoord[iMarker] = NULL;
6799  MinAngularCoord[iMarker] = NULL;
6800  MinRelAngularCoord[iMarker] = NULL;
6801  }
6802 
6803  /*--- Initialize pointers for turbomachinery performance computation ---*/
6804 
6805  nTurboPerf = config->GetnMarker_TurboPerformance();
6806  TangGridVelIn = new su2double*[config->GetnMarker_TurboPerformance()];
6807  SpanAreaIn = new su2double*[config->GetnMarker_TurboPerformance()];
6808  TurboRadiusIn = new su2double*[config->GetnMarker_TurboPerformance()];
6809  TangGridVelOut = new su2double*[config->GetnMarker_TurboPerformance()];
6810  SpanAreaOut = new su2double*[config->GetnMarker_TurboPerformance()];
6811  TurboRadiusOut = new su2double*[config->GetnMarker_TurboPerformance()];
6812 
6813  for (unsigned short iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_TurboPerformance(); iMarker++){
6814  TangGridVelIn[iMarker] = NULL;
6815  SpanAreaIn[iMarker] = NULL;
6816  TurboRadiusIn[iMarker] = NULL;
6817  TangGridVelOut[iMarker] = NULL;
6818  SpanAreaOut[iMarker] = NULL;
6819  TurboRadiusOut[iMarker] = NULL;
6820  }
6821 
6822 }
6823 
6824 void CPhysicalGeometry::InitiateCommsAll(void *bufSend,
6825  int *nElemSend,
6826  SU2_MPI::Request *sendReq,
6827  void *bufRecv,
6828  int *nElemRecv,
6829  SU2_MPI::Request *recvReq,
6830  unsigned short countPerElem,
6831  unsigned short commType) {
6832 
6833  /*--- Local variables ---*/
6834 
6835  int iMessage, iProc, offset, nElem, count, source, dest, tag;
6836 
6837  /*--- Launch the non-blocking recv's first. ---*/
6838 
6839  iMessage = 0;
6840  for (iProc = 0; iProc < size; iProc++) {
6841 
6842  /*--- Post recv's only if another proc is sending us data. We do
6843  not communicate with ourselves or post recv's for zero length
6844  messages to keep overhead down. ---*/
6845 
6846  if ((nElemRecv[iProc+1] > nElemRecv[iProc]) && (iProc != rank)) {
6847 
6848  /*--- Compute our location in the recv buffer. ---*/
6849 
6850  offset = countPerElem*nElemRecv[iProc];
6851 
6852  /*--- Take advantage of cumulative storage format to get the number
6853  of elems that we need to recv. ---*/
6854 
6855  nElem = nElemRecv[iProc+1] - nElemRecv[iProc];
6856 
6857  /*--- Total count can include multiple pieces of data per element. ---*/
6858 
6859  count = countPerElem*nElem;
6860 
6861  /*--- Post non-blocking recv for this proc. ---*/
6862 
6863  source = iProc; tag = iProc + 1;
6864 
6865  switch (commType) {
6866  case COMM_TYPE_DOUBLE:
6867  SU2_MPI::Irecv(&(static_cast<su2double*>(bufRecv)[offset]),
6868  count, MPI_DOUBLE, source, tag, MPI_COMM_WORLD,
6869  &(recvReq[iMessage]));
6870  break;
6871  case COMM_TYPE_UNSIGNED_LONG:
6872  SU2_MPI::Irecv(&(static_cast<unsigned long*>(bufRecv)[offset]),
6873  count, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, source, tag, MPI_COMM_WORLD,
6874  &(recvReq[iMessage]));
6875  break;
6876  case COMM_TYPE_LONG:
6877  SU2_MPI::Irecv(&(static_cast<long*>(bufRecv)[offset]),
6878  count, MPI_LONG, source, tag, MPI_COMM_WORLD,
6879  &(recvReq[iMessage]));
6880  break;
6881  case COMM_TYPE_UNSIGNED_SHORT:
6882  SU2_MPI::Irecv(&(static_cast<unsigned short*>(bufRecv)[offset]),
6883  count, MPI_UNSIGNED_SHORT, source, tag, MPI_COMM_WORLD,
6884  &(recvReq[iMessage]));
6885  break;
6886  case COMM_TYPE_CHAR:
6887  SU2_MPI::Irecv(&(static_cast<char*>(bufRecv)[offset]),
6888  count, MPI_CHAR, source, tag, MPI_COMM_WORLD,
6889  &(recvReq[iMessage]));
6890  break;
6891  case COMM_TYPE_SHORT:
6892  SU2_MPI::Irecv(&(static_cast<short*>(bufRecv)[offset]),
6893  count, MPI_SHORT, source, tag, MPI_COMM_WORLD,
6894  &(recvReq[iMessage]));
6895  break;
6896  case COMM_TYPE_INT:
6897  SU2_MPI::Irecv(&(static_cast<int*>(bufRecv)[offset]),
6898  count, MPI_INT, source, tag, MPI_COMM_WORLD,
6899  &(recvReq[iMessage]));
6900  break;
6901  default:
6902  break;
6903  }
6904 
6905  /*--- Increment message counter. ---*/
6906 
6907  iMessage++;
6908 
6909  }
6910  }
6911 
6912  /*--- Launch the non-blocking sends next. ---*/
6913 
6914  iMessage = 0;
6915  for (iProc = 0; iProc < size; iProc++) {
6916 
6917  /*--- Post sends only if we are sending another proc data. We do
6918  not communicate with ourselves or post sends for zero length
6919  messages to keep overhead down. ---*/
6920 
6921  if ((nElemSend[iProc+1] > nElemSend[iProc]) && (iProc != rank)) {
6922 
6923  /*--- Compute our location in the send buffer. ---*/
6924 
6925  offset = countPerElem*nElemSend[iProc];
6926 
6927  /*--- Take advantage of cumulative storage format to get the number
6928  of elems that we need to send. ---*/
6929 
6930  nElem = nElemSend[iProc+1] - nElemSend[iProc];
6931 
6932  /*--- Total count can include multiple pieces of data per element. ---*/
6933 
6934  count = countPerElem*nElem;
6935 
6936  /*--- Post non-blocking send for this proc. ---*/
6937 
6938  dest = iProc; tag = rank + 1;
6939 
6940  switch (commType) {
6941  case COMM_TYPE_DOUBLE:
6942  SU2_MPI::Isend(&(static_cast<su2double*>(bufSend)[offset]),
6943  count, MPI_DOUBLE, dest, tag, MPI_COMM_WORLD,
6944  &(sendReq[iMessage]));
6945  break;
6946  case COMM_TYPE_UNSIGNED_LONG:
6947  SU2_MPI::Isend(&(static_cast<unsigned long*>(bufSend)[offset]),
6948  count, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, dest, tag, MPI_COMM_WORLD,
6949  &(sendReq[iMessage]));
6950  break;
6951  case COMM_TYPE_LONG:
6952  SU2_MPI::Isend(&(static_cast<long*>(bufSend)[offset]),
6953  count, MPI_LONG, dest, tag, MPI_COMM_WORLD,
6954  &(sendReq[iMessage]));
6955  break;
6956  case COMM_TYPE_UNSIGNED_SHORT:
6957  SU2_MPI::Isend(&(static_cast<unsigned short*>(bufSend)[offset]),
6958  count, MPI_UNSIGNED_SHORT, dest, tag, MPI_COMM_WORLD,
6959  &(sendReq[iMessage]));
6960  break;
6961  case COMM_TYPE_CHAR:
6962  SU2_MPI::Isend(&(static_cast<char*>(bufSend)[offset]),
6963  count, MPI_CHAR, dest, tag, MPI_COMM_WORLD,
6964  &(sendReq[iMessage]));
6965  break;
6966  case COMM_TYPE_SHORT:
6967  SU2_MPI::Isend(&(static_cast<short*>(bufSend)[offset]),
6968  count, MPI_SHORT, dest, tag, MPI_COMM_WORLD,
6969  &(sendReq[iMessage]));
6970  break;
6971  case COMM_TYPE_INT:
6972  SU2_MPI::Isend(&(static_cast<int*>(bufSend)[offset]),
6973  count, MPI_INT, dest, tag, MPI_COMM_WORLD,
6974  &(sendReq[iMessage]));
6975  break;
6976  default:
6977  break;
6978  }
6979 
6980  /*--- Increment message counter. ---*/
6981 
6982  iMessage++;
6983 
6984  }
6985  }
6986 
6987 }
6988 
6989 void CPhysicalGeometry::CompleteCommsAll(int nSends,
6990  SU2_MPI::Request *sendReq,
6991  int nRecvs,
6992  SU2_MPI::Request *recvReq) {
6993 
6994  /*--- Local variables ---*/
6995 
6996  int ind, iSend, iRecv;
6997  SU2_MPI::Status status;
6998 
6999  /*--- Wait for the non-blocking sends to complete. ---*/
7000 
7001  for (iSend = 0; iSend < nSends; iSend++)
7002  SU2_MPI::Waitany(nSends, sendReq, &ind, &status);
7003 
7004  /*--- Wait for the non-blocking recvs to complete. ---*/
7005 
7006  for (iRecv = 0; iRecv < nRecvs; iRecv++)
7007  SU2_MPI::Waitany(nRecvs, recvReq, &ind, &status);
7008 
7009 }
7010 
7011 void CPhysicalGeometry::PrepareOffsets(unsigned long val_npoint_global) {
7012 
7013  /*--- Compute the number of points that will be on each processor.
7014  This is a linear partitioning with the addition of a simple load
7015  balancing for any remainder points. ---*/
7016 
7017  if (beg_node == NULL) beg_node = new unsigned long[size];
7018  if (end_node == NULL) end_node = new unsigned long[size];
7019 
7020  if (nPointLinear == NULL) nPointLinear = new unsigned long[size];
7021  if (nPointCumulative == NULL) nPointCumulative = new unsigned long[size+1];
7022 
7023  unsigned long quotient = val_npoint_global/size;
7024  int remainder = int(val_npoint_global%size);
7025  for (int ii = 0; ii < size; ii++) {
7026  nPointLinear[ii] = quotient + int(ii < remainder);
7027  }
7028 
7029  /*--- Store the local number of nodes on each proc in the linear
7030  partitioning, the beginning/end index, and the linear partitioning
7031  within an array in cumulative storage format. ---*/
7032 
7033  beg_node[0] = 0;
7034  end_node[0] = beg_node[0] + nPointLinear[0];
7035  nPointCumulative[0] = 0;
7036  for (int iProc = 1; iProc < size; iProc++) {
7037  beg_node[iProc] = end_node[iProc-1];
7038  end_node[iProc] = beg_node[iProc] + nPointLinear[iProc];
7039  nPointCumulative[iProc] = nPointCumulative[iProc-1] + nPointLinear[iProc-1];
7040  }
7041  nPointCumulative[size] = val_npoint_global;
7042 
7043 }
7044 
7045 unsigned long CPhysicalGeometry::GetLinearPartition(unsigned long val_global_index) {
7046 
7047  unsigned long iProcessor = 0;
7048 
7049  /*--- Initial guess ---*/
7050 
7051  iProcessor = val_global_index/nPointLinear[0];
7052 
7053  /*--- Guard against going over size. ---*/
7054 
7055  if (iProcessor >= (unsigned long)size)
7056  iProcessor = (unsigned long)size-1;
7057 
7058  /*--- Move up or down until we find the processor. ---*/
7059 
7060  if (val_global_index >= nPointCumulative[iProcessor])
7061  while(val_global_index >= nPointCumulative[iProcessor+1])
7062  iProcessor++;
7063  else
7064  while(val_global_index < nPointCumulative[iProcessor])
7065  iProcessor--;
7066 
7067  return iProcessor;
7068 
7069 }
7070 
7071 void CPhysicalGeometry::SortAdjacency(CConfig *config) {
7072 
7073 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
7074 #ifdef HAVE_PARMETIS
7075 
7076  if ((rank == MASTER_NODE) && (size > SINGLE_NODE))
7077  cout << "Executing the partitioning functions." << endl;
7078 
7079  /*--- Post process the adjacency information in order to get it into the
7080  CSR format before sending the data to ParMETIS. We need to remove
7081  repeats and adjust the size of the array for each local node. ---*/
7082 
7083  if ((rank == MASTER_NODE) && (size > SINGLE_NODE))
7084  cout << "Building the graph adjacency structure." << endl;
7085 
7086  /*--- Create a partitioner object so we can transform the global
7087  index values stored in the elements to a local index. ---*/
7088 
7089  CLinearPartitioner pointPartitioner(Global_nPointDomain,0);
7090 
7091  /*--- We can already create the array that indexes the adjacency. ---*/
7092 
7093  if (xadj == NULL) xadj = new idx_t[pointPartitioner.GetSizeOnRank(rank)+1];
7094  xadj[0] = 0;
7095 
7096  /*--- Here, we transfer the adjacency information from a multi-dim vector
7097  on a node-by-node basis into a single vector container. First, we sort
7098  the entries and remove the duplicates we find for each node, then we
7099  copy it into the single vect and clear memory from the multi-dim vec. ---*/
7100 
7101  unsigned long total_adj_size = 0;
7102  vector<unsigned long>::iterator it;
7103  for (unsigned long iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
7104 
7105  /*--- For each point, sort the adjacency in ascending order
7106  so that we can remove duplicates and complete the size for
7107  unique set of adjacent nodes for that point. ---*/
7108 
7109  sort(adj_nodes[iPoint].begin(), adj_nodes[iPoint].end());
7110  it = unique(adj_nodes[iPoint].begin(), adj_nodes[iPoint].end());
7111  const unsigned long local_size = it - adj_nodes[iPoint].begin();
7112  adj_nodes[iPoint].resize(local_size);
7113  total_adj_size += local_size;
7114 
7115  }
7116 
7117  /*--- Now that we know the size, create the final adjacency array. This
7118  is the array that we will feed to ParMETIS for partitioning. ---*/
7119 
7120  if (adjacency == NULL) adjacency = new idx_t[total_adj_size];
7121 
7122  unsigned long kPoint = 0;
7123  for (unsigned long iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
7124 
7125  /*--- Local size of the adjacency for the current point. ---*/
7126 
7127  const unsigned long local_size = adj_nodes[iPoint].size();
7128 
7129  /*--- Move the sorted adjacency into a 1-D vector for all
7130  points for loading into ParMETIS for partitioning next. ---*/
7131 
7132  for (unsigned long jPoint = 0; jPoint < local_size; jPoint++) {
7133  adjacency[kPoint] = (idx_t)adj_nodes[iPoint][jPoint]; kPoint++;
7134  }
7135 
7136  /*--- Increment the starting index for the next point (CSR). ---*/
7137 
7138  xadj[iPoint+1] = xadj[iPoint] + local_size;
7139 
7140  /*--- Free vector memory as we go. ---*/
7141 
7142  vector<unsigned long>().swap(adj_nodes[iPoint]);
7143 
7144  }
7145 
7146  /*--- Force free the entire old multi-dim. adjacency vector. ---*/
7147 
7148  vector< vector<unsigned long> >().swap(adj_nodes);
7149 
7150 #endif
7151 #endif
7152 
7153 }
7154 
7155 void CPhysicalGeometry::SetSendReceive(CConfig *config) {
7156 
7157  unsigned short Counter_Send, Counter_Receive, iMarkerSend, iMarkerReceive;
7158  unsigned long iVertex, LocalNode;
7159  unsigned short nMarker_Max = config->GetnMarker_Max();
7160  unsigned long iPoint, jPoint, iElem, nDomain, iDomain, jDomain;
7161  unsigned long *nVertexDomain = new unsigned long[nMarker_Max];
7162  unsigned short iNode, jNode;
7163  vector<unsigned long>::iterator it;
7164 
7165  vector<vector<unsigned long> > SendTransfLocal;
7166  vector<vector<unsigned long> > ReceivedTransfLocal;
7167  vector<vector<unsigned long> > SendDomainLocal;
7168  vector<vector<unsigned long> > ReceivedDomainLocal;
7170  map<unsigned long, unsigned long>::const_iterator MI;
7171 
7172  if (rank == MASTER_NODE && size > SINGLE_NODE)
7173  cout << "Establishing MPI communication patterns." << endl;
7174 
7175  nDomain = size;
7176 
7177  SendTransfLocal.resize(nDomain);
7178  ReceivedTransfLocal.resize(nDomain);
7179  SendDomainLocal.resize(nDomain);
7180  ReceivedDomainLocal.resize(nDomain);
7181 
7182  /*--- Loop over the all the points of the elements on this rank in order
7183  to find the points with different colors. Create the send/received lists
7184  from this information. ---*/
7185 
7186  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nElem; iElem++) {
7187  for (iNode = 0; iNode < elem[iElem]->GetnNodes(); iNode++) {
7188 
7189  iPoint = elem[iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
7190  iDomain = node[iPoint]->GetColor();
7191 
7192  if (iDomain == (unsigned long) rank) {
7193  for (jNode = 0; jNode < elem[iElem]->GetnNodes(); jNode++) {
7194 
7195  jPoint = elem[iElem]->GetNode(jNode);
7196  jDomain = node[jPoint]->GetColor();
7197 
7198  /*--- If one of the neighbors is a different color and connected
7199  by an edge, then we add them to the list. ---*/
7200 
7201  if (iDomain != jDomain) {
7202 
7203  /*--- We send from iDomain to jDomain the value of iPoint,
7204  we save the global value becuase we need to sort the lists. ---*/
7205 
7206  SendDomainLocal[jDomain].push_back(Local_to_Global_Point[iPoint]);
7207 
7208  /*--- We send from jDomain to iDomain the value of jPoint,
7209  we save the global value becuase we need to sort the lists. ---*/
7210 
7211  ReceivedDomainLocal[jDomain].push_back(Local_to_Global_Point[jPoint]);
7212 
7213  }
7214  }
7215  }
7216  }
7217  }
7218 
7219  /*--- Sort the points that must be sent and delete repeated points, note
7220  that the sorting should be done with the global index (not the local). ---*/
7221 
7222  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) {
7223  sort(SendDomainLocal[iDomain].begin(), SendDomainLocal[iDomain].end());
7224  it = unique(SendDomainLocal[iDomain].begin(), SendDomainLocal[iDomain].end());
7225  SendDomainLocal[iDomain].resize(it - SendDomainLocal[iDomain].begin());
7226  }
7227 
7228  /*--- Sort the points that must be received and delete repeated points, note
7229  that the sorting should be done with the global point (not the local). ---*/
7230 
7231  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) {
7232  sort(ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain].begin(), ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain].end());
7233  it = unique( ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain].begin(), ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain].end());
7234  ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain].resize(it - ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain].begin());
7235  }
7236 
7237  /*--- Create Global to Local Point array, note that the array is smaller (Max_GlobalPoint) than the total
7238  number of points in the simulation ---*/
7239  Max_GlobalPoint = 0;
7240  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
7241  if (Local_to_Global_Point[iPoint] > (long)Max_GlobalPoint)
7242  Max_GlobalPoint = Local_to_Global_Point[iPoint];
7243  }
7244 
7245  /*--- Set the value of some of the points ---*/
7246  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++)
7247  Global_to_Local_Point[Local_to_Global_Point[iPoint]] = iPoint;
7248 
7249  /*--- Add the new MPI send boundaries, reset the transformation,
7250  and save the local value. ---*/
7251 
7252  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) {
7253  if (SendDomainLocal[iDomain].size() != 0) {
7254  nVertexDomain[nMarker] = SendDomainLocal[iDomain].size();
7255  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexDomain[nMarker]; iVertex++) {
7256 
7257  MI = Global_to_Local_Point.find(SendDomainLocal[iDomain][iVertex]);
7258  if (MI != Global_to_Local_Point.end())
7259  iPoint = Global_to_Local_Point[SendDomainLocal[iDomain][iVertex]];
7260  else iPoint = -1;
7261 
7262  SendDomainLocal[iDomain][iVertex] = iPoint;
7263  SendTransfLocal[iDomain].push_back(0);
7264  }
7265  nElem_Bound[nMarker] = nVertexDomain[nMarker];
7266  bound[nMarker] = new CPrimalGrid*[nElem_Bound[nMarker]];
7267  nMarker++;
7268  }
7269  }
7270 
7271  /*--- Add the new MPI receive boundaries, reset the transformation, and save the local value ---*/
7272  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) {
7273  if (ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain].size() != 0) {
7274  nVertexDomain[nMarker] = ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain].size();
7275  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexDomain[nMarker]; iVertex++) {
7276 
7277  MI = Global_to_Local_Point.find(ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain][iVertex]);
7278  if (MI != Global_to_Local_Point.end())
7279  iPoint = Global_to_Local_Point[ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain][iVertex]];
7280  else iPoint = -1;
7281 
7282  ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain][iVertex] = iPoint;
7283  ReceivedTransfLocal[iDomain].push_back(0);
7284  }
7285  nElem_Bound[nMarker] = nVertexDomain[nMarker];
7286  bound[nMarker] = new CPrimalGrid*[nElem_Bound[nMarker]];
7287  nMarker++;
7288  }
7289  }
7290 
7291  /*--- First compute the Send/Receive boundaries ---*/
7292  Counter_Send = 0; Counter_Receive = 0;
7293  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++)
7294  if (SendDomainLocal[iDomain].size() != 0) Counter_Send++;
7295 
7296  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++)
7297  if (ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain].size() != 0) Counter_Receive++;
7298 
7299  iMarkerSend = nMarker - Counter_Send - Counter_Receive;
7300  iMarkerReceive = nMarker - Counter_Receive;
7301 
7302  /*--- First we do the send ---*/
7303  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) {
7304  if (SendDomainLocal[iDomain].size() != 0) {
7305  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < GetnElem_Bound(iMarkerSend); iVertex++) {
7306  LocalNode = SendDomainLocal[iDomain][iVertex];
7307  bound[iMarkerSend][iVertex] = new CVertexMPI(LocalNode, nDim);
7308  bound[iMarkerSend][iVertex]->SetRotation_Type(SendTransfLocal[iDomain][iVertex]);
7309  }
7310  Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarkerSend] = iDomain+1;
7311  iMarkerSend++;
7312  }
7313  }
7314 
7315  /*--- Second we do the receive ---*/
7316  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) {
7317  if (ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain].size() != 0) {
7318  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < GetnElem_Bound(iMarkerReceive); iVertex++) {
7319  LocalNode = ReceivedDomainLocal[iDomain][iVertex];
7320  bound[iMarkerReceive][iVertex] = new CVertexMPI(LocalNode, nDim);
7321  bound[iMarkerReceive][iVertex]->SetRotation_Type(ReceivedTransfLocal[iDomain][iVertex]);
7322  }
7323  Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarkerReceive] = -(iDomain+1);
7324  iMarkerReceive++;
7325  }
7326  }
7327 
7328  /*--- Free memory ---*/
7329 
7330  delete [] nVertexDomain;
7331 
7332 }
7333 
7334 void CPhysicalGeometry::SetBoundaries(CConfig *config) {
7335 
7336  unsigned long iElem_Bound, TotalElem, *nElem_Bound_Copy, iVertex_;
7337  string Grid_Marker;
7338  unsigned short iDomain, nDomain, iMarkersDomain, iLoop, *DomainCount, nMarker_Physical, Duplicate_SendReceive, *DomainSendCount, **DomainSendMarkers, *DomainReceiveCount, **DomainReceiveMarkers, nMarker_SendRecv, iMarker, iMarker_;
7339  CPrimalGrid*** bound_Copy;
7340  short *Marker_All_SendRecv_Copy;
7341  bool CheckStart;
7342 
7343  nDomain = size+1;
7344 
7345  /*--- Count the number of physical markers
7346  in the boundaries ---*/
7347 
7348  nMarker_Physical = 0;
7349  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
7350  if (bound[iMarker][0]->GetVTK_Type() != VERTEX) {
7351  nMarker_Physical++;
7352  }
7353  }
7354 
7355  /*--- Identify if there are markers that send/received with the same domain,
7356  they should be together---*/
7357 
7358  Duplicate_SendReceive = 0;
7359  for (iLoop = 0; iLoop < 2; iLoop++) {
7360 
7361  DomainCount = new unsigned short [nDomain];
7362 
7363  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++)
7364  DomainCount[iDomain] = 0;
7365 
7366  if (iLoop == 0) {
7367  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++)
7368  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++)
7369  if (bound[iMarker][0]->GetVTK_Type() == VERTEX)
7370  if (Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker] == iDomain) DomainCount[iDomain]++;
7371  }
7372  else {
7373  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++)
7374  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++)
7375  if (bound[iMarker][0]->GetVTK_Type() == VERTEX)
7376  if (Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker] == -iDomain) DomainCount[iDomain]++;
7377  }
7378 
7379  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++)
7380  if (DomainCount[iDomain] > 1) Duplicate_SendReceive++;
7381 
7382  delete [] DomainCount;
7383 
7384  }
7385 
7386  DomainSendCount = new unsigned short [nDomain];
7387  DomainSendMarkers = new unsigned short *[nDomain];
7388  DomainReceiveCount = new unsigned short [nDomain];
7389  DomainReceiveMarkers = new unsigned short *[nDomain];
7390 
7391  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) {
7392  DomainSendCount[iDomain] = 0;
7393  DomainSendMarkers[iDomain] = new unsigned short [nMarker];
7394 
7395  DomainReceiveCount[iDomain] = 0;
7396  DomainReceiveMarkers[iDomain] = new unsigned short [nMarker];
7397  }
7398 
7399  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) {
7400  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
7401  if (bound[iMarker][0]->GetVTK_Type() == VERTEX) {
7402  if (Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker] == iDomain) {
7403  DomainSendMarkers[iDomain][DomainSendCount[iDomain]] = iMarker;
7404  DomainSendCount[iDomain]++;
7405  }
7406  if (Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker] == -iDomain) {
7407  DomainReceiveMarkers[iDomain][DomainReceiveCount[iDomain]] = iMarker;
7408  DomainReceiveCount[iDomain]++;
7409  }
7410  }
7411  }
7412  }
7413 
7414  /*--- Create an structure to store the Send/Receive
7415  boundaries, because they require some reorganization ---*/
7416 
7417  nMarker_SendRecv = nMarker - nMarker_Physical - Duplicate_SendReceive;
7418  bound_Copy = new CPrimalGrid**[nMarker_Physical + nMarker_SendRecv];
7419  nElem_Bound_Copy = new unsigned long [nMarker_Physical + nMarker_SendRecv];
7420  Marker_All_SendRecv_Copy = new short [nMarker_Physical + nMarker_SendRecv];
7421  iMarker_ = nMarker_Physical;
7422  iVertex_ = 0;
7423  CheckStart = false;
7424 
7425  /*--- Copy and allocate the physical markers in the data structure ---*/
7426 
7427  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
7428  if (bound[iMarker][0]->GetVTK_Type() != VERTEX) {
7429 
7430  nElem_Bound_Copy[iMarker] = nElem_Bound[iMarker];
7431  bound_Copy[iMarker] = new CPrimalGrid* [nElem_Bound[iMarker]];
7432 
7433  for (iElem_Bound = 0; iElem_Bound < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem_Bound++) {
7434  if (bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetVTK_Type() == LINE)
7435  bound_Copy[iMarker][iElem_Bound] = new CLine(bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(0),
7436  bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(1), 2);
7437  if (bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetVTK_Type() == TRIANGLE)
7438 
7439  bound_Copy[iMarker][iElem_Bound] = new CTriangle(bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(0),
7440  bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(1),
7441  bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(2), 3);
7442  if (bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetVTK_Type() == QUADRILATERAL)
7443  bound_Copy[iMarker][iElem_Bound] = new CQuadrilateral(bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(0),
7444  bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(1),
7445  bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(2),
7446  bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(3), 3);
7447  }
7448  }
7449  }
7450 
7451 
7452  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++) {
7453 
7454  /*--- Compute the total number of elements (adding all the
7455  boundaries with the same Send/Receive ---*/
7456 
7457  if (DomainSendCount[iDomain] != 0) {
7458  TotalElem = 0;
7459  for (iMarkersDomain = 0; iMarkersDomain < DomainSendCount[iDomain]; iMarkersDomain++) {
7460  iMarker = DomainSendMarkers[iDomain][iMarkersDomain];
7461  TotalElem += nElem_Bound[iMarker];
7462  }
7463  if (CheckStart) iMarker_++;
7464  CheckStart = true;
7465  iVertex_ = 0;
7466  nElem_Bound_Copy[iMarker_] = TotalElem;
7467  bound_Copy[iMarker_] = new CPrimalGrid*[TotalElem];
7468  }
7469 
7470  for (iMarkersDomain = 0; iMarkersDomain < DomainSendCount[iDomain]; iMarkersDomain++) {
7471  iMarker = DomainSendMarkers[iDomain][iMarkersDomain];
7472  Marker_All_SendRecv_Copy[iMarker_] = Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker];
7473 
7474  for (iElem_Bound = 0; iElem_Bound < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem_Bound++) {
7475  bound_Copy[iMarker_][iVertex_] = new CVertexMPI(bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(0), nDim);
7476  bound_Copy[iMarker_][iVertex_]->SetRotation_Type(bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetRotation_Type());
7477  iVertex_++;
7478  }
7479 
7480  }
7481 
7482  /*--- Compute the total number of elements (adding all the
7483  boundaries with the same Send/Receive ---*/
7484 
7485  if (DomainReceiveCount[iDomain] != 0) {
7486  TotalElem = 0;
7487  for (iMarkersDomain = 0; iMarkersDomain < DomainReceiveCount[iDomain]; iMarkersDomain++) {
7488  iMarker = DomainReceiveMarkers[iDomain][iMarkersDomain];
7489  TotalElem += nElem_Bound[iMarker];
7490  }
7491  if (CheckStart) iMarker_++;
7492  CheckStart = true;
7493  iVertex_ = 0;
7494  nElem_Bound_Copy[iMarker_] = TotalElem;
7495  bound_Copy[iMarker_] = new CPrimalGrid*[TotalElem];
7496 
7497  }
7498 
7499  for (iMarkersDomain = 0; iMarkersDomain < DomainReceiveCount[iDomain]; iMarkersDomain++) {
7500  iMarker = DomainReceiveMarkers[iDomain][iMarkersDomain];
7501  Marker_All_SendRecv_Copy[iMarker_] = Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker];
7502 
7503  for (iElem_Bound = 0; iElem_Bound < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem_Bound++) {
7504  bound_Copy[iMarker_][iVertex_] = new CVertexMPI(bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(0), nDim);
7505  bound_Copy[iMarker_][iVertex_]->SetRotation_Type(bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetRotation_Type());
7506  iVertex_++;
7507  }
7508 
7509  }
7510 
7511  }
7512 
7513  delete [] DomainSendCount;
7514  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++)
7515  delete [] DomainSendMarkers[iDomain];
7516  delete[] DomainSendMarkers;
7517 
7518  delete [] DomainReceiveCount;
7519  for (iDomain = 0; iDomain < nDomain; iDomain++)
7520  delete [] DomainReceiveMarkers[iDomain];
7521  delete[] DomainReceiveMarkers;
7522 
7523  /*--- Deallocate the bound variables ---*/
7524 
7525  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
7526  for (iElem_Bound = 0; iElem_Bound < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem_Bound++)
7527  if (bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound] != NULL) delete bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound];
7528  if (bound[iMarker] != NULL) delete [] bound[iMarker];
7529  }
7530  if (bound != NULL) delete [] bound;
7531 
7532  /*--- Allocate the new bound variables, and set the number of markers ---*/
7533 
7534  bound = bound_Copy;
7535  nMarker = nMarker_Physical + nMarker_SendRecv;
7536 
7537  config->SetnMarker_All(nMarker);
7538 
7539  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
7540  nElem_Bound[iMarker] = nElem_Bound_Copy[iMarker];
7541  }
7542 
7543  for (iMarker = nMarker_Physical; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
7544  Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker] = Marker_All_SendRecv_Copy[iMarker];
7545  config->SetMarker_All_SendRecv(iMarker, Marker_All_SendRecv[iMarker]);
7546  config->SetMarker_All_TagBound(iMarker, "SEND_RECEIVE");
7547  }
7548 
7549  /*--- Update config information storing the boundary information in the right place ---*/
7550 
7551  for (iMarker = 0 ; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
7552 
7553  string Marker_Tag = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(iMarker);
7554 
7555  if (Marker_Tag != "SEND_RECEIVE") {
7556 
7557  /*--- Update config information storing the boundary information in the right place ---*/
7558 
7559  Tag_to_Marker[config->GetMarker_CfgFile_TagBound(Marker_Tag)] = Marker_Tag;
7560  config->SetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_KindBC(Marker_Tag));
7561  config->SetMarker_All_Monitoring(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Monitoring(Marker_Tag));
7562  config->SetMarker_All_GeoEval(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_GeoEval(Marker_Tag));
7563  config->SetMarker_All_Designing(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Designing(Marker_Tag));
7564  config->SetMarker_All_Plotting(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Plotting(Marker_Tag));
7565  config->SetMarker_All_Analyze(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Analyze(Marker_Tag));
7566  config->SetMarker_All_ZoneInterface(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_ZoneInterface(Marker_Tag));
7567  config->SetMarker_All_DV(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_DV(Marker_Tag));
7568  config->SetMarker_All_Moving(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Moving(Marker_Tag));
7569  config->SetMarker_All_Deform_Mesh(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Deform_Mesh(Marker_Tag));
7570  config->SetMarker_All_Fluid_Load(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Fluid_Load(Marker_Tag));
7571  config->SetMarker_All_PyCustom(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_PyCustom(Marker_Tag));
7572  config->SetMarker_All_PerBound(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_PerBound(Marker_Tag));
7573  config->SetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Turbomachinery(Marker_Tag));
7574  config->SetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_TurbomachineryFlag(Marker_Tag));
7575  config->SetMarker_All_MixingPlaneInterface(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_MixingPlaneInterface(Marker_Tag));
7576  }
7577 
7578  /*--- Send-Receive boundaries definition ---*/
7579 
7580  else {
7581 
7582  config->SetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker, SEND_RECEIVE);
7583  config->SetMarker_All_Monitoring(iMarker, NO);
7584  config->SetMarker_All_GeoEval(iMarker, NO);
7585  config->SetMarker_All_Designing(iMarker, NO);
7586  config->SetMarker_All_Plotting(iMarker, NO);
7587  config->SetMarker_All_Analyze(iMarker, NO);
7588  config->SetMarker_All_ZoneInterface(iMarker, NO);
7589  config->SetMarker_All_DV(iMarker, NO);
7590  config->SetMarker_All_Moving(iMarker, NO);
7591  config->SetMarker_All_Deform_Mesh(iMarker, NO);
7592  config->SetMarker_All_Fluid_Load(iMarker, NO);
7593  config->SetMarker_All_PyCustom(iMarker, NO);
7594  config->SetMarker_All_PerBound(iMarker, NO);
7595  config->SetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker, NO);
7596  config->SetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker, NO);
7597  config->SetMarker_All_MixingPlaneInterface(iMarker, NO);
7598 
7599  for (iElem_Bound = 0; iElem_Bound < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem_Bound++) {
7600  if (config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(iMarker) < 0)
7601  node[bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(0)]->SetDomain(false);
7602  }
7603 
7604  }
7605 
7606  /*--- Loop over the surface element to set the boundaries ---*/
7607 
7608  unsigned long Point_Surface, iElem_Surface;
7609  unsigned short iNode_Surface;
7610 
7611  for (iElem_Surface = 0; iElem_Surface < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem_Surface++) {
7612  for (iNode_Surface = 0; iNode_Surface < bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetnNodes(); iNode_Surface++) {
7613  Point_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(iNode_Surface);
7614  node[Point_Surface]->SetBoundary(nMarker);
7615  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != SEND_RECEIVE &&
7616  config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != INTERFACE_BOUNDARY &&
7617  config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != NEARFIELD_BOUNDARY &&
7618  config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != PERIODIC_BOUNDARY)
7619  node[Point_Surface]->SetPhysicalBoundary(true);
7620 
7621  if (config->GetSolid_Wall(iMarker))
7622  node[Point_Surface]->SetSolidBoundary(true);
7623 
7624  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == PERIODIC_BOUNDARY)
7625  node[Point_Surface]->SetPeriodicBoundary(true);
7626  }
7627  }
7628 
7629  }
7630 
7631  delete [] Marker_All_SendRecv_Copy;
7632  delete [] nElem_Bound_Copy;
7633 }
7634 
7635 void CPhysicalGeometry::Read_Mesh_FVM(CConfig *config,
7636  string val_mesh_filename,
7637  unsigned short val_iZone,
7638  unsigned short val_nZone) {
7639 
7640  /*--- Initialize counters for local/global points & elements ---*/
7641 
7642  Global_nPoint = 0; Global_nPointDomain = 0;
7643  Global_nElem = 0; Global_nElemDomain = 0;
7644  nelem_edge = 0; Global_nelem_edge = 0;
7645  nelem_triangle = 0; Global_nelem_triangle = 0;
7646  nelem_quad = 0; Global_nelem_quad = 0;
7647  nelem_tetra = 0; Global_nelem_tetra = 0;
7648  nelem_hexa = 0; Global_nelem_hexa = 0;
7649  nelem_prism = 0; Global_nelem_prism = 0;
7650  nelem_pyramid = 0; Global_nelem_pyramid = 0;
7651 
7652  /*--- Set the zone number from the input value. ---*/
7653 
7654  nZone = val_nZone;
7655 
7656  /*--- Create a mesh reader to read a CGNS grid into linear partitions. ---*/
7657 
7658  unsigned short val_format = config->GetMesh_FileFormat();
7659 
7660  CMeshReaderFVM *MeshFVM = NULL;
7661  switch (val_format) {
7662  case SU2:
7663  MeshFVM = new CSU2ASCIIMeshReaderFVM(config, val_iZone, val_nZone);
7664  break;
7665  case CGNS_GRID:
7666  MeshFVM = new CCGNSMeshReaderFVM(config, val_iZone, val_nZone);
7667  break;
7668  case RECTANGLE:
7669  MeshFVM = new CRectangularMeshReaderFVM(config, val_iZone, val_nZone);
7670  break;
7671  case BOX:
7672  MeshFVM = new CBoxMeshReaderFVM(config, val_iZone, val_nZone);
7673  break;
7674  default:
7675  SU2_MPI::Error("Unrecognized mesh format specified!", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
7676  break;
7677  }
7678 
7679  /*--- Store the dimension of the problem ---*/
7680 
7681  nDim = MeshFVM->GetDimension();
7682  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
7683  if (nDim == 2) cout << "Two dimensional problem." << endl;
7684  if (nDim == 3) cout << "Three dimensional problem." << endl;
7685  }
7686 
7687  /*--- Store the local and global number of nodes for this rank. ---*/
7688 
7689  nPoint = MeshFVM->GetNumberOfLocalPoints();
7690  nPointDomain = MeshFVM->GetNumberOfLocalPoints();
7691  Global_nPoint = MeshFVM->GetNumberOfGlobalPoints();
7692  Global_nPointDomain = MeshFVM->GetNumberOfGlobalPoints();
7693 
7694  if ((rank == MASTER_NODE) && (size > SINGLE_NODE)) {
7695  cout << Global_nPoint << " grid points before partitioning." << endl;
7696  } else if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
7697  cout << Global_nPoint << " grid points." << endl;
7698  }
7699 
7700  /*--- Store the local and global number of interior elements. ---*/
7701 
7702  nElem = MeshFVM->GetNumberOfLocalElements();
7703  Global_nElem = MeshFVM->GetNumberOfGlobalElements();
7704  Global_nElemDomain = MeshFVM->GetNumberOfGlobalElements();
7705 
7706  if ((rank == MASTER_NODE) && (size > SINGLE_NODE)) {
7707  cout << Global_nElem << " volume elements before partitioning." << endl;
7708  } else if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
7709  cout << Global_nElem << " volume elements." << endl;
7710  }
7711 
7712  /*--- Load the grid points, volume elements, and surface elements
7713  from the mesh object into the proper SU2 data structures. ---*/
7714 
7715  LoadLinearlyPartitionedPoints(config, MeshFVM);
7716  LoadLinearlyPartitionedVolumeElements(config, MeshFVM);
7717  LoadUnpartitionedSurfaceElements(config, MeshFVM);
7718 
7719  /*--- Prepare the nodal adjacency structures for ParMETIS. ---*/
7720 
7721  PrepareAdjacency(config);
7722 
7723  /*--- Now that we have loaded all information from the mesh,
7724  delete the mesh reader object. ---*/
7725 
7726  if (MeshFVM != NULL) delete MeshFVM;
7727 
7728 }
7729 
7730 void CPhysicalGeometry::LoadLinearlyPartitionedPoints(CConfig *config,
7731  CMeshReaderFVM *mesh) {
7732 
7733  /*--- Get the linearly partitioned coordinates from the mesh object. ---*/
7734 
7735  const vector<vector<passivedouble> > &gridCoords =
7736  mesh->GetLocalPointCoordinates();
7737 
7738  /*--- Initialize point counts and the grid node data structure. ---*/
7739 
7740  nPointNode = nPoint;
7741  node = new CPoint*[nPoint];
7742 
7743  /*--- Loop over the CGNS grid nodes and load into the SU2 data
7744  structure. Note that since we have performed a linear partitioning
7745  of the grid nodes, we can simply initialize the global index to
7746  the first node that lies on our rank and increment. ---*/
7747 
7748  CLinearPartitioner pointPartitioner(Global_nPointDomain,0);
7749  unsigned long GlobalIndex = pointPartitioner.GetFirstIndexOnRank(rank);
7750  for (unsigned long iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
7751  switch(nDim) {
7752  case 2:
7753  node[iPoint] = new CPoint(gridCoords[0][iPoint],
7754  gridCoords[1][iPoint],
7755  GlobalIndex,
7756  config);
7757  GlobalIndex++;
7758  break;
7759  case 3:
7760  node[iPoint] = new CPoint(gridCoords[0][iPoint],
7761  gridCoords[1][iPoint],
7762  gridCoords[2][iPoint],
7763  GlobalIndex,
7764  config);
7765  GlobalIndex++;
7766  break;
7767  }
7768  }
7769 
7770 }
7771 
7772 void CPhysicalGeometry::LoadLinearlyPartitionedVolumeElements(CConfig *config,
7773  CMeshReaderFVM *mesh) {
7774 
7775  /*--- Reset the global to local element mapping. ---*/
7776 
7777  Global_to_Local_Elem.clear();
7778 
7779  /*--- Get the volume connectivity from the mesh object. ---*/
7780 
7781  const vector<unsigned long> &connElems =
7782  mesh->GetLocalVolumeElementConnectivity();
7783 
7784  /*--- Allocate space for the CGNS interior elements in our SU2 data
7785  structure. Note that we only instantiate our rank's local set. ---*/
7786 
7787  elem = new CPrimalGrid*[nElem];
7788 
7789  /*--- Some temporaries for the loop below. ---*/
7790 
7791  unsigned long Global_Index_Elem = 0, iElem = 0;
7792  vector<unsigned long> connectivity(N_POINTS_HEXAHEDRON);
7793 
7794  /*--- Loop over all of the internal, local volumetric elements. ---*/
7795 
7796  for (unsigned long jElem = 0; jElem < nElem; jElem++) {
7797 
7798  /*--- Get the global ID for this element. This is stored in
7799  the first entry of our connectivity stucture. ---*/
7800 
7801  Global_Index_Elem = connElems[jElem*SU2_CONN_SIZE + 0];
7802 
7803  /*--- Get the VTK type for this element. This is stored in the
7804  second entry of the connectivity structure. ---*/
7805 
7806  int vtk_type = (int)connElems[jElem*SU2_CONN_SIZE + 1];
7807 
7808  /*--- Instantiate this element in the proper SU2 data structure.
7809  During this loop, we also set the global to local element map
7810  for later use and increment the element counts for all types. ---*/
7811 
7812  switch(vtk_type) {
7813 
7814  case TRIANGLE:
7815 
7816  for (unsigned long j = 0; j < N_POINTS_TRIANGLE; j++) {
7817  connectivity[j] = connElems[jElem*SU2_CONN_SIZE + SU2_CONN_SKIP + j];
7818  }
7819  Global_to_Local_Elem[Global_Index_Elem] = iElem;
7820  elem[iElem] = new CTriangle(connectivity[0],
7821  connectivity[1],
7822  connectivity[2], nDim);
7823  iElem++; nelem_triangle++;
7824  break;
7825 
7826  case QUADRILATERAL:
7827 
7828  for (unsigned long j = 0; j < N_POINTS_QUADRILATERAL; j++) {
7829  connectivity[j] = connElems[jElem*SU2_CONN_SIZE + SU2_CONN_SKIP + j];
7830  }
7831  Global_to_Local_Elem[Global_Index_Elem] = iElem;
7832  elem[iElem] = new CQuadrilateral(connectivity[0],
7833  connectivity[1],
7834  connectivity[2],
7835  connectivity[3], nDim);
7836  iElem++; nelem_quad++;
7837  break;
7838 
7839  case TETRAHEDRON:
7840 
7841  for (unsigned long j = 0; j < N_POINTS_TETRAHEDRON; j++) {
7842  connectivity[j] = connElems[jElem*SU2_CONN_SIZE + SU2_CONN_SKIP + j];
7843  }
7844  Global_to_Local_Elem[Global_Index_Elem] = iElem;
7845  elem[iElem] = new CTetrahedron(connectivity[0],
7846  connectivity[1],
7847  connectivity[2],
7848  connectivity[3]);
7849  iElem++; nelem_tetra++;
7850  break;
7851 
7852  case HEXAHEDRON:
7853 
7854  for (unsigned long j = 0; j < N_POINTS_HEXAHEDRON; j++) {
7855  connectivity[j] = connElems[jElem*SU2_CONN_SIZE + SU2_CONN_SKIP + j];
7856  }
7857  Global_to_Local_Elem[Global_Index_Elem] = iElem;
7858  elem[iElem] = new CHexahedron(connectivity[0],
7859  connectivity[1],
7860  connectivity[2],
7861  connectivity[3],
7862  connectivity[4],
7863  connectivity[5],
7864  connectivity[6],
7865  connectivity[7]);
7866  iElem++; nelem_hexa++;
7867  break;
7868 
7869  case PRISM:
7870 
7871  for (unsigned long j = 0; j < N_POINTS_PRISM; j++) {
7872  connectivity[j] = connElems[jElem*SU2_CONN_SIZE + SU2_CONN_SKIP + j];
7873  }
7874  Global_to_Local_Elem[Global_Index_Elem] = iElem;
7875  elem[iElem] = new CPrism(connectivity[0],
7876  connectivity[1],
7877  connectivity[2],
7878  connectivity[3],
7879  connectivity[4],
7880  connectivity[5]);
7881  iElem++; nelem_prism++;
7882  break;
7883 
7884  case PYRAMID:
7885 
7886  for (unsigned long j = 0; j < N_POINTS_PYRAMID; j++) {
7887  connectivity[j] = connElems[jElem*SU2_CONN_SIZE + SU2_CONN_SKIP + j];
7888  }
7889  Global_to_Local_Elem[Global_Index_Elem] = iElem;
7890  elem[iElem] = new CPyramid(connectivity[0],
7891  connectivity[1],
7892  connectivity[2],
7893  connectivity[3],
7894  connectivity[4]);
7895  iElem++; nelem_pyramid++;
7896  break;
7897 
7898  default:
7899  SU2_MPI::Error("Element type not supported!", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
7900  break;
7901  }
7902  }
7903 
7904 
7905  /*--- Reduce the global counts of all element types found in
7906  the CGNS grid with all ranks. ---*/
7907 
7908 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
7909  unsigned long Local_nElemTri = nelem_triangle;
7910  unsigned long Local_nElemQuad = nelem_quad;
7911  unsigned long Local_nElemTet = nelem_tetra;
7912  unsigned long Local_nElemHex = nelem_hexa;
7913  unsigned long Local_nElemPrism = nelem_prism;
7914  unsigned long Local_nElemPyramid = nelem_pyramid;
7915  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Local_nElemTri, &Global_nelem_triangle, 1,
7916  MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
7917  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Local_nElemQuad, &Global_nelem_quad, 1,
7918  MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
7919  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Local_nElemTet, &Global_nelem_tetra, 1,
7920  MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
7921  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Local_nElemHex, &Global_nelem_hexa, 1,
7922  MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
7923  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Local_nElemPrism, &Global_nelem_prism, 1,
7924  MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
7925  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Local_nElemPyramid, &Global_nelem_pyramid, 1,
7926  MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
7927 #else
7928  Global_nelem_triangle = nelem_triangle;
7929  Global_nelem_quad = nelem_quad;
7930  Global_nelem_tetra = nelem_tetra;
7931  Global_nelem_hexa = nelem_hexa;
7932  Global_nelem_prism = nelem_prism;
7933  Global_nelem_pyramid = nelem_pyramid;
7934 #endif
7935 
7936 }
7937 
7938 void CPhysicalGeometry::LoadUnpartitionedSurfaceElements(CConfig *config,
7939  CMeshReaderFVM *mesh) {
7940 
7941  /*--- The master node takes care of loading all markers and
7942  surface elements from the file. This information is later
7943  put into linear partitions to make its redistribution easier
7944  after we call ParMETIS. ---*/
7945 
7946  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
7947 
7948  const vector<string> &sectionNames = mesh->GetMarkerNames();
7949 
7950  /*--- Store the number of markers and print to the screen. ---*/
7951 
7952  nMarker = mesh->GetNumberOfMarkers();
7953  config->SetnMarker_All(nMarker);
7954  cout << nMarker << " surface markers." << endl;
7955 
7956  /*--- Create the data structure for boundary elements. ---*/
7957 
7958  bound = new CPrimalGrid**[nMarker];
7959  nElem_Bound = new unsigned long [nMarker];
7960  Tag_to_Marker = new string [config->GetnMarker_Max()];
7961 
7962  /*--- Set some temporaries for the loop below. ---*/
7963 
7964  int npe, vtk_type;
7965  unsigned long iElem = 0;
7966  vector<unsigned long> connectivity(N_POINTS_HEXAHEDRON);
7967 
7968  /*--- Loop over all sections that we extracted from the CGNS file
7969  that were identified as boundary element sections so that we can
7970  store those elements into our SU2 data structures. ---*/
7971 
7972  for (int iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
7973 
7974  /*--- Initialize some counter variables ---*/
7975 
7976  nelem_edge_bound = 0; nelem_triangle_bound = 0;
7977  nelem_quad_bound = 0; iElem = 0;
7978 
7979  /*--- Get the string name for this marker. ---*/
7980 
7981  string Marker_Tag = sectionNames[iMarker];
7982 
7983  /* Get the marker info and surface connectivity from the mesh object. */
7984 
7985  const unsigned long surfElems =
7986  mesh->GetNumberOfSurfaceElementsForMarker(iMarker);
7987 
7988  const vector<unsigned long> &connElems =
7989  mesh->GetSurfaceElementConnectivityForMarker(iMarker);
7990 
7991  /*--- Set the number of boundary elements in this marker. ---*/
7992 
7993  nElem_Bound[iMarker] = surfElems;
7994 
7995  /*--- Report the number and name of the marker to the console. ---*/
7996 
7997  cout << nElem_Bound[iMarker] << " boundary elements in index ";
7998  cout << iMarker <<" (Marker = " <<Marker_Tag<< ")." << endl;
7999 
8000  /*--- Instantiate the list of elements in the data structure. ---*/
8001 
8002  bound[iMarker] = new CPrimalGrid*[nElem_Bound[iMarker]];
8003 
8004  for (unsigned long jElem = 0; jElem < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; jElem++ ) {
8005 
8006  /*--- Not a mixed section. We already know the element type,
8007  which is stored ---*/
8008 
8009  vtk_type = (int)connElems[jElem*SU2_CONN_SIZE + 1];
8010 
8011  /*--- Store the loop size more easily. ---*/
8012 
8013  npe = (int)(SU2_CONN_SIZE-SU2_CONN_SKIP);
8014 
8015  /*--- Store the nodes for this element more clearly. ---*/
8016 
8017  for (int j = 0; j < npe; j++) {
8018  unsigned long nn = jElem*SU2_CONN_SIZE + SU2_CONN_SKIP + j;
8019  connectivity[j] = connElems[nn];
8020  }
8021 
8022  /*--- Instantiate the boundary element object. ---*/
8023 
8024  switch(vtk_type) {
8025  case LINE:
8026  bound[iMarker][iElem] = new CLine(connectivity[0],
8027  connectivity[1],2);
8028  iElem++; nelem_edge_bound++; break;
8029  case TRIANGLE:
8030  bound[iMarker][iElem] = new CTriangle(connectivity[0],
8031  connectivity[1],
8032  connectivity[2],3);
8033  iElem++; nelem_triangle_bound++; break;
8034  case QUADRILATERAL:
8035  bound[iMarker][iElem] = new CQuadrilateral(connectivity[0],
8036  connectivity[1],
8037  connectivity[2],
8038  connectivity[3],3);
8039  iElem++; nelem_quad_bound++; break;
8040  }
8041 
8042  }
8043 
8044  /*--- Update config file lists in order to store the boundary
8045  information for this marker in the correct place. ---*/
8046 
8047  Tag_to_Marker[config->GetMarker_CfgFile_TagBound(Marker_Tag)] = Marker_Tag;
8048  config->SetMarker_All_TagBound(iMarker, Marker_Tag);
8049  config->SetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_KindBC(Marker_Tag));
8050  config->SetMarker_All_Monitoring(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Monitoring(Marker_Tag));
8051  config->SetMarker_All_GeoEval(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_GeoEval(Marker_Tag));
8052  config->SetMarker_All_Designing(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Designing(Marker_Tag));
8053  config->SetMarker_All_Plotting(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Plotting(Marker_Tag));
8054  config->SetMarker_All_Analyze(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Analyze(Marker_Tag));
8055  config->SetMarker_All_ZoneInterface(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_ZoneInterface(Marker_Tag));
8056  config->SetMarker_All_DV(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_DV(Marker_Tag));
8057  config->SetMarker_All_Moving(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Moving(Marker_Tag));
8058  config->SetMarker_All_Deform_Mesh(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Deform_Mesh(Marker_Tag));
8059  config->SetMarker_All_Fluid_Load(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Fluid_Load(Marker_Tag));
8060  config->SetMarker_All_PyCustom(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_PyCustom(Marker_Tag));
8061  config->SetMarker_All_PerBound(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_PerBound(Marker_Tag));
8062  config->SetMarker_All_SendRecv(iMarker, NONE);
8063  config->SetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_Turbomachinery(Marker_Tag));
8064  config->SetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_TurbomachineryFlag(Marker_Tag));
8065  config->SetMarker_All_MixingPlaneInterface(iMarker, config->GetMarker_CfgFile_MixingPlaneInterface(Marker_Tag));
8066 
8067  }
8068  }
8069 
8070 }
8071 
8072 void CPhysicalGeometry::PrepareAdjacency(CConfig *config) {
8073 
8074 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
8075 #ifdef HAVE_PARMETIS
8076 
8077  /*--- Resize the vector for the adjacency information (ParMETIS). ---*/
8078 
8079  adj_nodes.clear();
8080  adj_nodes.resize(nPoint);
8081  for (unsigned long iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++)
8082  adj_nodes[iPoint].resize(0);
8083 
8084  /*--- Create a partitioner object so we can transform the global
8085  index values stored in the elements to a local index. ---*/
8086 
8087  CLinearPartitioner pointPartitioner(Global_nPointDomain,0);
8088  const unsigned long firstIndex = pointPartitioner.GetFirstIndexOnRank(rank);
8089 
8090  /*--- Loop over all elements that are now loaded and store adjacency. ---*/
8091 
8092  unsigned long connectivity[8] = {0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0};
8093  for (unsigned long iElem = 0; iElem < nElem; iElem++) {
8094 
8095  /*--- Get the VTK type for this element. This is stored in the
8096  first entry of the connectivity structure. ---*/
8097 
8098  unsigned short VTK_Type = elem[iElem]->GetVTK_Type();
8099 
8100  /*--- Instantiate this element and build adjacency structure. ---*/
8101 
8102  switch(VTK_Type) {
8103 
8104  case TRIANGLE:
8105 
8106  /*--- Store the connectivity for this element more easily. ---*/
8107 
8108  for (unsigned long iNode = 0; iNode < N_POINTS_TRIANGLE; iNode++) {
8109  connectivity[iNode] = elem[iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
8110  }
8111 
8112  /*--- Decide whether we need to store the adjacency for any nodes
8113  in the current element, i.e., check if any of the nodes have a
8114  global index value within the range of our linear partitioning. ---*/
8115 
8116  for (unsigned long iNode = 0; iNode < N_POINTS_TRIANGLE; iNode++) {
8117 
8118  const long local_index = connectivity[iNode]-firstIndex;
8119 
8120  if ((local_index >= 0) && (local_index < (long)nPoint)) {
8121 
8122  /*--- This node is within our linear partition.
8123  Add the neighboring nodes to this nodes' adjacency list. ---*/
8124 
8125  for (unsigned long jNode = 0; jNode < N_POINTS_TRIANGLE; jNode++) {
8126 
8127  /*--- Build adjacency assuming the VTK connectivity ---*/
8128 
8129  if (iNode != jNode)
8130  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[jNode]);
8131 
8132  }
8133 
8134  }
8135  }
8136 
8137  break;
8138 
8139  case QUADRILATERAL:
8140 
8141  /*--- Store the connectivity for this element more easily. ---*/
8142 
8143  for (unsigned long iNode = 0; iNode < N_POINTS_QUADRILATERAL; iNode++) {
8144  connectivity[iNode] = elem[iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
8145  }
8146 
8147  /*--- Decide whether we need to store the adjacency for any nodes
8148  in the current element, i.e., check if any of the nodes have a
8149  global index value within the range of our linear partitioning. ---*/
8150 
8151  for (unsigned long iNode = 0; iNode < N_POINTS_QUADRILATERAL; iNode++) {
8152 
8153  const long local_index = connectivity[iNode]-firstIndex;
8154 
8155  if ((local_index >= 0) && (local_index < (long)nPoint)) {
8156 
8157  /*--- This node is within our linear partition.
8158  Add the neighboring nodes to this nodes' adjacency list. ---*/
8159 
8160  /*--- Build adjacency assuming the VTK connectivity ---*/
8161 
8162  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode+1)%4]);
8163  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode+3)%4]);
8164 
8165  }
8166  }
8167 
8168  break;
8169 
8170  case TETRAHEDRON:
8171 
8172  /*--- Store the connectivity for this element more easily. ---*/
8173 
8174  for (unsigned long iNode = 0; iNode < N_POINTS_TETRAHEDRON; iNode++) {
8175  connectivity[iNode] = elem[iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
8176  }
8177 
8178  /*--- Decide whether we need to store the adjacency for any nodes
8179  in the current element, i.e., check if any of the nodes have a
8180  global index value within the range of our linear partitioning. ---*/
8181 
8182  for (unsigned long iNode = 0; iNode < N_POINTS_TETRAHEDRON; iNode++) {
8183 
8184  const long local_index = connectivity[iNode]-firstIndex;
8185 
8186  if ((local_index >= 0) && (local_index < (long)nPoint)) {
8187 
8188  /*--- This node is within our linear partition.
8189  Add the neighboring nodes to this nodes' adjacency list. ---*/
8190 
8191  for (unsigned long jNode = 0; jNode < N_POINTS_TETRAHEDRON; jNode++) {
8192 
8193  /*--- Build adjacency assuming the VTK connectivity ---*/
8194 
8195  if (iNode != jNode)
8196  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[jNode]);
8197 
8198  }
8199 
8200  }
8201  }
8202 
8203  break;
8204 
8205  case HEXAHEDRON:
8206 
8207  /*--- Store the connectivity for this element more easily. ---*/
8208 
8209  for (unsigned long iNode = 0; iNode < N_POINTS_HEXAHEDRON; iNode++) {
8210  connectivity[iNode] = elem[iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
8211  }
8212 
8213  /*--- Decide whether we need to store the adjacency for any nodes
8214  in the current element, i.e., check if any of the nodes have a
8215  global index value within the range of our linear partitioning. ---*/
8216 
8217  for (unsigned long iNode = 0; iNode < N_POINTS_HEXAHEDRON; iNode++) {
8218 
8219  const long local_index = connectivity[iNode]-firstIndex;
8220 
8221  if ((local_index >= 0) && (local_index < (long)nPoint)) {
8222 
8223  /*--- This node is within our linear partition.
8224  Add the neighboring nodes to this nodes' adjacency list. ---*/
8225 
8226  /*--- Build adjacency assuming the VTK connectivity ---*/
8227 
8228  if (iNode < 4) {
8229  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode+1)%4]);
8230  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode+3)%4]);
8231  } else {
8232  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode-3)%4+4]);
8233  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode-1)%4+4]);
8234  }
8235  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode+4)%8]);
8236 
8237  }
8238  }
8239 
8240  break;
8241 
8242  case PRISM:
8243 
8244  /*--- Store the connectivity for this element more easily. ---*/
8245 
8246  for (unsigned long iNode = 0; iNode < N_POINTS_PRISM; iNode++) {
8247  connectivity[iNode] = elem[iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
8248  }
8249 
8250  /*--- Decide whether we need to store the adjacency for any nodes
8251  in the current element, i.e., check if any of the nodes have a
8252  global index value within the range of our linear partitioning. ---*/
8253 
8254  for (unsigned long iNode = 0; iNode < N_POINTS_PRISM; iNode++) {
8255 
8256  const long local_index = connectivity[iNode]-firstIndex;
8257 
8258  if ((local_index >= 0) && (local_index < (long)nPoint)) {
8259 
8260  /*--- This node is within our linear partition.
8261  Add the neighboring nodes to this nodes' adjacency list. ---*/
8262 
8263  /*--- Build adjacency assuming the VTK connectivity ---*/
8264 
8265  if (iNode < 3) {
8266  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode+1)%3]);
8267  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode+2)%3]);
8268  } else {
8269  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode-2)%3+3]);
8270  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode-1)%3+3]);
8271  }
8272  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode+3)%6]);
8273 
8274  }
8275  }
8276 
8277  break;
8278 
8279  case PYRAMID:
8280 
8281 
8282  /*--- Store the connectivity for this element more easily. ---*/
8283 
8284  for (unsigned long iNode = 0; iNode < N_POINTS_PYRAMID; iNode++) {
8285  connectivity[iNode] = elem[iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
8286  }
8287 
8288  /*--- Decide whether we need to store the adjacency for any nodes
8289  in the current element, i.e., check if any of the nodes have a
8290  global index value within the range of our linear partitioning. ---*/
8291 
8292  for (unsigned long iNode = 0; iNode < N_POINTS_PYRAMID; iNode++) {
8293 
8294  const long local_index = connectivity[iNode]-firstIndex;
8295 
8296  if ((local_index >= 0) && (local_index < (long)nPoint)) {
8297 
8298  /*--- This node is within our linear partition.
8299  Add the neighboring nodes to this nodes' adjacency list. ---*/
8300 
8301  /*--- Build adjacency assuming the VTK connectivity ---*/
8302 
8303  if (iNode < 4) {
8304  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode+1)%4]);
8305  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[(iNode+3)%4]);
8306  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[4]);
8307  } else {
8308  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[0]);
8309  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[1]);
8310  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[2]);
8311  adj_nodes[local_index].push_back(connectivity[3]);
8312  }
8313 
8314  }
8315  }
8316 
8317  break;
8318 
8319  default:
8320  SU2_MPI::Error("Element type not supported!", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
8321  break;
8322  }
8323  }
8324 
8325  /*--- Prepare the adjacency information that ParMETIS will need for
8326  completing the graph partitioning in parallel. ---*/
8327 
8328  SortAdjacency(config);
8329 
8330 #endif
8331 #endif
8332 
8333 }
8334 
8335 void CPhysicalGeometry::Check_IntElem_Orientation(CConfig *config) {
8336 
8337  unsigned long Point_1, Point_2, Point_3, Point_4, Point_5, Point_6,
8338  iElem, triangle_flip = 0, quad_flip = 0, tet_flip = 0, prism_flip = 0,
8339  hexa_flip = 0, pyram_flip = 0;
8340  su2double test_1, test_2, test_3, test_4, *Coord_1, *Coord_2, *Coord_3, *Coord_4,
8341  *Coord_5, *Coord_6, a[3] = {0.0,0.0,0.0}, b[3] = {0.0,0.0,0.0}, c[3] = {0.0,0.0,0.0}, n[3] = {0.0,0.0,0.0}, test;
8342  unsigned short iDim;
8343 
8344  /*--- Loop over all the elements ---*/
8345 
8346  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nElem; iElem++) {
8347 
8348  /*--- 2D grid, triangle case ---*/
8349 
8350  if (elem[iElem]->GetVTK_Type() == TRIANGLE) {
8351 
8352  Point_1 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(0); Coord_1 = node[Point_1]->GetCoord();
8353  Point_2 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(1); Coord_2 = node[Point_2]->GetCoord();
8354  Point_3 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(2); Coord_3 = node[Point_3]->GetCoord();
8355 
8356  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
8357  a[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_2[iDim]-Coord_1[iDim]);
8358  b[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_3[iDim]-Coord_1[iDim]); }
8359  test = a[0]*b[1]-b[0]*a[1];
8360 
8361  if (test < 0.0) {
8362  elem[iElem]->Change_Orientation();
8363  triangle_flip++;
8364  }
8365  }
8366 
8367  /*--- 2D grid, quadrilateral case ---*/
8368 
8369  if (elem[iElem]->GetVTK_Type() == QUADRILATERAL) {
8370 
8371  Point_1 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(0); Coord_1 = node[Point_1]->GetCoord();
8372  Point_2 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(1); Coord_2 = node[Point_2]->GetCoord();
8373  Point_3 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(2); Coord_3 = node[Point_3]->GetCoord();
8374  Point_4 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(3); Coord_4 = node[Point_4]->GetCoord();
8375 
8376  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
8377  a[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_2[iDim]-Coord_1[iDim]);
8378  b[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_3[iDim]-Coord_1[iDim]); }
8379  test_1 = a[0]*b[1]-b[0]*a[1];
8380 
8381  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
8382  a[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_3[iDim]-Coord_2[iDim]);
8383  b[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_4[iDim]-Coord_2[iDim]); }
8384  test_2 = a[0]*b[1]-b[0]*a[1];
8385 
8386  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
8387  a[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_4[iDim]-Coord_3[iDim]);
8388  b[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_1[iDim]-Coord_3[iDim]); }
8389  test_3 = a[0]*b[1]-b[0]*a[1];
8390 
8391  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
8392  a[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_1[iDim]-Coord_4[iDim]);
8393  b[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_3[iDim]-Coord_4[iDim]); }
8394  test_4 = a[0]*b[1]-b[0]*a[1];
8395 
8396  if ((test_1 < 0.0) && (test_2 < 0.0) && (test_3 < 0.0) && (test_4 < 0.0)) {
8397  elem[iElem]->Change_Orientation();
8398  quad_flip++;
8399  }
8400  }
8401 
8402  /*--- 3D grid, tetrahedron case ---*/
8403 
8404  if (elem[iElem]->GetVTK_Type() == TETRAHEDRON) {
8405 
8406  Point_1 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(0); Coord_1 = node[Point_1]->GetCoord();
8407  Point_2 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(1); Coord_2 = node[Point_2]->GetCoord();
8408  Point_3 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(2); Coord_3 = node[Point_3]->GetCoord();
8409  Point_4 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(3); Coord_4 = node[Point_4]->GetCoord();
8410 
8411  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
8412  a[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_2[iDim]-Coord_1[iDim]);
8413  b[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_3[iDim]-Coord_1[iDim]);
8414  c[iDim] = Coord_4[iDim]-Coord_1[iDim]; }
8415  n[0] = a[1]*b[2]-b[1]*a[2];
8416  n[1] = -(a[0]*b[2]-b[0]*a[2]);
8417  n[2] = a[0]*b[1]-b[0]*a[1];
8418 
8419  test = n[0]*c[0]+n[1]*c[1]+n[2]*c[2];
8420  if (test < 0.0) {
8421  elem[iElem]->Change_Orientation();
8422  tet_flip++;
8423  }
8424 
8425  }
8426 
8427  /*--- 3D grid, prism case ---*/
8428 
8429  if (elem[iElem]->GetVTK_Type() == PRISM) {
8430 
8431  Point_1 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(0); Coord_1 = node[Point_1]->GetCoord();
8432  Point_2 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(1); Coord_2 = node[Point_2]->GetCoord();
8433  Point_3 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(2); Coord_3 = node[Point_3]->GetCoord();
8434  Point_4 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(3); Coord_4 = node[Point_4]->GetCoord();
8435  Point_5 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(4); Coord_5 = node[Point_5]->GetCoord();
8436  Point_6 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(5); Coord_6 = node[Point_6]->GetCoord();
8437 
8438  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
8439  a[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_3[iDim]-Coord_1[iDim]);
8440  b[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_2[iDim]-Coord_1[iDim]);
8441  c[iDim] = (Coord_4[iDim]-Coord_1[iDim])+
8442  (Coord_5[iDim]-Coord_2[iDim])+
8443  (Coord_6[iDim]-Coord_3[iDim]); }
8444 
8445  /*--- The normal vector should point to the interior of the element ---*/
8446 
8447  n[0] = a[1]*b[2]-b[1]*a[2];
8448  n[1] = -(a[0]*b[2]-b[0]*a[2]);
8449  n[2] = a[0]*b[1]-b[0]*a[1];
8450 
8451  test_1 = n[0]*c[0]+n[1]*c[1]+n[2]*c[2];
8452 
8453  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
8454  a[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_5[iDim]-Coord_4[iDim]);
8455  b[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_6[iDim]-Coord_4[iDim]);
8456  c[iDim] = (Coord_1[iDim]-Coord_4[iDim])+
8457  (Coord_2[iDim]-Coord_5[iDim])+
8458  (Coord_3[iDim]-Coord_6[iDim]); }
8459 
8460  /*--- The normal vector should point to the interior of the element ---*/
8461 
8462  n[0] = a[1]*b[2]-b[1]*a[2];
8463  n[1] = -(a[0]*b[2]-b[0]*a[2]);
8464  n[2] = a[0]*b[1]-b[0]*a[1];
8465 
8466  test_2 = n[0]*c[0]+n[1]*c[1]+n[2]*c[2];
8467 
8468  if ((test_1 < 0.0) || (test_2 < 0.0)) {
8469  elem[iElem]->Change_Orientation();
8470  prism_flip++;
8471  }
8472 
8473  }
8474 
8475  if (elem[iElem]->GetVTK_Type() == HEXAHEDRON) {
8476 
8477  Point_1 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(0); Coord_1 = node[Point_1]->GetCoord();
8478  Point_2 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(1); Coord_2 = node[Point_2]->GetCoord();
8479  Point_3 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(2); Coord_3 = node[Point_3]->GetCoord();
8480  Point_4 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(5); Coord_4 = node[Point_4]->GetCoord();
8481 
8482  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
8483  a[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_2[iDim]-Coord_1[iDim]);
8484  b[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_3[iDim]-Coord_1[iDim]);
8485  c[iDim] = Coord_4[iDim]-Coord_1[iDim]; }
8486  n[0] = a[1]*b[2]-b[1]*a[2];
8487  n[1] = -(a[0]*b[2]-b[0]*a[2]);
8488  n[2] = a[0]*b[1]-b[0]*a[1];
8489 
8490  test_1 = n[0]*c[0]+n[1]*c[1]+n[2]*c[2];
8491 
8492  Point_1 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(2); Coord_1 = node[Point_1]->GetCoord();
8493  Point_2 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(3); Coord_2 = node[Point_2]->GetCoord();
8494  Point_3 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(0); Coord_3 = node[Point_3]->GetCoord();
8495  Point_4 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(7); Coord_4 = node[Point_4]->GetCoord();
8496 
8497  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
8498  a[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_2[iDim]-Coord_1[iDim]);
8499  b[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_3[iDim]-Coord_1[iDim]);
8500  c[iDim] = Coord_4[iDim]-Coord_1[iDim]; }
8501  n[0] = a[1]*b[2]-b[1]*a[2];
8502  n[1] = -(a[0]*b[2]-b[0]*a[2]);
8503  n[2] = a[0]*b[1]-b[0]*a[1];
8504 
8505  test_2 = n[0]*c[0]+n[1]*c[1]+n[2]*c[2];
8506 
8507  Point_1 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(1); Coord_1 = node[Point_1]->GetCoord();
8508  Point_2 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(2); Coord_2 = node[Point_2]->GetCoord();
8509  Point_3 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(3); Coord_3 = node[Point_3]->GetCoord();
8510  Point_4 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(6); Coord_4 = node[Point_4]->GetCoord();
8511 
8512  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
8513  a[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_2[iDim]-Coord_1[iDim]);
8514  b[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_3[iDim]-Coord_1[iDim]);
8515  c[iDim] = Coord_4[iDim]-Coord_1[iDim]; }
8516  n[0] = a[1]*b[2]-b[1]*a[2];
8517  n[1] = -(a[0]*b[2]-b[0]*a[2]);
8518  n[2] = a[0]*b[1]-b[0]*a[1];
8519 
8520  test_3 = n[0]*c[0]+n[1]*c[1]+n[2]*c[2];
8521 
8522  Point_1 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(3); Coord_1 = node[Point_1]->GetCoord();
8523  Point_2 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(0); Coord_2 = node[Point_2]->GetCoord();
8524  Point_3 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(1); Coord_3 = node[Point_3]->GetCoord();
8525  Point_4 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(4); Coord_4 = node[Point_4]->GetCoord();
8526 
8527  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
8528  a[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_2[iDim]-Coord_1[iDim]);
8529  b[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_3[iDim]-Coord_1[iDim]);
8530  c[iDim] = Coord_4[iDim]-Coord_1[iDim]; }
8531  n[0] = a[1]*b[2]-b[1]*a[2];
8532  n[1] = -(a[0]*b[2]-b[0]*a[2]);
8533  n[2] = a[0]*b[1]-b[0]*a[1];
8534 
8535  test_4 = n[0]*c[0]+n[1]*c[1]+n[2]*c[2];
8536 
8537  if ((test_1 < 0.0) || (test_2 < 0.0) || (test_3 < 0.0)
8538  || (test_4 < 0.0)) {
8539  elem[iElem]->Change_Orientation();
8540  hexa_flip++;
8541  }
8542 
8543  }
8544 
8545  if (elem[iElem]->GetVTK_Type() == PYRAMID) {
8546 
8547  Point_1 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(0); Coord_1 = node[Point_1]->GetCoord();
8548  Point_2 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(1); Coord_2 = node[Point_2]->GetCoord();
8549  Point_3 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(2); Coord_3 = node[Point_3]->GetCoord();
8550  Point_4 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(4); Coord_4 = node[Point_4]->GetCoord();
8551 
8552  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
8553  a[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_2[iDim]-Coord_1[iDim]);
8554  b[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_3[iDim]-Coord_1[iDim]);
8555  c[iDim] = Coord_4[iDim]-Coord_1[iDim]; }
8556  n[0] = a[1]*b[2]-b[1]*a[2];
8557  n[1] = -(a[0]*b[2]-b[0]*a[2]);
8558  n[2] = a[0]*b[1]-b[0]*a[1];
8559 
8560  test_1 = n[0]*c[0]+n[1]*c[1]+n[2]*c[2];
8561 
8562  Point_1 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(2); Coord_1 = node[Point_1]->GetCoord();
8563  Point_2 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(3); Coord_2 = node[Point_2]->GetCoord();
8564  Point_3 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(0); Coord_3 = node[Point_3]->GetCoord();
8565  Point_4 = elem[iElem]->GetNode(4); Coord_4 = node[Point_4]->GetCoord();
8566 
8567  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
8568  a[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_2[iDim]-Coord_1[iDim]);
8569  b[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_3[iDim]-Coord_1[iDim]);
8570  c[iDim] = Coord_4[iDim]-Coord_1[iDim]; }
8571  n[0] = a[1]*b[2]-b[1]*a[2];
8572  n[1] = -(a[0]*b[2]-b[0]*a[2]);
8573  n[2] = a[0]*b[1]-b[0]*a[1];
8574 
8575  test_2 = n[0]*c[0]+n[1]*c[1]+n[2]*c[2];
8576 
8577  if ((test_1 < 0.0) || (test_2 < 0.0)) {
8578  elem[iElem]->Change_Orientation();
8579  pyram_flip++;
8580  }
8581 
8582  }
8583 
8584  }
8585 
8586 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
8587  unsigned long Mytriangle_flip = triangle_flip;
8588  unsigned long Myquad_flip = quad_flip;
8589  unsigned long Mytet_flip = tet_flip;
8590  unsigned long Myprism_flip = prism_flip;
8591  unsigned long Myhexa_flip = hexa_flip;
8592  unsigned long Mypyram_flip = pyram_flip;
8593 
8594  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Mytriangle_flip, &triangle_flip, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
8595  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Myquad_flip, &quad_flip, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
8596  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Mytet_flip, &tet_flip, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
8597  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Myprism_flip, &prism_flip, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
8598  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Myhexa_flip, &hexa_flip, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
8599  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Mypyram_flip, &pyram_flip, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
8600 #endif
8601 
8602  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
8603  if (triangle_flip > 0) cout << "There has been a re-orientation of the TRIANGLE volume elements." << endl;
8604  if (quad_flip > 0) cout << "There has been a re-orientation of the QUADRILATERAL volume elements." << endl;
8605  if (tet_flip > 0) cout << "There has been a re-orientation of the TETRAHEDRON volume elements." << endl;
8606  if (prism_flip > 0) cout << "There has been a re-orientation of the PRISM volume elements." << endl;
8607  if (hexa_flip > 0) cout << "There has been a re-orientation of the HEXAHEDRON volume elements." << endl;
8608  if (pyram_flip > 0) cout << "There has been a re-orientation of the PYRAMID volume elements." << endl;
8609  }
8610 
8611 }
8612 
8613 void CPhysicalGeometry::Check_BoundElem_Orientation(CConfig *config) {
8614 
8615  unsigned long Point_1_Surface, Point_2_Surface, Point_3_Surface, Point_4_Surface,
8616  iElem_Domain, Point_Domain = 0, Point_Surface, iElem_Surface,
8617  line_flip = 0, triangle_flip = 0, quad_flip = 0;
8618  su2double test_1, test_2, test_3, test_4, *Coord_1, *Coord_2, *Coord_3, *Coord_4,
8619  *Coord_5, a[3] = {0.0,0.0,0.0}, b[3] = {0.0,0.0,0.0}, c[3] = {0.0,0.0,0.0}, n[3] = {0.0,0.0,0.0}, test;
8620  unsigned short iDim, iMarker, iNode_Domain, iNode_Surface;
8621  bool find;
8622 
8623  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
8624 
8625  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != INTERNAL_BOUNDARY) {
8626 
8627  for (iElem_Surface = 0; iElem_Surface < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem_Surface++) {
8628 
8629  iElem_Domain = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetDomainElement();
8630  for (iNode_Domain = 0; iNode_Domain < elem[iElem_Domain]->GetnNodes(); iNode_Domain++) {
8631  Point_Domain = elem[iElem_Domain]->GetNode(iNode_Domain);
8632  find = false;
8633  for (iNode_Surface = 0; iNode_Surface < bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetnNodes(); iNode_Surface++) {
8634  Point_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(iNode_Surface);
8635  if (Point_Surface == Point_Domain) {find = true; break;}
8636  }
8637  if (!find) break;
8638  }
8639 
8640  /*--- 2D grid, line case ---*/
8641 
8642  if (bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetVTK_Type() == LINE) {
8643 
8644  Point_1_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(0); Coord_1 = node[Point_1_Surface]->GetCoord();
8645  Point_2_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(1); Coord_2 = node[Point_2_Surface]->GetCoord();
8646  Coord_3 = node[Point_Domain]->GetCoord();
8647 
8648  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
8649  a[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_2[iDim]-Coord_1[iDim]);
8650  b[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_3[iDim]-Coord_1[iDim]);
8651  }
8652  test = a[0]*b[1]-b[0]*a[1];
8653 
8654  if (test < 0.0) {
8655  bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->Change_Orientation();
8656  node[Point_1_Surface]->SetFlip_Orientation();
8657  node[Point_2_Surface]->SetFlip_Orientation();
8658  line_flip++;
8659  }
8660 
8661  }
8662 
8663  /*--- 3D grid, triangle case ---*/
8664 
8665  if (bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetVTK_Type() == TRIANGLE) {
8666 
8667  Point_1_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(0); Coord_1 = node[Point_1_Surface]->GetCoord();
8668  Point_2_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(1); Coord_2 = node[Point_2_Surface]->GetCoord();
8669  Point_3_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(2); Coord_3 = node[Point_3_Surface]->GetCoord();
8670  Coord_4 = node[Point_Domain]->GetCoord();
8671 
8672  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
8673  a[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_2[iDim]-Coord_1[iDim]);
8674  b[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_3[iDim]-Coord_1[iDim]);
8675  c[iDim] = Coord_4[iDim]-Coord_1[iDim];
8676  }
8677  n[0] = a[1]*b[2]-b[1]*a[2];
8678  n[1] = -(a[0]*b[2]-b[0]*a[2]);
8679  n[2] = a[0]*b[1]-b[0]*a[1];
8680 
8681  test = n[0]*c[0]+n[1]*c[1]+n[2]*c[2];
8682  if (test < 0.0) {
8683  bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->Change_Orientation();
8684  node[Point_1_Surface]->SetFlip_Orientation();
8685  node[Point_2_Surface]->SetFlip_Orientation();
8686  node[Point_3_Surface]->SetFlip_Orientation();
8687  triangle_flip++;
8688  }
8689 
8690  }
8691 
8692  /*--- 3D grid, rectangle case ---*/
8693
