8694  if (bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetVTK_Type() == QUADRILATERAL) {
8695 
8696  Point_1_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(0); Coord_1 = node[Point_1_Surface]->GetCoord();
8697  Point_2_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(1); Coord_2 = node[Point_2_Surface]->GetCoord();
8698  Point_3_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(2); Coord_3 = node[Point_3_Surface]->GetCoord();
8699  Point_4_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(3); Coord_4 = node[Point_4_Surface]->GetCoord();
8700  Coord_5 = node[Point_Domain]->GetCoord();
8701 
8702  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
8703  a[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_2[iDim]-Coord_1[iDim]);
8704  b[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_3[iDim]-Coord_1[iDim]);
8705  c[iDim] = Coord_5[iDim]-Coord_1[iDim];
8706  }
8707  n[0] = a[1]*b[2]-b[1]*a[2];
8708  n[1] = -(a[0]*b[2]-b[0]*a[2]);
8709  n[2] = a[0]*b[1]-b[0]*a[1];
8710  test_1 = n[0]*c[0]+n[1]*c[1]+n[2]*c[2];
8711 
8712  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
8713  a[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_3[iDim]-Coord_2[iDim]);
8714  b[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_4[iDim]-Coord_2[iDim]);
8715  c[iDim] = Coord_5[iDim]-Coord_2[iDim];
8716  }
8717  n[0] = a[1]*b[2]-b[1]*a[2];
8718  n[1] = -(a[0]*b[2]-b[0]*a[2]);
8719  n[2] = a[0]*b[1]-b[0]*a[1];
8720  test_2 = n[0]*c[0]+n[1]*c[1]+n[2]*c[2];
8721 
8722  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
8723  a[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_4[iDim]-Coord_3[iDim]);
8724  b[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_1[iDim]-Coord_3[iDim]);
8725  c[iDim] = Coord_5[iDim]-Coord_3[iDim];
8726  }
8727  n[0] = a[1]*b[2]-b[1]*a[2];
8728  n[1] = -(a[0]*b[2]-b[0]*a[2]);
8729  n[2] = a[0]*b[1]-b[0]*a[1];
8730  test_3 = n[0]*c[0]+n[1]*c[1]+n[2]*c[2];
8731 
8732  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
8733  a[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_1[iDim]-Coord_4[iDim]);
8734  b[iDim] = 0.5*(Coord_3[iDim]-Coord_4[iDim]);
8735  c[iDim] = Coord_5[iDim]-Coord_4[iDim];
8736  }
8737  n[0] = a[1]*b[2]-b[1]*a[2];
8738  n[1] = -(a[0]*b[2]-b[0]*a[2]);
8739  n[2] = a[0]*b[1]-b[0]*a[1];
8740  test_4 = n[0]*c[0]+n[1]*c[1]+n[2]*c[2];
8741 
8742  if ((test_1 < 0.0) && (test_2 < 0.0) && (test_3 < 0.0) && (test_4 < 0.0)) {
8743  bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->Change_Orientation();
8744  node[Point_1_Surface]->SetFlip_Orientation();
8745  node[Point_2_Surface]->SetFlip_Orientation();
8746  node[Point_3_Surface]->SetFlip_Orientation();
8747  node[Point_4_Surface]->SetFlip_Orientation();
8748  quad_flip++;
8749  }
8750 
8751  }
8752  }
8753  }
8754  }
8755 
8756 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
8757  unsigned long Myline_flip = line_flip;
8758  unsigned long Mytriangle_flip = triangle_flip;
8759  unsigned long Myquad_flip = quad_flip;
8760  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Myline_flip, &line_flip, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
8761  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Mytriangle_flip, &triangle_flip, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
8762  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Myquad_flip, &quad_flip, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
8763 #endif
8764 
8765  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
8766  if (line_flip > 0) cout << "There has been a re-orientation of the LINE surface elements." << endl;
8767  if (triangle_flip > 0) cout << "There has been a re-orientation of the TRIANGLE surface elements." << endl;
8768  if (quad_flip > 0) cout << "There has been a re-orientation of the QUADRILATERAL surface elements." << endl;
8769  }
8770 
8771 }
8772 
8773 void CPhysicalGeometry::ComputeWall_Distance(CConfig *config) {
8774 
8775  /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
8776  /*--- Step 1: Create the coordinates and connectivity of the linear ---*/
8777  /*--- subelements of the local boundaries that must be taken ---*/
8778  /*--- into account in the wall distance computation. ---*/
8779  /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
8780 
8781  /* Initialize an array for the mesh points, which eventually contains the
8782  mapping from the local nodes to the number used in the connectivity of the
8783  local boundary faces. However, in a first pass it is an indicator whether
8784  or not a mesh point is on a local wall boundary. */
8785  vector<unsigned long> meshToSurface(nPoint, 0);
8786 
8787  /* Define the vectors for the connectivity of the local linear subelements,
8788  the element ID's, the element type and marker ID's. */
8789  vector<unsigned long> surfaceConn;
8790  vector<unsigned long> elemIDs;
8791  vector<unsigned short> VTK_TypeElem;
8792  vector<unsigned short> markerIDs;
8793 
8794  /* Loop over the boundary markers. */
8795 
8796  for(unsigned short iMarker=0; iMarker<config->GetnMarker_All(); ++iMarker) {
8797 
8798 
8799  /* Check for a viscous wall. */
8800  if( config->GetViscous_Wall(iMarker)) {
8801 
8802  /* Loop over the surface elements of this marker. */
8803  for(unsigned long iElem=0; iElem < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem++) {
8804 
8805  /* Set the flag of the mesh points on this surface to true. */
8806  for (unsigned short iNode = 0; iNode < bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetnNodes(); iNode++) {
8807  unsigned long iPoint = bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
8808  meshToSurface[iPoint] = 1;
8809  }
8810  /* Determine the necessary data from the corresponding standard face,
8811  such as the number of linear subfaces, the number of DOFs per
8812  linear subface and the corresponding local connectivity. */
8813  const unsigned short VTK_Type = bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetVTK_Type();
8814  const unsigned short nDOFsPerElem = bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetnNodes();
8815 
8816  /* Loop over the nodes of element and store the required data. */
8817 
8818  markerIDs.push_back(iMarker);
8819  VTK_TypeElem.push_back(VTK_Type);
8820  elemIDs.push_back(iElem);
8821 
8822  for (unsigned short iNode = 0; iNode < nDOFsPerElem; iNode++)
8823  surfaceConn.push_back(bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetNode(iNode));
8824  }
8825  }
8826  }
8827 
8828 
8829  /*--- Create the coordinates of the local points on the viscous surfaces and
8830  create the final version of the mapping from all volume points to the
8831  points on the viscous surfaces. ---*/
8832  vector<su2double> surfaceCoor;
8833  unsigned long nVertex_SolidWall = 0;
8834 
8835  for(unsigned long i=0; i<nPoint; ++i) {
8836  if( meshToSurface[i] ) {
8837  meshToSurface[i] = nVertex_SolidWall++;
8838 
8839  for(unsigned short k=0; k<nDim; ++k)
8840  surfaceCoor.push_back(node[i]->GetCoord(k));
8841  }
8842  }
8843 
8844  /*--- Change the surface connectivity, such that it corresponds to
8845  the entries in surfaceCoor rather than in meshPoints. ---*/
8846  for(unsigned long i=0; i<surfaceConn.size(); ++i)
8847  surfaceConn[i] = meshToSurface[surfaceConn[i]];
8848 
8849  /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
8850  /*--- Step 2: Build the ADT, which is an ADT of bounding boxes of the ---*/
8851  /*--- surface elements. A nearest point search does not give ---*/
8852  /*--- accurate results, especially not for the integration ---*/
8853  /*--- points of the elements close to a wall boundary. ---*/
8854  /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
8855 
8856  /* Build the ADT. */
8857  CADTElemClass WallADT(nDim, surfaceCoor, surfaceConn, VTK_TypeElem,
8858  markerIDs, elemIDs, true);
8859 
8860  /* Release the memory of the vectors used to build the ADT. To make sure
8861  that all the memory is deleted, the swap function is used. */
8862  vector<unsigned short>().swap(markerIDs);
8863  vector<unsigned short>().swap(VTK_TypeElem);
8864  vector<unsigned long>().swap(elemIDs);
8865  vector<unsigned long>().swap(surfaceConn);
8866  vector<su2double>().swap(surfaceCoor);
8867 
8868  /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
8869  /*--- Step 3: Loop over all interior mesh nodes and compute minimum ---*/
8870  /*--- distance to a solid wall element ---*/
8871  /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
8872 
8873 
8874  if ( WallADT.IsEmpty() ) {
8875 
8876  /*--- No solid wall boundary nodes in the entire mesh.
8877  Set the wall distance to zero for all nodes. ---*/
8878 
8879  for (unsigned long iPoint=0; iPoint<GetnPoint(); ++iPoint)
8880  node[iPoint]->SetWall_Distance(0.0);
8881  }
8882  else {
8883 
8884  /*--- Solid wall boundary nodes are present. Compute the wall
8885  distance for all nodes. ---*/
8886 
8887  for (unsigned long iPoint=0; iPoint<GetnPoint(); ++iPoint) {
8888  unsigned short markerID;
8889  unsigned long elemID;
8890  int rankID;
8891  su2double dist;
8892 
8893  WallADT.DetermineNearestElement(node[iPoint]->GetCoord(), dist, markerID,
8894  elemID, rankID);
8895  node[iPoint]->SetWall_Distance(dist);
8896  }
8897  }
8898 
8899 }
8900 
8901 void CPhysicalGeometry::SetPositive_ZArea(CConfig *config) {
8902  unsigned short iMarker, Boundary, Monitoring;
8903  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint;
8904  su2double *Normal, PositiveXArea, PositiveYArea, PositiveZArea, WettedArea, CoordX = 0.0, CoordY = 0.0, CoordZ = 0.0, MinCoordX = 1E10, MinCoordY = 1E10,
8905  MinCoordZ = 1E10, MaxCoordX = -1E10, MaxCoordY = -1E10, MaxCoordZ = -1E10, TotalMinCoordX = 1E10, TotalMinCoordY = 1E10,
8906  TotalMinCoordZ = 1E10, TotalMaxCoordX = -1E10, TotalMaxCoordY = -1E10, TotalMaxCoordZ = -1E10;
8907  su2double TotalPositiveXArea = 0.0, TotalPositiveYArea = 0.0, TotalPositiveZArea = 0.0, TotalWettedArea = 0.0, AxiFactor;
8908 
8909  bool axisymmetric = config->GetAxisymmetric();
8910  bool fea = ((config->GetKind_Solver() == FEM_ELASTICITY) || (config->GetKind_Solver() == DISC_ADJ_FEM));
8911 
8912  PositiveXArea = 0.0;
8913  PositiveYArea = 0.0;
8914  PositiveZArea = 0.0;
8915  WettedArea = 0.0;
8916 
8917  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
8918  Boundary = config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker);
8919  Monitoring = config->GetMarker_All_Monitoring(iMarker);
8920 
8921  if ((((Boundary == EULER_WALL) ||
8922  (Boundary == HEAT_FLUX) ||
8923  (Boundary == ISOTHERMAL) ||
8924  (Boundary == LOAD_BOUNDARY) ||
8925  (Boundary == DISPLACEMENT_BOUNDARY)) && (Monitoring == YES))
8926  || (fea))
8927 
8928  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
8929  iPoint = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
8930 
8931  if (node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
8932  Normal = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal();
8933  CoordX = node[iPoint]->GetCoord(0);
8934  CoordY = node[iPoint]->GetCoord(1);
8935  if (nDim == 3) CoordZ = node[iPoint]->GetCoord(2);
8936 
8937  if (axisymmetric) AxiFactor = 2.0*PI_NUMBER*node[iPoint]->GetCoord(1);
8938  else AxiFactor = 1.0;
8939 
8940  if (nDim == 2) WettedArea += AxiFactor * sqrt (Normal[0]*Normal[0] + Normal[1]*Normal[1]);
8941  if (nDim == 3) WettedArea += sqrt (Normal[0]*Normal[0] + Normal[1]*Normal[1] + Normal[2]*Normal[2]);
8942 
8943  if (Normal[0] < 0) PositiveXArea -= Normal[0];
8944  if (Normal[1] < 0) PositiveYArea -= Normal[1];
8945  if ((nDim == 3) && (Normal[2] < 0)) PositiveZArea -= Normal[2];
8946 
8947  if (CoordX < MinCoordX) MinCoordX = CoordX;
8948  if (CoordX > MaxCoordX) MaxCoordX = CoordX;
8949 
8950  if (CoordY < MinCoordY) MinCoordY = CoordY;
8951  if (CoordY > MaxCoordY) MaxCoordY = CoordY;
8952 
8953  if (nDim == 3) {
8954  if (CoordZ < MinCoordZ) MinCoordZ = CoordZ;
8955  if (CoordZ > MaxCoordZ) MaxCoordZ = CoordZ;
8956  }
8957 
8958  }
8959  }
8960 
8961  }
8962 
8963 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
8964  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&PositiveXArea, &TotalPositiveXArea, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
8965  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&PositiveYArea, &TotalPositiveYArea, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
8966  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&PositiveZArea, &TotalPositiveZArea, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
8967 
8968  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MinCoordX, &TotalMinCoordX, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MIN, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
8969  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MinCoordY, &TotalMinCoordY, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MIN, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
8970  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MinCoordZ, &TotalMinCoordZ, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MIN, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
8971 
8972  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MaxCoordX, &TotalMaxCoordX, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MAX, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
8973  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MaxCoordY, &TotalMaxCoordY, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MAX, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
8974  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MaxCoordZ, &TotalMaxCoordZ, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MAX, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
8975 
8976  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&WettedArea, &TotalWettedArea, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
8977 #else
8978  TotalPositiveXArea = PositiveXArea;
8979  TotalPositiveYArea = PositiveYArea;
8980  TotalPositiveZArea = PositiveZArea;
8981 
8982  TotalMinCoordX = MinCoordX;
8983  TotalMinCoordY = MinCoordY;
8984  TotalMinCoordZ = MinCoordZ;
8985 
8986  TotalMaxCoordX = MaxCoordX;
8987  TotalMaxCoordY = MaxCoordY;
8988  TotalMaxCoordZ = MaxCoordZ;
8989 
8990  TotalWettedArea = WettedArea;
8991 #endif
8992 
8993  /*--- Set a reference area if no value is provided ---*/
8994 
8995  if (config->GetRefArea() == 0.0) {
8996 
8997  if (nDim == 3) config->SetRefArea(TotalPositiveZArea);
8998  else config->SetRefArea(TotalPositiveYArea);
8999 
9000  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
9001  if (nDim == 3) {
9002  cout << "Reference area = "<< TotalPositiveZArea;
9003  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) cout <<" m^2." << endl; else cout <<" ft^2." << endl;
9004  }
9005  else {
9006  cout << "Reference length = "<< TotalPositiveYArea;
9007  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) cout <<" m." << endl; else cout <<" ft." << endl;
9008  }
9009  }
9010 
9011  }
9012 
9013  /*--- Set a semi-span value if no value is provided ---*/
9014 
9015  if (config->GetSemiSpan() == 0.0) {
9016 
9017  if (nDim == 3) config->SetSemiSpan(fabs(TotalMaxCoordY));
9018  else config->SetSemiSpan(1.0);
9019 
9020  if ((nDim == 3) && (rank == MASTER_NODE)) {
9021  cout << "Semi-span length = "<< TotalMaxCoordY;
9022  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) cout <<" m." << endl; else cout <<" ft." << endl;
9023  }
9024 
9025  }
9026 
9027  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
9028 
9029  if (fea) cout << "Surface area = "<< TotalWettedArea;
9030  else cout << "Wetted area = "<< TotalWettedArea;
9031 
9032  if ((nDim == 3) || (axisymmetric)) { if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) cout <<" m^2." << endl; else cout <<" ft^2." << endl; }
9033  else { if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) cout <<" m." << endl; else cout <<" ft." << endl; }
9034 
9035  cout << "Area projection in the x-plane = "<< TotalPositiveXArea;
9036  if (nDim == 3) { if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) cout <<" m^2,"; else cout <<" ft^2,"; }
9037  else { if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) cout <<" m,"; else cout <<" ft,"; }
9038 
9039  cout << " y-plane = "<< TotalPositiveYArea;
9040  if (nDim == 3) { if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) cout <<" m^2,"; else cout <<" ft^2,"; }
9041  else { if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) cout <<" m." << endl; else cout <<" ft." << endl; }
9042 
9043  if (nDim == 3) { cout << " z-plane = "<< TotalPositiveZArea;
9044  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) cout <<" m^2." << endl; else cout <<" ft^2."<< endl; }
9045 
9046  cout << "Max. coordinate in the x-direction = "<< TotalMaxCoordX;
9047  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) cout <<" m,"; else cout <<" ft,";
9048 
9049  cout << " y-direction = "<< TotalMaxCoordY;
9050  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) cout <<" m"; else cout <<" ft";
9051 
9052  if (nDim == 3) {
9053  cout << ", z-direction = "<< TotalMaxCoordZ;
9054  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) cout <<" m." << endl; else cout <<" ft."<< endl;
9055  }
9056  else cout << "." << endl;
9057 
9058  cout << "Min. coordinate in the x-direction = "<< TotalMinCoordX;
9059  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) cout <<" m,"; else cout <<" ft";
9060 
9061  cout << " y-direction = "<< TotalMinCoordY;
9062  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) cout <<" m"; else cout <<" ft";
9063 
9064  if (nDim == 3) {
9065  cout << ", z-direction = "<< TotalMinCoordZ;
9066  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == SI) cout <<" m." << endl; else cout <<" ft."<< endl;
9067  }
9068  else cout << "." << endl;
9069 
9070  }
9071 
9072 }
9073 
9074 void CPhysicalGeometry::SetPoint_Connectivity(void) {
9075 
9076  unsigned short Node_Neighbor, iNode, iNeighbor;
9077  unsigned long jElem, Point_Neighbor, iPoint, iElem;
9078 
9079  /*--- Loop over all the elements ---*/
9080 
9081  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nElem; iElem++)
9082 
9083  /*--- Loop over all the nodes of an element ---*/
9084 
9085  for (iNode = 0; iNode < elem[iElem]->GetnNodes(); iNode++) {
9086  iPoint = elem[iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
9087 
9088  /*--- Store the element into the point ---*/
9089 
9090  node[iPoint]->SetElem(iElem);
9091  }
9092 
9093  /*--- Loop over all the points ---*/
9094 
9095  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++)
9096 
9097  /*--- Loop over all elements shared by the point ---*/
9098 
9099  for (iElem = 0; iElem < node[iPoint]->GetnElem(); iElem++) {
9100 
9101  jElem = node[iPoint]->GetElem(iElem);
9102 
9103  /*--- If we find the point iPoint in the surronding element ---*/
9104 
9105  for (iNode = 0; iNode < elem[jElem]->GetnNodes(); iNode++)
9106 
9107  if (elem[jElem]->GetNode(iNode) == iPoint)
9108 
9109  /*--- Localize the local index of the neighbor of iPoint in the element ---*/
9110 
9111  for (iNeighbor = 0; iNeighbor < elem[jElem]->GetnNeighbor_Nodes(iNode); iNeighbor++) {
9112  Node_Neighbor = elem[jElem]->GetNeighbor_Nodes(iNode, iNeighbor);
9113  Point_Neighbor = elem[jElem]->GetNode(Node_Neighbor);
9114 
9115  /*--- Store the point into the point ---*/
9116 
9117  node[iPoint]->SetPoint(Point_Neighbor);
9118  }
9119  }
9120 
9121  /*--- Set the number of neighbors variable, this is
9122  important for JST and multigrid in parallel ---*/
9123 
9124  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++)
9125  node[iPoint]->SetnNeighbor(node[iPoint]->GetnPoint());
9126 
9127 }
9128 
9129 void CPhysicalGeometry::SetRCM_Ordering(CConfig *config) {
9130  unsigned long iPoint, AdjPoint, AuxPoint, AddPoint, iElem, iNode, jNode;
9131  vector<unsigned long> Queue, AuxQueue, Result;
9132  unsigned short Degree, MinDegree, iDim, iMarker;
9133  bool *inQueue;
9134 
9135  inQueue = new bool [nPoint];
9136 
9137  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++)
9138  inQueue[iPoint] = false;
9139 
9140  /*--- Select the node with the lowest degree in the grid. ---*/
9141 
9142  MinDegree = node[0]->GetnNeighbor(); AddPoint = 0;
9143  for (iPoint = 1; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++) {
9144  Degree = node[iPoint]->GetnPoint();
9145  if (Degree < MinDegree) { MinDegree = Degree; AddPoint = iPoint; }
9146  }
9147 
9148  /*--- Add the node in the first free position. ---*/
9149 
9150  Result.push_back(AddPoint); inQueue[AddPoint] = true;
9151 
9152  /*--- Loop until reorganize all the nodes ---*/
9153 
9154  do {
9155 
9156  /*--- Add to the queue all the nodes adjacent in the increasing
9157  order of their degree, checking if the element is already
9158  in the Queue. ---*/
9159 
9160  AuxQueue.clear();
9161  for (iNode = 0; iNode < node[AddPoint]->GetnPoint(); iNode++) {
9162  AdjPoint = node[AddPoint]->GetPoint(iNode);
9163  if ((!inQueue[AdjPoint]) && (AdjPoint < nPointDomain)) {
9164  AuxQueue.push_back(AdjPoint);
9165  }
9166  }
9167 
9168  if (AuxQueue.size() != 0) {
9169 
9170  /*--- Sort the auxiliar queue based on the number of neighbors ---*/
9171 
9172  for (iNode = 0; iNode < AuxQueue.size(); iNode++) {
9173  for (jNode = 0; jNode < AuxQueue.size() - 1 - iNode; jNode++) {
9174  if (node[AuxQueue[jNode]]->GetnPoint() > node[AuxQueue[jNode+1]]->GetnPoint()) {
9175  AuxPoint = AuxQueue[jNode];
9176  AuxQueue[jNode] = AuxQueue[jNode+1];
9177  AuxQueue[jNode+1] = AuxPoint;
9178  }
9179  }
9180  }
9181 
9182  Queue.insert(Queue.end(), AuxQueue.begin(), AuxQueue.end());
9183  for (iNode = 0; iNode < AuxQueue.size(); iNode++) {
9184  inQueue[AuxQueue[iNode]] = true;
9185  }
9186 
9187  }
9188 
9189  /*--- Extract the first node from the queue and add it in the first free
9190  position. ---*/
9191 
9192  if (Queue.size() != 0) {
9193  AddPoint = Queue[0];
9194  Result.push_back(Queue[0]);
9195  Queue.erase (Queue.begin(), Queue.begin()+1);
9196  }
9197 
9198  /*--- Add to the queue all the nodes adjacent in the increasing
9199  order of their degree, checking if the element is already
9200  in the Queue. ---*/
9201 
9202  } while (Queue.size() != 0);
9203 
9204  /*--- Check that all the points have been added ---*/
9205 
9206  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++) {
9207  if (inQueue[iPoint] == false) Result.push_back(iPoint);
9208  }
9209 
9210  delete[] inQueue;
9211 
9212  reverse(Result.begin(), Result.end());
9213 
9214  /*--- Add the MPI points ---*/
9215 
9216  for (iPoint = nPointDomain; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
9217  Result.push_back(iPoint);
9218  }
9219 
9220  /*--- Reset old data structures ---*/
9221 
9222  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
9223  node[iPoint]->ResetElem();
9224  node[iPoint]->ResetPoint();
9225  node[iPoint]->ResetBoundary();
9226  node[iPoint]->SetPhysicalBoundary(false);
9227  node[iPoint]->SetSolidBoundary(false);
9228  node[iPoint]->SetPeriodicBoundary(false);
9229  node[iPoint]->SetDomain(true);
9230  }
9231 
9232  /*--- Set the new coordinates ---*/
9233 
9234  su2double **AuxCoord;
9235  unsigned long *AuxGlobalIndex;
9236 
9237  AuxGlobalIndex = new unsigned long [nPoint];
9238  AuxCoord = new su2double* [nPoint];
9239  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++)
9240  AuxCoord[iPoint] = new su2double [nDim];
9241 
9242  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
9243  AuxGlobalIndex[iPoint] = node[iPoint]->GetGlobalIndex();
9244  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
9245  AuxCoord[iPoint][iDim] = node[iPoint]->GetCoord(iDim);
9246  }
9247  }
9248 
9249  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
9250  node[iPoint]->SetGlobalIndex(AuxGlobalIndex[Result[iPoint]]);
9251  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
9252  node[iPoint]->SetCoord(iDim, AuxCoord[Result[iPoint]][iDim]);
9253  }
9254 
9255  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++)
9256  delete[] AuxCoord[iPoint];
9257  delete[] AuxCoord;
9258  delete[] AuxGlobalIndex;
9259 
9260  /*--- Set the new conectivities ---*/
9261 
9262  unsigned long *InvResult;
9263  InvResult = new unsigned long [nPoint];
9264  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++)
9265  InvResult[Result[iPoint]] = iPoint;
9266 
9267  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nElem; iElem++) {
9268  for (iNode = 0; iNode < elem[iElem]->GetnNodes(); iNode++) {
9269  iPoint = elem[iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
9270  elem[iElem]->SetNode(iNode, InvResult[iPoint]);
9271  }
9272  }
9273 
9274  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
9275  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem++) {
9276 
9277  string Marker_Tag = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(iMarker);
9278  if (Marker_Tag == "SEND_RECEIVE") {
9279  for (unsigned long iElem_Bound = 0; iElem_Bound < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem_Bound++) {
9280  if (config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(iMarker) < 0)
9281  node[bound[iMarker][iElem_Bound]->GetNode(0)]->SetDomain(false);
9282  }
9283  }
9284 
9285  for (iNode = 0; iNode < bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetnNodes(); iNode++) {
9286  iPoint = bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
9287  bound[iMarker][iElem]->SetNode(iNode, InvResult[iPoint]);
9288  node[InvResult[iPoint]]->SetBoundary(nMarker);
9289  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != SEND_RECEIVE &&
9290  config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != INTERNAL_BOUNDARY &&
9291  config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != INTERFACE_BOUNDARY &&
9292  config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != NEARFIELD_BOUNDARY &&
9293  config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != PERIODIC_BOUNDARY)
9294  node[InvResult[iPoint]]->SetPhysicalBoundary(true);
9295 
9296  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == EULER_WALL ||
9297  config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == HEAT_FLUX ||
9298  config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == ISOTHERMAL)
9299  node[InvResult[iPoint]]->SetSolidBoundary(true);
9300 
9301  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == PERIODIC_BOUNDARY)
9302  node[InvResult[iPoint]]->SetPeriodicBoundary(true);
9303  }
9304  }
9305  }
9306 
9307 
9308  delete[] InvResult;
9309 
9310 }
9311 
9312 void CPhysicalGeometry::SetElement_Connectivity(void) {
9313  unsigned short first_elem_face, second_elem_face, iFace, iNode, jElem;
9314  unsigned long face_point, Test_Elem, iElem;
9315 
9316  /*--- Loop over all the elements, faces and nodes ---*/
9317 
9318  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nElem; iElem++)
9319  for (iFace = 0; iFace < elem[iElem]->GetnFaces(); iFace++)
9320  for (iNode = 0; iNode < elem[iElem]->GetnNodesFace(iFace); iNode++) {
9321  face_point = elem[iElem]->GetNode(elem[iElem]->GetFaces(iFace, iNode));
9322 
9323  /*--- Loop over all elements sharing the face point ---*/
9324 
9325  for (jElem = 0; jElem < node[face_point]->GetnElem(); jElem++) {
9326  Test_Elem = node[face_point]->GetElem(jElem);
9327 
9328  /*--- If it is a new element in this face ---*/
9329 
9330  if ((elem[iElem]->GetNeighbor_Elements(iFace) == -1) && (iElem < Test_Elem) &&
9331  (FindFace(iElem, Test_Elem, first_elem_face, second_elem_face))) {
9332 
9333  /*--- Localice which faces are sharing both elements ---*/
9334 
9335  elem[iElem]->SetNeighbor_Elements(Test_Elem, first_elem_face);
9336 
9337  /*--- Store the element for both elements ---*/
9338 
9339  elem[Test_Elem]->SetNeighbor_Elements(iElem, second_elem_face);
9340 
9341  }
9342  }
9343  }
9344 }
9345 
9346 void CPhysicalGeometry::SetBoundVolume(void) {
9347  unsigned short cont, iMarker, iElem, iNode_Domain, iNode_Surface;
9348  unsigned long Point_Domain, Point_Surface, Point, iElem_Surface, iElem_Domain;
9349  bool CheckVol;
9350 
9351  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++)
9352  for (iElem_Surface = 0; iElem_Surface < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem_Surface++) {
9353 
9354  /*--- Choose and arbitrary point from the surface --*/
9355  Point = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(0);
9356  CheckVol = false;
9357 
9358  for (iElem = 0; iElem < node[Point]->GetnElem(); iElem++) {
9359  /*--- Look for elements surronding that point --*/
9360  cont = 0; iElem_Domain = node[Point]->GetElem(iElem);
9361  for (iNode_Domain = 0; iNode_Domain < elem[iElem_Domain]->GetnNodes(); iNode_Domain++) {
9362  Point_Domain = elem[iElem_Domain]->GetNode(iNode_Domain);
9363  for (iNode_Surface = 0; iNode_Surface < bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetnNodes(); iNode_Surface++) {
9364  Point_Surface = bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetNode(iNode_Surface);
9365  if (Point_Surface == Point_Domain) cont++;
9366  if (cont == bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetnNodes()) break;
9367  }
9368  if (cont == bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetnNodes()) break;
9369  }
9370 
9371  if (cont == bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->GetnNodes()) {
9372  bound[iMarker][iElem_Surface]->SetDomainElement(iElem_Domain);
9373  CheckVol = true;
9374  break;
9375  }
9376  }
9377  if (!CheckVol) {
9378  char buf[100];
9379  SPRINTF(buf,"The surface element (%u, %lu) doesn't have an associated volume element", iMarker, iElem_Surface );
9380  SU2_MPI::Error(buf, CURRENT_FUNCTION);
9381  }
9382  }
9383 }
9384 
9385 void CPhysicalGeometry::SetVertex(CConfig *config) {
9386  unsigned long iPoint, iVertex, iElem;
9387  unsigned short iMarker, iNode;
9388 
9389  /*--- Initialize the Vertex vector for each node of the grid ---*/
9390 
9391  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++)
9392  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++)
9393  node[iPoint]->SetVertex(-1, iMarker);
9394 
9395  /*--- Create and compute the vector with the number of vertex per marker ---*/
9396 
9397  nVertex = new unsigned long [nMarker];
9398  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
9399 
9400  /*--- Initialize the number of Bound Vertex for each Marker ---*/
9401 
9402  nVertex[iMarker] = 0;
9403  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem++)
9404  for (iNode = 0; iNode < bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetnNodes(); iNode++) {
9405  iPoint = bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
9406 
9407  /*--- Set the vertex in the node information ---*/
9408 
9409  if ((node[iPoint]->GetVertex(iMarker) == -1) || (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == SEND_RECEIVE)) {
9410  node[iPoint]->SetVertex(nVertex[iMarker], iMarker);
9411  nVertex[iMarker]++;
9412  }
9413  }
9414  }
9415 
9416  /*--- Initialize the Vertex vector for each node, the previous result is deleted ---*/
9417 
9418  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++)
9419  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++)
9420  node[iPoint]->SetVertex(-1, iMarker);
9421 
9422  /*--- Create the bound vertex structure, note that the order
9423  is the same as in the input file, this is important for Send/Receive part ---*/
9424 
9425  vertex = new CVertex**[nMarker];
9426  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
9427  vertex[iMarker] = new CVertex* [nVertex[iMarker]];
9428  nVertex[iMarker] = 0;
9429 
9430  /*--- Initialize the number of Bound Vertex for each Marker ---*/
9431 
9432  for (iElem = 0; iElem < nElem_Bound[iMarker]; iElem++)
9433  for (iNode = 0; iNode < bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetnNodes(); iNode++) {
9434  iPoint = bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
9435 
9436  /*--- Set the vertex in the node information ---*/
9437 
9438  if ((node[iPoint]->GetVertex(iMarker) == -1) || (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == SEND_RECEIVE)) {
9439  iVertex = nVertex[iMarker];
9440  vertex[iMarker][iVertex] = new CVertex(iPoint, nDim);
9441 
9442  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == SEND_RECEIVE) {
9443  vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->SetRotation_Type(bound[iMarker][iElem]->GetRotation_Type());
9444  }
9445  node[iPoint]->SetVertex(nVertex[iMarker], iMarker);
9446  nVertex[iMarker]++;
9447  }
9448  }
9449  }
9450 }
9451 
9452 void CPhysicalGeometry::ComputeNSpan(CConfig *config, unsigned short val_iZone, unsigned short marker_flag, bool allocate) {
9453  unsigned short iMarker, jMarker, iMarkerTP, iSpan, jSpan, kSpan = 0;
9454  unsigned long iPoint, iVertex;
9455  long jVertex;
9456  int nSpan, nSpan_loc;
9457  su2double *coord, *valueSpan, min, max, radius, delta;
9458  short PeriodicBoundary;
9459  unsigned short SpanWise_Kind = config->GetKind_SpanWise();
9460 
9461 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
9462  unsigned short iSize;
9463  int nSpan_max;
9464  int My_nSpan, My_MaxnSpan, *My_nSpan_loc = NULL;
9465  su2double MyMin, MyMax, *MyTotValueSpan =NULL,*MyValueSpan =NULL;
9466 #endif
9467 
9468  nSpan = 0;
9469  nSpan_loc = 0;
9470  if (nDim == 2){
9471  nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1] = 1;
9472  //TODO (turbo) make it more genral
9473  if(marker_flag == OUTFLOW) config->SetnSpanWiseSections(1);
9474 
9475  /*---Initilize the vector of span-wise values that will be ordered ---*/
9476  SpanWiseValue[marker_flag -1] = new su2double[1];
9477  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < 1; iSpan++){
9478  SpanWiseValue[marker_flag -1][iSpan] = 0;
9479  }
9480  }
9481  else{
9482  if(SpanWise_Kind == AUTOMATIC){
9483  /*--- loop to find inflow of outflow marker---*/
9484  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++){
9485  for (iMarkerTP=1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery()+1; iMarkerTP++){
9486  if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP){
9487  if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag){
9488  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
9489  iPoint = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
9490 
9491  /*--- loop to find the vertex that ar both of inflow or outflow marker and on the periodic
9492  * in order to caount the number of Span ---*/
9493  for (jMarker = 0; jMarker < nMarker; jMarker++){
9494  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(jMarker) == PERIODIC_BOUNDARY) {
9495  PeriodicBoundary = config->GetMarker_All_PerBound(jMarker);
9496  jVertex = node[iPoint]->GetVertex(jMarker);
9497  if ((jVertex != -1) && (PeriodicBoundary == (val_iZone + 1))){
9498  nSpan++;
9499  }
9500  }
9501  }
9502  }
9503  }
9504  }
9505  }
9506  }
9507 
9508  /*--- storing the local number of span---*/
9509  nSpan_loc = nSpan;
9510  /*--- if parallel computing the global number of span---*/
9511 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
9512  nSpan_max = nSpan;
9513  My_nSpan = nSpan; nSpan = 0;
9514  My_MaxnSpan = nSpan_max; nSpan_max = 0;
9515  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&My_nSpan, &nSpan, 1, MPI_INT, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
9516  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&My_MaxnSpan, &nSpan_max, 1, MPI_INT, MPI_MAX, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
9517 #endif
9518 
9519 
9520 
9521  /*--- initialize the vector that will contain the disordered values span-wise ---*/
9522  nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag -1] = nSpan;
9523  valueSpan = new su2double[nSpan];
9524 
9525  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpan; iSpan ++ ){
9526  valueSpan[iSpan] = -1001.0;
9527  }
9528 
9529 
9530  /*--- store the local span-wise value for each processor ---*/
9531  nSpan_loc = 0;
9532  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++){
9533  for (iMarkerTP=1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery()+1; iMarkerTP++){
9534  if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP){
9535  if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag){
9536  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
9537  iPoint = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
9538  for (jMarker = 0; jMarker < nMarker; jMarker++){
9539  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(jMarker) == PERIODIC_BOUNDARY) {
9540  PeriodicBoundary = config->GetMarker_All_PerBound(jMarker);
9541  jVertex = node[iPoint]->GetVertex(jMarker);
9542  if ((jVertex != -1) && (PeriodicBoundary == (val_iZone + 1))){
9543  coord = node[iPoint]->GetCoord();
9544  switch (config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone)){
9545  case CENTRIFUGAL:
9546  valueSpan[nSpan_loc] = coord[2];
9547  break;
9548  case CENTRIPETAL:
9549  valueSpan[nSpan_loc] = coord[2];
9550  break;
9551  case AXIAL:
9552  valueSpan[nSpan_loc] = sqrt(coord[0]*coord[0]+coord[1]*coord[1]);
9553  break;
9554  case CENTRIPETAL_AXIAL:
9555  if (marker_flag == OUTFLOW){
9556  valueSpan[nSpan_loc] = sqrt(coord[0]*coord[0]+coord[1]*coord[1]);
9557  }
9558  else{
9559  valueSpan[nSpan_loc] = coord[2];
9560  }
9561  break;
9562  case AXIAL_CENTRIFUGAL:
9563  if (marker_flag == INFLOW){
9564  valueSpan[nSpan_loc] = sqrt(coord[0]*coord[0]+coord[1]*coord[1]);
9565  }
9566  else{
9567  valueSpan[nSpan_loc] = coord[2];
9568  }
9569  break;
9570 
9571  }
9572  nSpan_loc++;
9573  }
9574  }
9575  }
9576  }
9577  }
9578  }
9579  }
9580  }
9581 
9582  /*--- Gather the span-wise values on all the processor ---*/
9583 
9584 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
9585  MyTotValueSpan = new su2double[nSpan_max*size];
9586  MyValueSpan = new su2double[nSpan_max];
9587  My_nSpan_loc = new int[size];
9588  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpan_max; iSpan++){
9589  MyValueSpan[iSpan] = -1001.0;
9590  for (iSize = 0; iSize< size; iSize++){
9591  MyTotValueSpan[iSize*nSpan_max + iSpan] = -1001.0;
9592  }
9593  }
9594 
9595  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan <nSpan_loc; iSpan++){
9596  MyValueSpan[iSpan] = valueSpan[iSpan];
9597  }
9598 
9599  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan <nSpan; iSpan++){
9600  valueSpan[iSpan] = -1001.0;
9601  }
9602 
9603  SU2_MPI::Allgather(MyValueSpan, nSpan_max , MPI_DOUBLE, MyTotValueSpan, nSpan_max, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
9604  SU2_MPI::Allgather(&nSpan_loc, 1 , MPI_INT, My_nSpan_loc, 1, MPI_INT, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
9605 
9606  jSpan = 0;
9607  for (iSize = 0; iSize< size; iSize++){
9608  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < My_nSpan_loc[iSize]; iSpan++){
9609  valueSpan[jSpan] = MyTotValueSpan[iSize*nSpan_max + iSpan];
9610  jSpan++;
9611  }
9612  }
9613 
9614  delete [] MyTotValueSpan; delete [] MyValueSpan; delete [] My_nSpan_loc;
9615 
9616 #endif
9617 
9618  // check if the value are gathered correctly
9619  //
9620  // for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpan; iSpan++){
9621  // if(rank == MASTER_NODE){
9622  // cout << setprecision(16)<< iSpan +1 << " with a value of " <<valueSpan[iSpan]<< " at flag " << marker_flag <<endl;
9623  // }
9624  // }
9625 
9626 
9627  /*--- Find the minimum value among the span-wise values ---*/
9628  min = 10.0E+06;
9629  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpan; iSpan++){
9630  if(valueSpan[iSpan]< min) min = valueSpan[iSpan];
9631  }
9632 
9633  /*---Initilize the vector of span-wise values that will be ordered ---*/
9634  SpanWiseValue[marker_flag -1] = new su2double[nSpan];
9635  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpan; iSpan++){
9636  SpanWiseValue[marker_flag -1][iSpan] = 0;
9637  }
9638 
9639  /*---Ordering the vector of span-wise values---*/
9640  SpanWiseValue[marker_flag -1][0] = min;
9641  for (iSpan = 1; iSpan < nSpan; iSpan++){
9642  min = 10.0E+06;
9643  for (jSpan = 0; jSpan < nSpan; jSpan++){
9644  if((valueSpan[jSpan] - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag -1][iSpan-1]) < min && (valueSpan[jSpan] - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag -1][iSpan-1]) > EPS){
9645  min = valueSpan[jSpan] - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag -1][iSpan-1];
9646  kSpan = jSpan;
9647  }
9648  }
9649  SpanWiseValue[marker_flag -1][iSpan] = valueSpan[kSpan];
9650  }
9651 
9652  delete [] valueSpan;
9653  }
9654  /*--- Compute equispaced Span-wise sections using number of section specified by the User---*/
9655  else{
9656  /*--- Initialize number of span---*/
9657  nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1] = config->Get_nSpanWiseSections_User();
9658  SpanWiseValue[marker_flag -1] = new su2double[config->Get_nSpanWiseSections_User()];
9659  for (iSpan = 0; iSpan < config->Get_nSpanWiseSections_User(); iSpan++){
9660  SpanWiseValue[marker_flag -1][iSpan] = 0;
9661  }
9662  /*--- Compute maximum and minimum value span-wise---*/
9663  min = 10.0E+06;
9664  max = -10.0E+06;
9665  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++){
9666  for (iMarkerTP=1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery()+1; iMarkerTP++){
9667  if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP){
9668  if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag){
9669  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
9670  iPoint = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
9671  for (jMarker = 0; jMarker < nMarker; jMarker++){
9672  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(jMarker) == PERIODIC_BOUNDARY) {
9673  PeriodicBoundary = config->GetMarker_All_PerBound(jMarker);
9674  jVertex = node[iPoint]->GetVertex(jMarker);
9675  if ((jVertex != -1) && (PeriodicBoundary == (val_iZone + 1))){
9676  coord = node[iPoint]->GetCoord();
9677  switch (config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone)){
9678  case CENTRIFUGAL: case CENTRIPETAL:
9679  if (coord[2] < min) min = coord[2];
9680  if (coord[2] > max) max = coord[2];
9681  break;
9682  case AXIAL:
9683  radius = sqrt(coord[0]*coord[0]+coord[1]*coord[1]);
9684  if (radius < min) min = radius;
9685  if (radius > max) max = radius;
9686  break;
9687  case CENTRIPETAL_AXIAL:
9688  if (marker_flag == OUTFLOW){
9689  radius = sqrt(coord[0]*coord[0]+coord[1]*coord[1]);
9690  if (radius < min) min = radius;
9691  if (radius > max) max = radius;
9692  }
9693  else{
9694  if (coord[2] < min) min = coord[2];
9695  if (coord[2] > max) max = coord[2];
9696  }
9697  break;
9698 
9699  case AXIAL_CENTRIFUGAL:
9700  if (marker_flag == INFLOW){
9701  radius = sqrt(coord[0]*coord[0]+coord[1]*coord[1]);
9702  if (radius < min) min = radius;
9703  if (radius > max) max = radius;
9704  }
9705  else{
9706  if (coord[2] < min) min = coord[2];
9707  if (coord[2] > max) max = coord[2];
9708  }
9709  break;
9710  }
9711  }
9712  }
9713  }
9714  }
9715  }
9716  }
9717  }
9718  }
9719  /*--- compute global minimum and maximum value on span-wise ---*/
9720 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
9721  MyMin= min; min = 0;
9722  MyMax= max; max = 0;
9723  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyMin, &min, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MIN, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
9724  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyMax, &max, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MAX, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
9725 #endif
9726 
9727  // cout <<"min " << min << endl;
9728  // cout <<"max " << max << endl;
9729  /*--- compute height value for each spanwise section---*/
9730  delta = (max - min)/(nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1] -1);
9731  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
9732  SpanWiseValue[marker_flag - 1][iSpan]= min + delta*iSpan;
9733  }
9734  }
9735 
9736 
9737  if(marker_flag == OUTFLOW){
9738  if(nSpanWiseSections[INFLOW -1] != nSpanWiseSections[OUTFLOW - 1]){
9739  char buf[100];
9740  SPRINTF(buf, "nSpan inflow %u, nSpan outflow %u", nSpanWiseSections[INFLOW], nSpanWiseSections[OUTFLOW]);
9741  SU2_MPI::Error(string(" At the moment only turbomachinery with the same amount of span-wise section can be simulated\n") + buf, CURRENT_FUNCTION);
9742  }
9743  else{
9744  config->SetnSpanWiseSections(nSpanWiseSections[OUTFLOW -1]);
9745  }
9746  }
9747 
9748 
9749 
9750  }
9751 
9752 }
9753 void CPhysicalGeometry::SetTurboVertex(CConfig *config, unsigned short val_iZone, unsigned short marker_flag, bool allocate) {
9754  unsigned long iPoint, **ordered, **disordered, **oldVertex3D, iInternalVertex;
9755  unsigned long nVert, nVertMax;
9756  unsigned short iMarker, iMarkerTP, iSpan, jSpan, iDim;
9757  su2double min, minInt, max, *coord, dist, Normal2, *TurboNormal, *NormalArea, target = 0.0, **area, ***unitnormal, Area = 0.0;
9758  bool **checkAssign;
9759  min = 10.0E+06;
9760  minInt = 10.0E+06;
9761  max = -10.0E+06;
9762 
9763  su2double radius;
9764  long iVertex, iSpanVertex, jSpanVertex, kSpanVertex = 0;
9765  int *nTotVertex_gb, *nVertexSpanHalo;
9766  su2double **x_loc, **y_loc, **z_loc, **angCoord_loc, **deltaAngCoord_loc, **angPitch, **deltaAngPitch, *minIntAngPitch,
9767  *minAngPitch, *maxAngPitch;
9768  int **rank_loc;
9769 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
9770  unsigned short iSize, kSize = 0, jSize;
9771  su2double MyMin,MyIntMin, MyMax;
9772  su2double *x_gb = NULL, *y_gb = NULL, *z_gb = NULL, *angCoord_gb = NULL, *deltaAngCoord_gb = NULL;
9773  bool *checkAssign_gb =NULL;
9774  unsigned long My_nVert;
9775 
9776 #endif
9777  string multizone_filename;
9778 
9779  x_loc = new su2double*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
9780  y_loc = new su2double*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
9781  z_loc = new su2double*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
9782  angCoord_loc = new su2double*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
9783  deltaAngCoord_loc = new su2double*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
9784  angPitch = new su2double*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
9785  deltaAngPitch = new su2double*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
9786  rank_loc = new int*[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
9787  minAngPitch = new su2double[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
9788  minIntAngPitch = new su2double[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
9789  maxAngPitch = new su2double[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
9790 
9791  nTotVertex_gb = new int[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
9792  nVertexSpanHalo = new int[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
9793  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
9794  nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] = -1;
9795  nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan] = 0;
9796  minAngPitch[iSpan] = 10.0E+06;
9797  minIntAngPitch[iSpan] = 10.0E+06;
9798  maxAngPitch[iSpan] = -10.0E+06;
9799  }
9800 
9801  /*--- Initialize auxiliary pointers ---*/
9802  TurboNormal = new su2double[3];
9803  NormalArea = new su2double[3];
9804  ordered = new unsigned long* [nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
9805  disordered = new unsigned long* [nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
9806  oldVertex3D = new unsigned long* [nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
9807  area = new su2double* [nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
9808  unitnormal = new su2double** [nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
9809  checkAssign = new bool* [nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
9810 
9811  /*--- Initialize the new Vertex structure. The if statement ensures that these vectors are initialized
9812  * only once even if the routine is called more than once.---*/
9813 
9814  if (allocate){
9815  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++){
9816  for (iMarkerTP=1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery()+1; iMarkerTP++){
9817  if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP){
9818  if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag){
9819  nSpanSectionsByMarker[iMarker] = nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1];
9820  nVertexSpan[iMarker] = new long[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
9821  turbovertex[iMarker] = new CTurboVertex** [nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
9822  nTotVertexSpan[iMarker] = new unsigned long [nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1] +1];
9823  MaxAngularCoord[iMarker] = new su2double [nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
9824  MinAngularCoord[iMarker] = new su2double [nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
9825  MinRelAngularCoord[iMarker] = new su2double [nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]];
9826  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
9827  nVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan] = 0;
9828  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan] = NULL;
9829  MinAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = 10.0E+06;
9830  MaxAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = -10.0E+06;
9831  MinRelAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = 10.0E+06;
9832  }
9833  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1] +1; iSpan++){
9834  nTotVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan] = 0;
9835  }
9836  }
9837  }
9838  }
9839  }
9840  }
9841 
9842  //this works only for turbomachinery rotating around the Z-Axes.
9843  // the reordering algorithm pitch-wise assumes that X-coordinate of each boundary vertex is positive so that reordering can be based on the Y-coordinate.
9844  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++){
9845  for (iMarkerTP=1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery()+1; iMarkerTP++){
9846  if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP){
9847  if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag){
9848 
9849  /*--- compute the amount of vertexes for each span-wise section to initialize the CTurboVertex pointers and auxiliary pointers ---*/
9850  for (iVertex = 0; (unsigned long)iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
9851  iPoint = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
9852  if (nDim == 3){
9853  dist = 10E+06;
9854  jSpan = -1;
9855  coord = node[iPoint]->GetCoord();
9856 
9857  switch (config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone)){
9858  case CENTRIFUGAL: case CENTRIPETAL:
9859  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
9860  if (dist > (abs(coord[2]-SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]))){
9861  dist= abs(coord[2]-SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]);
9862  jSpan=iSpan;
9863  }
9864  }
9865  break;
9866  case AXIAL:
9867  radius = sqrt(coord[0]*coord[0]+coord[1]*coord[1]);
9868  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
9869  if (dist > (abs(radius - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]))){
9870  dist= abs(radius-SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]);
9871  jSpan=iSpan;
9872  }
9873  }
9874  break;
9875  case CENTRIPETAL_AXIAL:
9876  if (marker_flag == OUTFLOW){
9877  radius = sqrt(coord[0]*coord[0]+coord[1]*coord[1]);
9878  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
9879  if (dist > (abs(radius - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]))){
9880  dist= abs(radius-SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]);
9881  jSpan=iSpan;
9882  }
9883  }
9884  }
9885  else{
9886  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
9887  if (dist > (abs(coord[2]-SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]))){
9888  dist= abs(coord[2]-SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]);
9889  jSpan=iSpan;
9890  }
9891  }
9892  }
9893  break;
9894 
9895  case AXIAL_CENTRIFUGAL:
9896  if (marker_flag == INFLOW){
9897  radius = sqrt(coord[0]*coord[0]+coord[1]*coord[1]);
9898  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
9899  if (dist > (abs(radius - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]))){
9900  dist= abs(radius-SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]);
9901  jSpan=iSpan;
9902  }
9903  }
9904  }
9905  else{
9906  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
9907  if (dist > (abs(coord[2]-SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]))){
9908  dist= abs(coord[2]-SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]);
9909  jSpan=iSpan;
9910  }
9911  }
9912  }
9913  break;
9914  }
9915  }
9916 
9917  /*--- 2D problem do not need span-wise separation---*/
9918  else{
9919  jSpan = 0;
9920  }
9921 
9922  if(node[iPoint]->GetDomain()){
9923  nVertexSpan[iMarker][jSpan]++;
9924  }
9925  nVertexSpanHalo[jSpan]++;
9926  }
9927 
9928  /*--- initialize the CTurboVertex pointers and auxiliary pointers ---*/
9929  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
9930  if (allocate){
9931  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan] = new CTurboVertex* [nVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan]];
9932  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan]; iVertex++){
9933  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iVertex] = NULL;
9934  }
9935  }
9936  ordered[iSpan] = new unsigned long [nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]];
9937  disordered[iSpan] = new unsigned long [nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]];
9938  oldVertex3D[iSpan] = new unsigned long [nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]];
9939  checkAssign[iSpan] = new bool [nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]];
9940  area[iSpan] = new su2double [nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]];
9941  unitnormal[iSpan] = new su2double* [nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]];
9942  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]; iVertex++){
9943  unitnormal[iSpan][iVertex] = new su2double [nDim];
9944  }
9945  angPitch[iSpan] = new su2double [nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]];
9946  deltaAngPitch[iSpan] = new su2double [nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]];
9947  nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan] = 0;
9948  }
9949 
9950  /*--- store the vertexes in a ordered manner in span-wise directions but not yet ordered pitch-wise ---*/
9951  for (iVertex = 0; (unsigned long)iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
9952  iPoint = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
9953  if(nDim == 3){
9954  dist = 10E+06;
9955  jSpan = -1;
9956 
9957  coord = node[iPoint]->GetCoord();
9958  switch (config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone)){
9959  case CENTRIFUGAL: case CENTRIPETAL:
9960  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
9961  if (dist > (abs(coord[2]-SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]))){
9962  dist= abs(coord[2]-SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]);
9963  jSpan=iSpan;
9964  }
9965  }
9966  break;
9967  case AXIAL:
9968  radius = sqrt(coord[0]*coord[0]+coord[1]*coord[1]);
9969  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
9970  if (dist > (abs(radius - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]))){
9971  dist= abs(radius-SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]);
9972  jSpan=iSpan;
9973  }
9974  }
9975  break;
9976  case CENTRIPETAL_AXIAL:
9977  if(marker_flag == OUTFLOW){
9978  radius = sqrt(coord[0]*coord[0]+coord[1]*coord[1]);
9979  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
9980  if (dist > (abs(radius - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]))){
9981  dist= abs(radius-SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]);
9982  jSpan=iSpan;
9983  }
9984  }
9985  }else{
9986  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
9987  if (dist > (abs(coord[2]-SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]))){
9988  dist= abs(coord[2]-SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]);
9989  jSpan=iSpan;
9990  }
9991  }
9992  }
9993  break;
9994 
9995  case AXIAL_CENTRIFUGAL:
9996  if(marker_flag == INFLOW){
9997  radius = sqrt(coord[0]*coord[0]+coord[1]*coord[1]);
9998  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
9999  if (dist > (abs(radius - SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]))){
10000  dist= abs(radius-SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]);
10001  jSpan=iSpan;
10002  }
10003  }
10004  }else{
10005  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
10006  if (dist > (abs(coord[2]-SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]))){
10007  dist= abs(coord[2]-SpanWiseValue[marker_flag-1][iSpan]);
10008  jSpan=iSpan;
10009  }
10010  }
10011  }
10012  break;
10013  }
10014  }
10015  /*--- 2D problem do not need span-wise separation---*/
10016  else{
10017  jSpan = 0;
10018  }
10019  /*--- compute the face area associated with the vertex ---*/
10020  vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal(NormalArea);
10021  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) NormalArea[iDim] = -NormalArea[iDim];
10022  Area = 0.0;
10023  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
10024  Area += NormalArea[iDim]*NormalArea[iDim];
10025  Area = sqrt(Area);
10026  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) NormalArea[iDim] /= Area;
10027  /*--- store all the all the info into the auxiliary containers ---*/
10028  disordered[jSpan][nVertexSpanHalo[jSpan]] = iPoint;
10029  oldVertex3D[jSpan][nVertexSpanHalo[jSpan]] = iVertex;
10030  area[jSpan][nVertexSpanHalo[jSpan]] = Area;
10031  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++){
10032  unitnormal[jSpan][nVertexSpanHalo[jSpan]][iDim] = NormalArea[iDim];
10033  }
10034  checkAssign[jSpan][nVertexSpanHalo[jSpan]] = false;
10035  nVertexSpanHalo[jSpan]++;
10036  }
10037 
10038  /*--- using the auxiliary container reordered the vertexes pitch-wise direction at each span ---*/
10039  // the reordering algorithm can be based on the Y-coordinate.
10040  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
10041 
10042  /*--- find the local minimum and maximum pitch-wise for each processor---*/
10043  min = 10E+06;
10044  minInt = 10E+06;
10045  max = -10E+06;
10046  for(iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex < nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]; iSpanVertex++){
10047  iPoint = disordered[iSpan][iSpanVertex];
10048  coord = node[iPoint]->GetCoord();
10049  /*--- find nodes at minimum pitch among all nodes---*/
10050  if (coord[1]<min){
10051  min = coord[1];
10052  if (nDim == 2 && config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone) == AXIAL){
10053  MinAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = coord[1];
10054  }
10055  else{
10056  MinAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = atan(coord[1]/coord[0]);
10057  }
10058  minAngPitch[iSpan]= MinAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan];
10059  kSpanVertex =iSpanVertex;
10060  }
10061 
10062  /*--- find nodes at minimum pitch among the internal nodes---*/
10063  if (coord[1]<minInt){
10064  if(node[iPoint]->GetDomain()){
10065  minInt = coord[1];
10066  if (nDim == 2 && config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone) == AXIAL){
10067  minIntAngPitch[iSpan] = coord[1];
10068  }
10069  else{
10070  minIntAngPitch[iSpan] = atan(coord[1]/coord[0]);
10071  }
10072  }
10073  }
10074 
10075  /*--- find nodes at maximum pitch among the internal nodes---*/
10076  if (coord[1]>max){
10077  if(node[iPoint]->GetDomain()){
10078  max =coord[1];
10079  if (nDim == 2 && config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone) == AXIAL){
10080  MaxAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = coord[1];
10081  }
10082  else{
10083  MaxAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = atan(coord[1]/coord[0]);
10084  }
10085  maxAngPitch[iSpan]= MaxAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan];
10086  }
10087  }
10088  }
10089 
10090  iInternalVertex = 0;
10091 
10092  /*--- reordering the vertex pitch-wise, store the ordered vertexes span-wise and pitch-wise---*/
10093  for(iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex<nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]; iSpanVertex++){
10094  dist = 10E+06;
10095  ordered[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = disordered[iSpan][kSpanVertex];
10096  checkAssign[iSpan][kSpanVertex] = true;
10097  coord = node[ordered[iSpan][iSpanVertex]]->GetCoord();
10098  target = coord[1];
10099  if (nDim == 2 && config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone) == AXIAL){
10100  angPitch[iSpan][iSpanVertex]=coord[1];
10101  }
10102  else{
10103  angPitch[iSpan][iSpanVertex]=atan(coord[1]/coord[0]);
10104  }
10105  if(iSpanVertex == 0){
10106  deltaAngPitch[iSpan][iSpanVertex]=0.0;
10107  }
10108  else{
10109  deltaAngPitch[iSpan][iSpanVertex]= angPitch[iSpan][iSpanVertex] - angPitch[iSpan][iSpanVertex - 1];
10110  }
10111  /*---create turbovertex structure only for the internal nodes---*/
10112  if(node[ordered[iSpan][iSpanVertex]]->GetDomain()){
10113  if (allocate){
10114  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iInternalVertex] = new CTurboVertex(ordered[iSpan][iSpanVertex], nDim);
10115  }
10116  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iInternalVertex]->SetArea(area[iSpan][kSpanVertex]);
10117  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iInternalVertex]->SetNormal(unitnormal[iSpan][kSpanVertex]);
10118  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iInternalVertex]->SetOldVertex(oldVertex3D[iSpan][kSpanVertex]);
10119  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iInternalVertex]->SetAngularCoord(angPitch[iSpan][iSpanVertex]);
10120  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iInternalVertex]->SetDeltaAngularCoord(deltaAngPitch[iSpan][iSpanVertex]);
10121  switch (config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone)){
10122  case CENTRIFUGAL:
10123  Normal2 = 0.0;
10124  for(iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 +=coord[iDim]*coord[iDim];
10125  if (marker_flag == INFLOW){
10126  TurboNormal[0] = -coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
10127  TurboNormal[1] = -coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
10128  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
10129  }else{
10130  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
10131  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
10132  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
10133  }
10134  break;
10135  case CENTRIPETAL:
10136  Normal2 = 0.0;
10137  for(iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 +=coord[iDim]*coord[iDim];
10138  if (marker_flag == OUTFLOW){
10139  TurboNormal[0] = -coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
10140  TurboNormal[1] = -coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
10141  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
10142  }else{
10143  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
10144  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
10145  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
10146  }
10147  break;
10148  case AXIAL:
10149  Normal2 = 0.0;
10150  for(iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 +=coord[iDim]*coord[iDim];
10151  if(nDim == 3){
10152  if (marker_flag == INFLOW){
10153  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
10154  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
10155  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
10156  }else{
10157  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
10158  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
10159  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
10160  }
10161  }
10162  else{
10163  if (marker_flag == INFLOW){
10164  TurboNormal[0] = -1.0;
10165  TurboNormal[1] = 0.0;
10166  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
10167  }else{
10168  TurboNormal[0] = 1.0;
10169  TurboNormal[1] = 0.0;
10170  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
10171  }
10172  }
10173 
10174  break;
10175  case CENTRIPETAL_AXIAL:
10176  Normal2 = 0.0;
10177  for(iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 +=coord[iDim]*coord[iDim];
10178  if (marker_flag == INFLOW){
10179  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
10180  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
10181  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
10182  }else{
10183  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
10184  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
10185  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
10186  }
10187  break;
10188 
10189  case AXIAL_CENTRIFUGAL:
10190  Normal2 = 0.0;
10191  for(iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 +=coord[iDim]*coord[iDim];
10192  if (marker_flag == INFLOW){
10193  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
10194  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
10195  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
10196  }else{
10197  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
10198  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
10199  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
10200  }
10201  break;
10202 
10203  }
10204  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iInternalVertex]->SetTurboNormal(TurboNormal);
10205  iInternalVertex++;
10206  }
10207 
10208 
10209  for(jSpanVertex = 0; jSpanVertex<nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]; jSpanVertex++){
10210  coord = node[disordered[iSpan][jSpanVertex]]->GetCoord();
10211  if(dist >= (coord[1] - target) && !checkAssign[iSpan][jSpanVertex] && (coord[1] - target) >= 0.0){
10212  dist= coord[1] - target;
10213  kSpanVertex =jSpanVertex;
10214  }
10215  }
10216  }
10217  }
10218 
10219  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
10220 
10221  delete [] ordered[iSpan];
10222  delete [] disordered[iSpan];
10223  delete [] oldVertex3D[iSpan];
10224  delete [] checkAssign[iSpan];
10225  delete [] area[iSpan];
10226  delete [] angPitch[iSpan];
10227  delete [] deltaAngPitch[iSpan];
10228 
10229  for(iVertex=0; iVertex < nVertexSpanHalo[iSpan]; iVertex++){
10230  delete [] unitnormal[iSpan][iVertex];
10231  }
10232  delete [] unitnormal[iSpan];
10233  }
10234  }
10235  }
10236  }
10237  }
10238 
10239  /*--- to be set for all the processor to initialize an appropriate number of frequency for the NR BC ---*/
10240  nVertMax = 0;
10241 
10242  /*--- compute global max and min pitch per span ---*/
10243  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
10244  nVert = 0;
10245 
10246 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
10247  MyMin = minAngPitch[iSpan]; minAngPitch[iSpan] = 10.0E+6;
10248  MyIntMin = minIntAngPitch[iSpan]; minIntAngPitch[iSpan] = 10.0E+6;
10249  MyMax = maxAngPitch[iSpan]; maxAngPitch[iSpan] = -10.0E+6;
10250 
10251  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyMin, &minAngPitch[iSpan], 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MIN, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
10252  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyIntMin, &minIntAngPitch[iSpan], 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MIN, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
10253  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyMax, &maxAngPitch[iSpan], 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MAX, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
10254 #endif
10255 
10256 
10257  /*--- compute the relative angular pitch with respect to the minimum value ---*/
10258 
10259  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++){
10260  for (iMarkerTP=1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery()+1; iMarkerTP++){
10261  if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP){
10262  if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag){
10263  nVert = nVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan];
10264  MinAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = minAngPitch[iSpan];
10265  MaxAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = maxAngPitch[iSpan];
10266  MinRelAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan] = minIntAngPitch[iSpan] - minAngPitch[iSpan];
10267  for(iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex< nVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan]; iSpanVertex++){
10268  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iSpanVertex]->SetRelAngularCoord(MinAngularCoord[iMarker][iSpan]);
10269  }
10270  }
10271  }
10272  }
10273  }
10274 
10275 
10276 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
10277  My_nVert = nVert;nVert = 0;
10278  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&My_nVert, &nVert, 1, MPI_INT, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
10279 #endif
10280 
10281  /*--- to be set for all the processor to initialize an appropriate number of frequency for the NR BC ---*/
10282  if(nVert > nVertMax){
10283  SetnVertexSpanMax(marker_flag,nVert);
10284  }
10285  /*--- for all the processor should be known the amount of total turbovertex per span ---*/
10286  nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]= (int)nVert;
10287 
10288  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++){
10289  for (iMarkerTP=1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery()+1; iMarkerTP++){
10290  if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP){
10291  if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag){
10292  nTotVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan]= nVert;
10293  nTotVertexSpan[iMarker][nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]]+= nVert;
10294  }
10295  }
10296  }
10297  }
10298  }
10299 
10300 
10301  /*--- Printing Tec file to check the global ordering of the turbovertex pitch-wise ---*/
10302  /*--- Send all the info to the MASTERNODE ---*/
10303 
10304  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
10305  x_loc[iSpan] = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]];
10306  y_loc[iSpan] = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]];
10307  z_loc[iSpan] = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]];
10308  angCoord_loc[iSpan] = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]];
10309  deltaAngCoord_loc[iSpan] = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]];
10310  rank_loc[iSpan] = new int[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]];
10311  for(iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex<nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]; iSpanVertex++){
10312  x_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
10313  y_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
10314  z_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
10315  angCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
10316  deltaAngCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
10317  rank_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1;
10318  }
10319  }
10320 
10321  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++){
10322  for (iMarkerTP=1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery()+1; iMarkerTP++){
10323  if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP){
10324  if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag){
10325  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
10326  for(iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex<nVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan]; iSpanVertex++){
10327  iPoint = turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iSpanVertex]->GetNode();
10328  coord = node[iPoint]->GetCoord();
10329  x_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = coord[0];
10330  y_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = coord[1];
10331  if (nDim == 3){
10332  z_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = coord[2];
10333  }
10334  else{
10335  z_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = 0.0;
10336  }
10337  angCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iSpanVertex]->GetRelAngularCoord();
10338  deltaAngCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iSpanVertex]->GetDeltaAngularCoord();
10339  }
10340  }
10341  }
10342  }
10343  }
10344  }
10345 
10346 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
10347 
10348  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
10349  if (rank == MASTER_NODE){
10350  x_gb = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]*size];
10351  y_gb = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]*size];
10352  z_gb = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]*size];
10353  angCoord_gb = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]*size];
10354  deltaAngCoord_gb = new su2double[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]*size];
10355  checkAssign_gb = new bool[nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]*size];
10356 
10357  for(iSize= 0; iSize < size; iSize++){
10358  for(iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex < nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]; iSpanVertex++){
10359  checkAssign_gb[iSize*nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + iSpanVertex] = false;
10360  }
10361  }
10362  }
10363  SU2_MPI::Gather(y_loc[iSpan], nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] , MPI_DOUBLE, y_gb, nTotVertex_gb[iSpan], MPI_DOUBLE, MASTER_NODE, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
10364  SU2_MPI::Gather(x_loc[iSpan], nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] , MPI_DOUBLE, x_gb, nTotVertex_gb[iSpan], MPI_DOUBLE, MASTER_NODE, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
10365  SU2_MPI::Gather(z_loc[iSpan], nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] , MPI_DOUBLE, z_gb, nTotVertex_gb[iSpan], MPI_DOUBLE, MASTER_NODE, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
10366  SU2_MPI::Gather(angCoord_loc[iSpan], nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] , MPI_DOUBLE, angCoord_gb, nTotVertex_gb[iSpan], MPI_DOUBLE, MASTER_NODE, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
10367  SU2_MPI::Gather(deltaAngCoord_loc[iSpan], nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] , MPI_DOUBLE, deltaAngCoord_gb, nTotVertex_gb[iSpan], MPI_DOUBLE, MASTER_NODE, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
10368 
10369  if (rank == MASTER_NODE){
10370  for(iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex<nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]; iSpanVertex++){
10371  x_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
10372  y_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
10373  z_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
10374  angCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
10375  deltaAngCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = -1.0;
10376  }
10377 
10378 
10379 
10380  min = 10.0E+06;
10381  for(iSize= 0; iSize < size; iSize++){
10382  if (angCoord_gb[iSize*nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]] < min && angCoord_gb[iSize*nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]] >= 0.0){
10383  kSize = iSize;
10384  min = angCoord_gb[iSize*nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]];
10385  }
10386  }
10387 
10388  kSpanVertex = 0;
10389  for(iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex < nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]; iSpanVertex++){
10390  x_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = x_gb[kSize*nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + kSpanVertex];
10391  y_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = y_gb[kSize*nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + kSpanVertex];
10392  z_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = z_gb[kSize*nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + kSpanVertex];
10393  angCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = angCoord_gb[kSize*nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + kSpanVertex];
10394  deltaAngCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = deltaAngCoord_gb[kSize*nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + kSpanVertex];
10395  rank_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] = kSize;
10396  target = angCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex];
10397  checkAssign_gb[kSize*nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + kSpanVertex] = true;
10398  min = 10.0E+06;
10399  for(jSize= 0; jSize < size; jSize++){
10400  for(jSpanVertex = 0; jSpanVertex < nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]; jSpanVertex++){
10401  if (angCoord_gb[jSize*nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + jSpanVertex] < min && (angCoord_gb[jSize*nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + jSpanVertex] - target) >= 0.0 && !checkAssign_gb[jSize*nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + jSpanVertex]){
10402  kSize = jSize;
10403  kSpanVertex = jSpanVertex;
10404  min = angCoord_gb[jSize*nTotVertex_gb[iSpan] + jSpanVertex];
10405  }
10406  }
10407  }
10408  }
10409 
10410 
10411  delete [] x_gb; delete [] y_gb; delete [] z_gb; delete [] angCoord_gb; delete [] deltaAngCoord_gb; delete[] checkAssign_gb;
10412 
10413  }
10414  }
10415 
10416 #endif
10417 
10418  if (rank == MASTER_NODE){
10419  if (marker_flag == INFLOW && val_iZone ==0){
10420  std::string sPath = "TURBOMACHINERY";
10421  int nError = 0;
10422 #if defined(_WIN32)
10423 #ifdef __MINGW32__
10424  nError = mkdir(sPath.c_str()); // MINGW on Windows
10425 #else
10426  nError = _mkdir(sPath.c_str()); // can be used on Windows
10427 #endif
10428 #else
10429  mode_t nMode = 0733; // UNIX style permissions
10430  nError = mkdir(sPath.c_str(),nMode); // can be used on non-Windows
10431 #endif
10432  if (nError != 0) {
10433  cout << "TURBOMACHINERY folder creation failed." <<endl;
10434  }
10435  }
10436  if (marker_flag == INFLOW){
10437  multizone_filename = "TURBOMACHINERY/spanwise_division_inflow.dat";
10438  }
10439  else{
10440  multizone_filename = "TURBOMACHINERY/spanwise_division_outflow.dat";
10441  }
10442  char buffer[50];
10443 
10444  if (GetnZone() > 1){
10445  unsigned short lastindex = multizone_filename.find_last_of(".");
10446  multizone_filename = multizone_filename.substr(0, lastindex);
10447  SPRINTF (buffer, "_%d.dat", SU2_TYPE::Int(val_iZone));
10448  multizone_filename.append(string(buffer));
10449  }
10450 
10451  // File to print the vector x_loc, y_loc, z_loc, globIdx_loc to check vertex ordering
10452  ofstream myfile;
10453  myfile.open (multizone_filename.data(), ios::out | ios::trunc);
10454  myfile.setf(ios::uppercase | ios::scientific);
10455  myfile.precision(8);
10456 
10457  myfile << "TITLE = \"Global index visualization file\"" << endl;
10458  myfile << "VARIABLES =" << endl;
10459  myfile.width(10); myfile << "\"iSpan\"";
10460  myfile.width(20); myfile << "\"x_coord\"" ;
10461  myfile.width(20); myfile << "\"y_coord\"" ;
10462  myfile.width(20); myfile << "\"z_coord\"" ;
10463  myfile.width(20); myfile << "\"radius\"" ;
10464  myfile.width(20); myfile << "\"Relative Angular Coord \"" ;
10465  myfile.width(20); myfile << "\"Delta Angular Coord \"" ;
10466  myfile.width(20); myfile << "\"processor\"" <<endl;
10467  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
10468  for(iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex < nTotVertex_gb[iSpan]; iSpanVertex++){
10469  radius = sqrt(x_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex]*x_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex] + y_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex]*y_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex]);
10470  myfile.width(10); myfile << iSpan;
10471  myfile.width(20); myfile << x_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex];
10472  myfile.width(20); myfile << y_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex];
10473  myfile.width(20); myfile << z_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex];
10474  myfile.width(20); myfile << radius;
10475  if (nDim ==2 && config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone)){
10476  myfile.width(20); myfile << angCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex];
10477  myfile.width(20); myfile << deltaAngCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex];
10478  }
10479  else{
10480  myfile.width(20); myfile << angCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex]*180.0/PI_NUMBER;
10481  myfile.width(20); myfile << deltaAngCoord_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex]*180.0/PI_NUMBER;
10482  }
10483  myfile.width(20); myfile << rank_loc[iSpan][iSpanVertex]<<endl;
10484  }
10485  myfile << endl;
10486  }
10487  }
10488 
10489 
10490  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
10491  delete [] x_loc[iSpan];
10492  delete [] y_loc[iSpan];
10493  delete [] z_loc[iSpan];
10494  delete [] angCoord_loc[iSpan];
10495  delete [] deltaAngCoord_loc[iSpan];
10496  delete [] rank_loc[iSpan];
10497 
10498  }
10499 
10500 
10501  delete [] area;
10502  delete [] ordered;
10503  delete [] disordered;
10504  delete [] oldVertex3D;
10505  delete [] checkAssign;
10506  delete [] TurboNormal;
10507  delete [] unitnormal;
10508  delete [] NormalArea;
10509  delete [] x_loc;
10510  delete [] y_loc;
10511  delete [] z_loc;
10512  delete [] angCoord_loc;
10513  delete [] nTotVertex_gb;
10514  delete [] nVertexSpanHalo;
10515  delete [] angPitch;
10516  delete [] deltaAngPitch;
10517  delete [] deltaAngCoord_loc;
10518  delete [] rank_loc;
10519  delete [] minAngPitch;
10520  delete [] maxAngPitch;
10521  delete [] minIntAngPitch;
10522 
10523 }
10524 
10525 
10526 void CPhysicalGeometry::UpdateTurboVertex(CConfig *config, unsigned short val_iZone, unsigned short marker_flag) {
10527  unsigned short iMarker, iMarkerTP, iSpan, iDim;
10528  long iSpanVertex, iPoint;
10529  su2double *coord, *TurboNormal, Normal2;
10530 
10531  /*--- Initialize auxiliary pointers ---*/
10532  TurboNormal = new su2double[3];
10533 
10534  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++){
10535  for (iMarkerTP=1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery()+1; iMarkerTP++){
10536  if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP){
10537  if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag){
10538  for(iSpan = 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
10539  for(iSpanVertex = 0; iSpanVertex<nVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan]; iSpanVertex++){
10540  iPoint = turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iSpanVertex]->GetNode();
10541  coord = node[iPoint]->GetCoord();
10542  /*--- compute appropriate turbo normal ---*/
10543  switch (config->GetKind_TurboMachinery(val_iZone)){
10544  case CENTRIFUGAL:
10545  Normal2 = 0.0;
10546  for(iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 +=coord[iDim]*coord[iDim];
10547  if (marker_flag == INFLOW){
10548  TurboNormal[0] = -coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
10549  TurboNormal[1] = -coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
10550  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
10551  }else{
10552  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
10553  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
10554  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
10555  }
10556  break;
10557  case CENTRIPETAL:
10558  Normal2 = 0.0;
10559  for(iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 +=coord[iDim]*coord[iDim];
10560  if (marker_flag == OUTFLOW){
10561  TurboNormal[0] = -coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
10562  TurboNormal[1] = -coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
10563  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
10564  }else{
10565  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
10566  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
10567  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
10568  }
10569  break;
10570  case AXIAL:
10571  Normal2 = 0.0;
10572  for(iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 +=coord[iDim]*coord[iDim];
10573  if(nDim == 3){
10574  if (marker_flag == INFLOW){
10575  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
10576  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
10577  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
10578  }else{
10579  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
10580  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
10581  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
10582  }
10583  }
10584  else{
10585  if (marker_flag == INFLOW){
10586  TurboNormal[0] = -1.0;
10587  TurboNormal[1] = 0.0;
10588  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
10589  }else{
10590  TurboNormal[0] = 1.0;
10591  TurboNormal[1] = 0.0;
10592  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
10593  }
10594  }
10595 
10596  break;
10597  case CENTRIPETAL_AXIAL:
10598  Normal2 = 0.0;
10599  for(iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 +=coord[iDim]*coord[iDim];
10600  if (marker_flag == INFLOW){
10601  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
10602  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
10603  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
10604  }else{
10605  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
10606  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
10607  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
10608  }
10609  break;
10610 
10611  case AXIAL_CENTRIFUGAL:
10612  Normal2 = 0.0;
10613  for(iDim = 0; iDim < 2; iDim++) Normal2 +=coord[iDim]*coord[iDim];
10614  if (marker_flag == INFLOW){
10615  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
10616  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
10617  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
10618  }else{
10619  TurboNormal[0] = coord[0]/sqrt(Normal2);
10620  TurboNormal[1] = coord[1]/sqrt(Normal2);
10621  TurboNormal[2] = 0.0;
10622  }
10623  break;
10624  }
10625 
10626  /*--- store the new turbo normal ---*/
10627  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iSpanVertex]->SetTurboNormal(TurboNormal);
10628  }
10629  }
10630  }
10631  }
10632  }
10633  }
10634 
10635  delete [] TurboNormal;
10636 }
10637 
10638 void CPhysicalGeometry::SetAvgTurboValue(CConfig *config, unsigned short val_iZone, unsigned short marker_flag, bool allocate) {
10639 
10640  unsigned short iMarker, iMarkerTP, iSpan, iDim;
10641  unsigned long iPoint;
10642  su2double *TurboNormal,*coord, *Normal, turboNormal2, Normal2, *gridVel, TotalArea, TotalRadius, radius;
10643  su2double *TotalTurboNormal,*TotalNormal, *TotalGridVel, Area;
10644  long iVertex;
10645  /*-- Variables declaration and allocation ---*/
10646  TotalTurboNormal = new su2double[nDim];
10647  TotalNormal = new su2double[nDim];
10648  TurboNormal = new su2double[nDim];
10649  TotalGridVel = new su2double[nDim];
10650  Normal = new su2double[nDim];
10651 
10652  bool grid_movement = config->GetGrid_Movement();
10653 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
10654  su2double MyTotalArea, MyTotalRadius, *MyTotalTurboNormal= NULL, *MyTotalNormal= NULL, *MyTotalGridVel= NULL;
10655 #endif
10656 
10657  /*--- Intialization of the vector for the interested boundary ---*/
10658  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++){
10659  for (iMarkerTP=1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery()+1; iMarkerTP++){
10660  if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP){
10661  if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag){
10662  if(allocate){
10663  AverageTurboNormal[iMarker] = new su2double *[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1] + 1];
10664  AverageNormal[iMarker] = new su2double *[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1] + 1];
10665  AverageGridVel[iMarker] = new su2double *[nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1] + 1];
10666  AverageTangGridVel[iMarker] = new su2double [nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1] + 1];
10667  SpanArea[iMarker] = new su2double [nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1] + 1];
10668  TurboRadius[iMarker] = new su2double [nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1] + 1];
10669  for (iSpan= 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1] + 1; iSpan++){
10670  AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan] = new su2double [nDim];
10671  AverageNormal[iMarker][iSpan] = new su2double [nDim];
10672  AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan] = new su2double [nDim];
10673  }
10674  }
10675  for (iSpan= 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1] + 1; iSpan++){
10676  AverageTangGridVel[iMarker][iSpan] = 0.0;
10677  SpanArea[iMarker][iSpan] = 0.0;
10678  TurboRadius[iMarker][iSpan] = 0.0;
10679  for(iDim=0; iDim < nDim; iDim++){
10680  AverageTurboNormal[iMarker][iSpan][iDim] = 0.0;
10681  AverageNormal[iMarker][iSpan][iDim] = 0.0;
10682  AverageGridVel[iMarker][iSpan][iDim] = 0.0;
10683  }
10684  }
10685  }
10686  }
10687  }
10688  }
10689 
10690 
10691 
10692  /*--- start computing the average quantities span wise --- */
10693  for (iSpan= 0; iSpan < nSpanWiseSections[marker_flag-1]; iSpan++){
10694 
10695  /*--- Forces initialization for contenitors to zero ---*/
10696  for (iDim=0; iDim<nDim; iDim++) {
10697  TotalTurboNormal[iDim] =0.0;
10698  TotalNormal[iDim] =0.0;
10699  TotalGridVel[iDim] =0.0;
10700  }
10701  TotalArea = 0.0;
10702  TotalRadius = 0.0;
10703  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++){
10704  for (iMarkerTP=1; iMarkerTP < config->GetnMarker_Turbomachinery()+1; iMarkerTP++){
10705  if (config->GetMarker_All_Turbomachinery(iMarker) == iMarkerTP){
10706  if (config->GetMarker_All_TurbomachineryFlag(iMarker) == marker_flag){
10707  for(iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexSpan[iMarker][iSpan]; iVertex++){
10708  iPoint = turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iVertex]->GetNode();
10709  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iVertex]->GetTurboNormal(TurboNormal);
10710  turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
10711  coord = node[iPoint]->GetCoord();
10712 
10713  if (nDim == 3){
10714  radius = sqrt(coord[0]*coord[0] + coord[1]*coord[1]);
10715  }
10716  else{
10717  radius = 0.0;
10718  }
10719  Area = turbovertex[iMarker][iSpan][iVertex]->GetArea();
10720  TotalArea += Area;
10721  TotalRadius += radius;
10722  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
10723  TotalTurboNormal[iDim] +=TurboNormal[iDim];
