14626  Distance = fabs(Xcoord_Airfoil[iVertex] - Xcoord_Airfoil[Trailing_Point]);
14627  if (MaxDistance < Distance) { MaxDistance = Distance; }
14628  }
14629 
14630  Width = MaxDistance;
14631  return Width;
14632 
14633 }
14634 
14635 su2double CPhysicalGeometry::Compute_WaterLineWidth(su2double *Plane_P0, su2double *Plane_Normal, CConfig *config, vector<su2double> &Xcoord_Airfoil, vector<su2double> &Ycoord_Airfoil, vector<su2double> &Zcoord_Airfoil) {
14636 
14637  unsigned long iVertex, Trailing_Point;
14638  su2double MinDistance, Distance, WaterLineWidth = 0.0;
14639  su2double WaterLine = config->GetGeo_Waterline_Location();
14640 
14641  MinDistance = 1E10; WaterLineWidth = 0; Trailing_Point = 0;
14642  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < Xcoord_Airfoil.size(); iVertex++) {
14643  Distance = fabs(Zcoord_Airfoil[iVertex] - WaterLine);
14644  if (Distance < MinDistance) {
14645  MinDistance = Distance;
14646  WaterLineWidth = fabs(Xcoord_Airfoil[iVertex] - Xcoord_Airfoil[Trailing_Point]);
14647  }
14648  }
14649 
14650  return WaterLineWidth;
14651 
14652 }
14653 
14654 su2double CPhysicalGeometry::Compute_Height(su2double *Plane_P0, su2double *Plane_Normal, vector<su2double> &Xcoord_Airfoil, vector<su2double> &Ycoord_Airfoil, vector<su2double> &Zcoord_Airfoil) {
14655 
14656  unsigned long iVertex, Trailing_Point;
14657  su2double MaxDistance, Distance, Height = 0.0;
14658 
14659  MaxDistance = 0.0; Trailing_Point = 0;
14660  for (iVertex = 1; iVertex < Zcoord_Airfoil.size(); iVertex++) {
14661  Distance = sqrt(pow(Zcoord_Airfoil[iVertex] - Zcoord_Airfoil[Trailing_Point], 2.0));
14662  if (MaxDistance < Distance) { MaxDistance = Distance; }
14663  }
14664 
14665  Height = MaxDistance;
14666 
14667  return Height;
14668 
14669 }
14670 
14671 su2double CPhysicalGeometry::Compute_LERadius(su2double *Plane_P0, su2double *Plane_Normal, vector<su2double> &Xcoord_Airfoil, vector<su2double> &Ycoord_Airfoil, vector<su2double> &Zcoord_Airfoil) {
14672 
14673  unsigned long iVertex, Trailing_Point, Leading_Point;
14674  su2double MaxDistance, Distance, LERadius = 0.0, X1, X2, X3, Y1, Y2, Y3, Ma, Mb, Xc, Yc, Radius;
14675 
14676  /*--- Find the leading and trailing edges and compute the radius of curvature ---*/
14677 
14678  MaxDistance = 0.0; Trailing_Point = 0; Leading_Point = 0;
14679  for (iVertex = 1; iVertex < Xcoord_Airfoil.size(); iVertex++) {
14680 
14681  Distance = sqrt(pow(Xcoord_Airfoil[iVertex] - Xcoord_Airfoil[Trailing_Point], 2.0) +
14682  pow(Ycoord_Airfoil[iVertex] - Ycoord_Airfoil[Trailing_Point], 2.0) +
14683  pow(Zcoord_Airfoil[iVertex] - Zcoord_Airfoil[Trailing_Point], 2.0));
14684 
14685  if (MaxDistance < Distance) { MaxDistance = Distance; Leading_Point = iVertex; }
14686  }
14687 
14688  X1 = Xcoord_Airfoil[Leading_Point-3];
14689  Y1 = Zcoord_Airfoil[Leading_Point-3];
14690 
14691  X2 = Xcoord_Airfoil[Leading_Point];
14692  Y2 = Zcoord_Airfoil[Leading_Point];
14693 
14694  X3 = Xcoord_Airfoil[Leading_Point+3];
14695  Y3 = Zcoord_Airfoil[Leading_Point+3];
14696 
14697  if (X2 != X1) Ma = (Y2-Y1) / (X2-X1); else Ma = 0.0;
14698  if (X3 != X2) Mb = (Y3-Y2) / (X3-X2); else Mb = 0.0;
14699 
14700  if (Mb != Ma) Xc = (Ma*Mb*(Y1-Y3)+Mb*(X1+X2)-Ma*(X2+X3))/(2.0*(Mb-Ma)); else Xc = 0.0;
14701  if (Ma != 0.0) Yc = -(1.0/Ma)*(Xc-0.5*(X1+X2))+0.5*(Y1+Y2); else Yc = 0.0;
14702 
14703  Radius = sqrt((Xc-X1)*(Xc-X1)+(Yc-Y1)*(Yc-Y1));
14704  if (Radius != 0.0) LERadius = 1.0/Radius; else LERadius = 0.0;
14705 
14706  return LERadius;
14707 
14708 }
14709 
14710 su2double CPhysicalGeometry::Compute_Thickness(su2double *Plane_P0, su2double *Plane_Normal, su2double Location, CConfig *config, vector<su2double> &Xcoord_Airfoil, vector<su2double> &Ycoord_Airfoil, vector<su2double> &Zcoord_Airfoil, su2double &ZLoc) {
14711 
14712  unsigned long iVertex, jVertex, n_Upper, n_Lower, Trailing_Point, Leading_Point;
14713  su2double Thickness_Location, Normal[3], Tangent[3], BiNormal[3], auxXCoord, auxYCoord, auxZCoord, Thickness_Value = 0.0, Length, Xcoord_Trailing, Ycoord_Trailing, Zcoord_Trailing, ValCos, ValSin, XValue, ZValue, zp1, zpn, Chord, MaxDistance, Distance, AoA;
14714  vector<su2double> Xcoord_Upper, Ycoord_Upper, Zcoord_Upper, Z2coord_Upper, Xcoord_Lower, Ycoord_Lower, Zcoord_Lower, Z2coord_Lower, Z2coord, Xcoord_Normal, Ycoord_Normal, Zcoord_Normal, Xcoord_Airfoil_, Ycoord_Airfoil_, Zcoord_Airfoil_;
14715  su2double Zcoord_Up, Zcoord_Down, ZLoc_, YLoc_;
14716 
14717  /*--- Find the leading and trailing edges and compute the angle of attack ---*/
14718 
14719  MaxDistance = 0.0; Trailing_Point = 0; Leading_Point = 0;
14720  for (iVertex = 1; iVertex < Xcoord_Airfoil.size(); iVertex++) {
14721  Distance = sqrt(pow(Xcoord_Airfoil[iVertex] - Xcoord_Airfoil[Trailing_Point], 2.0) +
14722  pow(Ycoord_Airfoil[iVertex] - Ycoord_Airfoil[Trailing_Point], 2.0) +
14723  pow(Zcoord_Airfoil[iVertex] - Zcoord_Airfoil[Trailing_Point], 2.0));
14724 
14725  if (MaxDistance < Distance) { MaxDistance = Distance; Leading_Point = iVertex; }
14726  }
14727 
14728  AoA = atan((Zcoord_Airfoil[Leading_Point] - Zcoord_Airfoil[Trailing_Point]) / (Xcoord_Airfoil[Trailing_Point] - Xcoord_Airfoil[Leading_Point]))*180/PI_NUMBER;
14729  Chord = MaxDistance;
14730 
14731  /*--- Translate to the origin ---*/
14732 
14733  Xcoord_Trailing = Xcoord_Airfoil[0];
14734  Ycoord_Trailing = Ycoord_Airfoil[0];
14735  Zcoord_Trailing = Zcoord_Airfoil[0];
14736 
14737  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < Xcoord_Airfoil.size(); iVertex++) {
14738  Xcoord_Airfoil_.push_back(Xcoord_Airfoil[iVertex] - Xcoord_Trailing);
14739  Ycoord_Airfoil_.push_back(Ycoord_Airfoil[iVertex] - Ycoord_Trailing);
14740  Zcoord_Airfoil_.push_back(Zcoord_Airfoil[iVertex] - Zcoord_Trailing);
14741  }
14742 
14743  /*--- Rotate the airfoil ---*/
14744 
14745  ValCos = cos(AoA*PI_NUMBER/180.0);
14746  ValSin = sin(AoA*PI_NUMBER/180.0);
14747 
14748  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < Xcoord_Airfoil.size(); iVertex++) {
14749  XValue = Xcoord_Airfoil_[iVertex];
14750  ZValue = Zcoord_Airfoil_[iVertex];
14751 
14752  Xcoord_Airfoil_[iVertex] = XValue*ValCos - ZValue*ValSin;
14753  Zcoord_Airfoil_[iVertex] = ZValue*ValCos + XValue*ValSin;
14754  }
14755 
14756  /*--- Identify upper and lower side, and store the value of the normal --*/
14757 
14758  for (iVertex = 1; iVertex < Xcoord_Airfoil_.size(); iVertex++) {
14759  Tangent[0] = Xcoord_Airfoil_[iVertex] - Xcoord_Airfoil_[iVertex-1];
14760  Tangent[1] = Ycoord_Airfoil_[iVertex] - Ycoord_Airfoil_[iVertex-1];
14761  Tangent[2] = Zcoord_Airfoil_[iVertex] - Zcoord_Airfoil_[iVertex-1];
14762  Length = sqrt(pow(Tangent[0], 2.0) + pow(Tangent[1], 2.0) + pow(Tangent[2], 2.0));
14763  Tangent[0] /= Length; Tangent[1] /= Length; Tangent[2] /= Length;
14764 
14765  BiNormal[0] = Plane_Normal[0];
14766  BiNormal[1] = Plane_Normal[1];
14767  BiNormal[2] = Plane_Normal[2];
14768  Length = sqrt(pow(BiNormal[0], 2.0) + pow(BiNormal[1], 2.0) + pow(BiNormal[2], 2.0));
14769  BiNormal[0] /= Length; BiNormal[1] /= Length; BiNormal[2] /= Length;
14770 
14771  Normal[0] = Tangent[1]*BiNormal[2] - Tangent[2]*BiNormal[1];
14772  Normal[1] = Tangent[2]*BiNormal[0] - Tangent[0]*BiNormal[2];
14773  Normal[2] = Tangent[0]*BiNormal[1] - Tangent[1]*BiNormal[0];
14774 
14775  Xcoord_Normal.push_back(Normal[0]); Ycoord_Normal.push_back(Normal[1]); Zcoord_Normal.push_back(Normal[2]);
14776 
14777  unsigned short index = 2;
14778 
14779  if (Normal[index] >= 0.0) {
14780  Xcoord_Upper.push_back(Xcoord_Airfoil_[iVertex]);
14781  Ycoord_Upper.push_back(Ycoord_Airfoil_[iVertex]);
14782  Zcoord_Upper.push_back(Zcoord_Airfoil_[iVertex]);
14783  }
14784  else {
14785  Xcoord_Lower.push_back(Xcoord_Airfoil_[iVertex]);
14786  Ycoord_Lower.push_back(Ycoord_Airfoil_[iVertex]);
14787  Zcoord_Lower.push_back(Zcoord_Airfoil_[iVertex]);
14788  }
14789 
14790  }
14791 
14792  /*--- Order the arrays using the X component ---*/
14793 
14794  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < Xcoord_Upper.size(); iVertex++) {
14795  for (jVertex = 0; jVertex < Xcoord_Upper.size() - 1 - iVertex; jVertex++) {
14796  if (Xcoord_Upper[jVertex] > Xcoord_Upper[jVertex+1]) {
14797  auxXCoord = Xcoord_Upper[jVertex]; Xcoord_Upper[jVertex] = Xcoord_Upper[jVertex+1]; Xcoord_Upper[jVertex+1] = auxXCoord;
14798  auxYCoord = Ycoord_Upper[jVertex]; Ycoord_Upper[jVertex] = Ycoord_Upper[jVertex+1]; Ycoord_Upper[jVertex+1] = auxYCoord;
14799  auxZCoord = Zcoord_Upper[jVertex]; Zcoord_Upper[jVertex] = Zcoord_Upper[jVertex+1]; Zcoord_Upper[jVertex+1] = auxZCoord;
14800  }
14801  }
14802  }
14803 
14804  /*--- Order the arrays using the X component ---*/
14805 
14806  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < Xcoord_Lower.size(); iVertex++) {
14807  for (jVertex = 0; jVertex < Xcoord_Lower.size() - 1 - iVertex; jVertex++) {
14808  if (Xcoord_Lower[jVertex] > Xcoord_Lower[jVertex+1]) {
14809  auxXCoord = Xcoord_Lower[jVertex]; Xcoord_Lower[jVertex] = Xcoord_Lower[jVertex+1]; Xcoord_Lower[jVertex+1] = auxXCoord;
14810  auxYCoord = Ycoord_Lower[jVertex]; Ycoord_Lower[jVertex] = Ycoord_Lower[jVertex+1]; Ycoord_Lower[jVertex+1] = auxYCoord;
14811  auxZCoord = Zcoord_Lower[jVertex]; Zcoord_Lower[jVertex] = Zcoord_Lower[jVertex+1]; Zcoord_Lower[jVertex+1] = auxZCoord;
14812  }
14813  }
14814  }
14815 
14816  n_Upper = Xcoord_Upper.size();
14817  if (n_Upper > 1) {
14818  zp1 = (Zcoord_Upper[1]-Zcoord_Upper[0])/(Xcoord_Upper[1]-Xcoord_Upper[0]);
14819  zpn = (Zcoord_Upper[n_Upper-1]-Zcoord_Upper[n_Upper-2])/(Xcoord_Upper[n_Upper-1]-Xcoord_Upper[n_Upper-2]);
14820  Z2coord_Upper.resize(n_Upper+1);
14821  SetSpline(Xcoord_Upper, Zcoord_Upper, n_Upper, zp1, zpn, Z2coord_Upper);
14822  }
14823 
14824  n_Lower = Xcoord_Lower.size();
14825  if (n_Lower > 1) {
14826  zp1 = (Zcoord_Lower[1]-Zcoord_Lower[0])/(Xcoord_Lower[1]-Xcoord_Lower[0]);
14827  zpn = (Zcoord_Lower[n_Lower-1]-Zcoord_Lower[n_Lower-2])/(Xcoord_Lower[n_Lower-1]-Xcoord_Lower[n_Lower-2]);
14828  Z2coord_Lower.resize(n_Lower+1);
14829  SetSpline(Xcoord_Lower, Zcoord_Lower, n_Lower, zp1, zpn, Z2coord_Lower);
14830  }
14831 
14832  if ((n_Upper > 1) && (n_Lower > 1)) {
14833 
14834  Thickness_Location = - Chord*(1.0-Location);
14835 
14836  Zcoord_Up = GetSpline(Xcoord_Upper, Zcoord_Upper, Z2coord_Upper, n_Upper, Thickness_Location);
14837  Zcoord_Down = GetSpline(Xcoord_Lower, Zcoord_Lower, Z2coord_Lower, n_Lower, Thickness_Location);
14838 
14839  YLoc_ = Thickness_Location;
14840  ZLoc_ = 0.5*(Zcoord_Up + Zcoord_Down);
14841 
14842  ZLoc = sin(-AoA*PI_NUMBER/180.0)*YLoc_ + cos(-AoA*PI_NUMBER/180.0)*ZLoc_ + Zcoord_Trailing;
14843 
14844  /*--- Compute the thickness (we add a fabs because we can not guarantee the
14845  right sorting of the points and the upper and/or lower part of the airfoil is not well defined) ---*/
14846 
14847  Thickness_Value = fabs(Zcoord_Up - Zcoord_Down);
14848 
14849  }
14850  else { Thickness_Value = 0.0; }
14851 
14852  return Thickness_Value;
14853 
14854 }
14855 
14856 su2double CPhysicalGeometry::Compute_Area(su2double *Plane_P0, su2double *Plane_Normal, CConfig *config,
14857  vector<su2double> &Xcoord_Airfoil, vector<su2double> &Ycoord_Airfoil, vector<su2double> &Zcoord_Airfoil) {
14858  unsigned long iVertex;
14859  su2double Area_Value = 0.0;
14860  vector<su2double> Xcoord_Upper, Ycoord_Upper, Zcoord_Upper, Xcoord_Lower, Ycoord_Lower, Zcoord_Lower, Z2coord, Xcoord_Normal, Ycoord_Normal, Zcoord_Normal, Xcoord_Airfoil_, Ycoord_Airfoil_, Zcoord_Airfoil_;
14861  su2double DeltaZ, DeltaX, X, Z;
14862 
14863  /*--- Use the Green theorem to evaluate the area (the points have been sortered),
14864  we assume that the airfoil is in the X-Z plane ---*/
14865 
14866  Area_Value = 0.0;
14867 
14868  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < Xcoord_Airfoil.size()-1; iVertex++) {
14869  X = 0.5*(Xcoord_Airfoil[iVertex]+Xcoord_Airfoil[iVertex+1]);
14870  Z = 0.5*(Zcoord_Airfoil[iVertex]+Zcoord_Airfoil[iVertex+1]);
14871  DeltaX = Xcoord_Airfoil[iVertex+1] - Xcoord_Airfoil[iVertex];
14872  DeltaZ = Zcoord_Airfoil[iVertex+1] - Zcoord_Airfoil[iVertex];
14873  Area_Value += 0.5*( X*DeltaZ-Z*DeltaX);
14874  }
14875 
14876  X = 0.5*(Xcoord_Airfoil[Xcoord_Airfoil.size()-1]+Xcoord_Airfoil[0]);
14877  Z = 0.5*(Zcoord_Airfoil[Xcoord_Airfoil.size()-1]+Zcoord_Airfoil[0]);
14878  DeltaX = Xcoord_Airfoil[0] - Xcoord_Airfoil[Xcoord_Airfoil.size()-1];
14879  DeltaZ = Zcoord_Airfoil[0] - Zcoord_Airfoil[Xcoord_Airfoil.size()-1];
14880  Area_Value += 0.5 * (X*DeltaZ-Z*DeltaX);
14881 
14882  Area_Value = fabs(Area_Value);
14883 
14884  return Area_Value;
14885 
14886 }
14887 
14888 su2double CPhysicalGeometry::Compute_Length(su2double *Plane_P0, su2double *Plane_Normal, CConfig *config,
14889  vector<su2double> &Xcoord_Airfoil, vector<su2double> &Ycoord_Airfoil, vector<su2double> &Zcoord_Airfoil) {
14890  unsigned long iVertex;
14891  su2double Length_Value = 0.0, Length_Value_ = 0.0;
14892  su2double DeltaZ, DeltaX;
14893 
14894  /*--- Not that in a symmetry plane configuration there is an extra edge that connects
14895  the two extremes, and we really don't now the curve orientation. We will evaluate
14896  both distance and picked the smallest one ---*/
14897 
14898  Length_Value = 0.0;
14899  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < Xcoord_Airfoil.size()-2; iVertex++) {
14900  DeltaX = Xcoord_Airfoil[iVertex+1] - Xcoord_Airfoil[iVertex];
14901  DeltaZ = Zcoord_Airfoil[iVertex+1] - Zcoord_Airfoil[iVertex];
14902  Length_Value += sqrt(DeltaX*DeltaX + DeltaZ*DeltaZ);
14903  }
14904 
14905  Length_Value_ = 0.0;
14906  for (iVertex = 1; iVertex < Xcoord_Airfoil.size()-1; iVertex++) {
14907  DeltaX = Xcoord_Airfoil[iVertex+1] - Xcoord_Airfoil[iVertex];
14908  DeltaZ = Zcoord_Airfoil[iVertex+1] - Zcoord_Airfoil[iVertex];
14909  Length_Value_ += sqrt(DeltaX*DeltaX + DeltaZ*DeltaZ);
14910  }
14911 
14912  Length_Value = min(Length_Value, Length_Value_);
14913 
14914  return Length_Value;
14915 
14916 }
14917 
14918 void CPhysicalGeometry::Compute_Wing(CConfig *config, bool original_surface,
14919  su2double &Wing_Volume, su2double &Wing_MinMaxThickness, su2double &Wing_MaxMaxThickness, su2double &Wing_MinChord, su2double &Wing_MaxChord,
14920  su2double &Wing_MinLERadius, su2double &Wing_MaxLERadius,
14921  su2double &Wing_MinToC, su2double &Wing_MaxToC, su2double &Wing_ObjFun_MinToC, su2double &Wing_MaxTwist, su2double &Wing_MaxCurvature,
14922  su2double &Wing_MaxDihedral) {
14923 
14924  unsigned short iPlane, iDim, nPlane = 0;
14925  unsigned long iVertex;
14926  su2double MinPlane, MaxPlane, dPlane, *Area, *MaxThickness, *ToC, *Chord, *LERadius, *Twist, *Curvature, *Dihedral, SemiSpan;
14927  vector<su2double> *Xcoord_Airfoil, *Ycoord_Airfoil, *Zcoord_Airfoil, *Variable_Airfoil;
14928  ofstream Wing_File, Section_File;
14929 
14930  /*--- Make a large number of section cuts for approximating volume ---*/
14931 
14932  nPlane = config->GetnWingStations();
14933  SemiSpan = config->GetSemiSpan();
14934 
14935  /*--- Allocate memory for the section cutting ---*/
14936 
14937  Area = new su2double [nPlane];
14938  MaxThickness = new su2double [nPlane];
14939  Chord = new su2double [nPlane];
14940  LERadius = new su2double [nPlane];
14941  ToC = new su2double [nPlane];
14942  Twist = new su2double [nPlane];
14943  Curvature = new su2double [nPlane];
14944  Dihedral = new su2double [nPlane];
14945 
14946  su2double **LeadingEdge = new su2double*[nPlane];
14947  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++ )
14948  LeadingEdge[iPlane] = new su2double[nDim];
14949 
14950  su2double **TrailingEdge = new su2double*[nPlane];
14951  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++ )
14952  TrailingEdge[iPlane] = new su2double[nDim];
14953 
14954  su2double **Plane_P0 = new su2double*[nPlane];
14955  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++ )
14956  Plane_P0[iPlane] = new su2double[nDim];
14957 
14958  su2double **Plane_Normal = new su2double*[nPlane];
14959  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++ )
14960  Plane_Normal[iPlane] = new su2double[nDim];
14961 
14962  MinPlane = config->GetStations_Bounds(0); MaxPlane = config->GetStations_Bounds(1);
14963  dPlane = fabs((MaxPlane - MinPlane)/su2double(nPlane-1));
14964 
14965  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
14966  Plane_Normal[iPlane][0] = 0.0; Plane_P0[iPlane][0] = 0.0;
14967  Plane_Normal[iPlane][1] = 0.0; Plane_P0[iPlane][1] = 0.0;
14968  Plane_Normal[iPlane][2] = 0.0; Plane_P0[iPlane][2] = 0.0;
14969 
14970  if (config->GetGeo_Description() == WING) {
14971  Plane_Normal[iPlane][1] = 1.0;
14972  Plane_P0[iPlane][1] = MinPlane + iPlane*dPlane;
14973  }
14974 
14975  if (config->GetGeo_Description() == TWOD_AIRFOIL) {
14976  Plane_Normal[iPlane][2] = 1.0;
14977  Plane_P0[iPlane][2] = MinPlane + iPlane*dPlane;
14978  }
14979 
14980  }
14981 
14982  /*--- Allocate some vectors for storing airfoil coordinates ---*/
14983 
14984  Xcoord_Airfoil = new vector<su2double>[nPlane];
14985  Ycoord_Airfoil = new vector<su2double>[nPlane];
14986  Zcoord_Airfoil = new vector<su2double>[nPlane];
14987  Variable_Airfoil = new vector<su2double>[nPlane];
14988 
14989  /*--- Create the section slices through the geometry ---*/
14990 
14991  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
14992 
14993  ComputeAirfoil_Section(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane],
14994  -1E6, 1E6, -1E6, 1E6, -1E6, 1E6, NULL, Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane],
14995  Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane],
14996  Variable_Airfoil[iPlane], original_surface, config);
14997 
14998  }
14999 
15000  /*--- Compute airfoil characteristic only in the master node ---*/
15001 
15002  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
15003 
15004  /*--- Write an output file---*/
15005 
15006  if (config->GetTabular_FileFormat() == TAB_CSV) {
15007  Wing_File.open("wing_description.csv", ios::out);
15008  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US)
15009  Wing_File << "\"yCoord/SemiSpan\",\"Area (in^2)\",\"Max. Thickness (in)\",\"Chord (in)\",\"Leading Edge Radius (1/in)\",\"Max. Thickness/Chord\",\"Twist (deg)\",\"Curvature (1/in)\",\"Dihedral (deg)\",\"Leading Edge XLoc/SemiSpan\",\"Leading Edge ZLoc/SemiSpan\",\"Trailing Edge XLoc/SemiSpan\",\"Trailing Edge ZLoc/SemiSpan\"" << endl;
15010  else
15011  Wing_File << "\"yCoord/SemiSpan\",\"Area (m^2)\",\"Max. Thickness (m)\",\"Chord (m)\",\"Leading Edge Radius (1/m)\",\"Max. Thickness/Chord\",\"Twist (deg)\",\"Curvature (1/in)\",\"Dihedral (deg)\",\"Leading Edge XLoc/SemiSpan\",\"Leading Edge ZLoc/SemiSpan\",\"Trailing Edge XLoc/SemiSpan\",\"Trailing Edge ZLoc/SemiSpan\"" << endl;
15012  }
15013  else {
15014  Wing_File.open("wing_description.dat", ios::out);
15015  Wing_File << "TITLE = \"Wing description\"" << endl;
15016  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US)
15017  Wing_File << "VARIABLES = \"<greek>h</greek>\",\"Area (in<sup>2</sup>)\",\"Max. Thickness (in)\",\"Chord (in)\",\"Leading Edge Radius (1/in)\",\"Max. Thickness/Chord\",\"Twist (deg)\",\"Curvature (1/in)\",\"Dihedral (deg)\",\"Leading Edge XLoc/SemiSpan\",\"Leading Edge ZLoc/SemiSpan\",\"Trailing Edge XLoc/SemiSpan\",\"Trailing Edge ZLoc/SemiSpan\"" << endl;
15018  else
15019  Wing_File << "VARIABLES = \"<greek>h</greek>\",\"Area (m<sup>2</sup>)\",\"Max. Thickness (m)\",\"Chord (m)\",\"Leading Edge Radius (1/m)\",\"Max. Thickness/Chord\",\"Twist (deg)\",\"Curvature (1/m)\",\"Dihedral (deg)\",\"Leading Edge XLoc/SemiSpan\",\"Leading Edge ZLoc/SemiSpan\",\"Trailing Edge XLoc/SemiSpan\",\"Trailing Edge ZLoc/SemiSpan\"" << endl;
15020  Wing_File << "ZONE T= \"Baseline wing\"" << endl;
15021  }
15022 
15023 
15024  /*--- Evaluate geometrical quatities that do not require any kind of filter, local to each point ---*/
15025 
15026  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
15027 
15028  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
15029  LeadingEdge[iPlane][iDim] = 0.0;
15030  TrailingEdge[iPlane][iDim] = 0.0;
15031  }
15032 
15033  Area[iPlane] = 0.0;
15034  MaxThickness[iPlane] = 0.0;
15035  Chord[iPlane] = 0.0;
15036  LERadius[iPlane] = 0.0;
15037  ToC[iPlane] = 0.0;
15038  Twist[iPlane] = 0.0;
15039 
15040  if (Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() > 1) {
15041 
15042  Compute_Wing_LeadingTrailing(LeadingEdge[iPlane], TrailingEdge[iPlane], Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
15043 
15044  Area[iPlane] = Compute_Area(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], config, Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
15045 
15046  MaxThickness[iPlane] = Compute_MaxThickness(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], config, Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
15047 
15048  Chord[iPlane] = Compute_Chord(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
15049 
15050  Twist[iPlane] = Compute_Twist(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
15051 
15052  LERadius[iPlane] = Compute_LERadius(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
15053 
15054  ToC[iPlane] = MaxThickness[iPlane] / Chord[iPlane];
15055 
15056 
15057  }
15058 
15059  }
15060 
15061  /*--- Evaluate geometrical quatities that have been computed using a filtered value (they depend on more than one point) ---*/
15062 
15063  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
15064 
15065  Curvature[iPlane] = 0.0;
15066  Dihedral[iPlane] = 0.0;
15067 
15068  if (Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() > 1) {
15069 
15070  if ((iPlane == 0) || (iPlane == nPlane-1)) Curvature[iPlane] = 0.0;
15071  else Curvature[iPlane] = Compute_Curvature(LeadingEdge[iPlane-1], TrailingEdge[iPlane-1],
15072  LeadingEdge[iPlane], TrailingEdge[iPlane],
15073  LeadingEdge[iPlane+1], TrailingEdge[iPlane+1]);
15074 
15075  if (iPlane == 0) Dihedral[iPlane] = 0.0;
15076  else Dihedral[iPlane] = Compute_Dihedral(LeadingEdge[iPlane-1], TrailingEdge[iPlane-1],
15077  LeadingEdge[iPlane], TrailingEdge[iPlane]);
15078 
15079  }
15080 
15081  }
15082 
15083  /*--- Set the curvature and dihedral angles at the extremes ---*/
15084 
15085  if (nPlane > 1) {
15086  if ((Xcoord_Airfoil[0].size() != 0) && (Xcoord_Airfoil[1].size() != 0)) {
15087  Curvature[0] = Curvature[1]; Dihedral[0] = Dihedral[1];
15088  }
15089  if ((Xcoord_Airfoil[nPlane-1].size() != 0) && (Xcoord_Airfoil[nPlane-2].size() != 0)) {
15090  Curvature[nPlane-1] = Curvature[nPlane-2];
15091  }
15092  }
15093 
15094  /*--- Plot the geometrical quatities ---*/
15095 
15096  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
15097  if (Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() > 1) {
15098  if (config->GetTabular_FileFormat() == TAB_CSV) {
15099  Wing_File << Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane][0]/SemiSpan <<", "<< Area[iPlane] <<", "<< MaxThickness[iPlane] <<", "<< Chord[iPlane] <<", "<< LERadius[iPlane] <<", "<< ToC[iPlane]
15100  <<", "<< Twist[iPlane] <<", "<< Curvature[iPlane] <<", "<< Dihedral[iPlane]
15101  <<", "<< LeadingEdge[iPlane][0]/SemiSpan <<", "<< LeadingEdge[iPlane][2]/SemiSpan
15102  <<", "<< TrailingEdge[iPlane][0]/SemiSpan <<", "<< TrailingEdge[iPlane][2]/SemiSpan << endl;
15103  }
15104  else {
15105  Wing_File << Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane][0]/SemiSpan <<" "<< Area[iPlane] <<" "<< MaxThickness[iPlane] <<" "<< Chord[iPlane] <<" "<< LERadius[iPlane] <<" "<< ToC[iPlane]
15106  <<" "<< Twist[iPlane] <<" "<< Curvature[iPlane] <<" "<< Dihedral[iPlane]
15107  <<" "<< LeadingEdge[iPlane][0]/SemiSpan <<" "<< LeadingEdge[iPlane][2]/SemiSpan
15108  <<" "<< TrailingEdge[iPlane][0]/SemiSpan <<" "<< TrailingEdge[iPlane][2]/SemiSpan << endl;
15109 
15110  }
15111  }
15112  }
15113 
15114  Wing_File.close();
15115 
15116  Section_File.open("wing_slices.dat", ios::out);
15117 
15118  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
15119 
15120  if (iPlane == 0) {
15121  Section_File << "TITLE = \"Aircraft Slices\"" << endl;
15122  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US)
15123  Section_File << "VARIABLES = \"x (in)\", \"y (in)\", \"z (in)\", \"x<sub>2D</sub>/c\", \"y<sub>2D</sub>/c\"" << endl;
15124  else Section_File << "VARIABLES = \"x (m)\", \"y (m)\", \"z (m)\", \"x<sub>2D</sub>/c\", \"y<sub>2D</sub>/c\"" << endl;
15125  }
15126 
15127  if (Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() > 1) {
15128 
15129  Section_File << "ZONE T=\"<greek>h</greek> = " << Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane][0]/SemiSpan << " \", I= " << Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() << ", F=POINT" << endl;
15130 
15131  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size(); iVertex++) {
15132 
15133  /*--- Move to the origin ---*/
15134 
15135  su2double XValue_ = Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex] - LeadingEdge[iPlane][0];
15136  su2double ZValue_ = Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex] - LeadingEdge[iPlane][2];
15137 
15138  /*--- Rotate the airfoil and divide by the chord ---*/
15139 
15140  su2double ValCos = cos(Twist[iPlane]*PI_NUMBER/180.0);
15141  su2double ValSin = sin(Twist[iPlane]*PI_NUMBER/180.0);
15142 
15143  su2double XValue = (XValue_*ValCos - ZValue_*ValSin) / Chord[iPlane];
15144  su2double ZValue = (ZValue_*ValCos + XValue_*ValSin) / Chord[iPlane];
15145 
15146  /*--- Write the file ---*/
15147 
15148  Section_File << Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex] << " " << Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex] << " " << Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex] << " " << XValue << " " << ZValue << endl;
15149  }
15150  }
15151 
15152  }
15153 
15154  Section_File.close();
15155 
15156 
15157  /*--- Compute the wing volume using a composite Simpson's rule ---*/
15158 
15159  Wing_Volume = 0.0;
15160  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane-2; iPlane+=2) {
15161  if (Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() > 1) {
15162  Wing_Volume += (1.0/3.0)*dPlane*(Area[iPlane] + 4.0*Area[iPlane+1] + Area[iPlane+2]);
15163  }
15164  }
15165 
15166  /*--- Evaluate Max and Min quantities ---*/
15167 
15168  Wing_MaxMaxThickness = -1E6; Wing_MinMaxThickness = 1E6; Wing_MinChord = 1E6; Wing_MaxChord = -1E6;
15169  Wing_MinLERadius = 1E6; Wing_MaxLERadius = -1E6; Wing_MinToC = 1E6; Wing_MaxToC = -1E6;
15170  Wing_MaxTwist = -1E6; Wing_MaxCurvature = -1E6; Wing_MaxDihedral = -1E6;
15171 
15172  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
15173  if (MaxThickness[iPlane] != 0.0) Wing_MinMaxThickness = min(Wing_MinMaxThickness, MaxThickness[iPlane]);
15174  Wing_MaxMaxThickness = max(Wing_MaxMaxThickness, MaxThickness[iPlane]);
15175  if (Chord[iPlane] != 0.0) Wing_MinChord = min(Wing_MinChord, Chord[iPlane]);
15176  Wing_MaxChord = max(Wing_MaxChord, Chord[iPlane]);
15177  if (LERadius[iPlane] != 0.0) Wing_MinLERadius = min(Wing_MinLERadius, LERadius[iPlane]);
15178  Wing_MaxLERadius = max(Wing_MaxLERadius, LERadius[iPlane]);
15179  if (ToC[iPlane] != 0.0) Wing_MinToC = min(Wing_MinToC, ToC[iPlane]);
15180  Wing_MaxToC = max(Wing_MaxToC, ToC[iPlane]);
15181  Wing_ObjFun_MinToC = sqrt((Wing_MinToC - 0.07)*(Wing_MinToC - 0.07));
15182  Wing_MaxTwist = max(Wing_MaxTwist, fabs(Twist[iPlane]));
15183  Wing_MaxCurvature = max(Wing_MaxCurvature, Curvature[iPlane]);
15184  Wing_MaxDihedral = max(Wing_MaxDihedral, fabs(Dihedral[iPlane]));
15185  }
15186 
15187  }
15188 
15189  /*--- Free memory for the section cuts ---*/
15190 
15191  delete [] Xcoord_Airfoil;
15192  delete [] Ycoord_Airfoil;
15193  delete [] Zcoord_Airfoil;
15194  delete [] Variable_Airfoil;
15195 
15196  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++)
15197  delete [] LeadingEdge[iPlane];
15198  delete [] LeadingEdge;
15199 
15200  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++)
15201  delete [] TrailingEdge[iPlane];
15202  delete [] TrailingEdge;
15203 
15204  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++)
15205  delete [] Plane_P0[iPlane];
15206  delete [] Plane_P0;
15207 
15208  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++)
15209  delete [] Plane_Normal[iPlane];
15210  delete [] Plane_Normal;
15211 
15212  delete [] Area;
15213  delete [] MaxThickness;
15214  delete [] Chord;
15215  delete [] LERadius;
15216  delete [] ToC;
15217  delete [] Twist;
15218  delete [] Curvature;
15219  delete [] Dihedral;
15220 
15221 }
15222 
15223 void CPhysicalGeometry::Compute_Fuselage(CConfig *config, bool original_surface,
15224  su2double &Fuselage_Volume, su2double &Fuselage_WettedArea,
15225  su2double &Fuselage_MinWidth, su2double &Fuselage_MaxWidth,
15226  su2double &Fuselage_MinWaterLineWidth, su2double &Fuselage_MaxWaterLineWidth,
15227  su2double &Fuselage_MinHeight, su2double &Fuselage_MaxHeight,
15228  su2double &Fuselage_MaxCurvature) {
15229 
15230  unsigned short iPlane, iDim, nPlane = 0;
15231  unsigned long iVertex;
15232  su2double MinPlane, MaxPlane, dPlane, *Area, *Length, *Width, *WaterLineWidth, *Height, *Curvature;
15233  vector<su2double> *Xcoord_Airfoil, *Ycoord_Airfoil, *Zcoord_Airfoil, *Variable_Airfoil;
15234  ofstream Fuselage_File, Section_File;
15235 
15236  /*--- Make a large number of section cuts for approximating volume ---*/
15237 
15238  nPlane = config->GetnWingStations();
15239 
15240  /*--- Allocate memory for the section cutting ---*/
15241 
15242  Area = new su2double [nPlane];
15243  Length = new su2double [nPlane];
15244  Width = new su2double [nPlane];
15245  WaterLineWidth = new su2double [nPlane];
15246  Height = new su2double [nPlane];
15247  Curvature = new su2double [nPlane];
15248 
15249  su2double **LeadingEdge = new su2double*[nPlane];
15250  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++ )
15251  LeadingEdge[iPlane] = new su2double[nDim];
15252 
15253  su2double **TrailingEdge = new su2double*[nPlane];
15254  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++ )
15255  TrailingEdge[iPlane] = new su2double[nDim];
15256 
15257  su2double **Plane_P0 = new su2double*[nPlane];
15258  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++ )
15259  Plane_P0[iPlane] = new su2double[nDim];
15260 
15261  su2double **Plane_Normal = new su2double*[nPlane];
15262  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++ )
15263  Plane_Normal[iPlane] = new su2double[nDim];
15264 
15265  MinPlane = config->GetStations_Bounds(0); MaxPlane = config->GetStations_Bounds(1);
15266  dPlane = fabs((MaxPlane - MinPlane)/su2double(nPlane-1));
15267 
15268  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
15269  Plane_Normal[iPlane][0] = 0.0; Plane_P0[iPlane][0] = 0.0;
15270  Plane_Normal[iPlane][1] = 0.0; Plane_P0[iPlane][1] = 0.0;
15271  Plane_Normal[iPlane][2] = 0.0; Plane_P0[iPlane][2] = 0.0;
15272 
15273  Plane_Normal[iPlane][0] = 1.0;
15274  Plane_P0[iPlane][0] = MinPlane + iPlane*dPlane;
15275 
15276  }
15277 
15278  /*--- Allocate some vectors for storing airfoil coordinates ---*/
15279 
15280  Xcoord_Airfoil = new vector<su2double>[nPlane];
15281  Ycoord_Airfoil = new vector<su2double>[nPlane];
15282  Zcoord_Airfoil = new vector<su2double>[nPlane];
15283  Variable_Airfoil = new vector<su2double>[nPlane];
15284 
15285  /*--- Create the section slices through the geometry ---*/
15286 
15287  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
15288 
15289  ComputeAirfoil_Section(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane],
15290  -1E6, 1E6, -1E6, 1E6, -1E6, 1E6, NULL, Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane],
15291  Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane],
15292  Variable_Airfoil[iPlane], original_surface, config);
15293  }
15294 
15295  /*--- Compute the area at each section ---*/
15296 
15297  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
15298 
15299  /*--- Write an output file---*/
15300 
15301  if (config->GetTabular_FileFormat() == TAB_CSV) {
15302  Fuselage_File.open("fuselage_description.csv", ios::out);
15303  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US)
15304  Fuselage_File << "\"x (in)\",\"Area (in^2)\",\"Length (in)\",\"Width (in)\",\"Waterline width (in)\",\"Height (in)\",\"Curvature (1/in)\",\"Generatrix Curve X (in)\",\"Generatrix Curve Y (in)\",\"Generatrix Curve Z (in)\",\"Axis Curve X (in)\",\"Axis Curve Y (in)\",\"Axis Curve Z (in)\"" << endl;
15305  else
15306  Fuselage_File << "\"x (m)\",\"Area (m^2)\",\"Length (m)\",\"Width (m)\",\"Waterline width (m)\",\"Height (m)\",\"Curvature (1/in)\",\"Generatrix Curve X (m)\",\"Generatrix Curve Y (m)\",\"Generatrix Curve Z (m)\",\"Axis Curve X (m)\",\"Axis Curve Y (m)\",\"Axis Curve Z (m)\"" << endl;
15307  }
15308  else {
15309  Fuselage_File.open("fuselage_description.dat", ios::out);
15310  Fuselage_File << "TITLE = \"Fuselage description\"" << endl;
15311  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US)
15312  Fuselage_File << "VARIABLES = \"x (in)\",\"Area (in<sup>2</sup>)\",\"Length (in)\",\"Width (in)\",\"Waterline width (in)\",\"Height (in)\",\"Curvature (1/in)\",\"Generatrix Curve X (in)\",\"Generatrix Curve Y (in)\",\"Generatrix Curve Z (in)\",\"Axis Curve X (in)\",\"Axis Curve Y (in)\",\"Axis Curve Z (in)\"" << endl;
15313  else
15314  Fuselage_File << "VARIABLES = \"x (m)\",\"Area (m<sup>2</sup>)\",\"Length (m)\",\"Width (m)\",\"Waterline width (m)\",\"Height (m)\",\"Curvature (1/m)\",\"Generatrix Curve X (m)\",\"Generatrix Curve Y (m)\",\"Generatrix Curve Z (m)\",\"Axis Curve X (m)\",\"Axis Curve Y (m)\",\"Axis Curve Z (m)\"" << endl;
15315  Fuselage_File << "ZONE T= \"Baseline fuselage\"" << endl;
15316  }
15317 
15318 
15319  /*--- Evaluate geometrical quatities that do not require any kind of filter, local to each point ---*/
15320 
15321  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
15322 
15323  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
15324  LeadingEdge[iPlane][iDim] = 0.0;
15325  TrailingEdge[iPlane][iDim] = 0.0;
15326  }
15327 
15328  Area[iPlane] = 0.0;
15329  Length[iPlane] = 0.0;
15330  Width[iPlane] = 0.0;
15331  WaterLineWidth[iPlane] = 0.0;
15332  Height[iPlane] = 0.0;
15333 
15334  if (Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() > 1) {
15335 
15336  Compute_Fuselage_LeadingTrailing(LeadingEdge[iPlane], TrailingEdge[iPlane], Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
15337 
15338  Area[iPlane] = Compute_Area(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], config, Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
15339 
15340  Length[iPlane] = Compute_Length(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], config, Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
15341 
15342  Width[iPlane] = Compute_Width(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
15343 
15344  WaterLineWidth[iPlane] = Compute_WaterLineWidth(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], config, Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
15345 
15346  Height[iPlane] = Compute_Height(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
15347 
15348  }
15349 
15350  }
15351 
15352  /*--- Evaluate geometrical quatities that have been computed using a filtered value (they depend on more than one point) ---*/
15353 
15354  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
15355 
15356  Curvature[iPlane] = 0.0;
15357 
15358  if (Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() > 1) {
15359 
15360  if ((iPlane == 0) || (iPlane == nPlane-1)) Curvature[iPlane] = 0.0;
15361  else Curvature[iPlane] = Compute_Curvature(LeadingEdge[iPlane-1], TrailingEdge[iPlane-1],
15362  LeadingEdge[iPlane], TrailingEdge[iPlane],
15363  LeadingEdge[iPlane+1], TrailingEdge[iPlane+1]);
15364 
15365  }
15366 
15367  }
15368 
15369  /*--- Set the curvature and dihedral angles at the extremes ---*/
15370 
15371  if (nPlane > 1) {
15372  if ((Xcoord_Airfoil[0].size() != 0) && (Xcoord_Airfoil[1].size() != 0)) {
15373  Curvature[0] = Curvature[1];
15374  }
15375  if ((Xcoord_Airfoil[nPlane-1].size() != 0) && (Xcoord_Airfoil[nPlane-2].size() != 0)) {
15376  Curvature[nPlane-1] = Curvature[nPlane-2];
15377  }
15378  }
15379 
15380  /*--- Plot the geometrical quatities ---*/
15381 
15382  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
15383  if (Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() > 1) {
15384  if (config->GetTabular_FileFormat() == TAB_CSV) {
15385  Fuselage_File << -Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane][0] <<", "<< Area[iPlane] <<", "<< Length[iPlane] <<", "<< Width[iPlane] <<", "<< WaterLineWidth[iPlane] <<", "<< Height[iPlane] <<", "<< Curvature[iPlane]
15386  <<", "<< -LeadingEdge[iPlane][1] <<", "<< LeadingEdge[iPlane][0] <<", "<< LeadingEdge[iPlane][2]
15387  <<", "<< -TrailingEdge[iPlane][1] <<", "<< TrailingEdge[iPlane][0] <<", "<< TrailingEdge[iPlane][2] << endl;
15388  }
15389  else {
15390  Fuselage_File << -Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane][0] <<" "<< Area[iPlane] <<" "<< Length[iPlane] <<" "<< Width[iPlane] <<" "<< WaterLineWidth[iPlane] <<" "<< Height[iPlane] <<" "<< Curvature[iPlane]
15391  <<" "<< -LeadingEdge[iPlane][1] <<" "<< LeadingEdge[iPlane][0] <<" "<< LeadingEdge[iPlane][2]
15392  <<" "<< -TrailingEdge[iPlane][1] <<" "<< TrailingEdge[iPlane][0] <<" "<< TrailingEdge[iPlane][2] << endl;
15393  }
15394  }
15395  }
15396 
15397  Fuselage_File.close();
15398 
15399  Section_File.open("fuselage_slices.dat", ios::out);
15400 
15401  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
15402 
15403  if (iPlane == 0) {
15404  Section_File << "TITLE = \"Aircraft Slices\"" << endl;
15405  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US)
15406  Section_File << "VARIABLES = \"x (in)\", \"y (in)\", \"z (in)\"" << endl;
15407  else Section_File << "VARIABLES = \"x (m)\", \"y (m)\", \"z (m)\"" << endl;
15408  }
15409 
15410  if (Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() > 1) {
15411 
15412  Section_File << "ZONE T=\"X = " << -Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane][0] << " \", I= " << Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() << ", F=POINT" << endl;
15413 
15414  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size(); iVertex++) {
15415 
15416  /*--- Write the file ---*/
15417 
15418  Section_File << -Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex] << " " << Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex] << " " << Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex] << endl;
15419  }
15420  }
15421 
15422  }
15423 
15424  Section_File.close();
15425 
15426 
15427  /*--- Compute the fuselage volume using a composite Simpson's rule ---*/
15428 
15429  Fuselage_Volume = 0.0;
15430  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane-2; iPlane+=2) {
15431  if (Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() > 1) {
15432  Fuselage_Volume += (1.0/3.0)*dPlane*(Area[iPlane] + 4.0*Area[iPlane+1] + Area[iPlane+2]);
15433  }
15434  }
15435 
15436  /*--- Compute the fuselage wetted area ---*/
15437 
15438  Fuselage_WettedArea = 0.0;
15439  if (Xcoord_Airfoil[0].size() > 1) Fuselage_WettedArea += (1.0/2.0)*dPlane*Length[0];
15440  for (iPlane = 1; iPlane < nPlane-1; iPlane++) {
15441  if (Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() > 1) {
15442  Fuselage_WettedArea += dPlane*Length[iPlane];
15443  }
15444  }
15445  if (Xcoord_Airfoil[nPlane-1].size() > 1) Fuselage_WettedArea += (1.0/2.0)*dPlane*Length[nPlane-1];
15446 
15447  /*--- Evaluate Max and Min quantities ---*/
15448 
15449  Fuselage_MaxWidth = -1E6; Fuselage_MinWidth = 1E6;
15450  Fuselage_MaxWaterLineWidth = -1E6; Fuselage_MinWaterLineWidth = 1E6;
15451  Fuselage_MaxHeight = -1E6; Fuselage_MinHeight = 1E6;
15452  Fuselage_MaxCurvature = -1E6;
15453 
15454  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
15455  if (Width[iPlane] != 0.0) Fuselage_MinWidth = min(Fuselage_MinWidth, Width[iPlane]);
15456  Fuselage_MaxWidth = max(Fuselage_MaxWidth, Width[iPlane]);
15457  if (WaterLineWidth[iPlane] != 0.0) Fuselage_MinWaterLineWidth = min(Fuselage_MinWaterLineWidth, WaterLineWidth[iPlane]);
15458  Fuselage_MaxWaterLineWidth = max(Fuselage_MaxWaterLineWidth, WaterLineWidth[iPlane]);
15459  if (Height[iPlane] != 0.0) Fuselage_MinHeight = min(Fuselage_MinHeight, Height[iPlane]);
15460  Fuselage_MaxHeight = max(Fuselage_MaxHeight, Height[iPlane]);
15461  Fuselage_MaxCurvature = max(Fuselage_MaxCurvature, Curvature[iPlane]);
15462  }
15463 
15464  }
15465 
15466  /*--- Free memory for the section cuts ---*/
15467 
15468  delete [] Xcoord_Airfoil;
15469  delete [] Ycoord_Airfoil;
15470  delete [] Zcoord_Airfoil;
15471  delete [] Variable_Airfoil;
15472 
15473  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++)
15474  delete [] LeadingEdge[iPlane];
15475  delete [] LeadingEdge;
15476 
15477  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++)
15478  delete [] TrailingEdge[iPlane];
15479  delete [] TrailingEdge;
15480 
15481  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++)
15482  delete [] Plane_P0[iPlane];
15483  delete [] Plane_P0;
15484 
15485  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++)
15486  delete [] Plane_Normal[iPlane];
15487  delete [] Plane_Normal;
15488 
15489  delete [] Area;
15490  delete [] Length;
15491  delete [] Width;
15492  delete [] WaterLineWidth;
15493  delete [] Height;
15494  delete [] Curvature;
15495 
15496 }
15497 
15498 void CPhysicalGeometry::Compute_Nacelle(CConfig *config, bool original_surface,
15499  su2double &Nacelle_Volume, su2double &Nacelle_MinMaxThickness,
15500  su2double &Nacelle_MinChord, su2double &Nacelle_MaxChord,
15501  su2double &Nacelle_MaxMaxThickness, su2double &Nacelle_MinLERadius,
15502  su2double &Nacelle_MaxLERadius, su2double &Nacelle_MinToC, su2double &Nacelle_MaxToC,
15503  su2double &Nacelle_ObjFun_MinToC, su2double &Nacelle_MaxTwist) {
15504 
15505  unsigned short iPlane, iDim, nPlane = 0;
15506  unsigned long iVertex;
15507  su2double Angle, MinAngle, MaxAngle, dAngle, *Area, *MaxThickness, *ToC, *Chord, *LERadius, *Twist;
15508  vector<su2double> *Xcoord_Airfoil, *Ycoord_Airfoil, *Zcoord_Airfoil, *Variable_Airfoil;
15509  ofstream Nacelle_File, Section_File;
15510 
15511 
15512  /*--- Make a large number of section cuts for approximating volume ---*/
15513 
15514  nPlane = config->GetnWingStations();
15515 
15516  /*--- Allocate memory for the section cutting ---*/
15517 
15518  Area = new su2double [nPlane];
15519  MaxThickness = new su2double [nPlane];
15520  Chord = new su2double [nPlane];
15521  LERadius = new su2double [nPlane];
15522  ToC = new su2double [nPlane];
15523  Twist = new su2double [nPlane];
15524 
15525  su2double **LeadingEdge = new su2double*[nPlane];
15526  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++ )
15527  LeadingEdge[iPlane] = new su2double[nDim];
15528 
15529  su2double **TrailingEdge = new su2double*[nPlane];
15530  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++ )
15531  TrailingEdge[iPlane] = new su2double[nDim];
15532 
15533  su2double **Plane_P0 = new su2double*[nPlane];
15534  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++ )
15535  Plane_P0[iPlane] = new su2double[nDim];
15536 
15537  su2double **Plane_Normal = new su2double*[nPlane];
15538  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++ )
15539  Plane_Normal[iPlane] = new su2double[nDim];
15540 
15541  MinAngle = config->GetStations_Bounds(0); MaxAngle = config->GetStations_Bounds(1);
15542  dAngle = fabs((MaxAngle - MinAngle)/su2double(nPlane-1));
15543 
15544  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
15545  Plane_Normal[iPlane][0] = 0.0; Plane_P0[iPlane][0] = 0.0;
15546  Plane_Normal[iPlane][1] = 0.0; Plane_P0[iPlane][1] = 0.0;
15547  Plane_Normal[iPlane][2] = 0.0; Plane_P0[iPlane][2] = 0.0;
15548 
15549  /*--- Apply roll to cut the nacelle ---*/
15550 
15551  Angle = MinAngle + iPlane*dAngle*PI_NUMBER/180.0;
15552 
15553  if (Angle <= 0) Angle = 1E-6;
15554  if (Angle >= 360) Angle = 359.999999;
15555 
15556  Plane_Normal[iPlane][0] = 0.0;
15557  Plane_Normal[iPlane][1] = -sin(Angle);
15558  Plane_Normal[iPlane][2] = cos(Angle);
15559 
15560  /*--- Apply tilt angle to the plane ---*/
15561 
15562  su2double Tilt_Angle = config->GetNacelleLocation(3)*PI_NUMBER/180;
15563  su2double Plane_NormalX_Tilt = Plane_Normal[iPlane][0]*cos(Tilt_Angle) + Plane_Normal[iPlane][2]*sin(Tilt_Angle);
15564  su2double Plane_NormalY_Tilt = Plane_Normal[iPlane][1];
15565  su2double Plane_NormalZ_Tilt = Plane_Normal[iPlane][2]*cos(Tilt_Angle) - Plane_Normal[iPlane][0]*sin(Tilt_Angle);
15566 
15567  /*--- Apply toe angle to the plane ---*/
15568 
15569  su2double Toe_Angle = config->GetNacelleLocation(4)*PI_NUMBER/180;
15570  su2double Plane_NormalX_Tilt_Toe = Plane_NormalX_Tilt*cos(Toe_Angle) - Plane_NormalY_Tilt*sin(Toe_Angle);
15571  su2double Plane_NormalY_Tilt_Toe = Plane_NormalX_Tilt*sin(Toe_Angle) + Plane_NormalY_Tilt*cos(Toe_Angle);
15572  su2double Plane_NormalZ_Tilt_Toe = Plane_NormalZ_Tilt;
15573 
15574  /*--- Update normal vector ---*/
15575 
15576  Plane_Normal[iPlane][0] = Plane_NormalX_Tilt_Toe;
15577  Plane_Normal[iPlane][1] = Plane_NormalY_Tilt_Toe;
15578  Plane_Normal[iPlane][2] = Plane_NormalZ_Tilt_Toe;
15579 
15580  /*--- Point in the plane ---*/
15581 
15582  Plane_P0[iPlane][0] = config->GetNacelleLocation(0);
15583  Plane_P0[iPlane][1] = config->GetNacelleLocation(1);
15584  Plane_P0[iPlane][2] = config->GetNacelleLocation(2);
15585 
15586  }
15587 
15588  /*--- Allocate some vectors for storing airfoil coordinates ---*/
15589 
15590  Xcoord_Airfoil = new vector<su2double>[nPlane];
15591  Ycoord_Airfoil = new vector<su2double>[nPlane];
15592  Zcoord_Airfoil = new vector<su2double>[nPlane];
15593  Variable_Airfoil = new vector<su2double>[nPlane];
15594 
15595  /*--- Create the section slices through the geometry ---*/
15596 
15597  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
15598 
15599  ComputeAirfoil_Section(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane],
15600  -1E6, 1E6, -1E6, 1E6, -1E6, 1E6, NULL, Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane],
15601  Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane],
15602  Variable_Airfoil[iPlane], original_surface, config);
15603 
15604  }
15605 
15606  /*--- Compute airfoil characteristic only in the master node ---*/
15607 
15608  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
15609 
15610  /*--- Write an output file---*/
15611 
15612  if (config->GetTabular_FileFormat() == TAB_CSV) {
15613  Nacelle_File.open("nacelle_description.csv", ios::out);
15614  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US)
15615  Nacelle_File << "\"Theta (deg)\",\"Area (in^2)\",\"Max. Thickness (in)\",\"Chord (in)\",\"Leading Edge Radius (1/in)\",\"Max. Thickness/Chord\",\"Twist (deg)\",\"Leading Edge XLoc\",\"Leading Edge ZLoc\",\"Trailing Edge XLoc\",\"Trailing Edge ZLoc\"" << endl;
15616  else
15617  Nacelle_File << "\"Theta (deg)\",\"Area (m^2)\",\"Max. Thickness (m)\",\"Chord (m)\",\"Leading Edge Radius (1/m)\",\"Max. Thickness/Chord\",\"Twist (deg)\",\"Curvature (1/in)\",\"Dihedral (deg)\",\"Leading Edge XLoc\",\"Leading Edge ZLoc\",\"Trailing Edge XLoc\",\"Trailing Edge ZLoc\"" << endl;
15618  }
15619  else {
15620  Nacelle_File.open("nacelle_description.dat", ios::out);
15621  Nacelle_File << "TITLE = \"Nacelle description\"" << endl;
15622  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US)
15623  Nacelle_File << "VARIABLES = \"<greek>q</greek> (deg)\",\"Area (in<sup>2</sup>)\",\"Max. Thickness (in)\",\"Chord (in)\",\"Leading Edge Radius (1/in)\",\"Max. Thickness/Chord\",\"Twist (deg)\",\"Leading Edge XLoc\",\"Leading Edge ZLoc\",\"Trailing Edge XLoc\",\"Trailing Edge ZLoc\"" << endl;
15624  else
15625  Nacelle_File << "VARIABLES = \"<greek>q</greek> (deg)\",\"Area (m<sup>2</sup>)\",\"Max. Thickness (m)\",\"Chord (m)\",\"Leading Edge Radius (1/m)\",\"Max. Thickness/Chord\",\"Twist (deg)\",\"Leading Edge XLoc\",\"Leading Edge ZLoc\",\"Trailing Edge XLoc\",\"Trailing Edge ZLoc\"" << endl;
15626  Nacelle_File << "ZONE T= \"Baseline nacelle\"" << endl;
15627  }
15628 
15629 
15630  /*--- Evaluate geometrical quatities that do not require any kind of filter, local to each point ---*/
15631 
15632  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
15633 
15634  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
15635  LeadingEdge[iPlane][iDim] = 0.0;
15636  TrailingEdge[iPlane][iDim] = 0.0;
15637  }
15638 
15639  Area[iPlane] = 0.0;
15640  MaxThickness[iPlane] = 0.0;
15641  Chord[iPlane] = 0.0;
15642  LERadius[iPlane] = 0.0;
15643  ToC[iPlane] = 0.0;
15644  Twist[iPlane] = 0.0;
15645 
15646  if (Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() > 1) {
15647 
15648  Compute_Wing_LeadingTrailing(LeadingEdge[iPlane], TrailingEdge[iPlane], Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
15649 
15650  Area[iPlane] = Compute_Area(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], config, Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
15651 
15652  MaxThickness[iPlane] = Compute_MaxThickness(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], config, Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
15653 
15654  Chord[iPlane] = Compute_Chord(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
15655 
15656  Twist[iPlane] = Compute_Twist(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
15657 
15658  LERadius[iPlane] = Compute_LERadius(Plane_P0[iPlane], Plane_Normal[iPlane], Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane], Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane]);
15659 
15660  ToC[iPlane] = MaxThickness[iPlane] / Chord[iPlane];
15661 
15662 
15663  }
15664 
15665  }
15666 
15667  /*--- Plot the geometrical quatities ---*/
15668 
15669  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
15670 
15671  su2double theta_deg = atan2(Plane_Normal[iPlane][1], -Plane_Normal[iPlane][2])/PI_NUMBER*180 + 180;
15672 
15673  if (Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() > 1) {
15674  if (config->GetTabular_FileFormat() == TAB_CSV) {
15675  Nacelle_File << theta_deg <<", "<< Area[iPlane] <<", "<< MaxThickness[iPlane] <<", "<< Chord[iPlane] <<", "<< LERadius[iPlane] <<", "<< ToC[iPlane]
15676  <<", "<< Twist[iPlane] <<", "<< LeadingEdge[iPlane][0] <<", "<< LeadingEdge[iPlane][2]
15677  <<", "<< TrailingEdge[iPlane][0] <<", "<< TrailingEdge[iPlane][2] << endl;
15678  }
15679  else {
15680  Nacelle_File << theta_deg <<" "<< Area[iPlane] <<" "<< MaxThickness[iPlane] <<" "<< Chord[iPlane] <<" "<< LERadius[iPlane] <<" "<< ToC[iPlane]
15681  <<" "<< Twist[iPlane] <<" "<< LeadingEdge[iPlane][0] <<" "<< LeadingEdge[iPlane][2]
15682  <<" "<< TrailingEdge[iPlane][0] <<" "<< TrailingEdge[iPlane][2] << endl;
15683 
15684  }
15685  }
15686 
15687  }
15688 
15689  Nacelle_File.close();
15690 
15691  Section_File.open("nacelle_slices.dat", ios::out);
15692 
15693  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
15694 
15695  if (iPlane == 0) {
15696  Section_File << "TITLE = \"Nacelle Slices\"" << endl;
15697  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US)
15698  Section_File << "VARIABLES = \"x (in)\", \"y (in)\", \"z (in)\", \"x<sub>2D</sub>/c\", \"y<sub>2D</sub>/c\"" << endl;
15699  else Section_File << "VARIABLES = \"x (m)\", \"y (m)\", \"z (m)\", \"x<sub>2D</sub>/c\", \"y<sub>2D</sub>/c\"" << endl;
15700  }
15701 
15702  if (Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() > 1) {
15703 
15704  su2double theta_deg = atan2(Plane_Normal[iPlane][1], -Plane_Normal[iPlane][2])/PI_NUMBER*180 + 180;
15705  su2double Angle = theta_deg*PI_NUMBER/180 - 0.5*PI_NUMBER;
15706 
15707  Section_File << "ZONE T=\"<greek>q</greek> = " << theta_deg << " deg\", I= " << Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() << ", F=POINT" << endl;
15708 
15709  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size(); iVertex++) {
15710 
15711  /*--- Move to the origin ---*/
15712 
15713  su2double XValue_ = Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex] - LeadingEdge[iPlane][0];
15714  su2double ZValue_ = Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex] - LeadingEdge[iPlane][2];
15715 
15716  /*--- Rotate the airfoil and divide by the chord ---*/
15717 
15718  su2double ValCos = cos(Twist[iPlane]*PI_NUMBER/180.0);
15719  su2double ValSin = sin(Twist[iPlane]*PI_NUMBER/180.0);
15720 
15721  su2double XValue = (XValue_*ValCos - ZValue_*ValSin) / Chord[iPlane];
15722  su2double ZValue = (ZValue_*ValCos + XValue_*ValSin) / Chord[iPlane];
15723 
15724  su2double XCoord = Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex] + config->GetNacelleLocation(0);
15725  su2double YCoord = (Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex]*cos(Angle) - Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex]*sin(Angle)) + config->GetNacelleLocation(1);
15726  su2double ZCoord = (Zcoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex]*cos(Angle) + Ycoord_Airfoil[iPlane][iVertex]*sin(Angle)) + config->GetNacelleLocation(2);
15727 
15728  /*--- Write the file ---*/
15729 
15730  Section_File << XCoord << " " << YCoord << " " << ZCoord << " " << XValue << " " << ZValue << endl;
15731  }
15732  }
15733 
15734  }
15735 
15736  Section_File.close();
15737 
15738 
15739  /*--- Compute the wing volume using a composite Simpson's rule ---*/
15740 
15741  Nacelle_Volume = 0.0;
15742  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane-2; iPlane+=2) {
15743  if (Xcoord_Airfoil[iPlane].size() > 1) {
15744  Nacelle_Volume += (1.0/3.0)*dAngle*(Area[iPlane] + 4.0*Area[iPlane+1] + Area[iPlane+2]);
15745  }
15746  }
15747 
15748  /*--- Evaluate Max and Min quantities ---*/
15749 
15750  Nacelle_MaxMaxThickness = -1E6; Nacelle_MinMaxThickness = 1E6; Nacelle_MinChord = 1E6; Nacelle_MaxChord = -1E6;
15751  Nacelle_MinLERadius = 1E6; Nacelle_MaxLERadius = -1E6; Nacelle_MinToC = 1E6; Nacelle_MaxToC = -1E6;
15752  Nacelle_MaxTwist = -1E6;
15753 
15754  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++) {
15755  if (MaxThickness[iPlane] != 0.0) Nacelle_MinMaxThickness = min(Nacelle_MinMaxThickness, MaxThickness[iPlane]);
15756  Nacelle_MaxMaxThickness = max(Nacelle_MaxMaxThickness, MaxThickness[iPlane]);
15757  if (Chord[iPlane] != 0.0) Nacelle_MinChord = min(Nacelle_MinChord, Chord[iPlane]);
15758  Nacelle_MaxChord = max(Nacelle_MaxChord, Chord[iPlane]);
15759  if (LERadius[iPlane] != 0.0) Nacelle_MinLERadius = min(Nacelle_MinLERadius, LERadius[iPlane]);
15760  Nacelle_MaxLERadius = max(Nacelle_MaxLERadius, LERadius[iPlane]);
15761  if (ToC[iPlane] != 0.0) Nacelle_MinToC = min(Nacelle_MinToC, ToC[iPlane]);
15762  Nacelle_MaxToC = max(Nacelle_MaxToC, ToC[iPlane]);
15763  Nacelle_ObjFun_MinToC = sqrt((Nacelle_MinToC - 0.07)*(Nacelle_MinToC - 0.07));
15764  Nacelle_MaxTwist = max(Nacelle_MaxTwist, fabs(Twist[iPlane]));
15765  }
15766 
15767  }
15768 
15769  /*--- Free memory for the section cuts ---*/
15770 
15771  delete [] Xcoord_Airfoil;
15772  delete [] Ycoord_Airfoil;
15773  delete [] Zcoord_Airfoil;
15774  delete [] Variable_Airfoil;
15775 
15776  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++)
15777  delete [] LeadingEdge[iPlane];
15778  delete [] LeadingEdge;
15779 
15780  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++)
15781  delete [] TrailingEdge[iPlane];
15782  delete [] TrailingEdge;
15783 
15784  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++)
15785  delete [] Plane_P0[iPlane];
15786  delete [] Plane_P0;
15787 
15788  for (iPlane = 0; iPlane < nPlane; iPlane++)
15789  delete [] Plane_Normal[iPlane];
15790  delete [] Plane_Normal;
15791 
15792  delete [] Area;
15793  delete [] MaxThickness;
15794  delete [] Chord;
15795  delete [] LERadius;
15796  delete [] ToC;
15797  delete [] Twist;
15798 
15799 }
15800 
15801 CMultiGridGeometry::CMultiGridGeometry(CGeometry **geometry, CConfig *config_container, unsigned short iMesh) : CGeometry() {
15802 
15803  /*--- CGeometry & CConfig pointers to the fine grid level for clarity. We may
15804  need access to the other zones in the mesh for zone boundaries. ---*/
15805 
15806  CGeometry *fine_grid = geometry[iMesh-1];
15807  CConfig *config = config_container;
15808 
15809  /*--- Local variables ---*/
15810 
15811  unsigned long iPoint, Index_CoarseCV, CVPoint, iElem, iVertex, jPoint, iteration, nVertexS, nVertexR, nBufferS_Vector, nBufferR_Vector, iParent, jVertex, *Buffer_Receive_Parent = NULL, *Buffer_Send_Parent = NULL, *Buffer_Receive_Children = NULL, *Buffer_Send_Children = NULL, *Parent_Remote = NULL, *Children_Remote = NULL, *Parent_Local = NULL, *Children_Local = NULL, Local_nPointCoarse, Local_nPointFine, Global_nPointCoarse, Global_nPointFine;;
15812  short marker_seed;
15813  bool agglomerate_seed = true;
15814  unsigned short nChildren, iNode, counter, iMarker, jMarker, priority, MarkerS, MarkerR, *nChildren_MPI;
15815  vector<unsigned long> Suitable_Indirect_Neighbors, Aux_Parent;
15816  vector<unsigned long>::iterator it;
15817 
15818  unsigned short nMarker_Max = config->GetnMarker_Max();
15819 
15820  unsigned short *copy_marker = new unsigned short [nMarker_Max];
15821 
15822 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
15823  int send_to, receive_from;
15824  SU2_MPI::Status status;
15825 #endif
15826 
15827  nDim = fine_grid->GetnDim(); // Write the number of dimensions of the coarse grid.
15828 
15829  /*--- Create a queue system to deo the agglomeration
15830  1st) More than two markers ---> Vertices (never agglomerate)
15831  2nd) Two markers ---> Edges (agglomerate if same BC, never agglomerate if different BC)
15832  3rd) One marker ---> Surface (always agglomarate)
15833  4th) No marker ---> Internal Volume (always agglomarate) ---*/
15834 
15835  /*--- Set a marker to indicate indirect agglomeration ---*/
15836 
15837  if (iMesh == MESH_1) {
15838 
15839  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < fine_grid->GetnPoint(); iPoint ++)
15840  fine_grid->node[iPoint]->SetAgglomerate_Indirect(false);
15841 
15842  for (iElem = 0; iElem < fine_grid->GetnElem(); iElem++) {
15843  if ((fine_grid->elem[iElem]->GetVTK_Type() == HEXAHEDRON) ||
15844  (fine_grid->elem[iElem]->GetVTK_Type() == QUADRILATERAL)) {
15845  for (iNode = 0; iNode < fine_grid->elem[iElem]->GetnNodes(); iNode++) {
15846  iPoint = fine_grid->elem[iElem]->GetNode(iNode);
15847  fine_grid->node[iPoint]->SetAgglomerate_Indirect(true);
15848  }
15849  }
15850  }
15851 
15852  }
15853 
15854  /*--- Create the coarse grid structure using as baseline the fine grid ---*/
15855 
15856  CMultiGridQueue MGQueue_InnerCV(fine_grid->GetnPoint());
15857 
15858  nPointNode = fine_grid->GetnPoint();
15859  node = new CPoint*[fine_grid->GetnPoint()];
15860  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < fine_grid->GetnPoint(); iPoint ++) {
15861 
15862  /*--- Create node structure ---*/
15863 
15864  node[iPoint] = new CPoint(nDim, iPoint, config);
15865 
15866  /*--- Set the indirect agglomeration to false ---*/
15867 
15868  node[iPoint]->SetAgglomerate_Indirect(false);
15869  }
15870 
15871  Index_CoarseCV = 0;
15872 
15873  /*--- The first step is the boundary agglomeration. ---*/
15874 
15875  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < fine_grid->GetnMarker(); iMarker++) {
15876 
15877  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < fine_grid->GetnVertex(iMarker); iVertex++) {
15878  iPoint = fine_grid->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
15879 
15880  /*--- If the element has not being previously agglomerated and it belongs
15881  to the physical domain, then the agglomeration is studied ---*/
15882 
15883  if ((fine_grid->node[iPoint]->GetAgglomerate() == false) &&
15884  (fine_grid->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) &&
15885  (GeometricalCheck(iPoint, fine_grid, config))) {
15886 
15887  nChildren = 1;
15888 
15889  /*--- We set an index for the parent control volume ---*/
15890 
15891  fine_grid->node[iPoint]->SetParent_CV(Index_CoarseCV);
15892 
15893  /*--- We add the seed point (child) to the parent control volume ---*/
15894 
15895  node[Index_CoarseCV]->SetChildren_CV(0, iPoint);
15896  agglomerate_seed = true; counter = 0; marker_seed = iMarker;
15897 
15898  /*--- For a particular point in the fine grid we save all the markers
15899  that are in that point ---*/
15900 
15901  for (jMarker = 0; jMarker < fine_grid->GetnMarker(); jMarker ++)
15902  if (fine_grid->node[iPoint]->GetVertex(jMarker) != -1) {
15903  copy_marker[counter] = jMarker;
15904  counter++;
15905  }
15906 
15907  /*--- To aglomerate a vertex it must have only one physical bc!!
15908  This can be improved. If there is only a marker, it is a good
15909  candidate for agglomeration ---*/
15910 
15911  if (counter == 1) agglomerate_seed = true;
15912 
15913  /*--- If there are two markers, we will aglomerate if one of the
15914  marker is SEND_RECEIVE ---*/
15915 
15916  if (counter == 2) {
15917  if ((config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(copy_marker[0]) == SEND_RECEIVE) ||
15918  (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(copy_marker[1]) == SEND_RECEIVE)) agglomerate_seed = true;
15919  else agglomerate_seed = false;
15920  }
15921 
15922  /*--- If there are more than 2 markers, the aglomeration will be discarted ---*/
15923 
15924  if (counter > 2) agglomerate_seed = false;
15925 
15926  /*--- If the seed can be agglomerated, we try to agglomerate more points ---*/
15927 
15928  if (agglomerate_seed) {
15929 
15930  /*--- Now we do a sweep over all the nodes that surround the seed point ---*/
15931 
15932  for (iNode = 0; iNode < fine_grid->node[iPoint]->GetnPoint(); iNode ++) {
15933 
15934  CVPoint = fine_grid->node[iPoint]->GetPoint(iNode);
15935 
15936  /*--- The new point can be agglomerated ---*/
15937 
15938  if (SetBoundAgglomeration(CVPoint, marker_seed, fine_grid, config)) {
15939 
15940  /*--- We set the value of the parent ---*/
15941 
15942  fine_grid->node[CVPoint]->SetParent_CV(Index_CoarseCV);
15943 
15944  /*--- We set the value of the child ---*/
15945 
15946  node[Index_CoarseCV]->SetChildren_CV(nChildren, CVPoint);
15947  nChildren++;
15948  }
15949 
15950  }
15951 
15952  Suitable_Indirect_Neighbors.clear();
15953 
15954  if (fine_grid->node[iPoint]->GetAgglomerate_Indirect())
15955  SetSuitableNeighbors(&Suitable_Indirect_Neighbors, iPoint, Index_CoarseCV, fine_grid);
15956 
15957  /*--- Now we do a sweep over all the indirect nodes that can be added ---*/
15958 
15959  for (iNode = 0; iNode < Suitable_Indirect_Neighbors.size(); iNode ++) {
15960 
15961  CVPoint = Suitable_Indirect_Neighbors[iNode];
15962 
15963  /*--- The new point can be agglomerated ---*/
15964 
15965  if (SetBoundAgglomeration(CVPoint, marker_seed, fine_grid, config)) {
15966 
15967  /*--- We set the value of the parent ---*/
15968 
15969  fine_grid->node[CVPoint]->SetParent_CV(Index_CoarseCV);
15970 
15971  /*--- We set the indirect agglomeration information ---*/
15972 
15973  if (fine_grid->node[CVPoint]->GetAgglomerate_Indirect())
15974  node[Index_CoarseCV]->SetAgglomerate_Indirect(true);
15975 
15976  /*--- We set the value of the child ---*/
15977 
15978  node[Index_CoarseCV]->SetChildren_CV(nChildren, CVPoint);
15979  nChildren++;
15980  }
15981  }
15982 
15983 
15984  }
15985 
15986  /*--- Update the number of child of the control volume ---*/
15987 
15988  node[Index_CoarseCV]->SetnChildren_CV(nChildren);
15989  Index_CoarseCV++;
15990  }
15991  }
15992  }
15993 
15994  /*--- Agglomerate all the nodes that have more than one physical boundary condition,
15995  Maybe here we can add the posibility of merging the vertex that have the same number,
15996  and kind of markers---*/
15997 
15998  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < fine_grid->GetnMarker(); iMarker++)
15999  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < fine_grid->GetnVertex(iMarker); iVertex++) {
16000  iPoint = fine_grid->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
16001  if ((fine_grid->node[iPoint]->GetAgglomerate() == false) &&
16002  (fine_grid->node[iPoint]->GetDomain())) {
16003  fine_grid->node[iPoint]->SetParent_CV(Index_CoarseCV);
16004  node[Index_CoarseCV]->SetChildren_CV(0, iPoint);
16005  node[Index_CoarseCV]->SetnChildren_CV(1);
16006  Index_CoarseCV++;
16007  }
16008  }
16009 
16010  /*--- Update the queue with the results from the boundary agglomeration ---*/
16011 
16012  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < fine_grid->GetnPoint(); iPoint ++) {
16013 
16014  /*--- The CV has been agglomerated, remove form the list ---*/
16015 
16016  if (fine_grid->node[iPoint]->GetAgglomerate() == true) {
16017 
16018  MGQueue_InnerCV.RemoveCV(iPoint);
16019 
16020  }
16021 
16022  else {
16023 
16024  /*--- Count the number of agglomerated neighbors, and modify the queue ---*/
16025 
16026  priority = 0;
16027  for (iNode = 0; iNode < fine_grid->node[iPoint]->GetnPoint(); iNode ++) {
16028  jPoint = fine_grid->node[iPoint]->GetPoint(iNode);
16029  if (fine_grid->node[jPoint]->GetAgglomerate() == true) priority++;
16030  }
16031  MGQueue_InnerCV.MoveCV(iPoint, priority);
16032  }
16033  }
16034 
16035  /*--- Agglomerate the domain nodes ---*/
16036 
16037  iteration = 0;
16038  while (!MGQueue_InnerCV.EmptyQueue() && (iteration < fine_grid->GetnPoint())) {
16039 
16040  iPoint = MGQueue_InnerCV.NextCV();
16041  iteration ++;
16042 
16043  /*--- If the element has not being previously agglomerated, belongs to the physical domain,
16044  and satisfies several geometrical criteria then the seed CV is acepted for agglomeration ---*/
16045 
16046  if ((fine_grid->node[iPoint]->GetAgglomerate() == false) &&
16047  (fine_grid->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) &&
16048  (GeometricalCheck(iPoint, fine_grid, config))) {
16049 
16050  nChildren = 1;
16051 
16052  /*--- We set an index for the parent control volume ---*/
16053 
16054  fine_grid->node[iPoint]->SetParent_CV(Index_CoarseCV);
16055 
16056  /*--- We add the seed point (child) to the parent control volume ---*/
16057 
16058  node[Index_CoarseCV]->SetChildren_CV(0, iPoint);
16059 
16060  /*--- Update the queue with the seed point (remove the seed and
16061  increase the priority of the neighbors) ---*/
16062 
16063  MGQueue_InnerCV.Update(iPoint, fine_grid);
16064 
16065  /*--- Now we do a sweep over all the nodes that surround the seed point ---*/
16066 
16067  for (iNode = 0; iNode < fine_grid->node[iPoint]->GetnPoint(); iNode ++) {
16068 
16069  CVPoint = fine_grid->node[iPoint]->GetPoint(iNode);
16070 
16071  /*--- Determine if the CVPoint can be agglomerated ---*/
16072 
16073  if ((fine_grid->node[CVPoint]->GetAgglomerate() == false) &&
16074  (fine_grid->node[CVPoint]->GetDomain()) &&
16075  (GeometricalCheck(CVPoint, fine_grid, config))) {
16076 
16077  /*--- We set the value of the parent ---*/
16078 
16079  fine_grid->node[CVPoint]->SetParent_CV(Index_CoarseCV);
16080 
16081  /*--- We set the value of the child ---*/
16082 
16083  node[Index_CoarseCV]->SetChildren_CV(nChildren, CVPoint);
16084  nChildren++;
16085 
16086  /*--- Update the queue with the new control volume (remove the CV and
16087  increase the priority of the neighbors) ---*/
16088 
16089  MGQueue_InnerCV.Update(CVPoint, fine_grid);
16090 
16091  }
16092 
16093  }
16094 
16095  /*--- Subrotuine to identify the indirect neighbors ---*/
16096 
16097  Suitable_Indirect_Neighbors.clear();
16098  if (fine_grid->node[iPoint]->GetAgglomerate_Indirect())
16099  SetSuitableNeighbors(&Suitable_Indirect_Neighbors, iPoint, Index_CoarseCV, fine_grid);
16100 
16101  /*--- Now we do a sweep over all the indirect nodes that can be added ---*/
16102 
16103  for (iNode = 0; iNode < Suitable_Indirect_Neighbors.size(); iNode ++) {
16104 
16105  CVPoint = Suitable_Indirect_Neighbors[iNode];
16106 
16107  /*--- The new point can be agglomerated ---*/
16108 
16109  if ((fine_grid->node[CVPoint]->GetAgglomerate() == false) &&
16110  (fine_grid->node[CVPoint]->GetDomain())) {
16111 
16112  /*--- We set the value of the parent ---*/
16113 
16114  fine_grid->node[CVPoint]->SetParent_CV(Index_CoarseCV);
16115 
16116  /*--- We set the indirect agglomeration information ---*/
16117 
16118  if (fine_grid->node[CVPoint]->GetAgglomerate_Indirect())
16119  node[Index_CoarseCV]->SetAgglomerate_Indirect(true);
16120 
16121  /*--- We set the value of the child ---*/
16122 
16123  node[Index_CoarseCV]->SetChildren_CV(nChildren, CVPoint);
16124  nChildren++;
16125 
16126  /*--- Update the queue with the new control volume (remove the CV and
16127  increase the priority of the neighbors) ---*/
16128 
16129  MGQueue_InnerCV.Update(CVPoint, fine_grid);
16130 
16131  }
16132  }
16133 
16134  /*--- Update the number of control of childrens ---*/
16135 
16136  node[Index_CoarseCV]->SetnChildren_CV(nChildren);
16137  Index_CoarseCV++;
16138  }
16139  else {
16140 
16141  /*--- The seed point can not be agglomerated because of size, domain, streching, etc.
16142  move the point to the lowest priority ---*/
16143 
16144  MGQueue_InnerCV.MoveCV(iPoint, -1);
16145  }
16146 
16147  }
16148 
16149  /*--- Add all the elements that have not being agglomerated, in the previous stage ---*/
16150 
16151  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < fine_grid->GetnPoint(); iPoint ++) {
16152  if ((fine_grid->node[iPoint]->GetAgglomerate() == false) && (fine_grid->node[iPoint]->GetDomain())) {
16153 
16154  nChildren = 1;
16155  fine_grid->node[iPoint]->SetParent_CV(Index_CoarseCV);
16156  if (fine_grid->node[iPoint]->GetAgglomerate_Indirect())
16157  node[Index_CoarseCV]->SetAgglomerate_Indirect(true);
16158  node[Index_CoarseCV]->SetChildren_CV(0, iPoint);
16159  node[Index_CoarseCV]->SetnChildren_CV(nChildren);
16160  Index_CoarseCV++;
16161 
16162  }
16163  }
16164 
16165  nPointDomain = Index_CoarseCV;
16166 
16167  /*--- Check that there are no hanging nodes ---*/
16168 
16169  unsigned long iFinePoint, iFinePoint_Neighbor, iCoarsePoint, iCoarsePoint_Complete;
16170  unsigned short iChildren;
16171 
16172  /*--- Find the point surrounding a point ---*/
16173 
16174  for (iCoarsePoint = 0; iCoarsePoint < nPointDomain; iCoarsePoint ++) {
16175  for (iChildren = 0; iChildren < node[iCoarsePoint]->GetnChildren_CV(); iChildren ++) {
16176  iFinePoint = node[iCoarsePoint]->GetChildren_CV(iChildren);
16177  for (iNode = 0; iNode < fine_grid->node[iFinePoint]->GetnPoint(); iNode ++) {
16178  iFinePoint_Neighbor = fine_grid->node[iFinePoint]->GetPoint(iNode);
16179  iParent = fine_grid->node[iFinePoint_Neighbor]->GetParent_CV();
16180  if (iParent != iCoarsePoint) node[iCoarsePoint]->SetPoint(iParent);
16181  }
16182  }
16183  }
16184 
16185  /*--- Detect isolated points and merge them with its correct neighbor ---*/
16186 
16187  for (iCoarsePoint = 0; iCoarsePoint < nPointDomain; iCoarsePoint ++) {
16188 
16189  if (node[iCoarsePoint]->GetnPoint() == 1) {
16190 
16191  /*--- Find the neighbor of the isolated point. This neighbor is the right control volume ---*/
16192 
16193  iCoarsePoint_Complete = node[iCoarsePoint]->GetPoint(0);
16194 
16195  /*--- Add the children to the connected control volume (and modify it parent indexing).
16196  Identify the child CV from the finest grid and added to the correct control volume.
16197  Set the parent CV of iFinePoint. Instead of using the original
16198  (iCoarsePoint) one use the new one (iCoarsePoint_Complete) ---*/
16199 
16200  nChildren = node[iCoarsePoint_Complete]->GetnChildren_CV();
16201 
16202  for (iChildren = 0; iChildren < node[iCoarsePoint]->GetnChildren_CV(); iChildren ++) {
16203  iFinePoint = node[iCoarsePoint]->GetChildren_CV(iChildren);
16204  node[iCoarsePoint_Complete]->SetChildren_CV(nChildren, iFinePoint);
16205  nChildren++;
16206  fine_grid->node[iFinePoint]->SetParent_CV(iCoarsePoint_Complete);
16207  }
16208 
16209  /*--- Update the number of children control volumes ---*/
16210 
16211  node[iCoarsePoint_Complete]->SetnChildren_CV(nChildren);
16212  node[iCoarsePoint]->SetnChildren_CV(0);
16213 
16214  }
16215  }
16216 
16217  // unsigned long iPointFree = nPointDomain-1;
16218  // iCoarsePoint = 0;
16219  //
16220  // do {
16221  //
16222  // if (node[iCoarsePoint]->GetnChildren_CV() == 0) {
16223  //
16224  // while (node[iPointFree]->GetnChildren_CV() == 0) {
16225  // Index_CoarseCV--;
16226  // iPointFree--;
16227  // }
16228  //
16229  // nChildren = node[iPointFree]->GetnChildren_CV();
16230  // for (iChildren = 0; iChildren < nChildren; iChildren ++) {
16231  // iFinePoint = node[iPointFree]->GetChildren_CV(iChildren);
16232  // node[iCoarsePoint]->SetChildren_CV(iChildren, iFinePoint);
16233  // fine_grid->node[iFinePoint]->SetParent_CV(iCoarsePoint);
16234  // }
16235  // node[iCoarsePoint]->SetnChildren_CV(nChildren);
16236  // node[iPointFree]->SetnChildren_CV(0);
16237  //
16238  // Index_CoarseCV--;
16239  // iPointFree--;
16240  //
16241  // }
16242  //
16243  // iCoarsePoint++;
16244  //
16245  // } while ((iCoarsePoint-1) < Index_CoarseCV);
16246  //
16247  // nPointDomain = Index_CoarseCV;
16248 
16249  /*--- Reset the point surrounding a point ---*/
16250 
16251  for (iCoarsePoint = 0; iCoarsePoint < nPointDomain; iCoarsePoint ++) {
16252  node[iCoarsePoint]->ResetPoint();
16253  }
16254 
16255  /*--- Dealing with MPI parallelization, the objective is that the received nodes must be agglomerated
16256  in the same way as the donor nodes. Send the node agglomeration information of the donor
16257  (parent and children), Sending only occurs with MPI ---*/
16258 
16259  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
16260 
16261  if ((config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == SEND_RECEIVE) &&
16262  (config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(iMarker) > 0)) {
16263 
16264  MarkerS = iMarker; MarkerR = iMarker+1;
16265 
16266 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
16267  send_to = config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(MarkerS)-1;
16268  receive_from = abs(config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(MarkerR))-1;
16269 #endif
16270 
16271  nVertexS = fine_grid->nVertex[MarkerS]; nVertexR = fine_grid->nVertex[MarkerR];
16272  nBufferS_Vector = nVertexS; nBufferR_Vector = nVertexR;
16273 
16274  /*--- Allocate Receive and send buffers ---*/
16275 
16276  Buffer_Receive_Children = new unsigned long [nBufferR_Vector];
16277  Buffer_Send_Children = new unsigned long [nBufferS_Vector];
16278 
16279  Buffer_Receive_Parent = new unsigned long [nBufferR_Vector];
16280  Buffer_Send_Parent = new unsigned long [nBufferS_Vector];
16281 
16282  /*--- Copy the information that should be sended ---*/
16283 
16284  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexS; iVertex++) {
16285  iPoint = fine_grid->vertex[MarkerS][iVertex]->GetNode();
16286  Buffer_Send_Children[iVertex] = iPoint;
16287  Buffer_Send_Parent[iVertex] = fine_grid->node[iPoint]->GetParent_CV();
16288  }
16289 
16290 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
16291  /*--- Send/Receive information using Sendrecv ---*/
16292  SU2_MPI::Sendrecv(Buffer_Send_Children, nBufferS_Vector, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, send_to,0,
16293  Buffer_Receive_Children, nBufferR_Vector, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, receive_from,0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
16294  SU2_MPI::Sendrecv(Buffer_Send_Parent, nBufferS_Vector, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, send_to,1,
16295  Buffer_Receive_Parent, nBufferR_Vector, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, receive_from,1, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
16296 #else
16297  /*--- Receive information without MPI ---*/
16298  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexR; iVertex++) {
16299  Buffer_Receive_Children[iVertex] = Buffer_Send_Children[iVertex];
16300  Buffer_Receive_Parent[iVertex] = Buffer_Send_Parent[iVertex];
16301  }
16302 #endif
16303 
16304  /*--- Deallocate send buffer ---*/
16305 
16306  delete [] Buffer_Send_Children;
16307  delete [] Buffer_Send_Parent;
16308 
16309  /*--- Create a list of the parent nodes without repeated parents ---*/
16310 
16311  Aux_Parent.clear();
16312  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexR; iVertex++)
16313  Aux_Parent.push_back (Buffer_Receive_Parent[iVertex]);
16314 
16315  sort(Aux_Parent.begin(), Aux_Parent.end());
16316  it = unique(Aux_Parent.begin(), Aux_Parent.end());
16317  Aux_Parent.resize(it - Aux_Parent.begin());
16318 
16319  /*--- Allocate some structures ---*/
16320 
16321  Parent_Remote = new unsigned long[nVertexR];
16322  Children_Remote = new unsigned long[nVertexR];
16323  Parent_Local = new unsigned long[nVertexR];
16324  Children_Local = new unsigned long[nVertexR];
16325 
16326  /*--- Create the local vector and remote for the parents and the children ---*/
16327 
16328  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexR; iVertex++) {
16329 
16330  Parent_Remote[iVertex] = Buffer_Receive_Parent[iVertex];
16331 
16332  /*--- We use the same sorting as in the donor domain ---*/
16333 
16334  for (jVertex = 0; jVertex < Aux_Parent.size(); jVertex++) {
16335  if (Parent_Remote[iVertex] == Aux_Parent[jVertex]) {
16336  Parent_Local[iVertex] = jVertex + Index_CoarseCV;
16337  break;
16338  }
16339  }
16340 
16341  Children_Remote[iVertex] = Buffer_Receive_Children[iVertex];
16342  Children_Local[iVertex] = fine_grid->vertex[MarkerR][iVertex]->GetNode();
16343 
16344  }
16345 
16346  Index_CoarseCV += Aux_Parent.size();
16347 
16348  nChildren_MPI = new unsigned short [Index_CoarseCV];
16349  for (iParent = 0; iParent < Index_CoarseCV; iParent++)
16350  nChildren_MPI[iParent] = 0;
16351 
16352  /*--- Create the final structure ---*/
16353  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexR; iVertex++) {
16354 
16355  /*--- Be careful, it is possible that a node change the agglomeration configuration, the priority
16356  is always, when receive the information ---*/
16357 
16358  fine_grid->node[Children_Local[iVertex]]->SetParent_CV(Parent_Local[iVertex]);
16359  node[Parent_Local[iVertex]]->SetChildren_CV(nChildren_MPI[Parent_Local[iVertex]], Children_Local[iVertex]);
16360  nChildren_MPI[Parent_Local[iVertex]]++;
16361  node[Parent_Local[iVertex]]->SetnChildren_CV(nChildren_MPI[Parent_Local[iVertex]]);
16362  node[Parent_Local[iVertex]]->SetDomain(false);
16363 
16364  }
16365 
16366  /*--- Deallocate auxiliar structures ---*/
16367 
16368  delete[] nChildren_MPI;
16369  delete[] Parent_Remote;
16370  delete[] Children_Remote;
16371  delete[] Parent_Local;
16372  delete[] Children_Local;
16373 
16374  /*--- Deallocate receive buffer ---*/
16375 
16376  delete [] Buffer_Receive_Children;
16377  delete [] Buffer_Receive_Parent;
16378 
16379  }
16380 
16381  }
16382 
16383  /*--- Update the number of points after the MPI agglomeration ---*/
16384 
16385  nPoint = Index_CoarseCV;
16386 
16387  /*--- Console output with the summary of the agglomeration ---*/
16388 
16389  Local_nPointCoarse = nPoint;
16390  Local_nPointFine = fine_grid->GetnPoint();
16391 
16392 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
16393  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Local_nPointCoarse, &Global_nPointCoarse, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
16394  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Local_nPointFine, &Global_nPointFine, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
16395 #else
16396  Global_nPointCoarse = Local_nPointCoarse;
16397  Global_nPointFine = Local_nPointFine;
16398 #endif
16399 
16400  su2double Coeff = 1.0, CFL = 0.0, factor = 1.5;
16401 
16402  if (iMesh != MESH_0) {
16403  if (nDim == 2) Coeff = pow(su2double(Global_nPointFine)/su2double(Global_nPointCoarse), 1./2.);
16404  if (nDim == 3) Coeff = pow(su2double(Global_nPointFine)/su2double(Global_nPointCoarse), 1./3.);
16405  CFL = factor*config->GetCFL(iMesh-1)/Coeff;
16406  config->SetCFL(iMesh, CFL);
16407  }
16408 
16409  su2double ratio = su2double(Global_nPointFine)/su2double(Global_nPointCoarse);
16410 
16411  if (((nDim == 2) && (ratio < 2.5)) ||
16412  ((nDim == 3) && (ratio < 2.5))) {
16413  config->SetMGLevels(iMesh-1);
16414  }
16415  else {
16416  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
16417  PrintingToolbox::CTablePrinter MGTable(&std::cout);
16418  MGTable.AddColumn("MG Level", 10);
16419  MGTable.AddColumn("CVs", 10);
16420  MGTable.AddColumn("Aggl. Rate", 10);
16421  MGTable.AddColumn("CFL", 10);
16422  MGTable.SetAlign(PrintingToolbox::CTablePrinter::RIGHT);
16423 
16424 
16425  if (iMesh == 1){
16426  MGTable.PrintHeader();
16427  MGTable << iMesh - 1 << Global_nPointFine << "1/1.00" << config->GetCFL(iMesh -1);
16428  }
16429  stringstream ss;
16430  ss << "1/" << std::setprecision(3) << ratio;
16431  MGTable << iMesh << Global_nPointCoarse << ss.str() << CFL;
16432  if (iMesh == config->GetnMGLevels()){
16433  MGTable.PrintFooter();
16434  }
16435  }
16436  }
16437 
16438  delete [] copy_marker;
16439 
16440 }
16441 
16442 
16443 CMultiGridGeometry::~CMultiGridGeometry(void) {
16444 
16445 }
16446 
16447 bool CMultiGridGeometry::SetBoundAgglomeration(unsigned long CVPoint, short marker_seed, CGeometry *fine_grid, CConfig *config) {
16448 
16449  bool agglomerate_CV = false;
16450  unsigned short counter, jMarker;
16451 
16452  unsigned short nMarker_Max = config->GetnMarker_Max();
16453 
16454  unsigned short *copy_marker = new unsigned short [nMarker_Max];
16455 
16456  /*--- Basic condition, the element has not being previously agglomerated, it belongs to the domain,
16457  and has passed some basic geometrical check ---*/
16458 
16459  if ((fine_grid->node[CVPoint]->GetAgglomerate() == false) &&
16460  (fine_grid->node[CVPoint]->GetDomain()) &&
16461  (GeometricalCheck(CVPoint, fine_grid, config))) {
16462 
16463  /*--- If the element belong to the boundary, we must be careful ---*/
16464 
16465  if (fine_grid->node[CVPoint]->GetBoundary()) {
16466 
16467  /*--- Identify the markers of the vertex that we want to agglomerate ---*/
16468 
16469  counter = 0;
16470  for (jMarker = 0; jMarker < fine_grid->GetnMarker(); jMarker ++)
16471  if (fine_grid->node[CVPoint]->GetVertex(jMarker) != -1) {
16472  copy_marker[counter] = jMarker;
16473  counter++;
16474  }
