16475 
16476  /*--- The basic condition is that the aglomerated vertex must have the same physical marker,
16477  but eventually a send-receive condition ---*/
16478 
16479  /*--- Only one marker in the vertex that is going to be aglomerated ---*/
16480 
16481  if (counter == 1) {
16482 
16483  /*--- We agglomerate if there is only a marker and is the same marker as the seed marker ---*/
16484 
16485  if (copy_marker[0] == marker_seed)
16486  agglomerate_CV = true;
16487 
16488  /*--- If there is only a marker, but the marker is the SEND_RECEIVE ---*/
16489 
16490  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(copy_marker[0]) == SEND_RECEIVE)
16491  agglomerate_CV = true;
16492 
16493  }
16494 
16495  /*--- If there are two markers in the vertex that is going to be aglomerated ---*/
16496 
16497  if (counter == 2) {
16498 
16499  /*--- First we verify that the seed is a physical boundary ---*/
16500 
16501  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(marker_seed) != SEND_RECEIVE) {
16502 
16503  /*--- Then we check that one of the marker is equal to the seed marker, and the other is send/receive ---*/
16504 
16505  if (((copy_marker[0] == marker_seed) && (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(copy_marker[1]) == SEND_RECEIVE)) ||
16506  ((config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(copy_marker[0]) == SEND_RECEIVE) && (copy_marker[1] == marker_seed)))
16507  agglomerate_CV = true;
16508  }
16509 
16510  }
16511 
16512  }
16513 
16514  /*--- If the element belong to the domain, it is allways aglomerated ---*/
16515 
16516  else { agglomerate_CV = true; }
16517 
16518  }
16519 
16520  delete [] copy_marker;
16521 
16522  return agglomerate_CV;
16523 
16524 }
16525 
16526 
16527 bool CMultiGridGeometry::GeometricalCheck(unsigned long iPoint, CGeometry *fine_grid, CConfig *config) {
16528 
16529  su2double max_dimension = 1.2;
16530 
16531  /*--- Evaluate the total size of the element ---*/
16532 
16533  bool Volume = true;
16534  su2double ratio = pow(fine_grid->node[iPoint]->GetVolume(), 1.0/su2double(nDim))*max_dimension;
16535  su2double limit = pow(config->GetDomainVolume(), 1.0/su2double(nDim));
16536  if ( ratio > limit ) Volume = false;
16537 
16538  /*--- Evaluate the stretching of the element ---*/
16539 
16540  bool Stretching = true;
16541 
16542  /* unsigned short iNode, iDim;
16543  unsigned long jPoint;
16544  su2double *Coord_i = fine_grid->node[iPoint]->GetCoord();
16545  su2double max_dist = 0.0 ; su2double min_dist = 1E20;
16546  for (iNode = 0; iNode < fine_grid->node[iPoint]->GetnPoint(); iNode ++) {
16547  jPoint = fine_grid->node[iPoint]->GetPoint(iNode);
16548  su2double *Coord_j = fine_grid->node[jPoint]->GetCoord();
16549  su2double distance = 0.0;
16550  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
16551  distance += (Coord_j[iDim]-Coord_i[iDim])*(Coord_j[iDim]-Coord_i[iDim]);
16552  distance = sqrt(distance);
16553  max_dist = max(distance, max_dist);
16554  min_dist = min(distance, min_dist);
16555  }
16556  if ( max_dist/min_dist > 100.0 ) Stretching = false;*/
16557 
16558  return (Stretching && Volume);
16559 
16560 }
16561 
16562 void CMultiGridGeometry::SetSuitableNeighbors(vector<unsigned long> *Suitable_Indirect_Neighbors, unsigned long iPoint,
16563  unsigned long Index_CoarseCV, CGeometry *fine_grid) {
16564 
16565  unsigned long jPoint, kPoint, lPoint;
16566  unsigned short iNode, jNode, iNeighbor, jNeighbor, kNode;
16567  bool SecondNeighborSeed, ThirdNeighborSeed;
16568  vector<unsigned long>::iterator it;
16569 
16570  /*--- Create a list with the first neighbors, including the seed ---*/
16571 
16572  vector<unsigned long> First_Neighbor_Points;
16573  First_Neighbor_Points.push_back(iPoint);
16574  for (iNode = 0; iNode < fine_grid->node[iPoint]->GetnPoint(); iNode ++) {
16575  jPoint = fine_grid->node[iPoint]->GetPoint(iNode);
16576  First_Neighbor_Points.push_back(jPoint);
16577  }
16578 
16579  /*--- Create a list with the second neighbors, without first, and seed neighbors ---*/
16580 
16581  vector<unsigned long> Second_Neighbor_Points, Second_Origin_Points, Suitable_Second_Neighbors;
16582 
16583  for (iNode = 0; iNode < fine_grid->node[iPoint]->GetnPoint(); iNode ++) {
16584  jPoint = fine_grid->node[iPoint]->GetPoint(iNode);
16585 
16586  for (jNode = 0; jNode < fine_grid->node[jPoint]->GetnPoint(); jNode ++) {
16587  kPoint = fine_grid->node[jPoint]->GetPoint(jNode);
16588 
16589  /*--- Check that the second neighbor do not belong to the first neighbor or the seed ---*/
16590 
16591  SecondNeighborSeed = true;
16592  for (iNeighbor = 0; iNeighbor < First_Neighbor_Points.size(); iNeighbor ++)
16593  if (kPoint == First_Neighbor_Points[iNeighbor]) {
16594  SecondNeighborSeed = false; break;
16595  }
16596 
16597  if (SecondNeighborSeed) {
16598  Second_Neighbor_Points.push_back(kPoint);
16599  Second_Origin_Points.push_back(jPoint);
16600  }
16601 
16602  }
16603  }
16604 
16605  /*--- Identify those second neighbors that are repeated (candidate to be added) ---*/
16606 
16607  for (iNeighbor = 0; iNeighbor < Second_Neighbor_Points.size(); iNeighbor ++)
16608 
16609  for (jNeighbor = 0; jNeighbor < Second_Neighbor_Points.size(); jNeighbor ++)
16610 
16611  /*--- Repeated second neighbor with different origin ---*/
16612 
16613  if ((Second_Neighbor_Points[iNeighbor] == Second_Neighbor_Points[jNeighbor]) &&
16614  (Second_Origin_Points[iNeighbor] != Second_Origin_Points[jNeighbor]) &&
16615  (iNeighbor < jNeighbor)) {
16616 
16617  Suitable_Indirect_Neighbors->push_back(Second_Neighbor_Points[iNeighbor]);
16618 
16619  /*--- Create alist with the suitable second neighbor, that we will use
16620  to compute the third neighbors --*/
16621 
16622  Suitable_Second_Neighbors.push_back(Second_Neighbor_Points[iNeighbor]);
16623 
16624  }
16625 
16626 
16627  /*--- Remove repeated from the suitable second neighbors ---*/
16628 
16629  sort(Suitable_Second_Neighbors.begin(), Suitable_Second_Neighbors.end());
16630  it = unique(Suitable_Second_Neighbors.begin(), Suitable_Second_Neighbors.end());
16631  Suitable_Second_Neighbors.resize(it - Suitable_Second_Neighbors.begin());
16632 
16633  /*--- Remove repeated from first neighbors ---*/
16634 
16635  sort(First_Neighbor_Points.begin(), First_Neighbor_Points.end());
16636  it = unique(First_Neighbor_Points.begin(), First_Neighbor_Points.end());
16637  First_Neighbor_Points.resize(it - First_Neighbor_Points.begin());
16638 
16639  /*--- Create a list with the third neighbors, without first, second, and seed neighbors ---*/
16640 
16641  vector<unsigned long> Third_Neighbor_Points, Third_Origin_Points;
16642 
16643  for (jNode = 0; jNode < Suitable_Second_Neighbors.size(); jNode ++) {
16644  kPoint = Suitable_Second_Neighbors[jNode];
16645 
16646  for (kNode = 0; kNode < fine_grid->node[kPoint]->GetnPoint(); kNode ++) {
16647  lPoint = fine_grid->node[kPoint]->GetPoint(kNode);
16648 
16649  /*--- Check that the third neighbor do not belong to the first neighbors or the seed ---*/
16650 
16651  ThirdNeighborSeed = true;
16652 
16653  for (iNeighbor = 0; iNeighbor < First_Neighbor_Points.size(); iNeighbor ++)
16654  if (lPoint == First_Neighbor_Points[iNeighbor]) {
16655  ThirdNeighborSeed = false;
16656  break;
16657  }
16658 
16659  /*--- Check that the third neighbor do not belong to the second neighbors ---*/
16660 
16661  for (iNeighbor = 0; iNeighbor < Suitable_Second_Neighbors.size(); iNeighbor ++)
16662  if (lPoint == Suitable_Second_Neighbors[iNeighbor]) {
16663  ThirdNeighborSeed = false;
16664  break;
16665  }
16666 
16667  if (ThirdNeighborSeed) {
16668  Third_Neighbor_Points.push_back(lPoint);
16669  Third_Origin_Points.push_back(kPoint);
16670  }
16671 
16672  }
16673  }
16674 
16675  /*--- Identify those third neighbors that are repeated (candidate to be added) ---*/
16676 
16677  for (iNeighbor = 0; iNeighbor < Third_Neighbor_Points.size(); iNeighbor ++)
16678  for (jNeighbor = 0; jNeighbor < Third_Neighbor_Points.size(); jNeighbor ++)
16679 
16680  /*--- Repeated second neighbor with different origin ---*/
16681 
16682  if ((Third_Neighbor_Points[iNeighbor] == Third_Neighbor_Points[jNeighbor]) &&
16683  (Third_Origin_Points[iNeighbor] != Third_Origin_Points[jNeighbor]) &&
16684  (iNeighbor < jNeighbor)) {
16685 
16686  Suitable_Indirect_Neighbors->push_back(Third_Neighbor_Points[iNeighbor]);
16687 
16688  }
16689 
16690  /*--- Remove repeated from Suitable Indirect Neighbors List ---*/
16691 
16692  sort(Suitable_Indirect_Neighbors->begin(), Suitable_Indirect_Neighbors->end());
16693  it = unique(Suitable_Indirect_Neighbors->begin(), Suitable_Indirect_Neighbors->end());
16694  Suitable_Indirect_Neighbors->resize(it - Suitable_Indirect_Neighbors->begin());
16695 
16696 }
16697 
16698 void CMultiGridGeometry::SetPoint_Connectivity(CGeometry *fine_grid) {
16699 
16700  unsigned long iFinePoint, iFinePoint_Neighbor, iParent, iCoarsePoint;
16701  unsigned short iChildren, iNode;
16702 
16703  /*--- Set the point surrounding a point ---*/
16704 
16705  for (iCoarsePoint = 0; iCoarsePoint < nPoint; iCoarsePoint ++) {
16706  for (iChildren = 0; iChildren < node[iCoarsePoint]->GetnChildren_CV(); iChildren ++) {
16707  iFinePoint = node[iCoarsePoint]->GetChildren_CV(iChildren);
16708  for (iNode = 0; iNode < fine_grid->node[iFinePoint]->GetnPoint(); iNode ++) {
16709  iFinePoint_Neighbor = fine_grid->node[iFinePoint]->GetPoint(iNode);
16710  iParent = fine_grid->node[iFinePoint_Neighbor]->GetParent_CV();
16711  if (iParent != iCoarsePoint) node[iCoarsePoint]->SetPoint(iParent);
16712  }
16713  }
16714  }
16715 
16716  /*--- Set the number of neighbors variable, this is
16717  important for JST and multigrid in parallel ---*/
16718 
16719  for (iCoarsePoint = 0; iCoarsePoint < nPoint; iCoarsePoint ++)
16720  node[iCoarsePoint]->SetnNeighbor(node[iCoarsePoint]->GetnPoint());
16721 
16722 }
16723 
16724 void CMultiGridGeometry::SetVertex(CGeometry *fine_grid, CConfig *config) {
16725  unsigned long iVertex, iFinePoint, iCoarsePoint;
16726  unsigned short iMarker, iMarker_Tag, iChildren;
16727 
16728  nMarker = fine_grid->GetnMarker();
16729  unsigned short nMarker_Max = config->GetnMarker_Max();
16730 
16731  /*--- If any children node belong to the boundary then the entire control
16732  volume will belong to the boundary ---*/
16733  for (iCoarsePoint = 0; iCoarsePoint < nPoint; iCoarsePoint ++)
16734  for (iChildren = 0; iChildren < node[iCoarsePoint]->GetnChildren_CV(); iChildren ++) {
16735  iFinePoint = node[iCoarsePoint]->GetChildren_CV(iChildren);
16736  if (fine_grid->node[iFinePoint]->GetBoundary()) {
16737  node[iCoarsePoint]->SetBoundary(nMarker);
16738  break;
16739  }
16740  }
16741 
16742  vertex = new CVertex**[nMarker];
16743  nVertex = new unsigned long [nMarker];
16744 
16745  Tag_to_Marker = new string [nMarker_Max];
16746  for (iMarker_Tag = 0; iMarker_Tag < nMarker_Max; iMarker_Tag++)
16747  Tag_to_Marker[iMarker_Tag] = fine_grid->GetMarker_Tag(iMarker_Tag);
16748 
16749  /*--- Compute the number of vertices to do the dimensionalization ---*/
16750  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) nVertex[iMarker] = 0;
16751 
16752 
16753  for (iCoarsePoint = 0; iCoarsePoint < nPoint; iCoarsePoint ++) {
16754  if (node[iCoarsePoint]->GetBoundary()) {
16755  for (iChildren = 0; iChildren < node[iCoarsePoint]->GetnChildren_CV(); iChildren ++) {
16756  iFinePoint = node[iCoarsePoint]->GetChildren_CV(iChildren);
16757  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker ++) {
16758  if ((fine_grid->node[iFinePoint]->GetVertex(iMarker) != -1) && (node[iCoarsePoint]->GetVertex(iMarker) == -1)) {
16759  iVertex = nVertex[iMarker];
16760  node[iCoarsePoint]->SetVertex(iVertex, iMarker);
16761  nVertex[iMarker]++;
16762  }
16763  }
16764  }
16765  }
16766  }
16767 
16768  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
16769  vertex[iMarker] = new CVertex* [fine_grid->GetnVertex(iMarker)+1];
16770  nVertex[iMarker] = 0;
16771  }
16772 
16773  for (iCoarsePoint = 0; iCoarsePoint < nPoint; iCoarsePoint ++)
16774  if (node[iCoarsePoint]->GetBoundary())
16775  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker ++)
16776  node[iCoarsePoint]->SetVertex(-1, iMarker);
16777 
16778  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) nVertex[iMarker] = 0;
16779 
16780  for (iCoarsePoint = 0; iCoarsePoint < nPoint; iCoarsePoint ++)
16781  if (node[iCoarsePoint]->GetBoundary())
16782  for (iChildren = 0; iChildren < node[iCoarsePoint]->GetnChildren_CV(); iChildren ++) {
16783  iFinePoint = node[iCoarsePoint]->GetChildren_CV(iChildren);
16784  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < fine_grid->GetnMarker(); iMarker ++) {
16785  if ((fine_grid->node[iFinePoint]->GetVertex(iMarker) != -1) && (node[iCoarsePoint]->GetVertex(iMarker) == -1)) {
16786  iVertex = nVertex[iMarker];
16787  vertex[iMarker][iVertex] = new CVertex(iCoarsePoint, nDim);
16788  node[iCoarsePoint]->SetVertex(iVertex, iMarker);
16789 
16790  /*--- Set the transformation to apply ---*/
16791  unsigned long ChildVertex = fine_grid->node[iFinePoint]->GetVertex(iMarker);
16792  unsigned short RotationKind = fine_grid->vertex[iMarker][ChildVertex]->GetRotation_Type();
16793  vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->SetRotation_Type(RotationKind);
16794  nVertex[iMarker]++;
16795  }
16796  }
16797  }
16798 }
16799 
16800 void CMultiGridGeometry::MatchNearField(CConfig *config) {
16801 
16802  unsigned short iMarker;
16803  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint;
16804  int iProcessor = size;
16805 
16806  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
16807  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == NEARFIELD_BOUNDARY) {
16808  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
16809  iPoint = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
16810  if (node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
16811  vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->SetDonorPoint(iPoint, node[iPoint]->GetGlobalIndex(), iVertex, iMarker, iProcessor);
16812  }
16813  }
16814  }
16815  }
16816 
16817 }
16818 
16819 void CMultiGridGeometry::MatchActuator_Disk(CConfig *config) {
16820 
16821  unsigned short iMarker;
16822  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint;
16823  int iProcessor = size;
16824 
16825  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
16826  if ((config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == ACTDISK_INLET) ||
16827  (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == ACTDISK_OUTLET)) {
16828  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
16829  iPoint = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
16830  if (node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
16831  vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->SetDonorPoint(iPoint, node[iPoint]->GetGlobalIndex(), iVertex, iMarker, iProcessor);
16832  }
16833  }
16834  }
16835  }
16836 
16837 }
16838 
16839 void CMultiGridGeometry::MatchPeriodic(CConfig *config, unsigned short val_periodic) {
16840 
16841  unsigned short iMarker, iPeriodic, nPeriodic;
16842  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint;
16843  int iProcessor = rank;
16844 
16845  /*--- Evaluate the number of periodic boundary conditions ---*/
16846 
16847  nPeriodic = config->GetnMarker_Periodic();
16848 
16849  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
16850  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == PERIODIC_BOUNDARY) {
16851  iPeriodic = config->GetMarker_All_PerBound(iMarker);
16852  if ((iPeriodic == val_periodic) ||
16853  (iPeriodic == val_periodic + nPeriodic/2)) {
16854  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
16855  iPoint = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
16856  if (node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
16857  vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->SetDonorPoint(iPoint, node[iPoint]->GetGlobalIndex(), iVertex, iMarker, iProcessor);
16858  }
16859  }
16860  }
16861  }
16862  }
16863 
16864 }
16865 
16866 void CMultiGridGeometry::SetControlVolume(CConfig *config, CGeometry *fine_grid, unsigned short action) {
16867 
16868  unsigned long iFinePoint, iFinePoint_Neighbor, iCoarsePoint, iEdge, iParent;
16869  long FineEdge, CoarseEdge;
16870  unsigned short iChildren, iNode, iDim;
16871  bool change_face_orientation;
16872  su2double *Normal, Coarse_Volume, Area, *NormalFace = NULL;
16873  Normal = new su2double [nDim];
16874 
16875  /*--- Compute the area of the coarse volume ---*/
16876  for (iCoarsePoint = 0; iCoarsePoint < nPoint; iCoarsePoint ++) {
16877  node[iCoarsePoint]->SetVolume(0.0);
16878  Coarse_Volume = 0.0;
16879  for (iChildren = 0; iChildren < node[iCoarsePoint]->GetnChildren_CV(); iChildren ++) {
16880  iFinePoint = node[iCoarsePoint]->GetChildren_CV(iChildren);
16881  Coarse_Volume += fine_grid->node[iFinePoint]->GetVolume();
16882  }
16883  node[iCoarsePoint]->SetVolume(Coarse_Volume);
16884  }
16885 
16886  /*--- Update or not the values of faces at the edge ---*/
16887  if (action != ALLOCATE) {
16888  for (iEdge=0; iEdge < nEdge; iEdge++)
16889  edge[iEdge]->SetZeroValues();
16890  }
16891 
16892  for (iCoarsePoint = 0; iCoarsePoint < nPoint; iCoarsePoint ++)
16893  for (iChildren = 0; iChildren < node[iCoarsePoint]->GetnChildren_CV(); iChildren ++) {
16894  iFinePoint = node[iCoarsePoint]->GetChildren_CV(iChildren);
16895 
16896  for (iNode = 0; iNode < fine_grid->node[iFinePoint]->GetnPoint(); iNode ++) {
16897  iFinePoint_Neighbor = fine_grid->node[iFinePoint]->GetPoint(iNode);
16898  iParent = fine_grid->node[iFinePoint_Neighbor]->GetParent_CV();
16899  if ((iParent != iCoarsePoint) && (iParent < iCoarsePoint)) {
16900 
16901  FineEdge = fine_grid->FindEdge(iFinePoint, iFinePoint_Neighbor);
16902 
16903  change_face_orientation = false;
16904  if (iFinePoint < iFinePoint_Neighbor) change_face_orientation = true;
16905 
16906  CoarseEdge = FindEdge(iParent, iCoarsePoint);
16907 
16908  fine_grid->edge[FineEdge]->GetNormal(Normal);
16909 
16910  if (change_face_orientation) {
16911  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Normal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim];
16912  edge[CoarseEdge]->AddNormal(Normal);
16913  }
16914  else {
16915  edge[CoarseEdge]->AddNormal(Normal);
16916  }
16917  }
16918  }
16919  }
16920  delete[] Normal;
16921 
16922  /*--- Check if there is a normal with null area ---*/
16923 
16924  for (iEdge = 0; iEdge < nEdge; iEdge++) {
16925  NormalFace = edge[iEdge]->GetNormal();
16926  Area = 0.0; for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Area += NormalFace[iDim]*NormalFace[iDim];
16927  Area = sqrt(Area);
16928  if (Area == 0.0) for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) NormalFace[iDim] = EPS*EPS;
16929  }
16930 
16931 }
16932 
16933 void CMultiGridGeometry::SetBoundControlVolume(CConfig *config, CGeometry *fine_grid, unsigned short action) {
16934  unsigned long iCoarsePoint, iFinePoint, FineVertex, iVertex;
16935  unsigned short iMarker, iChildren, iDim;
16936  su2double *Normal, Area, *NormalFace = NULL;
16937 
16938  Normal = new su2double [nDim];
16939 
16940  if (action != ALLOCATE) {
16941  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++)
16942  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++)
16943  vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->SetZeroValues();
16944  }
16945 
16946  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker ++)
16947  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
16948  iCoarsePoint = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
16949  for (iChildren = 0; iChildren < node[iCoarsePoint]->GetnChildren_CV(); iChildren ++) {
16950  iFinePoint = node[iCoarsePoint]->GetChildren_CV(iChildren);
16951  if (fine_grid->node[iFinePoint]->GetVertex(iMarker)!=-1) {
16952  FineVertex = fine_grid->node[iFinePoint]->GetVertex(iMarker);
16953  fine_grid->vertex[iMarker][FineVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
16954  vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->AddNormal(Normal);
16955  }
16956  }
16957  }
16958 
16959  delete[] Normal;
16960 
16961  /*--- Check if there is a normal with null area ---*/
16962  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker ++)
16963  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
16964  NormalFace = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal();
16965  Area = 0.0; for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Area += NormalFace[iDim]*NormalFace[iDim];
16966  Area = sqrt(Area);
16967  if (Area == 0.0) for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) NormalFace[iDim] = EPS*EPS;
16968  }
16969 
16970 }
16971 
16972 void CMultiGridGeometry::SetCoord(CGeometry *geometry) {
16973  unsigned long Point_Fine, Point_Coarse;
16974  unsigned short iChildren, iDim;
16975  su2double Area_Parent, Area_Children;
16976  su2double *Coordinates_Fine, *Coordinates;
16977  Coordinates = new su2double[nDim];
16978 
16979  for (Point_Coarse = 0; Point_Coarse < GetnPoint(); Point_Coarse++) {
16980  Area_Parent = node[Point_Coarse]->GetVolume();
16981  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Coordinates[iDim] = 0.0;
16982  for (iChildren = 0; iChildren < node[Point_Coarse]->GetnChildren_CV(); iChildren++) {
16983  Point_Fine = node[Point_Coarse]->GetChildren_CV(iChildren);
16984  Area_Children = geometry->node[Point_Fine]->GetVolume();
16985  Coordinates_Fine = geometry->node[Point_Fine]->GetCoord();
16986  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
16987  Coordinates[iDim] += Coordinates_Fine[iDim]*Area_Children/Area_Parent;
16988  }
16989  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
16990  node[Point_Coarse]->SetCoord(iDim, Coordinates[iDim]);
16991  }
16992  delete[] Coordinates;
16993 }
16994 
16995 void CMultiGridGeometry::SetMultiGridWallHeatFlux(CGeometry *geometry, unsigned short val_marker){
16996 
16997  unsigned long Point_Fine, Point_Coarse, iVertex;
16998  unsigned short iChildren;
16999  long Vertex_Fine;
17000  su2double Area_Parent, Area_Children;
17001  su2double WallHeatFlux_Fine, WallHeatFlux_Coarse;
17002  bool isVertex;
17003  int numberVertexChildren;
17004 
17005  for(iVertex=0; iVertex < nVertex[val_marker]; iVertex++){
17006  Point_Coarse = vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNode();
17007  if (node[Point_Coarse]->GetDomain()){
17008  Area_Parent = 0.0;
17009  WallHeatFlux_Coarse = 0.0;
17010  numberVertexChildren = 0;
17011  /*--- Compute area parent by taking into account only volumes that are on the marker ---*/
17012  for(iChildren=0; iChildren < node[Point_Coarse]->GetnChildren_CV(); iChildren++){
17013  Point_Fine = node[Point_Coarse]->GetChildren_CV(iChildren);
17014  isVertex = (node[Point_Fine]->GetDomain() && geometry->node[Point_Fine]->GetVertex(val_marker) != -1);
17015  if (isVertex){
17016  numberVertexChildren += 1;
17017  Area_Parent += geometry->node[Point_Fine]->GetVolume();
17018  }
17019  }
17020 
17021  /*--- Loop again and propagate values to the coarser level ---*/
17022  for(iChildren=0; iChildren < node[Point_Coarse]->GetnChildren_CV(); iChildren++){
17023  Point_Fine = node[Point_Coarse]->GetChildren_CV(iChildren);
17024  Vertex_Fine = geometry->node[Point_Fine]->GetVertex(val_marker);
17025  isVertex = (node[Point_Fine]->GetDomain() && Vertex_Fine != -1);
17026  if(isVertex){
17027  Area_Children = geometry->node[Point_Fine]->GetVolume();
17028  //Get the customized BC values on fine level and compute the values at coarse level
17029  WallHeatFlux_Fine = geometry->GetCustomBoundaryHeatFlux(val_marker, Vertex_Fine);
17030  WallHeatFlux_Coarse += WallHeatFlux_Fine*Area_Children/Area_Parent;
17031  }
17032 
17033  }
17034  //Set the customized BC values at coarse level
17035  CustomBoundaryHeatFlux[val_marker][iVertex] = WallHeatFlux_Coarse;
17036  }
17037  }
17038 
17039 }
17040 
17041 void CMultiGridGeometry::SetMultiGridWallTemperature(CGeometry *geometry, unsigned short val_marker){
17042 
17043  unsigned long Point_Fine, Point_Coarse, iVertex;
17044  unsigned short iChildren;
17045  long Vertex_Fine;
17046  su2double Area_Parent, Area_Children;
17047  su2double WallTemperature_Fine, WallTemperature_Coarse;
17048  bool isVertex;
17049  int numberVertexChildren;
17050 
17051  for(iVertex=0; iVertex < nVertex[val_marker]; iVertex++){
17052  Point_Coarse = vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNode();
17053  if (node[Point_Coarse]->GetDomain()){
17054  Area_Parent = 0.0;
17055  WallTemperature_Coarse = 0.0;
17056  numberVertexChildren = 0;
17057  /*--- Compute area parent by taking into account only volumes that are on the marker ---*/
17058  for(iChildren=0; iChildren < node[Point_Coarse]->GetnChildren_CV(); iChildren++){
17059  Point_Fine = node[Point_Coarse]->GetChildren_CV(iChildren);
17060  isVertex = (node[Point_Fine]->GetDomain() && geometry->node[Point_Fine]->GetVertex(val_marker) != -1);
17061  if (isVertex){
17062  numberVertexChildren += 1;
17063  Area_Parent += geometry->node[Point_Fine]->GetVolume();
17064  }
17065  }
17066 
17067  /*--- Loop again and propagate values to the coarser level ---*/
17068  for(iChildren=0; iChildren < node[Point_Coarse]->GetnChildren_CV(); iChildren++){
17069  Point_Fine = node[Point_Coarse]->GetChildren_CV(iChildren);
17070  Vertex_Fine = geometry->node[Point_Fine]->GetVertex(val_marker);
17071  isVertex = (node[Point_Fine]->GetDomain() && Vertex_Fine != -1);
17072  if(isVertex){
17073  Area_Children = geometry->node[Point_Fine]->GetVolume();
17074  //Get the customized BC values on fine level and compute the values at coarse level
17075  WallTemperature_Fine = geometry->GetCustomBoundaryTemperature(val_marker, Vertex_Fine);
17076  WallTemperature_Coarse += WallTemperature_Fine*Area_Children/Area_Parent;
17077  }
17078 
17079  }
17080  //Set the customized BC values at coarse level
17081  CustomBoundaryTemperature[val_marker][iVertex] = WallTemperature_Coarse;
17082  }
17083  }
17084 
17085 }
17086 
17087 void CMultiGridGeometry::SetRotationalVelocity(CConfig *config, unsigned short val_iZone, bool print) {
17088 
17089  unsigned long iPoint_Coarse;
17090  su2double *RotVel, Distance[3] = {0.0,0.0,0.0}, *Coord;
17091  su2double Center[3] = {0.0,0.0,0.0}, Omega[3] = {0.0,0.0,0.0}, L_Ref;
17092  RotVel = new su2double [3];
17093  unsigned short iDim;
17094 
17095  /*--- Center of rotation & angular velocity vector from config. ---*/
17096 
17097  for (iDim = 0; iDim < 3; iDim++){
17098  Center[iDim] = config->GetMotion_Origin(iDim);
17099  Omega[iDim] = config->GetRotation_Rate(iDim)/config->GetOmega_Ref();
17100  }
17101 
17102  L_Ref = config->GetLength_Ref();
17103 
17104  /*--- Loop over all nodes and set the rotational velocity. ---*/
17105 
17106  for (iPoint_Coarse = 0; iPoint_Coarse < GetnPoint(); iPoint_Coarse++) {
17107 
17108  /*--- Get the coordinates of the current node ---*/
17109 
17110  Coord = node[iPoint_Coarse]->GetCoord();
17111 
17112  /*--- Calculate the non-dim. distance from the rotation center ---*/
17113 
17114  Distance[0] = (Coord[0]-Center[0])/L_Ref;
17115  Distance[1] = (Coord[1]-Center[1])/L_Ref;
17116  Distance[2] = (Coord[2]-Center[2])/L_Ref;
17117 
17118  /*--- Calculate the angular velocity as omega X r ---*/
17119 
17120  RotVel[0] = Omega[1]*(Distance[2]) - Omega[2]*(Distance[1]);
17121  RotVel[1] = Omega[2]*(Distance[0]) - Omega[0]*(Distance[2]);
17122  RotVel[2] = Omega[0]*(Distance[1]) - Omega[1]*(Distance[0]);
17123 
17124  /*--- Store the grid velocity at this node ---*/
17125 
17126  node[iPoint_Coarse]->SetGridVel(RotVel);
17127 
17128  }
17129 
17130  delete [] RotVel;
17131 
17132 }
17133 
17134 void CMultiGridGeometry::SetShroudVelocity(CConfig *config) {
17135 
17136  unsigned long iPoint, iVertex;
17137  unsigned short iMarker, iMarkerShroud;
17138  su2double RotVel[3];
17139 
17140  RotVel[0] = 0.0;
17141  RotVel[1] = 0.0;
17142  RotVel[2] = 0.0;
17143 
17144  /*--- Loop over all vertex in the shroud marker and set the rotational velocity to 0.0 ---*/
17145  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++){
17146  for(iMarkerShroud=0; iMarkerShroud < config->GetnMarker_Shroud(); iMarkerShroud++){
17147  if(config->GetMarker_Shroud(iMarkerShroud) == config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(iMarker)){
17148  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
17149  iPoint = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
17150  node[iPoint]->SetGridVel(RotVel);
17151  }
17152  }
17153  }
17154  }
17155 }
17156 
17157 void CMultiGridGeometry::SetTranslationalVelocity(CConfig *config, unsigned short val_iZone, bool print) {
17158 
17159  unsigned iDim;
17160  unsigned long iPoint_Coarse;
17161  su2double xDot[3] = {0.0,0.0,0.0};
17162 
17163  /*--- Get the translational velocity vector from config ---*/
17164 
17165  for (iDim = 0; iDim < 3; iDim++){
17166  xDot[iDim] = config->GetTranslation_Rate(iDim)/config->GetVelocity_Ref();
17167  }
17168 
17169  /*--- Loop over all nodes and set the translational velocity ---*/
17170 
17171  for (iPoint_Coarse = 0; iPoint_Coarse < nPoint; iPoint_Coarse++) {
17172 
17173  /*--- Store the grid velocity at this node ---*/
17174 
17175  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
17176  node[iPoint_Coarse]->SetGridVel(iDim,xDot[iDim]);
17177 
17178  }
17179 
17180 }
17181 
17182 void CMultiGridGeometry::SetGridVelocity(CConfig *config, unsigned long iter) {
17183 
17184  /*--- Local variables ---*/
17185 
17186  su2double *Coord_nP1 = NULL, *Coord_n = NULL, *Coord_nM1 = NULL;
17187  su2double TimeStep, GridVel = 0.0;
17188  unsigned long Point_Coarse;
17189  unsigned short iDim;
17190 
17191  /*--- Compute the velocity of each node in the volume mesh ---*/
17192 
17193  for (Point_Coarse = 0; Point_Coarse < GetnPoint(); Point_Coarse++) {
17194 
17195  /*--- Coordinates of the current point at n+1, n, & n-1 time levels ---*/
17196 
17197  Coord_nM1 = node[Point_Coarse]->GetCoord_n1();
17198  Coord_n = node[Point_Coarse]->GetCoord_n();
17199  Coord_nP1 = node[Point_Coarse]->GetCoord();
17200 
17201  /*--- Unsteady time step ---*/
17202 
17203  TimeStep = config->GetDelta_UnstTimeND();
17204 
17205  /*--- Compute mesh velocity with 1st or 2nd-order approximation ---*/
17206 
17207  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
17208  if (config->GetTime_Marching() == DT_STEPPING_1ST)
17209  GridVel = ( Coord_nP1[iDim] - Coord_n[iDim] ) / TimeStep;
17210  if (config->GetTime_Marching() == DT_STEPPING_2ND)
17211  GridVel = ( 3.0*Coord_nP1[iDim] - 4.0*Coord_n[iDim]
17212  + 1.0*Coord_nM1[iDim] ) / (2.0*TimeStep);
17213 
17214  /*--- Store grid velocity for this point ---*/
17215 
17216  node[Point_Coarse]->SetGridVel(iDim, GridVel);
17217 
17218  }
17219  }
17220 }
17221 
17222 void CMultiGridGeometry::SetRestricted_GridVelocity(CGeometry *fine_mesh, CConfig *config) {
17223 
17224  /*--- Local variables ---*/
17225  unsigned short iDim, iChild;
17226  unsigned long Point_Coarse, Point_Fine;
17227  su2double Area_Parent, Area_Child, Grid_Vel[3], *Grid_Vel_Fine;
17228 
17229  /*--- Loop over all coarse mesh points ---*/
17230  for (Point_Coarse = 0; Point_Coarse < GetnPoint(); Point_Coarse++) {
17231  Area_Parent = node[Point_Coarse]->GetVolume();
17232 
17233  /*--- Zero out the grid velocity ---*/
17234  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
17235  Grid_Vel[iDim] = 0.0;
17236 
17237  /*--- Loop over all of the children for this coarse CV and compute
17238  a grid velocity based on the values in the child CVs (fine mesh). ---*/
17239  for (iChild = 0; iChild < node[Point_Coarse]->GetnChildren_CV(); iChild++) {
17240  Point_Fine = node[Point_Coarse]->GetChildren_CV(iChild);
17241  Area_Child = fine_mesh->node[Point_Fine]->GetVolume();
17242  Grid_Vel_Fine = fine_mesh->node[Point_Fine]->GetGridVel();
17243  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
17244  Grid_Vel[iDim] += Grid_Vel_Fine[iDim]*Area_Child/Area_Parent;
17245  }
17246 
17247  /*--- Set the grid velocity for this coarse node. ---*/
17248  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
17249  node[Point_Coarse]->SetGridVel(iDim, Grid_Vel[iDim]);
17250  }
17251 }
17252 
17253 
17254 void CMultiGridGeometry::FindNormal_Neighbor(CConfig *config) {
17255 
17256  unsigned short iMarker, iDim;
17257  unsigned long iPoint, iVertex;
17258 
17259  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
17260 
17261  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != SEND_RECEIVE &&
17262  config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != INTERFACE_BOUNDARY &&
17263  config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != NEARFIELD_BOUNDARY ) {
17264 
17265  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
17266 
17267  iPoint = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
17268 
17269  /*--- If the node belong to the domain ---*/
17270  if (node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
17271 
17272  /*--- Compute closest normal neighbor ---*/
17273  su2double cos_max, scalar_prod, norm_vect, norm_Normal, cos_alpha, diff_coord;
17274  unsigned long Point_Normal = 0, jPoint;
17275  unsigned short iNeigh;
17276  su2double *Normal = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal();
17277  cos_max = -1.0;
17278  for (iNeigh = 0; iNeigh < node[iPoint]->GetnPoint(); iNeigh++) {
17279  jPoint = node[iPoint]->GetPoint(iNeigh);
17280  scalar_prod = 0.0; norm_vect = 0.0; norm_Normal = 0.0;
17281  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
17282  diff_coord = node[jPoint]->GetCoord(iDim)-node[iPoint]->GetCoord(iDim);
17283  scalar_prod += diff_coord*Normal[iDim];
17284  norm_vect += diff_coord*diff_coord;
17285  norm_Normal += Normal[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
17286  }
17287  norm_vect = sqrt(norm_vect);
17288  norm_Normal = sqrt(norm_Normal);
17289  cos_alpha = scalar_prod/(norm_vect*norm_Normal);
17290 
17291  /*--- Get maximum cosine (not minimum because normals are oriented inwards) ---*/
17292  if (cos_alpha >= cos_max) {
17293  Point_Normal = jPoint;
17294  cos_max = cos_alpha;
17295  }
17296  }
17297  vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->SetNormal_Neighbor(Point_Normal);
17298  }
17299  }
17300  }
17301  }
17302 }
17303 
17304 
17305 void CMultiGridGeometry::SetGeometryPlanes(CConfig *config) {
17306  bool loop_on;
17307  unsigned short iMarker = 0;
17308  su2double auxXCoord, auxYCoord, auxZCoord, *Face_Normal = NULL, auxArea, *Xcoord = NULL, *Ycoord = NULL, *Zcoord = NULL, *FaceArea = NULL;
17309  unsigned long jVertex, iVertex, ixCoord, iPoint, iVertex_Wall, nVertex_Wall = 0;
17310 
17311  /*--- Compute the total number of points on the near-field ---*/
17312  nVertex_Wall = 0;
17313  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++)
17314  if ((config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == HEAT_FLUX) ||
17315  (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == ISOTHERMAL) ||
17316  (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == EULER_WALL) )
17317  nVertex_Wall += nVertex[iMarker];
17318 
17319 
17320  /*--- Create an array with all the coordinates, points, pressures, face area,
17321  equivalent area, and nearfield weight ---*/
17322  Xcoord = new su2double[nVertex_Wall];
17323  Ycoord = new su2double[nVertex_Wall];
17324  if (nDim == 3) Zcoord = new su2double[nVertex_Wall];
17325  FaceArea = new su2double[nVertex_Wall];
17326 
17327  /*--- Copy the boundary information to an array ---*/
17328  iVertex_Wall = 0;
17329  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++)
17330  if ((config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == HEAT_FLUX) ||
17331  (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == ISOTHERMAL) ||
17332  (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == EULER_WALL) )
17333  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
17334  iPoint = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
17335  Xcoord[iVertex_Wall] = node[iPoint]->GetCoord(0);
17336  Ycoord[iVertex_Wall] = node[iPoint]->GetCoord(1);
17337  if (nDim==3) Zcoord[iVertex_Wall] = node[iPoint]->GetCoord(2);
17338  Face_Normal = vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal();
17339  FaceArea[iVertex_Wall] = fabs(Face_Normal[nDim-1]);
17340  iVertex_Wall ++;
17341  }
17342 
17343 
17344  //vector<su2double> XCoordList;
17345  vector<su2double>::iterator IterXCoordList;
17346 
17347  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex_Wall; iVertex++)
17348  XCoordList.push_back(Xcoord[iVertex]);
17349 
17350  sort( XCoordList.begin(), XCoordList.end());
17351  IterXCoordList = unique( XCoordList.begin(), XCoordList.end());
17352  XCoordList.resize( IterXCoordList - XCoordList.begin() );
17353 
17354  /*--- Create vectors and distribute the values among the different PhiAngle queues ---*/
17355  Xcoord_plane.resize(XCoordList.size());
17356  Ycoord_plane.resize(XCoordList.size());
17357  if (nDim==3) Zcoord_plane.resize(XCoordList.size());
17358  FaceArea_plane.resize(XCoordList.size());
17359  Plane_points.resize(XCoordList.size());
17360 
17361 
17362  su2double dist_ratio;
17363  unsigned long iCoord;
17364 
17365  /*--- Distribute the values among the different PhiAngles ---*/
17366  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
17367  if (node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
17368  loop_on = true;
17369  for (ixCoord = 0; ixCoord < XCoordList.size()-1 && loop_on; ixCoord++) {
17370  dist_ratio = (node[iPoint]->GetCoord(0) - XCoordList[ixCoord])/(XCoordList[ixCoord+1]- XCoordList[ixCoord]);
17371  if (dist_ratio >= 0 && dist_ratio <= 1.0) {
17372  if (dist_ratio <= 0.5) iCoord = ixCoord;
17373  else iCoord = ixCoord+1;
17374  Xcoord_plane[iCoord].push_back(node[iPoint]->GetCoord(0) );
17375  Ycoord_plane[iCoord].push_back(node[iPoint]->GetCoord(1) );
17376  if (nDim==3) Zcoord_plane[iCoord].push_back(node[iPoint]->GetCoord(2) );
17377  FaceArea_plane[iCoord].push_back(node[iPoint]->GetVolume());
17378  Plane_points[iCoord].push_back(iPoint );
17379  loop_on = false;
17380  }
17381  }
17382  }
17383  }
17384 
17385  unsigned long auxPoint;
17386  /*--- Order the arrays in ascending values of y ---*/
17387  for (ixCoord = 0; ixCoord < XCoordList.size(); ixCoord++)
17388  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < Xcoord_plane[ixCoord].size(); iVertex++)
17389  for (jVertex = 0; jVertex < Xcoord_plane[ixCoord].size() - 1 - iVertex; jVertex++)
17390  if (Ycoord_plane[ixCoord][jVertex] > Ycoord_plane[ixCoord][jVertex+1]) {
17391  auxXCoord = Xcoord_plane[ixCoord][jVertex]; Xcoord_plane[ixCoord][jVertex] = Xcoord_plane[ixCoord][jVertex+1]; Xcoord_plane[ixCoord][jVertex+1] = auxXCoord;
17392  auxYCoord = Ycoord_plane[ixCoord][jVertex]; Ycoord_plane[ixCoord][jVertex] = Ycoord_plane[ixCoord][jVertex+1]; Ycoord_plane[ixCoord][jVertex+1] = auxYCoord;
17393  auxPoint = Plane_points[ixCoord][jVertex]; Plane_points[ixCoord][jVertex] = Plane_points[ixCoord][jVertex+1]; Plane_points[ixCoord][jVertex+1] = auxPoint;
17394  if (nDim==3) {
17395  auxZCoord = Zcoord_plane[ixCoord][jVertex]; Zcoord_plane[ixCoord][jVertex] = Zcoord_plane[ixCoord][jVertex+1]; Zcoord_plane[ixCoord][jVertex+1] = auxZCoord;
17396  }
17397  auxArea = FaceArea_plane[ixCoord][jVertex]; FaceArea_plane[ixCoord][jVertex] = FaceArea_plane[ixCoord][jVertex+1]; FaceArea_plane[ixCoord][jVertex+1] = auxArea;
17398  }
17399 
17400  /*--- Delete structures ---*/
17401  delete[] Xcoord; delete[] Ycoord;
17402  if (Zcoord != NULL) delete[] Zcoord;
17403  delete[] FaceArea;
17404 }
17405 
17406 CDummyGeometry::CDummyGeometry(CConfig *config){
17407 
17408  size = SU2_MPI::GetSize();
17409  rank = SU2_MPI::GetRank();
17410 
17411  nEdge = 0;
17412  nPoint = 0;
17413  nPointDomain = 0;
17414  nPointNode = 0;
17415  nElem = 0;
17416  nMarker = 0;
17417  nZone = config->GetnZone();
17418 
17419  nElem_Bound = NULL;
17420  Tag_to_Marker = NULL;
17421  elem = NULL;
17422  face = NULL;
17423  bound = NULL;
17424  node = NULL;
17425  edge = NULL;
17426  vertex = NULL;
17427  nVertex = NULL;
17428  newBound = NULL;
17429  nNewElem_Bound = NULL;
17430  Marker_All_SendRecv = NULL;
17431 
17432  XCoordList.clear();
17433  Xcoord_plane.clear();
17434  Ycoord_plane.clear();
17435  Zcoord_plane.clear();
17436  FaceArea_plane.clear();
17437  Plane_points.clear();
17438 
17439  /*--- Arrays for defining the linear partitioning ---*/
17440 
17441  beg_node = NULL;
17442  end_node = NULL;
17443 
17444  nPointLinear = NULL;
17445  nPointCumulative = NULL;
17446 
17447  /*--- Containers for customized boundary conditions ---*/
17448 
17449  CustomBoundaryHeatFlux = NULL; //Customized heat flux wall
17450  CustomBoundaryTemperature = NULL; //Customized temperature wall
17451 
17452  /*--- MPI point-to-point data structures ---*/
17453 
17454  nP2PSend = 0;
17455  nP2PRecv = 0;
17456 
17457  countPerPoint = 0;
17458 
17459  bufD_P2PSend = NULL;
17460  bufD_P2PRecv = NULL;
17461 
17462  bufS_P2PSend = NULL;
17463  bufS_P2PRecv = NULL;
17464 
17465  req_P2PSend = NULL;
17466  req_P2PRecv = NULL;
17467 
17468  nPoint_P2PSend = new int[size];
17469  nPoint_P2PRecv = new int[size];
17470 
17471  Neighbors_P2PSend = NULL;
17472  Neighbors_P2PRecv = NULL;
17473 
17474  Local_Point_P2PSend = NULL;
17475  Local_Point_P2PRecv = NULL;
17476 
17477  /*--- MPI periodic data structures ---*/
17478 
17479  nPeriodicSend = 0;
17480  nPeriodicRecv = 0;
17481 
17482  countPerPeriodicPoint = 0;
17483 
17484  bufD_PeriodicSend = NULL;
17485  bufD_PeriodicRecv = NULL;
17486 
17487  bufS_PeriodicSend = NULL;
17488  bufS_PeriodicRecv = NULL;
17489 
17490  req_PeriodicSend = NULL;
17491  req_PeriodicRecv = NULL;
17492 
17493  nPoint_PeriodicSend = NULL;
17494  nPoint_PeriodicRecv = NULL;
17495 
17496  Neighbors_PeriodicSend = NULL;
17497  Neighbors_PeriodicRecv = NULL;
17498 
17499  Local_Point_PeriodicSend = NULL;
17500  Local_Point_PeriodicRecv = NULL;
17501 
17502  Local_Marker_PeriodicSend = NULL;
17503  Local_Marker_PeriodicRecv = NULL;
17504 
17505  nVertex = new unsigned long[config->GetnMarker_All()];
17506 
17507  for (unsigned short iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++){
17508  nVertex[iMarker] = 0;
17509  }
17510 
17511  Tag_to_Marker = new string[config->GetnMarker_All()];
17512 
17513  for (unsigned short iRank = 0; iRank < size; iRank++){
17514  nPoint_P2PRecv[iRank] = 0;
17515  nPoint_P2PSend[iRank] = 0;
17516  }
17517 
17518  nDim = CConfig::GetnDim(config->GetMesh_FileName(), config->GetMesh_FileFormat());
17519 
17520  config->SetnSpanWiseSections(0);
17521 }

Definition: config_structure.inl:419
CGeometry::SetSpline
void SetSpline(vector< su2double > &x, vector< su2double > &y, unsigned long n, su2double yp1, su2double ypn, vector< su2double > &y2)
Given arrays x[1..n] and y[1..n] containing a tabulated function, i.e., yi = f(xi), with x1 < x2 < . . . < xN , and given values yp1 and ypn for the first derivative of the interpolating function at points 1 and n, respectively, this routine returns an array y2[1..n] that contains the second derivatives of the interpolating function at the tabulated points xi. If yp1 and/or ypn are equal to 1 × 1030 or larger, the routine is signaled to set the corresponding boundary condition for a natural spline, with zero second derivative on that boundary. Numerical Recipes: The Art of Scientific Computing, Third Edition in C++.
